story:
Hey friends and family, as my Dystopia Rising friends in texas know, in October I fell backwards off a slab of concrete and broke my ankle badly in two places. I have since been unable to put my foot down until this week alone and I still have a month of physical therapy before I can honestly Walk again.

Shortly thereafter, I lost my job, and the bills began piling up. I have exhausted all of my resources and enough of my immediate family's as well. And as much as I hate asking for help, 10 dollar drawings and unemployment checks worth less than I made at part time minimum wage... just isn't gonna fix this. 

I owe many bills, and am now facing homelessness. I am being kicked out of where I currently live at the end of december. I have a family member willing to lend me some space until I move, which I can't feasibly do until mid january, but I just don't have the money to do anything right now. I am desperate enough to finally ask for help getting back on my feet. 

In order to survive until february, which is when realistically I can move to the new place and find a job and take care of things on my own, I need help with three things. Medical bills, A working car, and moving costs. 

 

My total breakdown is as follows: 

Medical

Outstanding medical bills: approx 165$

Physical therapy costs: approx 600$

Anticipated bills to come: at least 200$

Vehicle

Outstanding car payments: 180$

Car insurance (3 mos): 150$

Repairs still needed: at least 65$

Relocation

Rent until february: 800$

Miscellaneous moving expenses: at least 100$

 

Total approximate needed: at least 2260$

5% for indiegogo: approx 115$

Total asking for: approx 2400$

 

I apologize that I have to ask, as asking for or accepting handouts goes against my normal nature, but I desperately need the help. I cannot do it on my own. If I could earn it I would, but it's just too much too quick. Any help at all is appreciated, and if I can at least cross a few items off the list, it will be better than nothing. I love you guys.

Thank you for your consideration.

story:
I'm Dawn Derow, Founder of DIVINE BODY BALANCE, Personal Trainer, Yoga Instructor, Group Fitness Instructor for CRUNCH FITNESS, EXHALE SPA & MOVING STRENGTH. I practice what I preach to my private clients and students when it comes to Health & Fitness. I am passionate about guiding people to feeling good about your Body/Mind/Soul through fitness & nutrition. 

A few months ago I decided to embark on a new fitness journey for myself and enter into the world of Fitness & Figure competing. World Beauty Fitness & Fashion (WBFF) is an internationally recognized competition merging fitness, fashion & beauty which provides amazing opportunities for its  top 6 contestants. With everything I do in my career, it's very important that I take my own fitness goals to a new and challenging level. It's not easy, and in fact, it takes an incredible amount of discipline and commitment to do this, but I have some of the best trainers & coaches on my side to help me along the way. On November 7th I will be competing, so everything I am doing now, workouts, eating right, sleeping, is preparing me for the big event!  My goals are to place in one of the top 6 spots, be offered my pro card and secure representation with a Fitness Modeling Agency.

As soon as I began this journey I quickly realized how costly this process was going to be. Training sessions in the gym, preparing every meal within strict dietary guidelines from my nutritionist (organic, fresh, measured, weighed etc.) Weekly sessions with my posing coach, treatments, such as chiropractic, massage and physical therapy. Two bikini costumes and my "Aphrodite" inspired Diva Fitness costume, hair, make-up and other accessories. After all of that, there is the cost of getting to Rhode Island for the Weekend of November 6 & 7, hotels, spray tan, tickets to the show and lets not forget the cost of the registration fees. This is why I am asking for your sponsorship. 

In addition to offsetting the above expenses, your donation will also benefit a wonderful organization called "BENT ON LEARNING."

BENT ON LEARNING is a non-profit organization committed to teaching children in the New York City public school system. They bring yoga to as many students as possible and not in a different location, but right there in the classroom, where the learning happens. It's amazing what you can achieve when you put your MIND, BODY & PASSION into action! Regardless of whether or not I reach my fundraising goal, I will still be donating 10% of whatever I raise to BENT ON LEARNING. This is only the beginning of my partnership with them… in the coming year, I hope to teach some of their classes, be a role model for children who are new to yoga and help provide a positive outlet for them as they pursue their education. As a yoga teacher and fitness professional, I feel a strong connection to the services that BENT ON LEARNING is providing for the children in the public school system. If I reach my fundraising goal, I will be able to help BENT ON LEARNING  buy 75 YOGA MATS for children all over New York (16 schools) in almost all of the boroughs. Learn more about BENT ON LEARNING HERE: http://bentonlearning.org/

If you contribute to my Fitness Competition Fund you will receive some lovely fitness related incentives. 

**Moving Strength is a studio I work for on the Upper East & Upper West Side - by donating you will receive a free class.

** Since I teach group fitness for Crunch - they have donated a 3 day Crunch Pass to their many gyms.

**Nick Ebner is my trainer and nutritionist. He has donated a few of his Saturday classes so you can experience some of the fundamental things I have learned throughout my training. 

** I am also offering the following services:

* Personal Training Session

* Private Yoga Session

* Thai Massage Stretch

**If you are a music lover - you will receive a MAC Nominated CD of 'Music 4 Two.'  MAC Award Winning DVD of  'Revolution', or a DVD of my Classical Show - "LEGIT". 

**Lastly, and my personal favorite, are the SHOES! 361 Apparel/Onedegreebeyond  (the official sponsor of the RIO 2016 Olympics) - has donated a pair of their running sneakers.

If you would like a 'sneak peek' of the competition - you may come join us at PEARL STUDIOS 519 8th Ave - on Saturday, October 24th for the MOCK TRIAL RUN THROUGH. 2pm doors open, show is at 2:30pm. $10 at the door.  For more information email: compprep@phoenyxfitnes.com 

I am grateful for all your support! Please get the word out to your friends, let people know through your social media platform. 

And to those of you contributing right now, THANK YOU! Thank you for helping me "Bring home the gold". Much Appreciated. 

Namaste ~ 

Dawn

story:
Tinted Relief

No one will know..

There is an inconceivable amount of people who suffer with the restraints of dandruff because they are ashamed and do not commonly talk about it. Whether it is an issue of embarrassment or financial insufficiency, the need for an accessible product would make a prominent impact on the majority of people's lives. 

The specific ingredients in the formula provide  hydration and moisture of the scalp to relieve itching. The synthetically source tint will disguise and blend the dandruff into hair.

 

 

Before Picture:

Person's A hair styled into a pony tail exposing dandruff at the scalp on forehead

 

 

 

After Picture:

Person A's hair and scalp sprayed twice with Tinted Relief

 

 

 

Before Picture:

Person B's hair styled exposing bald spot and dandruff on back of head

 

 

After Picture:

Person B’s  hair sprayed with Tinted Relief and rubbed into the scalp.

Do not forget to wash hands after blending into scalp!

 

 

 

How To Use:

Style hair. Spray hair and scalp with Tinted Relief. Blend onto any bald spots or onto scalp.

 

 

 

Walk away with confidence. I started this company because I personally understand the struggles of needing a hair solution at a reasonable price. I have scalp psoriasis and dandruff. I have looked into many alternatives however most are not over the counter and require health insurance, which is expensive and many cannot afford. 

I work in the hospitality industry and must keep my hair tight and up to 10 to 14 hours  day. No matter how many times I wash my hair, I feel unclean and self conscious.

I created this product to help me and I want it to help you too.

story:
YOU CAN PRE-ORDER ESTRIDE ON WWW.ESTRIDE.STORE

 

ESTRIDE is a rider friendly multi-functional fitness tracker that measures everything you need to improve your riding and insure the health of your horse. Ideal for hacking, training, competition and/or any other activity in the equestrian field.

Tracking:

  • Stride Count
  • Fitness
  • Calorie Burn
  • Regularity
  • Gait pattern analysis with advanced horse health tracker

ESTRIDE is the fastest and most accurate biomechanical analytics tool so far. Using advanced machine learning algorithms, ESTRIDE can learn and track your horses' stride and riding patterns and make recommendations to improve your riding style.

 

 

ESTRIDE Summary - In a Nutshell

  • Available in 3 configurations: ESTRIDE STEP, ESTRIDE BALANCE, ESTRIDE PRECISION.

  • MyEstride personal cloud available on PC, Mac, Tablets and Smartphones (IoS and Android) anywhere, anytime.

  • Advanced Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence algorithms. The more you ride, the more accurate data you get.

  • Up to 10 hour battery life 

  • Wireless communication  range up to 1.2km (0.7miles).

  • Lifetime free feature upgrade via MyEstride.
 
Dashboard
 

Compare Features

No matter what your skill level is, we have an ESTRIDE to meet your expectation.  

You can upgrade from Step - Balance - Precision at any time, should you want to.

Extras available to purchase on MyEstride Portal

What is ESTRIDE?

 

ESTRIDE is made up of

Boot positioning

Dimensions

All dimensions provided in cm

Technical Details

 

  • High precision 9-DOF sensor 
  • Long range RF Module 
  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • Lithium-polymer battery 
  • Bluetooth operating temperature: -4℃ to 65℃ 
  • Other components operating temperature: -40℃ to 85℃

Software Features at glance

Following features available anytime, anywhere in on computer, tablet or mobile. 

MyEstride on Mobile, Tablet, Computer, Laptop

ESTRIDE in action

1. Training

ESTRIDE allows you to track your daily training and compare with past sessions or between multiple horses.

  • Measure Time in each gait
  • Training time compare
  • Gait Pattern for walk, trot and canter
  • Measure Jumps
  • Identify Gait inconsistencies
  • Stride Change Alert

Gait pattern

 

Activity time monitoring and comparison

 

2. Calorie Burn

Estride also calculates both the number of calories burned in training by the horse and by the rider.

  • Horse calories burnt
  • Rider calories burnt

 

Rider calorie burn vs riding time

3. Regularity Scoring

ESTRIDE helps you identify stability of front or hind legs and measure the stride consistency over time.

  • Horse stability (each leg / each gait) 
  • Horse consistency in each gait

 

4. Stride Irregularity

Automatic advanced warnings and alerts in case of irregularities in regular stride patterns. This could help in very early diagnosis of lameness or injury.

  • Early stride change indicator

 

5. Rehabilitation Monitoring post injury/lameness

ESTRIDE monitors your daily riding pattern and learns from it. It assists in injury or lameness recuperation. Keep an eye on improvements to help you reach your goals!

 

6. Activity Log

Keep an eye of your regular training sessions

 

7. Training calendar

Challenge yourself with your training calendar. Compare previous training times at a glance.

 

8. Training goals

ESTRIDE can help you set targets for 

  • Total Training time
  • Horse/Rider Calorie burn  
  • Strides per gait
  • Jumping effort
  • Gait duration

 

Technical Modules

This module gives you futuristic suggestions based on your training technique vs your horse's pattern. Advanced mathematical technique and computerized simulations allow you to see emerging patterns in your horses training and help you reach your goals and fullest potential. 

It calculates a range of possible outcomes and probabilities that can occur with certain training sessions and generate decision trees based on the outcomes. It can  help you and your horse build up to a competition and achieve maximum potential.

  • Trainer Notes
  • Predictive Analytics
  • Detail Pattern Analyser
  • Stability Analyser
  • Consistency Analyser

Match your style

Available in 3 colours

Option 1:   

Node: Jet black with red silicon band (Matt)

Controller: Jet black with Red Base (Glossy)

Option 2:  

Node: Jet black with white silicon band (Matt)

Controller: Jet black (Glossy)

Option 3:  

Node: Crystal white with black silicon band (Matt)

Controller: Crystal white (Glossy)

    Sleek Controller Design

    Prototype Gallery

    Received final pcb lot 1

    Final PCB's printed

    Writing complex algorithms

    Node 3D print

    Controller 3d print

    Boot design brainstorming

    First prototype pcb

    Idea conception from scratch

    Timeline

    Team

    Hennie - The horse behind our inspiration

    Arpan Bhatia - Software and Analytics

    Victoria Caley - Equine Bio-mechanics

    Poonam Goyal - Integration Specialist

    Hideo Awira - Electronics Expert

    Ami Heida - Product Design

    Nikola Serer - Product Design

    Lazar Daniel - Digital Media

    Andrii Markiv - Digital Media

    Denis Dolganov - Product Render

    Fine Print

    International Backers

    We are proud to have the support of international backers. We will ship Estride worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. 

    Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. 

    Estimated Delivery 

    Each reward may have a different estimated shipment month. While we strive to work towards achieving the tight deadlines, there might be a possibility that we may slip. We will keep you updated when/if the estimated shipping date changes.

    Warranty

    We are here for you. Each Estride product includes with a 30-day (after you receive it) money back guarantee, only if unused and returned in original packing and minimum 1 year limited warranty. Please visit http://www.estride.store/legal/Warranty for more details.

    Questions? 

    Please contact our support team if you have any questions - we'll help you out. support@stride-invent.com

    Disclaimer

    Look and feel of the final product might differ depending various considerations during final design.

    Smartphone would require Bluetooth 4.0 module and an active internet connection to sync data to your cloud.  To check if your mobile phone supports BLE (Bluetooth low energy - used to send data from controller to mobile), use apps available on the mobile store.   

    Estride App not available for mobile phones running Windows operating system.  

    Estride ships with Neoprene boots as standard, leather boots can be ordered at later stage or unless specified with the order.

    Battery life and charge cycles vary with use, settings, and other factors; actual results will vary.  

    Wireless range can differ depending on environmental factors such as interference.  

    Estride is initially available in English and other languages available in 2018.

    Estride is splash resistant but not waterproof. Incidental exposure to water while riding in rain or through shallow puddles won’t ruin your device, but submerging the device is not recommended under any circumstances. If you intend to ride in water to the depth where the boot might be fully submerged, we do not recommend you use Estride for such activities. Estride leather boots are not water resistant.

    Risks and Challenges

    Estride is nearly complete. We’re currently working on challenges with manufacturing, production and international shipping. As a team, we are dedicated to delivering Estride to you ASAP and will keep you updated at every step.

    We learn from mistakes. But sometimes due to unforeseen circumstances, we might miss the target. If we do, we’ll let you know the reasons behind it and try to solve it as quickly as possible.

    Supply Chain Risk

    We have worked hard in organising a logistics network to ensure smooth delivery of all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

    Terms and Conditions

    Backers with EU shipping addresses will be responsible for paying duties and taxes at the time of shipping.

    http://www.estride.store/legal/Privacy.pdf
    http://www.estride.store/legal/Warranty.pdf
    http://www.estride.store/legal/Cookie.pdf
    http://www.estride.store/legal/Terms.pdf

Estride is initially available in English and other languages available in 2018.
Estride is splash resistant but not waterproof. Incidental exposure to water while riding in rain or through shallow puddles won’t ruin your device, but submerging the device is not recommended under any circumstances. If you intend to ride in water to the depth where the boot might be fully submerged, we do not recommend you use Estride for such activities. Estride leather boots are not water resistant.
Risks and Challenges
Estride is nearly complete. We’re currently working on challenges with manufacturing, production and international shipping. As a team, we are dedicated to delivering Estride to you ASAP and will keep you updated at every step.
We learn from mistakes. But sometimes due to unforeseen circumstances, we might miss the target. If we do, we’ll let you know the reasons behind it and try to solve it as quickly as possible.
Supply Chain Risk
We have worked hard in organising a logistics network to ensure smooth delivery of all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.
Terms and Conditions
Backers with EU shipping addresses will be responsible for paying duties and taxes at the time of shipping.
http://www.estride.store/legal/Privacy.pdfhttp://www.estride.store/legal/Warranty.pdfhttp://www.estride.store/legal/Cookie.pdfhttp://www.estride.store/legal/Terms.pdf

story:
Feature Highlights:

 CES 2020 Innovation Award  winner.  The best gift you can give  Mom and Dad.

  • Plug in like a nightlight.  Use as a flashlight in the event of a power outage.
  • Equipped with learning sensors that detect motion, sound, temperature, air quality, humidity, vibration and volatile organic compounds. 
  • Comes with the app and the Wellness Dashboard for monitoring.
  • No cameras and recorded audio needed. 
  • Sends a notification when it detects behavior and environment abnormalities.
  • Hands-free communication. Use like an intercom, anywhere you are in the world.
  • Set voice reminders for medications, appointments, activities and more.
  • Comes with free lifetime monitoring service - an Indiegogo campaign exclusive. 
    ​



Don't wait until something happens. Verify that your parents are okay at all times. 



 

FREE LIFETIME MONITORING SERVICE

 

Monitor daily routine non-intrusively, with sensors that learn normal patterns and behaviors over time.

 

 

 

 


With the Wellness Dashboard, you can review everything CareAlert senses at a glance. See levels of activity, comfort, and environmental quality.
 


 



 

 If something doesn’t seem right, CareAlert will alert you immediately, connecting you with its two-way communicator so you can check in.

 


 

Multiple sensors learn their daily routines, so CareAlert can alert you when unusual behavior or activity happens.

For complete monitoring, we recommend a CareAlert in the bedroom, bathroom and the kitchen or living room.

 

 

 


 

No need for pillboxes. Set custom pre-recorded voice reminders for medicines and dosage.


 


 

Intercom-style voice calls can be answered from anywhere within audio range.
 

 

Simply plug CareAlert into each room—it looks just like a nightlight! 

In the event of a power outage, it can be used as a battery-powered emergency light.

 


 

Grandchildren can use the CareAlert app to let their grandparents that they're being thought of. With the push of a button on the app, CareAlert's light blinks. 


 

 



 

 

What the App includes
 

Access to and set up of the wellness dashboard

Activity reporting

Programmed voice reminders

20 voice chats per month

Security and software bug updates 

Life time software updates

Up to 5 family members or caregivers can use the app to have access to the dashboard and notifications

Monitoring after the first year

The first year monitoring is free, afterwards if you choose to keep the monitoring option, subscription cost is $250/year. This provides you with all the additional features as they become available.

             

 

Minimum number of units

Recommended for a complete home monitoring set up. 


 

 

 

 


What started as a way to ensure CareAlert's Founder Fereydoun Taslimi's mother-in-law was home safe became a multi-year project aimed at creating an intelligent, interactive monitoring system that ensures privacy and peace of mind.  

HIs mother-in-law's landline was accidentally knocked off the hook one evening and her cellphone was in her purse, with the battery drained while she was out shopping.  Fereydoun and his wife Lili had not heard from her and started to worry even more when phone calls went directly to voice mail.  They drove to her house to check on her, just to find her playing solitaire on he  iPad and everything was fine. 

Fereydoun realized that  having an elderly family member living alone could cause a great deal of worry over his or her health and safety. There had to be a better way than cameras which most seniors often perceive  as a violation of their privacy – which they value by choosing to live on their own in the first place. He designed and tested multiple  versions of sensors and realized that with AI, a device could learn patterns and predict outcomes from sensors, This could  provide actionable and useful data to a user with an easy to use app.

After years of collaboration and testing with engineers, home health care and telecommunication experts, CareAlert from Sensorscall is ready for productiion.  It won the CES 2020 Innovation Award and is a member of the 2019 Class BSH Future Home Accelerator Powered by Techstars in Munich. CNN Business recognized CareAlert as a small sensor-packed device that can be plugged into outlets around a home to help decrease the daily worrying for caretakers, recognizing it as important innovation that can change how we grow old and how family can look after their senior parents privately and effectively.  Sensorscall is based in Atlanta, GA. 

What started as a way to ensure Lili’s mother was home safe became a multi-year project aimed at creating an intelligent, interactive monitoring system for children and caregivers to know know that their parents are okay and can be easily reached, even without a phone.  Fereydoun's hope is that CareAlert can provide that same comfort to you and your loved ones. 

We thank the community for your encouragement and support! 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CareAlert comes with a one-year warranty. 

 

We wlll ship worldwide,  VAT and GST not included. Please review the perk for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in November 2020*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 
*Actual ship dates may vary for international locations.  We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of CareAlert.

 

 

 


Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
 

WE CAN'T DO THIS WITHOUT YOU

story:
• Eco-friendly properties:  One Oxy-Water Bottle replaces dozens of disposable plastic bottles and reduces the amount of nonbiodegradable waste
  • Capacity: One Oxy-Water Bottle holds up to 0.6 liter
  • Speed: One Oxy-Water Bottle needs only 3 minutes to produce an oxygenated drink 
  • Other properties: One Oxy-Water Bottle can do both, cool and heat
  • Bonus: A powerbank with each device
  • Simple Design: Compact, ergonomical and functional




The Oxygen Concentrator Power Oxygen extracts the gas from air and dissolves it in water afterwards. 

The operational principle of the bottle is simple and does not require much energy. On the molecular level the concentrator squeezes air and divides it into nitrogen and oxygen. This division is made possible due to a zeolite column that is built into the bottle. 

The zeolite crystal has a complex branched net of minute pore spaces that can withhold particles no bigger than 0.3 micron. After nitrogen and other gases are separated, the concentrated oxygen is dissolved in water.  

Power Oxygen purifies water up to 97-99%. The service life of a zeolite crystal amounts to 20 thousand hours minimum, which makes up as much as 10 years of work.

Oxygenated water is potable water which is saturated with extra oxygen and, as a result, contains two or three times increased amount of it. Such water heightens productivity, neutralizes the negative consequences of an unbalanced lifestyle and egests toxins and wastes. 

Such water is greatly popular with people doing a lot of sport or/and exerting work. It is also very   good for elderly people and children.

It is a kind of life-giving drink that provides our bodies with extra oxygen. Its application has neither restrictions nor bounds.

Oxygenated water supplies body cells with more oxygen and facilitates metabolism. 

Water in mountain springs and streams is believed to contain far more oxygen than tap water, being so to speak natural oxygenated water. People in mountain valleys may live longer because they drink such water.
​
​​

  • It prevents hypoxia and anoxia
  • It improves metabolism
  • It egests toxins and wastes
  • It heightens brain productivity
  • It prevents the lack of fruit-sugar in blood
  • It helps to regenerate skin sores and heal wounds and injuries
  • It improves the performance of the gastrointestinal tract
  • It improves the immune system
  • It heightens potency
  • It inhibits the process of ageing
  • It improves sleep

  • It facilitates recovery after strenuous physical work
  • It egests muscle lactic acid and relieves pain
  • It improves stamina
  • It contributes to weight loss
  • It improves your vital tonus and, as a result, your mood



With Power Oxygen one can make oxygenated water only in 3 minutes. Besides, the bottle can be used to make vitamin-fortified drinks: just add some chopped fruit to the water in your bottle!

While preparing an oxygenated drink, a bottle can cool the liquid up to 10ºC (50ºF). The content of oxygenated water is akin to that of a mountain spring.

In case some heating is needed, the bottle can warm up any drink – be it water, tea or coffee – in just 3 minutes up to 70ºC (160ºF).


The built-in zeolite column neutralizes any harmful gases and bacteria. Its molecular structure works like a sieve to all air pollutants: oxygen molecules are the only ones it lets through. Due to the bigger molecule size of other gases they are barred from penetrating the filter. 
Initially zeolite filters were designed for purifying air in hospitals and laboratories, i.e. in places where the least polluted air is a must. Besides, they are widely used in incubators, fish farms and steel mills. The latter usage is caused by the necessity to provide the maximum amount of oxygen possible.





When your mobile phone or any other device needs charging, you can do it using your bottle as a power bank. The 5800 mAh capacity of its in-built accumulator makes it possible. Without extra charging the accumulator enables up to 20 operations, be it preparing an oxygenated drink or cooling/heating options. 


A Power Oxygen bottle is easy to operate. To do that there is just one button, i.e. “START”. 
Depending on how many times the user presses the button, he/she can choose one of the three existing modules: making a drink, cooling, or heating.
A beeping sound informs the user that the task has been performed.




  • Power Oxygen makes 100% oxygenated water
  • Power Oxygen is compact and easy to use at home or carry along to work, the gym or on a jogging run
  • Power Oxygen is ideal to fight hypoxia in the mountains
  • Power Oxygen is made of durable high quality materials only
  • Power Oxygen is reasonably priced and good for health.








We are a team of young people sharing love for sport and innovations. For better sports performance and faster post-training recovery we drink mass-produced and bottled oxygenated water. Once communicating together we stumbled upon an ingenious idea to create such a bottle that will make oxygenated water on its own, which will be friendly both financially and ecologically.

By now we have created Power Oxygen, the working prototype of an oxy-bottle. The model increases the concentration of oxygen by 3 times, which has been proved by experiments conducted in laboratory conditions.

At present we intend to move on to the production stage of the project. We love sport, we are active and we like making the world a better place. We’ll appreciate any contribution to the implementation of the idea, i.e. the production of Power Oxygen, the first sports oxy-bottle ever!

Feel free to email us directly at poweroxybottle@gmail.com or leave us a message if you have any other questions.

Patent-pending technology, patent-pending design.

It is explicitly pointed out that the products which serve as Perks are in the development phase. It cannot be excluded that during the development phase technical, economical or other circumstances arise which may result in a delay of the delivery of the Perk or the production and delivery of the Perk in a different form as regards functionality and/or design. By making a Contribution the Contributors explicitly acknowledge the risks associated with the occurrence of one of the aforementioned events.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Michelle Alden. I am licensed professional counselor and  a marriage family therapist who specializes in working with adoptive families and with parents who have very challenging children. I have developed, with the help of other professionals, an intensive in-home program to bring safety and health back into families torn apart by destructive behaviors.  I have also had over ten years experience running camps for at risk children and youth. I am passionate about helping parents do everything they can to keep their children at home in a safe and secure environment. I am especially passionate about working with adoptive families who are struggling with behaviors related to attachment disorders and complex trauma. In a camp setting my team will have the unique opportunity to bring parenting skills to parents while we also provide therapy enriched activities to the siblings and the adoptive child(ren).  September 2016 will be our first camp of this nature and our hope is to not only have a Family First Camp every year but build a camp paradigm that will duplicated and widely used.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to launch our first camp September 2016 we need start up funding to secure the camp facility for 10 families and up to 40 volunteers.  After our initial camp we are confident that the camps will be self sustaining. Families will pay $1000.00 to attend Family First Camp. This cost covers their food, lodging, therapy, training materials and activities. We are exploring avenues of financial assistance for families in need through Idaho's medicaid funding source- Optum. The money collected from the attending families will be used for camp 2017.

  • We need $10,000 to cover the costs of the camp facility for about 80 people (families and volunteers). This money will go directly to Pilgrim Cove Camp where we have already put in our deposit for Sept.2-5, 2016.
  • All therapists and adult helpers are volunteering their time which is saving us hundreds of dollars.
  • We are asking for donations in kind of crafts materials, woodworking and other activities.

The Impact

If you have ever been to camp, you wont be surprised to hear there are many benefits of camping programs. Through camp, life long memories are made, skills are developed, opportunities to unplug from technology happen and people connect. Family First Camp is designed to help families that are struggling to bond and overcome challenges they are facing with their adopted child or children. When a child who has experienced trauma or suffers with attachment disorders comes into a family, the entire family is impacted. Our camp is unique in that we are including the entire family in the process of healing and bringing safety and health back into the family. Our Family First Program is a beneficial alternative to residential treatment and out of home placements, our camp will be an opportunity for skill building and gaining resources.

    Risks & Challenges

    With every new adventure there are risks and obstacles. For myself and the other two counselors we are determined to provide this opportunity for families despite the personal risks. Our biggest challenge this first year is to meet our financial obligations to provide families with a top notch quality camp experience. We also face the challenge of getting the word out to families and helping them to secure the funding to attend. We are currently in the process of interviewing and training the volunteers needed to put on a camp that sensitive to the needs and challenges each family will bring. Our team is made up of three counselors including myself and a handful of seasoned volunteers from a camping network called Royal Family Kids Camp (an international camping program for foster children). All the counselors have been trained in areas of trauma, attachment and trust based parenting. Our volunteers will be screened, background checked and receive training in handling children with trauma and challenging behaviors. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please note that every contribution helps. No gift is too small.  Even if you are not able to contribute finacially please let people know about Family First Camp.  Help us get the word out and let's see what a splash we can make for adoptive families!

story:
To Whom It May Concern:

My name is Victoria Leveque, I am a current student at the University of Miami majoring in Economics and minoring in French and finance. I am writing you today because Mikaila Ulmer’s beverage company has inspired me to come up with my own company. You see I am from Haiti and ever since I could remember, I always wanted to do something that would make people explore the Haitian culture and also bring some kind of positivity in Haiti, so I came up with a perfect idea. In our culture there is this Jam in Haiti we call it “Confiture”. The confiture is a 100 percent organic made with the pulp of a grapefruit and other tropical fruits mix with other ingredients. I want to build my company by exporting this product from Haiti to the United States and hopefully around the world. My mother and I came up with this idea and we have not only one flavor but also multiple. I looked all over supermarkets and have not yet seen this product. In the future I see my product in wholefood and many more grocery stores. With my company, people will have a taste of the Haitian culture and the Haitian people will have a place to work. Please let me know what you think about my idea. I will love to have a meeting with you so you can also have taste of the “Confitures”. You will not be disappointed.

The product will be created in Haiti. The reason behind is that the more jobs that Haiti can provide the better for the people because they can stop focusing on creating violence in the country and start focus on making money to take care of their love ones. The factory will only have Haitians that knows how to cook and that are in need of a job. Like I said before my goal is to open people's eyes to the Haitian culture and try to put more Haitian product out there in the US. 

With that being said I believe that Haitian confiture is something that people outside of Haiti have yet tasted. Yes it is similar to  american Jam but it's made out of completely different ingredients. I honestly feel like it is better than most Jams at the grocery stores. 

I believe to start this campaign, I will need 10,000 dollars for the startup because I need to build a factory to make the Jams. Right now we have people making it manually which makes this process very slow. I think the factory will allow us to sell the product in big quantity to different states in aAmerica. Help me turn this idea into an accomplishment. This product can become the new peanut butter and jelly but instead of jelly it will have Confiture Chadeque.
story_txt:
To Whom It May Concern:
My name is Victoria Leveque, I am a current student at the
University of Miami majoring in Economics and minoring in French and finance. I
am writing you today because Mikaila Ulmer’s beverage company has inspired me
to come up with my own company. You see I am from Haiti and ever since I could
remember, I always wanted to do something that would make people explore the
Haitian culture and also bring some kind of positivity in Haiti, so I came up
with a perfect idea. In our culture there is this Jam in Haiti we call it
“Confiture”. The confiture is a 100 percent organic made with the pulp of a
grapefruit and other tropical fruits mix with other ingredients. I want to
build my company by exporting this product from Haiti to the United States and
hopefully around the world. My mother and I came up with this idea and we have
not only one flavor but also multiple. I looked all over supermarkets and have
not yet seen this product. In the future I see my product in wholefood and many
more grocery stores. With my company, people will have a taste of the Haitian
culture and the Haitian people will have a place to work. Please let me know
what you think about my idea. I will love to have a meeting with you so you can
also have taste of the “Confitures”. You will not be disappointed.

The product will be created in Haiti. The reason behind is that the more jobs that Haiti can provide the better for the people because they can stop focusing on creating violence in the country and start focus on making money to take care of their love ones. The factory will only have Haitians that knows how to cook and that are in need of a job. Like I said before my goal is to open people's eyes to the Haitian culture and try to put more Haitian product out there in the US. With that being said I believe that Haitian confiture is something that people outside of Haiti have yet tasted. Yes it is similar to  american Jam but it's made out of completely different ingredients. I honestly feel like it is better than most Jams at the grocery stores. I believe to start this campaign, I will need 10,000 dollars for the startup because I need to build a factory to make the Jams. Right now we have people making it manually which makes this process very slow. I think the factory will allow us to sell the product in big quantity to different states in aAmerica. Help me turn this idea into an accomplishment. This product can become the new peanut butter and jelly but instead of jelly it will have Confiture Chadeque.

story:
Short Summary

We have designed and developed what we like to call a pocket light. It is the size of a credit card and emits 5watts of light for over 10.000 hours. It uses lithium battery technology and led technology as well as hard ABS plastic technology.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is a simple Breakdown for how our fundraising will work:

  • For every light you buy, we will donate a light to a country where electricity does not exist or is scarce.
  • Our goal is to get at least 100,000 lights donated and help "Light The World"

The Impact

An estimated 79 percent of the people in the third world -- the 50 poorest nations -- have no access to electricity, despite decades of international development work. The total number of individuals without electric power is put at about 1.5 billion, or a quarter of the world's population, concentrated mostly in Africa and southern Asia.

Can you imagine if we could donate the 1.5 billion simple lights to all those people? I know it seems like a long shot but its definitely possible to touch that number with your help.

Risks & Challenges

We really have no risks as we have already secured a manufacturer for the product. The only challenge we have is getting the lights where they need to go. Thats where you help. A Simple donation can change the life of someone. Make a change, hekp make a difference.

Our "Pocket Light"

Our pocket light is as small and thin as a Credit card. It has a 5w bulb and a lithium battery. It will last for over 10,000 hoIt comes in 7 different colors, but to someone who does not have electricity, the Please donate today and help change the world, one bulb at a time,

story:
Here is what we hope to achieve

Help us to bring forward the production of our TravelShades® Junior range

We have designed and ordered the first production run of TravelShades® for adults. Many children suffer greatly from motion sickness as you more than likely know. The purpose of this crowdfunding campaign is to raise enough money to pay for the first production run of TravelShades® for children. In return for supporting our campaign, we are willing to give our first wave of buyers a variety of discounts on the £39.99 rrp for the adult models and £29.99 rrp for the TravelShades Junior. Check out our perks.

If we reach our stretch goals, we will be able to invest in research to find more ways to help people who suffer from all types of motion sickness and nausea.

Combating cyber sickness

We already have some very positive feedback that TravelShades can help gamers and others affected by fast-moving images on screens of all kinds. But we need to prove effectiveness in the same rigorous trials that proved the worth of TravelShades for motion sickness. The results of this study is expected to lead us into the development of a specific gamer product.

Motion sickness research

If we raise more than £100,000, we will apply 10% of the amount raised to research regarding motion sickness and other charitable activities connected with motion sickness and nausea.
 

How do TravelShades® work?

The development of a specially designed translucent lens, allows the eye to sense light but not movement, which is key to significantly reducing the effects of motion sickness.
 


 

How effective are TravelShades®?

Independent testing proves that almost 9 out of 10 people* who normally suffer from travel sickness benefit from wearing TravelShades®.
 

 
*Leeds Beckett University Retail Institute Field Trial 2015.
 

What our pioneer testers say

 

Top 10 reasons to choose TravelShades®


 

Some of our best perks

 
 

Here is how you choose your perfect TravelShades® once you have purchased your perk

Once TravelShades® are ready and waiting then you will receive an email containing a unique purchase code and a link to our online shop. Here you will be able to redeem your perk and make your choice of style, frame finish, lens type and case.

 

What the experts Say


"I believe that TravelShades represent a very exciting development in the treatment of motion sickness. Unlike drugs, which may cause sedation and other side effects, TravelShades are not associated with such problems. Whilst the exact mechanism of their action has not been precisely defined, they work empirically in a large percentage of sufferers and I believe that they harmlessly and reversibly damp down complex reflexes and pathways known to be involved in this disabling condition."
 

Professor Paul Marks, Consultant Neurosurgeon, BA, LLM, MD, FRCS, FFFLM
 

"I am satisfied that, if used correctly in accordance with instructions, TravelShades® are entirely safe for use by adults and children"
 

Mr JNP Kirkpatrick, FRCOphth, Consultant Ophthalmic Surgeon
 

 

TravelShades® choices

Jet set special perk


 

You may have seen us here


 

Meet inventor Tim Flaxman

 

TravelShades® timeline

Meet the TravelShades® team

Please share our campaign and help get effective instant and drug-free motion sickness relief to the people who need it. If you can't donate, you can still help by spreading the word using Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Skills Way wants to become the French brand of reference in the world of golf and sportswear.

To achieve this, Skills Way wants to share his state of mind which is found in both his name and slogan « Skill’s Way, Success is yours, Own it » :

Skills Way is a permanent reminder of the fact that the progress is at least as important, if not more than the end result.

  • We train, we practice, we make mistakes and we learn from them. We do not give up. This is how we move forward, it is a journey of our own is our way to success.

Succes is yours, Own it, "The success is in us and it is our" reflects a state of mind.

  • There are no small or big successes, there are successes. To appreciate them, we define steps or milestones to measure the progress.

Skill’s Way wishes to develop through four strategic areas

  • Innovate in unique style
  • Improve the wearer's experience feedback
  • Create a sense of belonging
  • Investing in the future

These 4 areas will enable us to achieve our goal of recognition in the world of golf and sportswear.

Innovate in style

A unique style, special seams to help your mouvement


Pick your favorite shirt


Man range

Women range

Skill’s Way is a young company South West of France, and all products are designed and "designated" in France.

Improve feedback

Our creations need to be pleasant, cutting allows for seams placed to not hinder movement. Our goal is to improve the experience of the golfer taking into account its experience.

Prototyping and material selection are controlled from France, Skill's Way follows all stages of production in order to offer high quality products

Create a sense of belonging

Skills Way is also a community with exclusive distribution from the website and from our authorized partners.

Invest in the future

Skill's Way supports young talented professionals and amateurs who will be the great players of tomorrow.

•Promote members of the Pro Team through the Skill's Way community

•Support members of the Pro Team by providing equipment

Funding

Skill's Way needs funding in order to start production of these products. We chose crowdfunding and the proceeds received we have chosen to prioritize our work.

Crowdfunding is based counterparts, Skill's Way proposes that the participation is translated into commands following donations but also the total amount received.

A certificate of thanks Skill's Way will be sent to each donor.

A Golf Ball Skill's Way (goodies) will be sent to each donor with a donation of at least € 25

A polo Skill's Way will be sent to each donor having given at least 50 Euros during the fundraising campaign, the Skill's Way polo shirts are exceptionally priced at 50 € instead of 65 €.

Why support us

Golf is a sport that has over 61 million members worldwide

Skills Way wants to expand internationally

•The Golf becomes an Olympic sport in 2016.

•Golf is a sport that can be practiced for a lifetime, from an early age to over 70 years.

•The Golf is the fourth individual sport in France the number of licensees, with over 400 000 members, an increase of over 20% in 10 years.

•This sport brings together around values such as friendliness, environmental friendliness and fair play.

•The sport picture reflects elegance, compliance, accuracy and technical skills.

•At the French level, the turnover achieved in 2015 by the golf industry, represented almost 1.5 billion euro.

story:
B-style yoga is not your mommas yoga plain and simple.I'm not your average yogi either. I am not afraid to take risks on my own to help someone else reach their highest potential. I have been working the mat since I am 13yrs old my teachers extremely  unorthodox (  exactly why In am the same)  taught me yoga was a moving meditation that be used to heal or create, manifest or break down walls. It is a way to shut the ego up long enough for the spirit your soul to come through and work on the physical plain in the wet suit we call our bodies. I was taught every modalitiy of religions, metaphysical practices and spiritual connections to help me communicate with everyone I come in contact with in a way in which they resonate in truth with. I have been known to get the newest student to hold a CROW pose and the most seasoned yogi rethink their approach to a handstand. I have been able to hold the attention of 50 plus students in a heated room and make them leave knowing each others name because we all worked together to create the class, mind you this was a weekly class and happen more frequently then not. I have also over the years knew I was intuitive, ESP I do not like the word Psychic has I feel it limits the gifts of what this mind can do and see. I have worked with my gifts including healing with hands and voice and put it together with my passion for yoga and all the hidden knowledge I have about the practice itself . That is why B-style yoga was developed and needs a home. I need a space that is multi roomed so there can be meditation and meditation rocking at the same time. A space that is free for people to come in a chill, meditate, read or just be with a cutoff tea and some warm friendly energy. There has to be room for Aerial Hammocks for floating guided meditation and some flips if the work calls for it. warm and non warm rooms for different practices. A big closet to house all the Dhrama wheels , handstand canes, mats, bolsters, block, bands, you name it because I use all , including barres and bosu balls they are huge need space to play on them as well. For me I  use every tool , prop piece of equipment I can get my hands on to help someone achieve the fullest expression of a pose they can. 

B-style yoga works with healing. Most of my privates have some sort of challenge physically , mentally and emotionally that has blocked them from their connection to their divinty and power. By sequentially linking poses together like a puzzle I can create a specific indivualized practice that helps the student access their power and connection on all 4 bodies to remove traumas. I  cannot make someone walk at least not yet however that being will feel power strength and  connect to courage to see life and their challenges as oppurtunities.  I work with all ages and all challenges from ADHD helping children and teens ween off meds by introducing them to a couple of poses that they can manage alone. I use crystals and other proffesional in the field to aid in the advancement of healing. I want to expand and create a out reach program which Whispering Mantra studios will essentially be home base for . Bring B-style yoga and all its props to Clinic, Hospices, Senior Homes, Hospitals Rehabs you name it without cost to them. 

My life has not been easy but is has been fabulous. The past I have owned successful business and have worked for some amazing people . All this has lead to here, over the course of 5 yrs and my own challeneges physically myself 2014'15 I had two serious Cervical spine surgeries that have left me with painful complications. I am single mom always have been so the buck stops here. Myself and my son met family distractions and traumas that we went through and have come out the other side more aware and far more connected. This  is why I am asking for  your contribution . The bank account suffered the storm and normally opening a new business would have been as easy as opening the check book. This where my next lesson would be taught , That is to dare to show vulnerability by starting this campaign this project and reach out to the community to help. So here I am at 52 yrs old ready to put my talk to work . I can now truly connect to so many on so many issues that you do not need tissues . See I am the living example of my B-style Practice. I know addiction in a family, know life threatening events, I know and connect to having the rug shift underneath you and wake up in a whole new ball game. I can resonate there for I can work on the what you expierence because I might know first hand myself. My intuitive gift and healing work on the whole as well So when walk into one of my class you really do feel at home and like we have known each other forever , because we have. Whispering Mantra yoga studios is the home and playground for B-style yoga and we , I plan on growing and expanding and coming to a planet near you. Thank you for your time , I know what the capital to build this studio can do I know what it means I can see it clearly . I hope this snapshot into my world, head and vision leaves you wanting to be the reason it manifests. Then you can come and play with all of us , rock that mat!!!! XO b 

Risks and challenges

In being as transparent as possible, I will say that I'm not worried about competition because I know my practice is unique. However, I will have to focus heavily on PR and marketing in order to grow my practice and reach out to communities. Purchasing the proper equipment and finding the perfect central  location to create a studio and a team that will allow me to travel to   take my practice on the road.

The other challenge is my own time constraints. I'll be looking to mentor others to assist in my practice with me so I can continue to grow and serve more people.

story:
This is Mohamed Youssef Kattara I’m the owner for German Technology Solar Systems Co. (GTSS) , I’m a mechanical power engineer has more than 25 years experience in the field of refrigeration and air conditioning and also I’m the inventor for (Lina PAC) Personal  Air Conditioner , This is amazing and unique product , it reduce the air temperature from 35 C to 16C in dry weather and also reduce the temperature from 32 C to 24 C in wet weather until 80% R.H like in east Asia.

Lina PAC change the water in the main tank into what is called dry ice vapor cooling effect by using ceramic diaphragm pump (it is nanotechnology).

This video explains how LINA PAC works and the healthy benefits

In & Out R.H and Temperature Laboratory Test which had been made in Germany clear reducing the temperature from 35 to 16 degrees in dry weather.

This campaign is important because it will enable us to increase the number of production lines to spread huge amount of LINA PAC around the world.

                 What We Need & What You Get

I need 300,000$ to buy components for producing 5000 units of LINA PAC so we can supply those units at the date of 10-august -2016 .our mold capability 800 units /day so if there are more support we can cover USA, EUROPE ,CANADA and East Asia with nearly 20,000 LINA PAC units at the end of august .TNT , DHL , Fed EX  and Aramex will be our distributors for LINA PAC to reach to each one in 3 days maximum  for any country around the world . The final cost include The transportation fees will be 119 $  .
LINA PAC consume 34 watt/hr compared with traditional air conditioner which has minimum power consumption 800 watt/hr , you can take LINA PAC with you where are you going but it is difficult to take the traditional air conditioner with you , Lina PAC wash the air by the dry ice fog , so you will  smell the air like after the rain , Lina PAC does not have air filter or evaporator coil like in traditional air conditioner which consider focus of bacteria and virus ,Honey , mint oil , olive oil , table salt and lemon droplets  can be watered down in the base tank and inhaled through the air stream for improve our healthy life.

If we don't reach the entire goal , we will manufacture according to what we will gain.

  • LINA PAC is portable and very easy to use.
  • LINA PAC is 100% eco-friendly.
  • Costs 1 US dollar and 22 cents for electricity monthly (for 20 hr operation per day)
  • Can work in  closed rooms or open area with no increase in relative humidity.

                         advantages of Lina PAC
  • Reduce temperature in dry weather from 35 C to 16 C
  • Reduce temperature in wet weather from 32 C & 70% R.H to 24 C
  • Consume 34 watt/hr electricity ,for 20 hour operation per day for one  month you will pay 1.22 $
  • Lina PAC does not have air filter or evaporator coil like in traditional air conditioner which consider focus of bacteria and virus
  • Lina PAC does not dry the air like in traditional air conditioner
  • Lina PAC does not increase the humidity in the space
  • Lina PAC washes the air by the dry ice fog , so you will  smell the air like after the rain
  • Honey , mint oil , olive oil , table salt and lemon droplets  can be watered down in the base tank and inhaled through the air stream for improve our healthy life
  • Lina PAC coefficient of performance is 7 compared with the traditional air conditioner  which not more than 3
  • Our design have been done through the psychometric chart  so we are achieved the sufficient amount of air and the amount of dry ice fog  required to cool the person , So 34 watt not 10 watt or 1.5 watt is sufficient amount of power consumption need  for cool the person.
  • The capacity of the main tank 2 liter of water which will sufficient to seven hours continues operation.

LINA PAC uses “ceramic diaphragm pump” technology which uses nanotechnology to break water into tiny droplets approximately 3 microns in size turning it into dry ice fog (similar to the fog produced from a freezer) which in turn increases the surface area in contact with air. So by passing air over this fog you obtain 7 times the cooling energy resulting from changing water to ice.





Adding Honey, mint or lemon droplets may help in the treatment of the following cases:

1. Getting rid of migraine. (mint oil)
2. Reduce the rate of snoring. (honey and mint)
3. Reduce the level of glucose in blood. (by adding honey)
4. Treat asthma and sinuses. (Honey and mint)
5. Repellent of mosquitoes and insects. (mint oil & lemon)
6. Increase mental alertness and focus by 28%. (mint oil)
7. Inhaling lemon decrease chances of getting cancer.
8. Reduce elevated blood pressure in hypertensive patients.(honey)

If you couldn't support us financially you can support us morally by spread our invention to your friends.

story:
Each year, we produce billions of pounds of plastic. Only about 25% of this plastic is actually recycled. So where does the rest end up? Much of that plastic ends up in our oceans and landfills. The accumulation of this plastic has left us with a serious problem that must be dealt with.

Our team at Superior Filament has made it a mission of ours to create a company in which we can help solve our world's problems with the development of technology and innovation. Our first step: cleaning up our environment. The 3D filament we have created is made directly from 100% recycled and biodegradable materials; helping not only our environment, but making 3D-printing an eco-friendly technology.  

                       

Purchasing one spool of our PET filament is equivalent to preventing 120 water bottles from reaching our oceans. 

Over the past year, we have developed 3 different strands of filament and are currently working on developing several others. With the support from the MTEC SmartZone, and Michigan Technological University our team has been able to reach the point in which we are just about ready to launch our startup. 

                          

 


        Collect Plastic Waste

Regrind Plastic Into Pellet Form

Create Individual Spools 

The Power Is Now In Your Hands

We Donate $1 For Every Spool Sold

       The Ocean Cleanup Project


Every spool sold is equipped with a 3D-printed filter to keep dust and debris out of your printer. 

We also use our own, eco-friendly desiccant bags to keep the moisture out of your filament. The bags are filled with dry-wall which contains 95% recycled materials and works just as well as traditional desiccants. 

                        

     Fill up the box you received from a previous order, or any empty box laying around your house. Send us your wasted prints (our plastic or our competitors) and we will provide a credit towards your next purchase. 

We have already received over $19,000 in seed funding through various competitions and we are well on our way towards launching our startup. We just need a little help. 

(Left to Right: Joshua Krugh, Aubrey Woern, Cedric Kennedy)


Although our campaign goal is to raise $10,000, we have prepared for the chance that we raise more.  Below, is a detailed list describing how we will use your contributions. 

$10,000:

  • $2,500 towards plastic inventory (equivalent to 300,000 water bottles)
  • $6,000 towards machinery upgrades
  • $1,500 towards office space rent at the MTEC SmartZone

$15,000

  • $5000 towards plastic inventory (equivalent to 600,000 water bottles)
  • $6,000 towards machinery upgrades
  • $1,500 towards office space rent at the MTEC SmartZone
  • $2,500 towards marketing efforts
$20,000
  • $7,500 towards plastic inventory (equivalent to 900,000 water bottles)
  • $4,500 towards machinery upgrades
  • $1,500 towards office space rent at the MTEC SmartZone
  • $1,500 towards marketing efforts
  • $2,500 towards marketing efforts
  • $2,500 outreach recycling programs (travel expenses)
If we do not reach our goal, we will use the funds for inventory purposes in order to begin generating revenue. 

There are five very large whirlpools called gyres found in our oceans; each accumulating massive amounts of plastic. Combined they hold over 5 trillion pieces of plastic. This presents a very serious problem. Millions of animals die each year from ingesting or becoming entangled in this garbage; destroying the ocean's ecosystem. 

Plastic pollution is not only harmful to our environment, but also effects our personal health. Fish end up eating particles of plastic and the toxins are passed to us when we eat seafood. The consumption of this seafood has been linked to certain cancers. 



Risks & Challenges

3D-printing is becoming a very saturated market, presenting a great challenge. However, we have entered this industry with a passion in our hearts and a drive for success. Our team has set out to make a difference, and with your support, we know we can make this happen.  Our vision at Superior Filament is to create a large enterprise that solves problems around the globe through innovation and the use of technologies. Thank you again for your support!


Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to your contribution, please share our video with your friends and family. 

If you decide not to contribute, that is fine too. However, we do encourage you to go out and find your own unique way towards making a difference. Because here at Superior Filament, we truly believe that:

Together, we can Change the World

#onespoolatatime

story:
About My Project

I live in Singapore where personal mobility devices like motorized scooters and electric bicycles are very popular. However, these devices are mostly designed for a single person and very fun-focused. So I designed and built a four-wheeled mobility pad so that it can be used for many applications.

I call this device the MoPad (Mobility + Pad).

It is operated by one person and is designed to carry 2 adults or loads up to 200kg.

Also I enjoy building things and one of the main reason for me is to design and build a device that can benefit many people if they were made more popular. For example, there are many elderly wheelchair user requiring care takers to push them around, workers needing to push trolleys with their equipment and documents at work and buyers pushing shopping trolleys in supermarkets; this is very inefficient.

I wish to start mass production for this device so it can be made popular for use by everyone. Therefore I seek your support for funding!

Presentation

The MoPad is a motorized mobility device designed to be used as a heavy duty vehicle. It is a very practical and useful motorized device which can be readily used to convert manual mobility devices such as wheelchairs, trolleys, golf carts into motorized ones without any modification made to the existing device. There is a lot of potential application for this device. It has four wheels and designed to be narrow enough for bicycle paths and still be stable when turning. It can function with an operator standing at the back or a used in seating position on the main pad. It has four anchor points with fastening harness to secure anything placed onto the pad. It is also fitted with 500 watt motors and speed restricted to be slow at 18km/hr (speed can be further reduced) to provide adequate power to facilitate movement of people and things but not to go too fast.

Technical Data

Length: 120cm                       Width: 60cm
Height (Adjustable HandleBar): 80 - 130cm
Height (Platform): 22.5cm
Weight: 35kg                              Wheel: 8 inch tires
Motor: 500W electric              Max Load: 200kg
Range: 40km                              Speed: 18km/h (with motor)

As there are many existing manual mobility devices user around, the MoPad will be about to enable them with motorized power instantly! I think my mobility pad concept will appeal to many more people across sectors. I hope that by getting MoPad into mass production, it will greatly benefit everyone!

Planned actions

Upon reaching $120 000 I will assemble a team to begin mass production.

Risks and problems

It is a complex product and quite many of the parts have to be specially manufactured.
My job is to design, make and document the parts but I have no experience in mass production.
I'm the only fully dedicated team member today.
I do not have any big resources so if I for some reason must end the project, it is not certain that I can repay all contributions.
The rules on electric devices differs from country to country, and some places do not allow 4 wheeled motorized devices.
I am convinced that I can put together a good team and solve these difficulties and make a great MoPad.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey if you can’t help with the funding, you can certainly help by spreading the word on about by my project to increase the awareness…
Remember to use the Indigogo share tools!
Thank you in advance!

story:
Sheda Light - Your life, one light.






                   Sheda Light Ecosystem

Sheda Light isn't just another flashlight. Its design implements a clip-on system that allows you to use it with a lot of accessories. 

Choose the ones that fit your favorite Sport & Lifestyle!!



                             The Technoloy

We've been working on this idea for two years and, after many prototypes, developments, other ideas and new technologies, we believe that we found a flashlight that fits our needs.. and yours.

Despite its small size, it packs quite a punch! The embedded LiPo battery gives you all the light you need, even in standalone mode. 

The BatLife system always tells you how much time do you have left for your current usage. No more guessing around until your light goes out.




If you need more power, just connect it to your favorite power-bank and charge it through the magnetic clip charger - compatible with all the accessories.


  


All this, maintaining its usage. Non stop adventure!  


                          Always find your Sheda. No matter what!

The "GlowFindMe" is a glowing epoxy that helps you not to waste time looking for light when you need... light!


                          

                                                  
                                                    Size Matters!

                

Ever wondered why that, when you need a flashlight it's nowhere to be found, and when it is, its battery's dead? 

We asked the same question to many people, and the answer we found was that a flashlight doesn't have a place to be stored nor is remembered until you need it. That's why we focused in making a very small flashlight, to allow you to store it easily were it counts, without robbing space. You can store it in your car's glove compartment, trunk or, at your house, inside the electrical cabinet, inside your closet, near the dog leash... wherever it suits you better.


Like taking late night walks? Why carry a cumbersome and heavy flashlight? Sheda Light fits your pocket!



                                                Never lose your Sheda
Our Patent Pending "MeMa Clip" (Mechanic and Magnetic Clip) allows you to plug and unplug your Sheda with just one hand in all its accessories without the risk of it falling off. If your activity is very harsh on movement, the embedded safety rubber belt gives you extra safety.


                                                     Lights out?
The magnetic charger enables the Sheda to always be charged and, if the lights go out, the emergency driver kicks in and you'll have light when and where you need it. 

            



                   Sheda Light.. Share your light

We wanted a light that can kindle your path but also spread light to your surroundings. We all know it is usefull to pinpoint a given location, but sometimes you simply need light everywhere.

The Flood light allows you to see and be seen, it's only a matter of adjusting brightness with the Multi Function Switch. Playing cards in the tent? "Easy peasy"!



      

                               Stretch Goals

Sheda's Light team ideas do not stop here! We have many ideas that we wish we could see come alive! Help us bringing them to you too!

                                              Tier 1 @ 30.000€ - COLOR

Choose your color! Sheda is also about fashion! You can choose your Sheda to have another color.

                                            Tier 2 @ 50.000€ - RED LIGHT

Our supporters asked us yet for another light. Why not enable Sheda Light to be used as a tail light or as a night friendly red light? We heard you! Reach Milestone 2 and Sheda will have both white (up to 500 lm) and red light (up to 100 lm) on the side!



                                              Tier 3 @ 60.000€ - BLE

All Sheda's come with embedded Bluetooth BLE!
Sheda Light is all about simplicity and usage. With the BLE you can program your Sheda to work just the way you want to, by programming the multi-function switch according to your needs. Your preferred light and intensity at the first click, programming a "lock" combination or turning your light ON remotely, is all accessible from your smartphone (IOS and Android). 

                               Tier 4 @ 80.000€ - OPEN SOURCE

Want another Accessory? If we get to this Milestone, all the Accessories will be open sourced, so you can print them at home, with your 3D printer!

     Where are we now? Where are we going?


We've been behind this project for two years now. After many prototypes and field tests we believe that we have something worth fighting for. 
Sheda Light is in its finished prototype phase. We want to start producing it until the end of the year 2016 and already contacted some suppliers for electronics and mechanical parts, but we need funding to go ahead with the product. 
All the mechanical parts are designed both for the flashlight and for the accessories. All have been field tested with 3D printed samples. We're just missing the "final stuff".
The electronics are designed by an expert on LED driving, so we are very sure about the facts and figures that we present to you. 
Bottom line, our path is all about making LED flashlights that fit field needs and work needs. We want to deliver a trustworthy device that becomes your only light for whatever your active life may be. Just like we started searching one for ourselves, two years ago.

                        SEPTEMBER UPDATE


It's been a week from the launch! 

Still fighting to reach more and more supporters.  Meanwhile we've been listening to your opinions and changed some Stretch Goals and added and extra functionality to Sheda - The RED floodlight. 

Our beta testers started to share their experience in their social media, showing the various uses and abilities of Sheda. 



You too can help us out, please share our project with your friends, backpackers, riders, hikers, hunters, fishers, campers and all the adventurous people you know! Thank you very much for your support!
