All this, maintaining its usage. Non stop adventure!  




                          Always find your Sheda. No matter what!
The "GlowFindMe" is a glowing epoxy that helps you not to waste time looking for light when you need... light!
                          
                                                  
                                                    Size Matters!

                

Ever wondered why that, when you need a flashlight it's nowhere to be found, and when it is, its battery's dead? 
We asked the same question to many people, and the answer we found was that a flashlight doesn't have a place to be stored nor is remembered until you need it. That's why we focused in making a very small flashlight, to allow you to store it easily were it counts, without robbing space. You can store it in your car's glove compartment, trunk or, at your house, inside the electrical cabinet, inside your closet, near the dog leash... wherever it suits you better.

Like taking late night walks? Why carry a cumbersome and heavy flashlight? Sheda Light fits your pocket!


                                                Never lose your Sheda
Our Patent Pending "MeMa Clip" (Mechanic and Magnetic Clip) allows you to plug and unplug your Sheda with just one hand in all its accessories without the risk of it falling off. If your activity is very harsh on movement, the embedded safety rubber belt gives you extra safety.
                                                     Lights out?
The magnetic charger enables the Sheda to always be charged and, if the lights go out, the emergency driver kicks in and you'll have light when and where you need it. 
            



                       Sheda Light.. Share your light We wanted a light that can kindle your path but also spread light to your surroundings. We all know it is usefull to pinpoint a given location, but sometimes you simply need light everywhere.
The Flood light allows you to see and be seen, it's only a matter of adjusting brightness with the Multi Function Switch. Playing cards in the tent? "Easy peasy"!





      
                               Stretch Goals


Sheda's Light team ideas do not stop here! We have many ideas that we wish we could see come alive! Help us bringing them to you too!



                                              Tier 1 @ 30.000€ - COLOR


Choose your color! Sheda is also about fashion! You can choose your Sheda to have another color.

                                            Tier 2 @ 50.000€ - RED LIGHT
Our supporters asked us yet for another light. Why not enable Sheda Light to be used as a tail light or as a night friendly red light? We heard you! Reach Milestone 2 and Sheda will have both white (up to 500 lm) and red light (up to 100 lm) on the side!








                                              Tier 3 @ 60.000€ - BLE


All Sheda's come with embedded Bluetooth BLE!
Sheda Light is all about simplicity and usage. With the BLE you can program your Sheda to work just the way you want to, by programming the multi-function switch according to your needs. Your preferred light and intensity at the first click, programming a "lock" combination or turning your light ON remotely, is all accessible from your smartphone (IOS and Android). 


                               Tier 4 @ 80.000€ - OPEN SOURCE


Want another Accessory? If we get to this Milestone, all the Accessories will be open sourced, so you can print them at home, with your 3D printer!




     Where are we now? Where are we going?


We've been behind this project for two years now. After many prototypes and field tests we believe that we have something worth fighting for. 
Sheda Light is in its finished prototype phase. We want to start producing it until the end of the year 2016 and already contacted some suppliers for electronics and mechanical parts, but we need funding to go ahead with the product. 
All the mechanical parts are designed both for the flashlight and for the accessories. All have been field tested with 3D printed samples. We're just missing the "final stuff".
The electronics are designed by an expert on LED driving, so we are very sure about the facts and figures that we present to you. 
Bottom line, our path is all about making LED flashlights that fit field needs and work needs. We want to deliver a trustworthy device that becomes your only light for whatever your active life may be. Just like we started searching one for ourselves, two years ago.


                        SEPTEMBER UPDATE

It's been a week from the launch! 
Still fighting to reach more and more supporters.  Meanwhile we've been listening to your opinions and changed some Stretch Goals and added and extra functionality to Sheda - The RED floodlight. 
Our beta testers started to share their experience in their social media, showing the various uses and abilities of Sheda. 



You too can help us out, please share our project with your friends, backpackers, riders, hikers, hunters, fishers, campers and all the adventurous people you know! Thank you very much for your support!

story:
I'm Rich Freedland of Mountain View, California.   I have lived in Silicon Valley for over forty years and worked in many start-up companies.  As president of Helios Incorporated, I led a team of world class engineers into changing how disk drives are made.

Today my passion is solving the problem of drug adherence in the senior community.  Most seniors living at home take multiple prescription medications along with a number of supplements.   It becomes confusing over time.   It can be a challenge for a caregiver to properly set up a pill tray each week.   Medication is becoming more complicated.

GRAMedical has developed a fully automated pill storage and dispensing unit for use by seniors in the their home.  We provide reminders (alerts) and send messages when pills are not taken (notifications).  We track the medication use so a history is available for doctors and others. 

This fundraising campaign will help raise the funds needed to improve our prototype and build our first units for testing by seniors in their home.   The funds raised will be used for engineering purposes such as improving the user interface and efficiently dispensing the pills upon request by the user.

Contributors will help us create a device that will directly improve the health of seniors living independently.  Those living at home and in independent living centers will find it much easier to take their medication on time and with the proper instructions.   This leads to better overall health.

Do you know a senior living alone and taking six or more medications?   There is great demand for this product as observed by interviewing seniors and caregivers over the past three years.

I have run and grown successful companies before.   It requires a great, experienced team and a product that is challenging but possible with the right technology advancements.   My team has worked for three years on different technologies for handling pills efficiently.   Our goal is to guarantee the correct pill is provided to the user in the correct quantity every time.   Not most of the time but 100% of the time.   That is the technology that we have submitted to the US Patent office for review.

 

Are there competitors?   Yes, but they have taken a different approach to handling pills.   Our patent pending technology offers safeguards and precision that are valuable for those taking multiple medications.

You probably have friends that deal with this issue every day.  Please share our Indiegogo link on Facebook or direct friends that care for elderly.   Thank you in advance for your help.

story:
Where we come from

Hey supporters.  My name is Ben.  I've been a runner my whole life.  Whether it was training for the soccer season as a teen or preparing for obstacle course races like Spartan or BattleFrog, I have learned to love the runner's high.  

Finding the right gear is essential to success in any endeavor.  As I searched for the right way to carry my stuff around while running, I grew tired of paying through the nose for name brand gear that didn't get the job done.  I had to carry my phone in my hand and tie my house key onto the draw string of my shorts.  There had to be a better way. Every pair of shorts had a key pocket in the waistline... right on my hip flexor. That's not comfortable.  

So, with the help of an amazing design crew, we built the Bryce Running Shirt.  The fitted, water resistant pocket on the left arm holds your phone securely as you move. Keys and other small items can fit in the zippered pocket on the right side.  Reflective piping increases visibility when running in the dark, rain or snow. Simple, secure, practical.

But we need your help

We have the prototype and a few samples ready to go. Now it's time to move into production.  An incredible production house in southern Utah is all set to manufacture this line.  We just need the money to get started.  The first $10,000 raised here will go entirely to the manufacturing process.  If we meet our stretch goal of $15,000 we will use the extra funds to market the Bryce shirt line in other ways (think sponsoring local races or paid advertisements on podcasts) as well as begin designing our next project, the Arches Running Shirt (coming out later this year). None of the funds raised here will go to paying me or any of my design team a salary.  

What's in it for you?

Let's break it down. Take a look around a local running store or the internet.  A high quality athletic shirt made out of premium technical fabric like the kind we use can easily run $50-80.  Then add in an armband style phone carrier for another $30.  Wow!

We put that all together, in a single comfortable, simple item.  Instead of running you upwards of $80, the Bryce Running Shirt retails for $49.  Our supporters... that's you... will get an even better deal. You will also get your new shirt before they are available anywhere else.

One man band

I'm really excited to bring my dream to the world, but I'm just one person.  I have great support from my friends and family. I've teamed up with wonderful industry experts to help me with the design and manufacturing.  But, even with all their incredible help, the day-to-day running of the business all falls on me.  I'm happy to do it, if it means seeing Red Rock Running grow and serve the running community. If you are willing to support me, I am willing to put in the long hours and hard work to get the job done.

Not able to help us financially?

There is plenty more you can do to help.  Right now the only way people can here about us is through Indiegogo and word of mouth.  Tell your friends, tell your coworkers, tell everyone.  Share on social media. Use the share buttons Indiegogo provides for you.  

Thanks for all your help and good wishes.  If you have any questions or concerns do not hesitate to reach out.

Ben

Red Rock Running

redrockrunning.com

contact@redrockrunning.com

story:
HicsMod to manage your environment

your personal assistant that monitors and manages the air quality around you

With HicsMod you will be able to have lots of useful information about your living environments whether you're indoor or outdoor.

Through a simple APP you can monitor the air quality thanks to many sensors located inside HicsMod but also control the environment, using its hardware and software interfaces to act on smart devices and home automation systems.

_____________________________________________

Do You Really Control Your Environment?

We check everything in our lives .... but we really know the environment in which we live?

Our house is healthy? The office where we spend much of our days keeps us free from harmful elements for health?

            

The answer is NO!

So, how to improve knowledge then therefore, govern everything around us?

_____________________________________________

HicsMod, the perfect union of an environmental monitoring unit and a remote control for your devices

 

 

A "Smart Home" always with you and in your pocket

Our team is composed by 2 engineers, 1 sales manager and the CEO, with professional experiences in Smart Home and Building Automation. Thanks to our experiences, we know very well that many smart features both in home and entire buildings are based on the information supplied by different sensors.

For this reasons we will make available some of these functions anywhere, even in environments that are not equipped with smart devices.

 

E.M.U. (Environmental Monitoring Unit)

HicsMod is therefore a modern and concentrated air control unit, equipped with a watchful heart can constantly monitor:

    01   Temperature

    02   Humidity

    03   UV Rays

    04   Toxic Gases

    05   Allergens

    06   Pollution

 

 

SUITE (an open system for the control of your Internet of Things and electronic devices in your smart home)

Our smartphones is a great way to control devices in the environments where we live.

With a dedicated and simplified version of Suite, our complete software for controlling smart homes and smart devices, our Motorola Smartphone is able to manage many household and office appliances, as well as of the Internet of Things.

This first version of HicsMod will be equipped with an infrared control (IR) to manage numerous devices replacing their remote controls.

 

We help you build a better world

Air Quality Big Data
Thanks to HicsMod, through a simple and free APP, the information on air quality will be available to anyone. Big Data obtained directly from thousands of HicsMod used worldwide.

 

 

 

Better places to live
Everybody will know in real time the quality of environments and choose which place to spend their time. Above all, the citizens and the competent authorities will take action to improve its quality.


Next steps
Before production, next step is to test a prototype of HicsMod. The amount of $ 9,000 is the minimum we need to produce a prototype and create an APP to monitor the air quality around us. 

First of all, the campaign that we launched will be used to:

  • $ 4,000 to create an HicsMod prototype implementing and developing the functions provided
  • $ 3,000 to realize the APP to view big data on air quality around the world
  • $ 2,000 to acquire a server for managing data on pollution and air quality.

Once we've tested the prototype and made the necessary revisions, the next step will be a limited production run - funded via a second crowdfunding campaign. The retail price of HicsMod is projected to be between USD 90 - 120.

 

Your contribution is essential

We need to create a prototype and above all to spread worldwide respect for nature in which we live.
 

How can you help?
Make a donation and spread the word.

Every little bit helps. If you know anyone who would be interested in the HicsMod, send them a link to this page! The more people hear about this project, the better the chance we'll hit our goal.

Your contribution will help us bring this project into reality, foster innovation in the green economy, and help us to live in a healthier world

For this we ask you to support HicsMod !
And you can do it in many ways. From the smallest contribution dowloading the Environment Quality APP, to the purchase of a t-shirt to be an Ambassador of a "clean planet".

Our goal is to have as many HicsMod spread all over the world to monitor the air of our cities, our streets, our parks.

 

But, most of all, we will need the support of Motorola and of all of you to develop a final product that guarantees excellent performance and a great user experience.

story:
We absolutely love doing cryotherapy, but our biggest lament was that it was too expensive for us to do on a regular basis. We have come up with a business model that keeps it simple and keeps our costs low, so that we can pass on the savings to our customers. Our business model has two basic elements to get cold therapy to folks who can benefit from it!

1. We have already purchased a "local" cold therapy machine called the Zimmer 6.  This is a small portable unit that can administer (through a small hose and nozzle) super cooled air to specific areas of the body that need  attention.  Basically, it's a more effective and intense version of  methods like ice packs to reduce inflammation, swelling, and muscle soreness. It can be used before and/or after physical activity, or as part of a physical therapy routine. We are super excited to be able to take the Zimmer 6 around town to various venues to begin offering services, and to build excitement and brand recognition for when we open our trailer for full body sessions as well.

2. The trailer! Made in the US by a company based in Texas, this will be the ONLY cryotherapy sauna in Austin with the ability to travel to athletic and health/wellness related events. Taking the therapy to the people! It will spend most of its time parked in an East Austin location with regular business hours, in close proximity to several other local businesses. Personally, we have never loved the cushy spa-like atmosphere that many cryotherapy businesses use, and we want to provide a simple, friendly, and professional atmosphere where people can get individualized cryotherapy services efficiently and affordably. We believe the trailer concept really hits that mark!

Cryotherapy is a quickly growing practice that is being used for a variety of benefits, including better recovery from exercise and injuries, improved sleep, increased energy, improved athletic performance, reduced inflammation and pain, and help with weight management. For those who have not yet experienced it, a cryosauna is a chamber that the client enters wearing minimal clothing per the client's comfort level, in addition to gloves, socks, slippers, and underwear (for men) to protect extremities. The head remains above the sauna while the chamber fills with nitrogen gas. A session takes only 90 seconds to three minutes, so it is very efficient for those with a busy schedule, and can be enjoyed several times a week. Unlike ice baths, full body cryotherapy can be used immediately before exercise without decreasing the pliability of soft tissue, for a burst of extra energy during your workout or competition, or used afterwards for recovery. We love how doing cryotherapy makes us feel, and can't wait to get this business running so we can start sharing the love!  

Where you come in!

We are taking  the standard route of financing our venture through a lender, however, we are hoping to mitigate the amount we have to borrow, and maximize our potential for success by community fundraising.

Our goal is to raise $15K to help with start up costs, including purchasing the trailer and cryosauna, and completing the build out (flooring, furniture, and exterior decoration), developing promotional materials, and meeting monthly expenses as we get going, such as nitrogen supply, insurance, POS system, and rent.

Please help us achieve our dream by donating to our campaign at whatever level you can! We also appreciate help with word of mouth promotion to those you know who may be interested.  You can share our vision with others by using Indiegogo's share tools, as well as through our Facebook page: ATXCryotherapy, Instagram Feed: ATXcryo. We hope to have the trailer up and running by the end of August! Cant wait to see y'all at our opening party!

story:
We're inundated with all kinds of health information and yet somehow we're sicker than ever. Holistic Hilda, the host and producer of the Wise Traditions podcast, is convinced that the key to better health is found in the wisdom of our ancestors. The month-long ancestral health tour in Australia was prompted by a sense of urgency to share ancestral health principles, based on Dr. Weston A. Price's findings nearly 100 years ago, and to learn about traditional health habits that we can incorporate into our own lives wherever we live. 

Three reasons: 1) Dr. Weston A. Price considered the indigenous people of Australia to represent the paradigm of moral and physical perfection. I am eager to learn what I can from those whose heritage is tied to one of the oldest cultures in existence on the planet.  2) Australian WAPF chapter leaders have arranged the itinerary and are excited for me to come and give talks,  conduct interviews, have air time on the radio with health experts, and connect with communities along the east coast of the continent. 3) Outside of the United States, Australia has the biggest listening audience of the Wise Traditions podcast. 

  What will I be doing exactly? I will be giving talks, conducting interviews, appearing on the radio and more. I am nailing down the itinerary with the help of WAPF chapter leaders in Australia. The tour includes stops in Victoria, Sydney, Northern Rivers, Toowoomba, Northern Territory, and Cairns. I'm particularly excited about the collaboration with those already very involved in sustainable farming/living in Australia, and the possibility of connecting with indigenous peoples. I'm also thrilled that Talk Radio East Side FM is on the schedule, along with a symposium with Dr. Steven Lin, and a presentation with Dr. Ron Ehrlich. 

The biggest challenge along the way will probably just be pacing myself. I'm a connector at heart and I envision many opportunities arising spontaneously. I will work hard to make sure every event and outreach will be top notch, while simultaneously making sure to not to over-stuff the schedule

A trip of this magnitude requires significant resources. The Weston A. Price Foundation has offered to sponsor the trip to a degree, but $8000 more is needed to cover flights to and from Australia, transportation within the country (it's BIG), food, lodging, and the hiring of a local videographer/photographer to capture content for future release. 

I hope to save money by staying with local chapter leaders! I'm not opposed to couch surfing, either. I also am excited by the prospect of hiring a videographer in Australia, so I don't have to incur unnecessary additional travel costs.

Of course I'll cover plenty of expenses out of pocket. But I just can't pull off this project on my own! A friend in Australia actually was the one who came up with this idea to crowdfund the project. 

As you can imagine, gifts of any size are MUCH appreciated! This is a big undertaking and it truly cannot take place without significant support. 

On a related money note, what happens if we raise more than expected? That would be HUGE! If/when the basic trip expenses are covered, additional monies will be distributed among a number of communities lifting up ancestral health practices in Australia. And if the campaign goal is not reached, what then? Adjustments will be made in terms of the scope of content captured. (In other words, I might not be able to hire someone to record presentations or interviews or various portions of the experience). But, honestly, this is an important reason I am taking this trip: to bring the information back to the world, so I'd hate to have to do this!  

As mentioned above, monetary support is crucial. If, however, you're not in a position to contribute financially, you can help raise the visibility of the campaign by simply sharing it on social media. Or direct your friends to follow me @holistichilda on Instagram to learn more about this mission to change the world through wise traditions. And thank you!

story:
Dance Your Move

www.danceyourmove.org

Art, Dance and Wellness

Summary

Dance Your Move is a space to empower creative spirit within anyone irrespective of the age, field of interest and location. It provides artistically designed digital and physical products and dance mediation workshops. 

Dance Your Move is an idea that is created out of passion for dance. It is a company registered in IL, USA. The website- www.danceyourmove.org houses one in-person product that is Dance Meditation classes and other products that are online deliverables like workshops and ebooks. 

DYM had few sales already with little to no marketing in various platforms. The only one that we have really tried to use is Facebook at a minimal budget. We would like to reach out more within next 3 months and that is why we are asking for funding. Any funding that is raised will strictly go towards marketing:

  • Creative Workshops for women
  • Dance Meditation Classes for kids, seniors citizens and women
  • Other creative products like ebook- Creative Zen series with individual ebooks including regular creative writing 

No funds raised here will be used to provide salary requirements for any of the helpers/employees working for Dance Your Move.

What We Need & What You Get

Target Goal To Reach: $15,000 ( 2 years and after)

More cushion for another year of marketing that will get us more sales and we hire more creatives to create more innovative products, for this the Target goal to reach: $25,000 (3 years and after)

With $15,000, we are hoping to not only provide funding for next few months but after a short interval where we will upgrade our products then we will use rest of the funding for the next round. Our goal is to have a marketing budget for 2 years with an extra room to keep the momentum going for the company for years to come after those 2 years. 

We have belief in our signature product and based on where the current trend is going, we have two of the most sought after aspects- health & wellness oriented product AND online products that people can use at their own pace on their own time. 

Whatever funds that are raised will go towards marketing two of the above products even if we don't reach our target goal. We will use what we raise to make tracks with DYM so your support will not go to waste. 

Online Product Example

Video
One of the product listed in the video on the page is called Creative Shift. It is an online workshop for women. This is one of the online product that is available to purchase on the website. To go further it is about empowering the next female entrepreneur. The idea was to create a workshop in general that had sets of creative exercises for all but since DYM's founder is a female and empowering the next voice to come up with innovative ideas to be a female seem to be an apt thing for DYM community. Women plays multiple roles everyday and we hope to encourage some of them to pick up the next role as a creative entrepreneur. 

Risks & Challenges

Health & wellness is something that people are concerned about and that is our strength and challenge currently. We hope to raise funds, spread the word and have our in-person classes scheduled after the craziness is over. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can contribute anything that is great. If you cannot, please reach out to your friends, family, your community who can contribute in some way. We would appreciate any complimentary noise you make about us in the world. 

Thank you. 

www.danceyourmove.org

story:
To Our Loved and Respected Clipper & Soul Family

 

My name is Megan Goodman, owner/stylist of Clipper & Soul Barbershop in Bloomington, IN. I purchased the barbershop in September 2019, becoming one of the only woman owned, team-based, socially entrepreneuria barbering businesses in the nation.  I have been a stylist since 2007. For me to become an owner/stylist was a dream come true.

When I was a young girl, I remember cutting my siblings hair on the front porch. Cutting hair became a passion. However, I was discouraged from becoming a barber stylist. I was told I need to have bigger dreams and aspirations. I needed to pursue a career as a nurse or something to make lots of money so I wouldn’t have to worry about anything financially. I have been asked many times “Why would you Just Want to Cut Hair?”

After several different career paths, even becoming a Medical Assistant, I found my way back to “just cutting hair”. The thing is, it isn’t about cutting hair at all. For me, it’s about the people, the relationships, the community, the stories and memories we create with other human beings. The bond between an individual and “THEIR barber stylist” that lasts a lifetime. From first grade pictures to senior prom, graduating high school thru college years, engagement photos to wedding day videos, that first “real job” to that big promotion. There is something amazing about the connections you form with people and the community when you are a barber stylist. There is something extraordinary about “JUST CUTTING HAIR”.

As most of you know, the State of Indiana mandated that we close our doors during the COVID-19 pandemic to help protect our community. We are continuing to do our part to mitigate the spread of the virus. 

This pandemic took everyone by storm, we could not have prepared for this emotionally or financially. With your help and our determination we have faith that we all can rise above these uncertain times.  These are extremely tough times for everyone across the globe. We continue to brainstorm, exploring ways to rise up from these ashes. We want to add value to our clients so we set-up a INDIEGOGO campaign, providing incentives for contributions. In addition we set up VENMO @ClipperandSoul  if you prefer to donate. 

We are extremely thankful, grateful and blessed for any contributions we receive. We thank you whole heartedly.

Your contributions will help cover the following

  • Lease
  • Utilities
  • Payroll (when we re-open)
  • Any/All operating expenses

Please share with friends and family. We are anxious to get back behind the chair doing what we do best "Just Cutting Hair".

 

Much Love and Many Blessing

Megan Goodman, Owner/Stylist, Clipper & Soul

Please visit our website www.clipperandsoul.com to learn more about who we are and our partnerships in the community.

We ask you continue to do your part by staying home and washing your hands often. Thank you.

story:
I begin on a journey to make changes in my life to live healthier and use natural products on my skin and body, after I was diagnosed with a rare medical condition. I started by making my own whipped Shea butter body cream. I eventually would make jars for my family and friends, who encouraged me to consider sharing my creations with others. From whipped Shea butter, I branched out to make Lip balm, All-natural deodorant, Brown sugar Facial scrub, Coffee scrub, and Organic Lavender and Oatmeal soap. All of my products are handmade/crafted and packaged by myself.  I make all of the items in my kitchen and use my basement to store my products and supplies. I take great care and pride in delivering a quality product that is made with love and all-natural plant-based ingredients.

In addition to making and selling products, I also enjoy teaching others how to make soap. Prior to the national pandemic, I had the opportunity to conduct a Soap making class. This was a very fun experience and others enjoyed learning the process. I was asked to conduct a soap making class for Breast Cancer survivors, by a local church. I look forward to doing this in the near future.

At this time, my business is solely online and I want to take things to the next level.  I had the opportunity to have my products in a beauty store, which unfortunately closed last year. I also have participated in craft/vendor events in my area, pre-COVID. I have received overwhelming positive feedback from my creations. This is very encouraging for me to continue to grow my business. I am a creative person and I want to continue to create and grow my business. My short-term goal is to sell my products in a natural food store or have a display set up in a retail food market chain.

My long-term goal is to create a non-profit organization that will provide education classes to disadvantaged middle and high school students on how to start a business.

At this time, I fund all of my business expenses, which is costly and limits my ability to take my business to the next level. I'm seeking funding from this campaign to grow and expand my business. I'm requesting $150,000 for business expenses which includes hiring a business consultant, obtaining a work studio, increase marketing, create my own website, photography, public relations to get my products into magazines and beauty blogs, promotional materials along with samples and testers for retailers. 

If I don't reach my goal of $150,000, the funds received will be used to grow my business. My top priorities are to hire a business consultant, increase marketing, and create my own website.

Your contribute will make a huge impact in my life. I've always been a self-starter and highly motivated person to achieve my goals. I never thought I would have my own business helping and impacting others by offering safe and quality skincare products. I want to continue to grow this venture and help even more people.  I strongly believe that all goals can be achieved by hard work, perseverance, and dedication.

Risks, Challenges, and/or obstacles are associated with most things in life. I want to work with a business consultant to properly map out any foreseeable challenges and minimize time and money waste.  I am a very detailed-oriented person and problem solver. I hope for the best but also plan for unfortunate situations to occur.

If you are still reading this, I greatly appreciate your consideration thus far. In addition to a financial contribution, please share this with anyone you think would be interested in helping. Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools for your convenience. 

Please review the following pictures of my business products, display, and packed items for shipment.

story:
Overview

Nexx is the first multifunctional traction device that helps you to relieve neck tension, improves flexibility and ranges of motion. 

Most importantly Nexx is Comfortable and Relaxing. Our users are so at-ease most fall asleep during treatment. Gently Extending the Neck 26 Degree Elevation Arch, it Helps to Hydrate Discs, Increases Blood Circulation and Restores the Natural Curve of the Neck. Instant Relief, Fixing your Forward Head Posture and Rounded Shoulders. Helps With Mobility that Causes  Cervical Herniated Discs.

 

- Either throw out your mobile phone or buy yourself a Nexx and look after your neck. - Gadget Flow

 

As Featured In

 

The spine, neck, and back support us in our daily life. Any pain coming from it affects us more than we know. Chronic back problems are bad for long term health.

When back pain is not treated, it directly affects the quality of your life.

The solution?

An indispensable at-home tool to alleviate neck pain, use the same therapy chiropractors use to decompress the spine and relieve cervical pressure.

When the neck & back loses their natural curved shape, the soft discs that are in between the vertebrae become compressed, & rich lubricating fluid is unable to penetrate & hydrate the discs. This causes premature aging in the form of stiff, dry joints. Our Nexx Device counteracts that by lifting, stretching, decompressing, hydrating, & shaping the neck & back into its “vital” natural curved shape. The Dual inflation mechanism gradually lifts also pulls and separates the joints.

 

 

Have questions? 

            

 

, Patented, Intelligent dual rise and release traction is the most satisfying tension relief one can now do in the comfort of your own home. Nexx creates expansion between the head and the neck, separating the vertebrae to relieve pressure, reducing the pressure between discs or off of a compressed nerve, as well as by stretching the surrounding joint structures and muscles, supplying oxygen to the brain by improving spine blood circulation.

 

DUAL AIR NECK TRACTION

NEXX simultaneously gives two different degrees of elevation. Optimal pull, also rise pressure release.

Cervical traction works on neck pain and other medical conditions that affect the spine. It relieves stiff, sore neck, improves poor posture and corrects the forward head-tilt. It is also reported to help lessen the frequency of headaches, insomnia.

The Nexx cervical care device is excellence-driven physiotherapy equipment. 

 

Nexx provides 4 adjustable temperature settings, comfort the individual preference and apply soothing heat therapy to aching neck muscles. Uniquely designed to target the muscles in the back of the head and neck, it contours to the shape of your neck to provide targeted relief. This heating therapy delivers gentle heat to tender muscles, increasing blood flow and allowing muscles to relax.

 

 Electrotherapy Pulse Massager Helps to Ease Tiredness, Promote Blood Circulation, Enhance Immunity, Improve Sleeping Quality and Activate Collaterals to Relief Your Body Pain. A small pulse generator, implanted in the device, sends electrical pulses to the spinal cord.

These pulses interfere with the nerve impulses that make you feel pain and help to reduce it via stimulation of the nerve endings, thus benefiting the stressed muscle tissues and nervous system in general.

 

Do you get told to stand up straight?

Your posture and how you hold your body when you’re sitting or standing is the foundation for every movement you make.

Computers, phones, and other digital

 

 

Two external electrode massage pads can be applied to many other parts of the body, such as legs, back, joints, arms, etc.

Nexx all in one mode is the real Gamechanger! Combine all 3 at once or adjust the heat and traction with the help of the controller, each function and frequency combination can be adjusted according to the user's own feelings and preferences.

                                     

 

 

 

Baxx technology, a team built of engineers and health enthusiasts,athletes had a vision: to spread wellness by turning an everyday essential(mobility) into the design and user-friendly at-home therapy device. The technology age has brought us some amazing tools throughout the decade, also has transformed the way we carry ourselves. Posture, our everyday routines have placed a heavy strain on the natural curve in our body, ultimately resulting in the restriction of blood flow. Many devices have popped up over recent years, claiming to correct or relive posture and pain. These claims come with a very uncomfortable price or simply noneffective ways to treat the core issues. Intelligent Traction combined with heat and electrotherapy is a real game-changer in this space.

 

Baxx Technology is not responsible for taxes or duties.

Optimal pull, also rise pressure release.Cervical traction works on neck pain and other medical conditions that affect the spine. It relieves stiff, sore neck, improves poor posture and corrects the forward head-tilt. It is also reported to help lessen the frequency of headaches, insomnia.The Nexx cervical care device is excellence-driven physiotherapy equipment.  

Nexx provides 4 adjustable temperature settings, comfort the individual preference and apply soothing heat therapy to aching neck muscles. Uniquely designed to target the muscles in the back of the head and neck, it contours to the shape of your neck to provide targeted relief. This heating therapy delivers gentle heat to tender muscles, increasing blood flow and allowing muscles to relax.  Electrotherapy Pulse Massager Helps to Ease Tiredness, Promote Blood Circulation, Enhance Immunity, Improve Sleeping Quality and Activate Collaterals to Relief Your Body Pain. A small pulse generator, implanted in the device, sends electrical pulses to the spinal cord.These pulses interfere with the nerve impulses that make you feel pain and help to reduce it via stimulation of the nerve endings, thus benefiting the stressed muscle tissues and nervous system in general. Do you get told to stand up straight?Your posture and how you hold your body when you’re sitting or standing is the foundation for every movement you make.Computers, phones, and other digital  Two external electrode massage pads can be applied to many other parts of the body, such as legs, back, joints, arms, etc.Nexx all in one mode is the real Gamechanger! Combine all 3 at once or adjust the heat and traction with the help of the controller, each function and frequency combination can be adjusted according to the user's own feelings and preferences.                                        Baxx technology, a team built of engineers and health enthusiasts,athletes had a vision: to spread wellness by turning an everyday essential(mobility) into the design and user-friendly at-home therapy device. The technology age has brought us some amazing tools throughout the decade, also has transformed the way we carry ourselves. Posture, our everyday routines have placed a heavy strain on the natural curve in our body, ultimately resulting in the restriction of blood flow. Many devices have popped up over recent years, claiming to correct or relive posture and pain. These claims come with a very uncomfortable price or simply noneffective ways to treat the core issues. Intelligent Traction combined with heat and electrotherapy is a real game-changer in this space. Baxx Technology is not responsible for taxes or duties.

story:
These days most people are “face first” in a computer screen or other digital device from 6 to 7.5 hours a day, or even longer. Let's be honest. Is that an addiction or what?

 

 

As you stay glued to your screens all day long, harmful rays are damaging your eyes. And you are probably among the 99% who don't use any kind of eye protection.

 

But you aren't going to stop using these devices, are you?

 

Of course not! So the best solution for sparing your eyes from the harmful HEV (blue light) assault they receive daily from these screens is to wear some form of effective eye protection.

HEV (blue light) rays are as harmful as the better-known UVA and UVB rays we protect ourselves from by wearing sunglasses when we go outdoors. These HEV rays are the indoor silent assassin that is slowly but surely degrading your vision.

You must fight this silent, insidious, unrelenting attack on your irreplaceable eyes and help them survive the digital age.

 

What is the harm these HEV (blue light) rays are causing?

 

Melanin is the natural pigment in our skin and eyes that protects us from harmful rays. Located just behind the retina, it protects our eyes from these rays in the same way that it protects our skin. 

                                              

But our eye melanin is incrementally and cumulatively lost as we age. We lose 25% of it by the time we turn 40 – and by age 60, as much as 50% is gone. Blue-eyed people are at even higher risk.

The result is that mature adults can experience increased likelihood of macular degeneration and cataracts as the HEV rays harm the retina and macula of the eyes.

The debilitating physical damage may not always become noticeable until later in life, but it starts early with regular exposure until you reach that “holy crap” moment – and then surgery may become the only alternative.

 

 

“Compared with age-matched controls, patients with advanced macular degeneration had significantly higher exposure to blue or visible light over the preceding 25 years, but were not different in respect to exposure to UVA or UVB. These data suggest that high levels of exposure to blue or visible light may cause ocular damage, especially later in life, and may be related to the development of age-related macular degeneration.”

– National Center for Biotechnology Information

      

In addition to these long-term effects, there are uncomfortable short-term afflictions  known as Computer Vision Syndrome (CVS).

                

The two most serious complaints are headaches and sleep problems. These sleep problems occur because HEV rays suppress melatonin that is necessary for quality sleep.

And as if this weren’t bad enough, 90% of children who use a computer more than 3 hours a day suffer vision problems. (And as we know, their actual use is usually MUCH longer!) Remember — computer addiction has NO age limits! We must help younger people protect themselves.

 

             Harvard Medical School weighs in on the subject

 

Now, that's pretty straightforward, isn't it?

 

 

Since you aren't going to stop using digital devices, the best solution is to wear protective computer eyewear. But computer eyewear is not all created equal! What you need is serious, professional-quality protection – NOT the cheap colored glasses in flimsy frames that are often advertised in catalogs or found on Amazon.       

What you need is meaningful, effective
VISION INSURANCE.

 

Why are these new SightSaver Computer Glasses the state-of-the-art professional protection your eyes need?

 

These lenses are infused with a scientifically proven, proprietary synthetic melanin called Melaneye. (Synthetic melanin was first created in the labs of the Yale Medical Research Center.) We’ve already learned that (1) natural melanin is the body’s protection against harmful rays, (2) it's found not just in our skin but also in the retina of our eyes, and (3) we cumulatively lose the melanin in our eyes as we age. As it is lost, it cannot be replaced – but we can compensate by using lenses with synthetic melanin infused into them. The Melaneye synthetic melanin that's infused into SightSaver lenses is what sets them apart from ordinary colored computer glasses.

Not only does it protect our eyes, but many people report that the Melaneye synthetic melanin actually increases their visual acuity – making things look sharper and clearer when wearing their SightSaver Computer Glasses.

 

 

“Wearing lenses with synthetic melanin is a natural means of protecting oneself – it makes up for the loss of retinal melanin that occurs as we age – as melanin is the very pigment that nature has chosen to protect us.”

– Jose-Alain Safel, French National Hospital Center for Ophthalmology

 

In Their Own Words…

Hear what others think about their 

SightSaver Computer Glasses.

 

See and hear for yourself what others have to say about how they have been helped by SightSaver Computer Glasses:

 

  • Melaneye protection from the damaging and harmful HEV rays.
  • Retarding and compensating for natural melanin loss caused by these rays.
  • Addressing the issue of melanin loss from overexposure and addiction to digital devices with screens (e.g., computer screens, tablets, smart phones, gaming devices, etc.).
  • Enhanced visual acuity, providing better definition and contrast.

 

 

Note the wrap-around frame for greater protected vision – and the quality of the frame.

 

  • High-quality polycarbonate lenses.
  • Anti-reflective coating.
  • Our proprietary, synthetic melanin – Melaneye – infused into the lenses.
  • The wrap-around frame style reduces unfiltered light.
  • Frames are made from TR-90, a superior material used for many of the designer, brand-name, high-end eyewear costing $200-$300 and more.
  • A microfiber bag to hold your eyewear that can double as a cleaning cloth.
  • A handsome eyewear case with the SightSaver Computer Glasses logo on it.

 

Most people are addicted to digital devices and their screens. We know you aren’t going to stop using these devices, so the only solution is to protect your eyes.  And you must also protect the younger people in your life who think of themselves as indestructible and invincible. Step in and do the right thing for them by getting them a pair of these glasses!

 

As the perk for your support, you can own a single or multiple pairs of SightSaver Computer Glasses for a price well below MSRP that will never be lower or repeated again anywhere. When these ultra high-quality computer glasses become commercially available, their price will be much higher.

You will be among the first to own these extraordinary Best in Class synthetic melanin-infused eyewear. When people hear about how special they are, and see how great they look, they will ask, “WHERE did you get these? HOW can I get a pair?” (Here’s a tip. Be careful about lending them out. You may have trouble getting them back!) You can take pride in having a product others will see as desirable, but for now, is uniquely yours.

Look just below and see the levels of perks we are offering. One of these offers will be the right choice for you. If you are new to Indiegogo, backing our campaign is simple. After reviewing your choices below, make your decision and choose the number of pairs of SightSavers you wish to order (multiples earn you a discount). Then find the perk you have chosen in the column on the right – click on it – and proceed to checkout.

 

My Company – HiTekSpeks – has already had two successful crowdfunders for technologically enhanced eyewear. If you wish, you can choose a pledge perk that includes either or both of these great products. 

You can review these products – and their features and benefits – on their respective Indiegogo campaign pages:

  • SightSaver Sunglasses  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sightsaver-s...
  • NightDrive Eyewear  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/nightdrive-o... 

Pricing for these Combo Offers can be found on the chart above – and in the pledge column to the right.

 

Like you, your friends and family members are subjected daily to harmful HEV rays from their computer screens. You might want to think about getting an extra pair or two for someone special – and remember, all age groups can benefit from your thoughtfulness.

Whether for yourself or for others, you can help ensure the success of this campaign by spreading the word on social media and in person.

We also encourage you to follow our Indiegogo campaign by going to our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Sight-Saver-Computer-G.... By clicking the “like” button there – and interacting – you help spread the word. If you post our campaign link – www.igg.com/sightsavercomputerglasses – on your personal Facebook page, this too lets your friends know about this great product. And maybe some of them are exactly the people who need it most.

 

This is simple. If you watch digital devices, you should be wearing SightSaver Computer Glasses – period! HEV rays are among the most damaging of the all the harmful rays – and our Melaneye-infused lenses protect against them and counteract their effect.  

We are proud of the appearance of our eyewear – they look GREAT – but the eye-protecting Melaneye that's infused into our lenses is the real story here – and is what makes our eyewear so important to own and wear.

 

Imagine what it will feel like to KNOW you are doing your best to protect your eyes from the ravages of the HEV rays discharged by your computer screens by owning a pair of SightSavers.

 

You can continue to leave your precious eyes unprotected against HEV rays, or perhaps hope that wearing some flimsy colored lenses will protect them. Or, you can make the smart decision to protect your eyesight by supporting this Indiegogo campaign so you can get your very own pair of SightSaver Computer Glasses.

Bottom Line: Why would you settle for no protection, or cheap eyewear that only does half the job of protecting your eyes?

It doesn’t matter how old you are. Improved eye protection from damaging HEV rays can help ANYONE. It can be the margin of safety you need and deserve. You can have that peace of mind with your very own SightSaver Computer Glasses.

 

 

Choose your perk from the choices to the right of the screen and be among the first to experience the full BENEFITS of this unique and innovative approach to better eye protection. Reserve your SightSaver Computer Glasses NOW – and then spread the word to help make sure your friends and family members are protected too.

story:
The first step is to correct your posture, such as reading a book or looking at your phone, to avoid maintaining the same posture for a long time. If it is not serious, pay attention to the warmth of the cervical spine. Hot compresses can help improve the blood circulation of the cervical spine and relax the neck muscles. Avoid improper sudden twist and unqualified massage, which can easily cause secondary damage to the fragile neck.

 

 

Physical massage type

Similar to the manipulating of human hands, massage can be achieved by rotating spherical/irregular objects inside the device. Some products also have the function of a hot compress, but be careful not to adjust the strength to too much, so as to avoid excessive massage, which will cause damage and aggravate symptoms. Its appearance is generally thick and has a certain weight.

Electrical pulse-type

It's totally different from a physical massager. The shape is similar to that of a headphone, which is hung on the neck when using, and with 2 or 3 massage units (inductive metal electrode plate) on the main part. The electrical pulse signals of different frequencies and duty cycles are used to stimulate the cervical spine and make the muscles contract, all of these will promote blood circulation and remove stasis to relax the muscles and relieve the soreness of the cervical spine caused by the accumulation of lactic acid. Some mid-to-high-end products will also have the function of heating, of course, the effect will be better.

 

 

 

Therefore, we introduce the most stylish, portable, ultra-modern, and pocket-friendly neck massager- K5 Pro.

 

A few minutes daily usage of it gives stimulating, healthful aid to blood circulation
The High-grade silicone material is more skin-friendly, creating an extraordinary massage experience. For someone with serious muscle tension across the back, neck, and shoulders, it is great – effects can be felt within minutes.

 

TENS (Transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation) therapy involves the use of low-voltage electric currents to treat pain. TENS therapy blocks or changes your perception of pain. While EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) contracts the neck muscles to build muscle strength for recovery. 

K5 Pro combines dual-frequency pulse technology (TENS+EMS) to bring you a deep massage experience of nerve layer, vascular layer, and muscle layer to give a refreshing massage around your neck.

 

K5 Pro is so light in weight that it can conveniently be carried in a pocket or a purse. 

It has a long-lasting battery. It requires just one-hour charging to provide a battery life of 5 days.
Its unique and fashionable shape solves the need for massage anywhere, anytime. 

 

Moreover, it is driven by the British ARM hard-core chip due to which it has a faster running speed and provides a more stable massage force.

 

Four electrode zones, alternately linked, release more than 1000 massage waveforms

 

You can easily switch between modes or strengths with just one swipe and with English voice menu navigation. It works with 3 different temperature levels so you may set the temperature according to your need.

 

 

 

 

 

Established in 2007, SKG is a global technology company focused on the research, development, design, and production of wearable massagers. Based on human health data management, adhering to the “Global manufacturing, Global sales" brand philosophy, SKG integrates the best quality R&D, design, and manufacturing resources in the world. 

SKG provides high-quality wearable massagers and service experience for consumers who are pursuing smart technology, fashion, and health, and committed to making everyone younger and healthier.

 

                                                  

All SKG products are certified with international boards and certifications such as ROHS, FCC, CB, CE, ISO13485, ISO9001, FDA, etc.

SKG sports a special Design Team which has been awarded the German Red Dot and IF Awards multiple times, and has long worked closely with world-class design companies such as MILLOT, U2, SEOL, and DESIGN NEXT.

story:
We all know how important water is to our life. However, our drinking water is not 100% safe now.

Recent news about drinking water crisis

This’s exactly what Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle all about:  A cutting-edge self-cleaning water bottle that stays sterilized and keeps the water inside as pure as it gets—at all time!  

 

 

The sterilize feature is what Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle all about. The mercury-free UV-C LED technology from Silicon Valley produces a 99.99% sterilization of Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle and water.  

 UV-C LED experiment

With UV-C light at 275nm, it effectively destroys bacteria DNA and RNA strand. Even NASA is using this technology to sterilize their water in space.  

With FDA, CE and SGS certifications, the UV-C LED deep UV disinfection technology was first used by NASA to sterilize space gloves and allow astronauts to drink pure water. Now, this technology is family-friendly and within your reach. Using a bottle that you keeps your water fresh,  clean, safe to drink all the time and wherever you go. 

Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle is not just a regular thermos flask. As a personal item, we like to use things that align with our style and interest.  

Mahaton's design is inspired by modern architecture and made by top-notch designers from the UK, featuring beautifully smooth and straight forward lines, and gray meranti color system.

Refined and truly original aesthetics are not the only new aspect that Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle features as opposed to other self-cleaning bottles. We have also added wireless charging technology to this genuinely unique thermos to make it even more convenient and practical for your needs. 

We're proud to announce our Mahaton as a non-toxic disinfection water bottle, which keeps itself sterilized while not releasing any chemical substance. Mahaton Self-Cleaning Bottle uses green technology to help us protect our planet. 

On the other hand, Mahaton is an affordable device for everybody. We believe that the purpose of cutting-edge technology is to make people's lives better without leaving anyone behind. Having access to pure water should be a fundamental right in our future, and this key principle reflects on our pricing.

We are a start-up company with a big dream, which is to improve people’s personal hygiene through technology and innovation. Using technological innovation to bring health-protect products to worldwide and improve our daily life.  

We created products to keep thousands of families safer from bacteria. Now, among all our creations, we offer you the self-cleaning bottle that will change the concept of a water bottle and what it is intended to do.

 

1.Wireless charging

Mahaton bottle uses innovative wireless charging technology 

High-performance polymer lithium battery 

A new charging experience

2.UV-C LED sterilization technology

Mahaton bottle contains a 275 nm deep UV chip It can eliminate 99.99% of bacteria and odor 

Our goal is to provide the world’s greenest, mercury-free, and convenient water purification solution

3.Vacuum stainless steel, thermal insulation technology

Double-wall electropolished stainless steel 

Hot water can reach a suitable temperature after 5 hours

4.Intelligent activation, worry free safety feature

Water purification at a touch of button

Auto-stop safety feature applies when opening the lid during purification process

 

 

 

Mahaton Disinfection works with the least UV-C LED sterilization technology. Incubated at the IDEA Venture of Northeastern University in Boston, USA, the company mainly develops innovative and chemical free disinfection products for families and individuals. Mahaton found by Northeastern University alumni, director of an semi-conductor manufactuer in Silicon Valley and the designer who won Red Dot, IF and IDEA design awards. The company is formed by one of the earliest engineer teams in the world to develop UV-C LED technology based consumer products. Mahaton’s vision is to use the technological innovation to improve people’s living environment.

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 800+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $350MM raised between them.

story:
For those of you who don’t know us, our names are Dexter Gordon and Danielle Vito, or more commonly known as Dexter and Vito. Our friendship is no ordinary friendship; ours is a relationship brought together by fate fifteen years ago, and we became besties-at-first-sight. Todd-Grant Elementary, McIntosh Co. Georgia, Mrs. Way’s fifth grade class was where we realized our souls were meant to meet. Mrs. Way had given the class a creative writing assignment. After writing two separate, mediocre stories, we put our heads together and wrote The Broker, a literary masterpiece- for fifth grade standards, anyways.

As years passed, we started becoming inseparable- literally inseparable, having every single class together from eighth grade on. During our senior year of high school in Mrs. Barrow’s journalism class, we were made editors of the yearbook. This was not a task we took lightly; we spent hours planning, designing, and creating the 2009 yearbook, trying to make it the best yearbook MCA has ever had- which I am pretty sure we did. Dedication does not begin to describe the passion we had for the yearbook. Countless hours were spent going around town selling ads and going to sporting events for photos. We even went to a golf match, and trecked the course taking action shots of the team.


After receiving and opening our acceptance letters to the University of Georgia, we headed up to Athens to figure out what on earth we wanted to do with our lives. Three years into college, the only thing we were sure of was we were tired of eating typical college cuisine. Sure, every once in a while one of us would go into the kitchen and try to recreate one of our favorite home-cooked meals, but the meal usually fell short of bringing Darien to Athens. But the yearning for a good, home-cooked meal just kept growing, and we were determined to make frozen dinners and ramen noodles a thing of the past. One day while sitting around recollecting about high school, we thought about an Art History project we did in Dr. Debbie Smith’s class. We had to make a food from an assigned time period and we were assigned a British Trifle. Your normal British Trifle consists of a thick custard, fruit juice or jello, a sponge cake, and whipped cream. Being as ingenuous as we are and using the ingredients we had at home, our trifle consisted of yogurt, strawberries and blueberries, graham crackers and whipped cream. Dr. Smith dubbed it “The Trifling Trifle”, but it turned out to be delicious and her favorite dish of the class! Finally it hit us- instead of trying to take on the challenge of creating delicious meals single-handedly, why not go into the kitchen and create something together. As time went on and our meals tasted closer and closer to home, we came up with an answer to the question “So what are you planning on doing after college?” 

Instead of answering, “Well, I’m not really sure yet,” we can now answer with certainty, “We’re gonna open a restaurant.” The Little Fiddle Bar & Griddle will be our southern home-style take on a bar and grill in the Classic City. You don’t live in the Classic City you say? GameDay weekends are an excellent time to experience all that The Little Fiddle has to offer. Our menu will be an eclectic one, best described as bar food with a southern flare. While we will have our own takes on your favorite typical bar food, such as burgers and wings, our extensive weekend brunch menu will be what really sets us apart. It will be a weekly staple for college students and locals alike, as well as the perfect treat for visitors to top off their stay in Athens. Not to toot our own horns or anything, but pretty much anytime we get in the kitchen together, something amazing comes out. This is never more true than when it comes to breakfast. So it only makes sense that our restaurant would have to feature a super awesome brunch menu, and that's exactly what we expect to have. From our cream cheese stuffed french toast topped with apple caramel syrup, to our fried chicken biscuit with buttermilk gravy, no matter your taste, we will have something for you! To see more of our delicious creations find us on social media; our links are at the bottom of the page.


In order to make this happen we need your help. Starting a restaurant is expensive, especially for two kids straight outta college. We also realize asking you folks to fund our entire business would be insane! Instead, we are asking for help starting a Box Lunch and Catering Service. We understand that in order to be successful we have to work our way up. Having a lunch delivery service, we will be able to get valuable experience, while saving money to open The Little Fiddle Bar and Griddle in the near future. Your donations will help us get the equipment and the space to prepare our food for delivery.

Your donation will also get you a lot of cool stuff! We want to show you how much your support means to us, and give you something in return. Each donation will get you a personalized, hand-written thank you card and a custom Little Fiddle sticker and button. We are not asking you to completely fund the restaurant, but if one day you’re feeling really generous, you my friend will become Little Fiddle royalty! We have everything necessary for having a successful business; we have the drive, we have the passion, and we have the skills. The only thing we don’t have is the means. This is not just because we don’t want to have a real job, or something we all of a sudden decided to do. The Little Fiddle has been years in the making. In the kitchen together is where we are meant to be. There is no question of if there will be a Little Fiddle, the only question is when! With your help our dream will be one step closer to reality!


To keep up with the progress of our campaign and beyond, find us on: facebook at The Little Fiddle, twitter @Little_Fiddle_,  and on Instagram @thelittlefiddle. I know they’re all different, but we had to work with what we had.

story:
Introduction to Xplosive Performance Academy

Hello everyone, My name is John Vickers & I am the Owner/Operator of Xplosive Performance Academy. I have been in the Sports Performance industry for almost 10 years now and have had the opportunity to mentor, train and help many individuals reach their goals when I comes to earning sports scholarships.

I am looking for funding to help open my own performance training center to help even more kids reach their goals. I work with many intercity kids that need a way out and a way of becoming successful. I am currently renting space through another gym and am limited in the number of kids I can reach.

Your help will allow me to open a facility that is conducive to what I'm trying to do while teaching athletes from youth to professional on how to become successful through hard work, dedication, commitment and desire to take them to the next level. Thank you for reading this and I hope you can help me, help many others!

What We Need To Help More Athletes

I am looking to get $15,000 in funding to help open our training facility. Below is what is needed to open the facility:


- 3 functional squat racks - $4,500

- Dumbbells up to 110 lbs. - $2,500

- 6 Barbells - $1,200

- Plyo Boxes - $1,600

- Weights - $2,400

- MISC. Equipment - $2,800


Xplosive Performance Academy is one of the most unique training philosphies in the surrounding area. Our program is completely based around creating the better, more explosive athlete through a scientifically based program with speed training, plyometrics, multi-directional movement, sport-specific strength training and core development. Multiple athletes to come through our program have earned major division 1 sports scholarships and we are looking to quadruple that number.


Your Impact on Metro Detroit Athletes

Through the 10 years I have been training athletes, I have had the opportunity to help 100's of them to earn scholarships. This year alone, I had over 40 athletes earn scholarships.


Not only is it important to play their sport at a high level, but a high level of grades are also important.  When I open this facility, I will be teaming with an after school tutoring and ACT prep program to help these athletes focus on their grades and their athletics while staying off the streets and out of harm or troubles ways.

 

Risks & Challenges

 With any business, there is competition. This is my one big challenge and I am charging at any competition full speed ahead. Our program has proven over and over again that we set kids apart from others when it comes to athleticism.


My biggest problem when I first started training was that I had a tough time selling to individuals. Now, in my 10th year, it comes easy and I normally have athletes and their parents as pre-sold packages because they see the value and understand that it takes extra to get their kids to the next level.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I completely understand that some people can't contribute financially. If you can not make a financial contribution, please spread the word through social media, email or word of mouth.


Thank you all for your time!

story:
My name is Robert Ross and I am the founder of FoldingCoin Inc. an Indiana non profit crypto currency applying blockchain technology to help support Stanford's Folding@home project in creating medicines for uncured diseases like Cancer, Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, and many more.

To get a better understanding of the project I work on, I would like to explain what Folding@home is. Folding@home (FAH) is developed by Stanford University and has been running for almost 15 years. What  FAH does is has anyone in the world download a "protein simulation" program onto their PCs to simulate how proteins fold and unfold in the human body. The results of all this distributed computation is tabulated and analyzed to help new find new medicines and cures to some of the worst diseases faced by man such as Cancer. Anyone can donate their PC computational cycles as FAH is a 501(c)3 non profit and all the results are available to medical and scientific researchers upon request. This is a great way to help fight cancer without having to give time or money. The program runs in the background of your computer when you are not using it.


But there's a problem. There's no reward for sharing your computer cycles in this way. You can join a team and you can earn points, but there is no profit motive to help with research.

FoldingCoin Inc. was created to drive more participation to FAH by distributing the crypto currency FLDC (like Bitcoin) to participants of Folding@home. FLDC can be exchanged for BTC and BTC can be exchanged for US dollars thus giving a profit motive to fold. FoldingCoin Inc.

What is Bitcoin?

To explain in depth what Bitcoin is would take a long time on this campaign. Please watch the provided video for an excellent brief description of what Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency is.

What does Bitcoin have to do with medicine creation on FAH?

Thats simple, Bitcoin allows profit for running your computational cycles and FAH does not. Please watch this video for complete details on how this will work but I will put the main points here in the campaign page.


Lets take a look at the computational power of the three single biggest computational networks in the world:

  • The Worlds fastest SuperComputer = 33 PetaFLOPS
  • The FAH project = 48 PetaFLOPS 
  • The Bitcoin Network = 4,064,260 PetaFLOPS

Since there is a profit motive for people to contribute power to the Bitcoin network it has become 123,159 times more powerful than the worlds fastest supercomputer. The way Bitcoin became so powerful is because specialized hardware was created for Bitcoin mining called ASICs (Application Specific Integrated Circuits). Before the ASICs though there was enough computational power in general PCs to equal 330 PetaFLOPS.

Imagine if that power was harnessed for molecular protein folding. Most of this power was redirected to altcoin mining after the ASICs came out since that was the next profitable thing, and power was not redirected towards FAH since there was no profit motive for folding. FoldingCoin Inc. looks to bring a profit motive for people to fold proteins by distributing FLDC along with other Counterparty tokens. 

Venture capitalists could see this as an opportunity to invest in the creation of economic sized Anton Supercomputer, which is an ASIC molecular protein simulating machine that can fold more efficiently than standard computing hardware. This very thing happened to Bitcoin mining when it became exponentially profitable: venture capitalists invested in the creation of ASIC miners to compute Bitcoin at a more efficient rate than standard computing hardware.

So where is your money going to?

On January 5th 2015 I decided to go full time with developing FoldingCoin Inc. We have a great team of developers  that work on FoldingCoin Inc. on a purely volunteer basis. All of the FLDC devs still have full time jobs for income, but I no longer do. 

FoldingCoin Inc. has become popular enough where its success depends on one of us going full time developing it and I have decided to take that route. In the crypto currency world having a very active developer that responds to emails and forums quickly can be a crucial component. The money you donate will support my ability to continue developing FoldingCoin Inc. full time without having to get a job to pay my rent. I work 60-70 hours a week on FoldingCoin Inc. and I only need $10,000 dollars to work for 1 calendar year as my bills are split between 3 people and I have no children to tend to. This will equal to a little over $3 an hour for me all year. Its not much, but I can live very cheap.

Any excess of the $10,000 dollars will go directly to fund FoldingCoin Inc. I do wish to note that FoldingCoin Inc. will be running a crowd funding campaign later in the year with some great new innovations we wish to develop that will be very expensive. This campaign you are looking to fund is to ensure I can keep my focus on the missions of FoldingCoin Inc. so we can reach that point of doing a large crowd funding sale for FoldingCoin Inc. 

Another way I wish to bring in income is by helping Indianapolis businesses start accepting Bitcoin as a payment method and FLDC as a discount token for products and/or services from those businesses. I am only charging $100 for the service and this includes full training of the establishments staff on Bitcoin and how it works.

Projects like Bitcoin and FoldingCoin are fantastic ways to help improve our world and actually make charitable work profitable. If you do not wish to donate to this cause at this time I encourage you to help create medicines on your computer. It is a very easy two step setup to get started:

  • Step 1. Get a FLDC wallet
  • Step 2. Setup your Folding client
Most of the perks that I offer in this campaign require you to get a Counterwallet address. Please go to THIS LINK to setup your Counterparty wallet and email me your Bitcoin address found in the tutorial, setting up a wallet is free. If I reach my goal then any unclaimed perks of me setting up a business with Bitcoin acceptance will be donated to a local charity in Indianapolis and I will get them started with Bitcoin instead.
Thank you and if you have further questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email rross@foldingcoin.net :)
FoldingCoin Inc. was built to support Stanford's Folding@home but no direct partnership is established. FoldingCoin Inc. is independant from Stanford.
