We have a great team of developers  that work on FoldingCoin Inc. on a purely volunteer basis. All of the FLDC devs still have full time jobs for income, but I no longer do. FoldingCoin Inc. has become popular enough where its success depends on one of us going full time developing it and I have decided to take that route. In the crypto currency world having a very active developer that responds to emails and forums quickly can be a crucial component. The money you donate will support my ability to continue developing FoldingCoin Inc. full time without having to get a job to pay my rent. I work 60-70 hours a week on FoldingCoin Inc. and I only need $10,000 dollars to work for 1 calendar year as my bills are split between 3 people and I have no children to tend to. This will equal to a little over $3 an hour for me all year. Its not much, but I can live very cheap.Any excess of the $10,000 dollars will go directly to fund FoldingCoin Inc. I do wish to note that FoldingCoin Inc. will be running a crowd funding campaign later in the year with some great new innovations we wish to develop that will be very expensive. This campaign you are looking to fund is to ensure I can keep my focus on the missions of FoldingCoin Inc. so we can reach that point of doing a large crowd funding sale for FoldingCoin Inc. Another way I wish to bring in income is by helping Indianapolis businesses start accepting Bitcoin as a payment method and FLDC as a discount token for products and/or services from those businesses. I am only charging $100 for the service and this includes full training of the establishments staff on Bitcoin and how it works.Projects like Bitcoin and FoldingCoin are fantastic ways to help improve our world and actually make charitable work profitable. If you do not wish to donate to this cause at this time I encourage you to help create medicines on your computer. It is a very easy two step setup to get started:

Step 1. Get a FLDC wallet


Step 2. Setup your Folding client

Most of the perks that I offer in this campaign require you to get a Counterwallet address. Please go to THIS LINK to setup your Counterparty wallet and email me your Bitcoin address found in the tutorial, setting up a wallet is free. If I reach my goal then any unclaimed perks of me setting up a business with Bitcoin acceptance will be donated to a local charity in Indianapolis and I will get them started with Bitcoin instead.Thank you and if you have further questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email rross@foldingcoin.net :)FoldingCoin Inc. was built to support Stanford's Folding@home but no direct partnership is established. FoldingCoin Inc. is independant from Stanford.

story:
Our campaign has ended, but our journey is just beginning!

Contact us at info@dumpthebucket.org or visit our website. 

What's the deal?

Did you know that many families in the United States still live without running water? Can you count the number of times and ways you use water during a day? The average American uses 100 gallons of water per day. Now try to imagine living on less than two gallons per day – two gallons to wash your hands and face, flush the toilet, drink, cook with, and shower.

In the Yukon-Kuskokwim Delta of southwest Alaska, live Americans that survive with an entirely different experience. Currently, 45% of homes in this region do NOT have in-home water and sewer. People without this service use less than two gallons of water per day and rely on a “honeybucket” (a five-gallon bucket topped with a toilet seat) to dispose of human waste. Without running water, this population suffers the highest rates of hospitalizations for infectious disease of all Americans. The suffering is real and, despite efforts, seems to be worsening.

Photos (from top left, clockwise): honeybucket, child dumping honeybucket waste into a collection bin, sanitation haulers dumping collection bins, overflowing collection bin.

What is the solution? DTB - A water reuse system dreamed up by us, made real by you, and celebrated by the Alaskan families that will receive running water for the first time.   

Who are we?

Leading our team is Brian Lefferts (Project Manager), Bob White (Technical Lead), and Jennifer Dobson (Health/Social Lead). Our team has extensive experience developing innovative solutions to water and sewer problems in the Arctic environment. We have collaboratively implemented many innovative projects over the past ten years.

We all live and work in one of the most remote regions of the United States. We know firsthand the struggles faced by those without piped water. This project was developed as a solution to improve health outcomes related to infectious diseases. Our team is dedicated to the mission, "working together to achieve excellent health."

What are the barriers? 

Community water systems cost millions of dollars to construct; funding sources have essentially dried up in recent years; and any remaining project money is highly competitive. Sadly, the thousands Alaskan homes that don’t have running water are unlikely to get it anytime soon. These families must carry buckets of water to their home, and they use “honey buckets” to remove human waste from homes. 

Without your support, the thousands of homes are not likely to get running water anytime soon. 

What’s the idea? 

In this remote Arctic environment, the real challenge is not treating the water; it is delivering water to the home. Over ninety percent of the water used in a home is for washing, bathing, and laundry – not for drinking. So why not simply re-treat the water in the home, taking the delivery issue out of the equation? 

The DTB water reuse treatment system involves adding plumbing so that drain water from the laundry, shower, and bathroom sink gets routed to an in-home water treatment system. This water is treated with biofiltration and disinfected. Then, it is routed back into the home for non-drinking purposes only. Treated water from a community water system will still be provided to the home for consumption, and toilet (black) water will be removed away from the home separately. 

By reusing household greywater, the DTB system cuts back on the amount of water delivered to each home tenfold, and finally make running water a reality for thousands of people.

Why do we need you? 

We’ve designed this revolutionary water reuse system, but we need your help to build and test it! As our partner, you will support our steps towards the reality of running water in thousands of homes.

$15,000 will allow us to  build the system and purchase all supplies needed to complete the pilot test.  

$50,000 funds the one year controlled trial to evaluate it's performance.

How else can I support the effort?

Besides contributing financially, you can support this campaign by...

·  Share our story with your like-minded friends. Use Indiegogo share tools or other social media avenues. #dumpthebucket

·  Take a selfie as you use water, and remember the struggles of those without water. #dumpthebucket

·  Talk about our campaign!

·  For other ways to support the effort, contact us at by e-mail or through www.dumpthebucket.org. 

As seen on KYUK

story:
La doar doi ani de la naștere, Axenia Gherega trece printr-o perioadă foarte dificilă.

Acum jumătate de an părinții săi au observat o mică schimbare la ochișorul ei drept.

La insistența medicului de familie, părinții Axeniei au făcut o serie de investigații unde i s-a depistat o infecție destul de rară. Ulterior, în urma unei investigației minuțioase, fetița a fost diagnosticată cu retinoblastomă, o tumoare din cauza căreia este pe cale să-și piardă vederea.

Părinții Axeniei au aplecat la o clinică specializată în tratarea problemelor de ochi în Odessa, Ucraina. Aici medicii au confirmat boala de care suferea micuța și le-au recomandat să plece la o clinică specializată din Germania, pentru o intervenție care i-ar salva vederea.

Pe 11 mai, Stela și Sergiu Gherega împreună cu fiica lor erau deja în Essen, Germania, unde s-au consultat cu medicii și le-au redat speranța că ochiul Axeniei ar putea fi salvat. Intervenția chirurgicală a fost programată pentru data de 28 mai 2015, însă pentru această operație este nevoie de 15 mii de euro.

Acum, Axenia vede cu ochiul său drept cu o capacitatea de doar 10 la sută. Iar dacă nu va fi supusă cât de curând operației, fetița riscă să își piardă vederea la ambii ochi.

Cei care doresc să o ajute pe Axenia, pot dona banii pe o platformă online, sau o pot contacta pe bunica fetiței la numărul de telefon 0 79 564 108 (d-na Tamara) sau pe Corina Barbacari (00 443-906-4998) cea care s-a oferit să facă cunoscut acest caz tuturor pentru a o salva pe micuța Axenia. 

Email: axeniagherega@gmail.com

Sumele pot fi donate pe următoarea platformă: www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-me-save-my-eye-...

Ea vrea o copilarie in culori,sumbrul e prea timpuriu pentru EA!

Implica-te!

Ajuta un copil!

Fa un bine!

Spune unui prienten de acest caz!

Fa un Share!

Va multumim!


Date de contact:

Dna Tamara (bunica): 0 79 564 108

Corina Barbacari: 00 443-906-4998

email: axeniagherega@gmail.com

 

Axenia's Story!!

Just two years after birth, Axenia Gherega is going through a very difficult period.

Now half a year his parents noticed a slight change in her left eye.

At the insistence of Axenia's  family doctor parents have made a number of investigations where they had found a rather rare infection. Later, after a thorough investigation, the girl was diagnosed with retinoblastoma, a tumor because that is about to lose his sight.

 Axeniei's parents bowed in a clinic specializing in treating eye problems in Odessa, Ukraine. Here doctors confirmed she was suffering little disease and have recommended to go to a specialist clinic in Germany for an intervention that would save the sight.

On May 11, Stela and Sergiu Gherega together with their daughter were already in Essen, Germany, where doctors have been consulted and gave Axenia hope that the eye could be saved. Surgery was scheduled for May 28, 2015, but for this operation requires 15 thousand euro.

Now, with his right eye sees Axenia with a capacity of just 10 percent. And if not soon will undergo surgery, the girl risks losing sight in both eyes.

Those wishing to help Axenia can donate money online platform, or can contact the girl's grandmother by phone +373 79-564-108 (Mrs. Tamara) or Barbacari Corina (00 443-906-4998) a volunteer who made  this case known to save all the little Axenia.

Email: axeniagherega@gmail.com

Amounts can be donated on the following platform: www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-me-save-my-eye -...

She wants a happy childhood!

Get involved!

Help a child!

Make good!

Tell a friend about this case!

Make a Share!

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

An emerging group of psychologists believes that many of our modern-day health problems, including, stress, anxiety and depression can be traced in part to society’s increasing alienation from nature. We spend 90% of our lives within buildings, excessive indoor living and a lack of bonding with the Earth causes a disconnection, resulting in psychological pain. If our thoughts and behaviours are out of balance with nature, everything about our lives is affected; family, workplace and the community. We are less likely to be committed to positively interact with and protect the natural world, destroying and depleting natural resources faster than they can be renewed which is leading to ecocide.

Any real change in sustainable practice will most likely happen at an individual level, through changes in attitudes and everyday behaviour. For this change to happen, an individual will need to feel connected to the natural world because reconnection to nature is vital. We are not here to protect nature, we are nature, it’s part of our self identity. We can improve personal well-being in order to improve ecological integrity.

Because you can make a difference,
imagine…

the innovative Green Wonderland Eco Retreat Centre, a passionate project in motion where you will get to experience ecological integrative therapeutic retreats and educational programs on themes related to personal development across the broadest spectrum of traditions and teachings. A place where people like you come together to learn, teach, experience, exchange and inspire others under an ecological consciousness.


With the wellness and healing of the entire person in mind (bio-psycho-socio-spiritual dimensions), and the creation of the links between the Human psyche and the Earth psyche in the emerging fields of Ecopsychology and Eco Art Therapy combined with Permaculture principles and ethics, we created Green Wonderland’s visionary retreats. Permaculture principles and practices of ecological design offers guidance not only for external processes like repairing damaged land but also for the healing of both individual and collective psychological and social terrain creating an opportunity to find balance between outward and inward growth.


What We Need & What You Get

Imagine how beautiful life can be? Because of your message your gift.

We have found the perfect location and invite you to envisage Green Wonderland and all that it could become.


Together with your contributions, we plan to raise and earn enough funds to acquire the property that will become Green Wonderland – Eco Retreat Centre and open to guests from August 2015 onwards, for body-mind-heart expanding Eco Retreats. All your donations will be used for the purchase of this therapeutic, organic and off the grid farm in the Sierra Nevada Mountains.

The total cost is £195 000 and contributions of any value (from £1 to £3000) can be a significant addition for the existence of this project in this perfect therapeutic environment.

The total cost can be broken down, for example, into 1950 donations of £100 each (We Plant a Tree in your Honour perk).

or 390 donations of £500 each (Therapeutic Retreat - 5 Days - perk).

Because of the amazing health benefits of the summer season, Green Wonderland would like to highlight the two Early Bird Sound Massage in Water perks, where you will get to experience a unique, harmonious and revitalizing sound massage in water. This time limited offer will run from August to September 2015, creating the opportunity for you to experience an integrative therapy with amazing health benefits. After this new summer experience you will get an opportunity to be placed on the guest list for the 2016 summer retreats, to visit Green Wonderland and take part in our other retreats.

We also have our featured Life Transitions and Letting Go Retreat perk where identification with the natural cycle plays out diverse themes providing powerful metaphors to be worked through therapeutically. When we listen, an instinctive wisdom inside each of us reminds us that there must be more. The world is full of wonders and real connection with humans, animals, trees and ourselves is vital. The goal of the 30 day retreat will be assisting you to adjust to major changes by addressing resilience, coping strategies and confidence.



Green Wonderland’s Visionary Retreats 

(See our 3 and 5 Days Therapeutic Retreats perks).

Because the 12 Permaculture Principles are thinking tools, that when used together, allow us to creatively re-design our Environment and Behaviour, based on these principles we developed 12 Eco Therapeutic Retreats with a set of different therapies and restorative goals:

“Observe and Interact Retreat” – Observe nature and your dreams, interact with them through intuitive and creative thinking.

  • Mindfulness
  • Synchronicity Walks
  • Eco-dreamwork

“Catch and Store Energy Retreat” – Receive the universal life energy, feel re-energised and invigorated. Find out how to retain the permanence of vitality in your life.

  • Usui Reiki
  • Sound Massage Therapy
  • Horticultural Therapy

“Obtain a Yield Retreat” – Learn how to look for and appreciate many different “yields” both physical and non-physical. Be open to receive. The Universe is abundant and generous if we work in harmony with nature’s energies and rhythms. Understand the powerful energies all around and within us, plant and tend the seeds of abundance.

  • Drum Circle
  • Sound Bath
  • Eco-dreamwork or dream sharing group
  • Vegan communal kitchen and communal table

“Apply Self-Regulation and Accept Feedback Retreat” – Find out how to read nature’s responses to your behaviour and immerse yourself into her natural rhythm and cycles in wild and harmonious settings. A positive experience where the resulting process fosters new personal awareness that leads to positive choices for change.

  • Wilderness Therapy
  • Green Exercise

“Use and Value Renewable Resources and Services Retreat” – This retreat can guide you in making better choices. You will contribute with your energies, where they will be met and multiplied by the energies of others.

  • Natural Lifestyle Therapy
  • Horticultural Therapy
  • Drum Circles

“Produce no Waste Retreat” – What do I produce that ends up going nowhere? Where are my efforts badly directed? Careful consideration of even the most seemingly negative situations can reveal hidden gifts we might have overlooked.

  • Acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT)
  • Synchronicity walks

“Design from Patterns to Details Retreat” – Learning our own patterns: what I’m good at, what interests me… and then arranging the details of my life accordingly. Understanding the “story” of our lives, and how that fits into the larger stories of humankind now and in the past and future.

  • Eco-dreamwork
  • Eco Art Therapy

“Integrate rather than Segregate Retreat” – Understanding interconnections and the mutual dependencies and cooperation’s.

  • Natural Lifestyle Therapy with Communal Table
  • Horticultural Therapy
  • Synchronicity Walks

“Use Small and Slow Solutions Retreat” – Reflect on how you partake of nature’s generosity one bite at a time. Slowing down and cultivating peace of mind and body.

  • Meditation
  • Usui Reiki

“Use and Value Diversity Retreat” – As in nature, diversity creates an abundance of surplus and resilience, two important concepts in both permaculture design and sustainability. Discover the abundance within and strengthen your resilience to create an adaptive response to extreme changes and profound experiences in life.

  • Green Exercise
  • Meditation
  • Eco Art therapy

“Use Edges and Value the Marginal Retreat” – Edges can be extremely fertile places in psychological awareness as well as at the intersections of forest and field, water and shore. Listen to the marginalized voices of nature – the animals, plants, storms and waters. Sensations, inner or outer voices that flit across our minds, all are fertile soil for inner growth.

  • Wilderness Therapy
  • Mindfulness

“Creatively Use and Respond to Change Retreat” – Rather than digging our heels in and resisting change in a futile attempt to save an insolvable way of life, we can embrace change and respond creatively. Taking the problem more deeply inside and alchemizing it into wisdom and insight, but beyond that, moving outside again to ask what the world is saying to us.

  • Eco Art Therapy
  • Eco Hypnotherapy
  • Sound Massage in Water


When experiencing these retreats with us, you will be able to connect with yourself as part of Earth’s web of life and learn how art and sensory nature moments can help realign critical thinking and provide lasting personal development. Because connection with wild nature is an important aid to develop an ecological sensibility and re-orientate your sense of who and what you are, we want to support you to reconnect with that source of nourishment, well-being and inspiration.

You will achieve the ability to be in the present moment, with awareness and openness, and take action, guided by your values. Together we will promote personal insight, conflict resolution, inner healing and self-discovery. You will be able to become aware of your strength, stamina and vitality, adding spark to life and fuelling your dreams, imagination, playfulness, and intuitive skills.

Six main areas were established to relate to Personal Development and Sustainability:

1. Ecological Integrative Therapies;

2. Veganism;

3. Animal Sanctuary;

4. Permaculture and Natural buildings;

5. Outreach and Educational Programmes;

6. Gift economy

Join our tribe, the movement towards an ecological consciousness and lets cultivate resilience together!


The Impact

Working in Gift Economy principles we will accept donations to cover marginal costs, however, our time, labour and expertise are a gift. Giving you a fair opportunity whatever your socio-economic status to facilitate the access to therapies in an eco retreat context. 

Together, with your contribution, we will create local community-based sharing networks (skills/items/seeds swap and share), boosting local communities, developing small-scale local responses to the global challenges of climate change and sustainable living.

The educational programs will work with the support of some of the local schools whereby children will come to Green Wonderland to learn about the environment and protecting it, help on the land growing fruits and vegetables in their own organic patch, and have fun learning how to recycle and the great ways which we can re-use waste.

With Green Wonderland’s Animal Sanctuary, we will be dedicated to make a difference to the lives of the non-human animals being rescued, in addition to this we aim to educate and influence people through our compassionate and ethical message.

Co-create Green Wonderland, a unique eco retreat centre!
Be part of the magic as a dream becomes reality.

Green Wonderland evolved from www.journeytogreenwonderland.com our blog, which has been a channel for expressing our vision and for sharing and learning of knowledge, building a platform of exchange to create a shift towards an ecological consciousness. 

Because you can make a difference with us to inspire local and international communities to reduce their ecological footprint, to protect the environment and sustain its natural resources for current and future generations.

This is our journey with you to create Green Wonderland on a fully accredited organic farm that is completely off-grid and solar powered, in the region of the Sierra Nevada mountains, Southern Spain.

We want to build a relationship with you founded on mutual trust and gratitude. There are no independent means of purchasing the space for Green Wonderland so, if you can donate please do, no matter how small the contribution is, your donation will make Green Wonderland a lived reality. 


Risks & Challenges

A challenge for us to create this project would be the raising of the full amount to purchase this specific organic farm. However we have considered this possible scenario and we have developed a tipping point within the main target which would serve as an alternative solution. We have calculated a tipping point of 40% of the total value to be a viable option where we would still purchase a plot of land at a considerably reduced rate, and then would create Green Wonderland from the foundations up. If this were to be the case, where we have not raised the full amount, we would still create Green Wonderland but it would be from approximately April 2016 onwards. We will keep you updated on all the progress once the campaign has ended on our blog and through our social media networks. 

We are Sofia and Ivan and it is because of the combined years of expertise in the fields of Psychology, Hypnotherapy, Graphic Design, Art, Meditation, Sound Massage and Reiki, that we sustain the vision and skills to passionately build and develop this project. Values of respect, love and care for all living beings and the Planet as well as a collaborative approach, have been inspiring us to participate in community based work in the areas of Animal Rights protection, Permaculture and Gift Economy. We have a personal reason for starting this project, a passionate vision for what it could become and a social mission. We are dedicated, enthusiastic, skilled, resilient, versatile and well motivated earthlings. Years of dedicated work has allowed us to have a greater depth of understanding of the different dimensions of being human. We have a deep connection with plants, trees, all animals, music and art which in our experience have a way of changing perceptions without the filter of intellectualisation.

Our Core Values:

  • Integrity, Truth and Transparency
  • Respect, Love and Care for all living beings and the planet
  • Appreciation for Learning and Sharing of Knowledge
  • Collaborative approach to Living
  • Adaptability, Creativity and Free-thinking
Our wish is to live as sustainably as possible by producing the things we need from the land and through gift economy we will be reducing the need to purchase products or recycle. We want to use both solar and hydropower for our electricity, and water from natural resources. All products will be natural and biodegradable and the meals provided will be prepared wherever possible with our own produce, which is grown without the use of artificial chemicals or fertilizers. All organic wastes are disposed of in a compost heap, where it slowly breaks down into very rich, fertile compost. Additionally, we will strive to motivate local and international communities to reduce their ecological footprint.


Other Ways You Can Co Create With Us

Perhaps you really want to contribute and you don’t have the funds to offer a contribution, but you can still be a fundamental key to create Green Wonderland. Please get the word out and make some noise about the Green Wonderland campaign, spread the word across facebook, twitter and please share the links for the project with as many people as possible to make Green Wonderland a success story!

Because a truly life-affirming, resilient, creative and sustainable future is possible through the implementation of an ecological consciousness. The goal of Green Wonderland Eco Retreat Centre is to support such a beautiful metamorphosis into a lived reality.
story_txt:
Short Summary 



An
emerging group of psychologists believes that many of our modern-day
health problems, including, stress, anxiety and depression can be
traced in part to society’s increasing alienation from nature. We
spend 90% of our lives within buildings, excessive indoor living and
a lack of bonding with the Earth causes a disconnection, resulting in
psychological pain. If our thoughts and behaviours are out of balance
with nature, everything about our lives is affected; family,
workplace and the community. We are less likely to be committed to
positively interact with and protect the natural world, destroying
and depleting natural resources faster than they can be renewed which
is leading to ecocide.

Any
real change in sustainable practice will most likely happen at an
individual level, through changes in attitudes and everyday
behaviour. For this change to happen, an individual will need to feel
connected to the natural world because reconnection to nature is
vital. We are not here to protect nature, we are nature, it’s part
of our self identity. We can improve personal well-being in order to
improve ecological integrity.



Because you can make a difference, imagine…the
innovative Green Wonderland Eco Retreat Centre, a passionate project
in motion where you will get to experience ecological integrative therapeutic retreats and educational programs on themes related to
personal development across the broadest spectrum of traditions and
teachings. A place where people like you come together to learn,
teach, experience, exchange and inspire others under an ecological
consciousness.



With the wellness and healing of the entire person in mind (bio-psycho-socio-spiritual dimensions), and the creation of the links between the Human psyche and the Earth psyche in the emerging fields of Ecopsychology and Eco Art Therapy combined with Permaculture principles and ethics, we created Green Wonderland’s visionary retreats. Permaculture principles and practices of ecological design offers guidance not only for external processes like repairing damaged land but also for the healing of both individual and collective psychological and social terrain creating an opportunity to find balance between outward and inward growth.
   What We Need & What You Get 



Imagine
how beautiful life can be? Because of your message your gift.

We
have found the perfect location and invite you to envisage Green
Wonderland and all that it could become.



Together
with your contributions, we plan to raise and earn enough funds to
acquire the property that will become Green Wonderland – Eco
Retreat Centre and open to guests from August 2015 onwards, for
body-mind-heart expanding Eco Retreats. All your donations will be
used for the purchase of this therapeutic, organic and off the grid farm in the Sierra Nevada Mountains.

The total cost is £195 000 and contributions of any value (from £1 to £3000) can be a significant addition for the existence of this project in this perfect therapeutic environment.
The total cost can be broken down, for example, into 1950 donations of £100 each (We Plant a Tree in your Honour perk).
or 390 donations of £500 each (Therapeutic Retreat - 5 Days - perk).
Because of the amazing health benefits of the summer season, Green Wonderland would like to highlight the two Early Bird Sound Massage in Water perks, where you will get to experience a unique, harmonious and revitalizing sound massage in water. This time limited offer will run from August to September 2015, creating the opportunity for you to experience an integrative therapy with amazing health benefits. After this new summer experience you will get an opportunity to be placed on the guest list for the 2016 summer retreats, to visit Green Wonderland and take part in our other retreats.
We also have our featured Life Transitions and Letting Go Retreat perk where identification with the natural cycle plays out diverse themes providing powerful metaphors to be worked through therapeutically. When we listen, an instinctive wisdom inside each of us reminds us that there must be more. The world is full of wonders and real connection with humans, animals, trees and ourselves is vital. The goal of the 30 day retreat will be assisting you to adjust to major changes by addressing resilience, coping strategies and confidence.




Green
Wonderland’s Visionary Retreats 
(See our 3 and 5 Days Therapeutic Retreats perks).

Because
the 12 Permaculture Principles are thinking tools, that when used
together, allow us to creatively re-design our Environment and
Behaviour, based on these principles we developed 12 Eco Therapeutic
Retreats with a set of different therapies and restorative goals:

“Observe and Interact Retreat” – Observe nature and your dreams, interact with them through intuitive and creative thinking.

Mindfulness
Synchronicity Walks
Eco-dreamwork

“Catch and Store Energy Retreat” – Receive the universal life energy, feel re-energised and invigorated. Find out how to retain the permanence of vitality in your life.

Usui Reiki
Sound Massage Therapy
Horticultural Therapy

“Obtain a Yield Retreat” – Learn how to look for and appreciate many different “yields” both physical and non-physical. Be open to receive. The Universe is abundant and generous if we work in harmony with nature’s energies and rhythms. Understand the powerful energies all around and within us, plant and tend the seeds of abundance.

Drum Circle
Sound Bath
Eco-dreamwork or dream sharing group
Vegan communal kitchen and communal table

“Apply Self-Regulation and Accept Feedback Retreat” – Find out how to read nature’s responses to your behaviour and immerse yourself into her natural rhythm and cycles in wild and harmonious settings. A positive experience where the resulting process fosters new personal awareness that leads to positive choices for change.

Wilderness Therapy
Green Exercise

“Use and Value Renewable Resources and Services Retreat” – This retreat can guide you in making better choices. You will contribute with your energies, where they will be met and multiplied by the energies of others.

Natural Lifestyle Therapy
Horticultural Therapy
Drum Circles

“Produce no Waste Retreat” – What do I produce that ends up going nowhere? Where are my efforts badly directed? Careful consideration of even the most seemingly negative situations can reveal hidden gifts we might have overlooked.

Acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT)
Synchronicity walks

“Design from Patterns to Details Retreat” – Learning our own patterns: what I’m good at, what interests me… and then arranging the details of my life accordingly. Understanding the “story” of our lives, and how that fits into the larger stories of humankind now and in the past and future.

Eco-dreamwork
Eco Art Therapy

“Integrate rather than Segregate Retreat” – Understanding interconnections and the mutual dependencies and cooperation’s.

Natural Lifestyle Therapy with Communal Table
Horticultural Therapy
Synchronicity Walks

“Use Small and Slow Solutions Retreat” – Reflect on how you partake of nature’s generosity one bite at a time. Slowing down and cultivating peace of mind and body.

Meditation
Usui Reiki

“Use and Value Diversity Retreat” – As in nature, diversity creates an abundance of surplus and resilience, two important concepts in both permaculture design and sustainability. Discover the abundance within and strengthen your resilience to create an adaptive response to extreme changes and profound experiences in life.

Green Exercise
Meditation
Eco Art therapy

“Use Edges and Value the Marginal Retreat” – Edges can be extremely fertile places in psychological awareness as well as at the intersections of forest and field, water and shore. Listen to the marginalized voices of nature – the animals, plants, storms and waters. Sensations, inner or outer voices that flit across our minds, all are fertile soil for inner growth.

Wilderness Therapy
Mindfulness

“Creatively Use and Respond to Change Retreat” – Rather than digging our heels in and resisting change in a futile attempt to save an insolvable way of life, we can embrace change and respond creatively. Taking the problem more deeply inside and alchemizing it into wisdom and insight, but beyond that, moving outside again to ask what the world is saying to us.

Eco Art Therapy
Eco Hypnotherapy
Sound Massage in Water


When
experiencing these retreats with us, you will be able to connect with
yourself as part of Earth’s web of life and learn how art and
sensory nature moments can help realign critical thinking and provide
lasting personal development. Because connection with wild nature is
an important aid to develop an ecological sensibility and
re-orientate your sense of who and what you are, we want to
support you to reconnect with that source of nourishment, well-being
and inspiration.

You
will achieve the ability to be in the present moment, with awareness
and openness, and take action, guided by your values. Together we
will promote personal insight, conflict resolution, inner healing and
self-discovery. You will be able to become aware of your strength,
stamina and vitality, adding spark to life and fuelling your dreams,
imagination, playfulness, and intuitive skills.


Six main areas were established to relate to Personal Development and Sustainability:
1. Ecological Integrative Therapies;
2. Veganism;
3. Animal Sanctuary;
4. Permaculture and Natural buildings;
5. Outreach and Educational Programmes;
6. Gift economy
Join our tribe, the movement towards an ecological consciousness and lets cultivate resilience together!




The Impact
Working
in Gift Economy principles we will accept donations to cover marginal
costs, however, our time, labour and expertise are a gift. Giving
you a fair opportunity whatever your socio-economic status to
facilitate the access to therapies in an eco retreat context. Together, with your contribution, we will create local
community-based sharing networks (skills/items/seeds swap and share),
boosting local communities, developing small-scale local responses to
the global challenges of climate change and sustainable living.

The
educational programs will work with the support of some of the local
schools whereby children will come to Green Wonderland to learn about
the environment and protecting it, help on the land growing fruits
and vegetables in their own organic patch, and have fun learning how
to recycle and the great ways which we can re-use waste.

With
Green Wonderland’s Animal Sanctuary, we will be dedicated to make a
difference to the lives of the non-human animals being rescued, in addition to
this we aim to educate and influence people through our compassionate
and ethical message.

Co-create
Green Wonderland, a unique eco retreat centre!
Be
part of the magic as a dream becomes reality.Green Wonderland evolved from www.journeytogreenwonderland.com our blog, which has been a channel for expressing our vision and for sharing and learning of knowledge, building a platform of exchange to create a shift towards an ecological consciousness. 

Because
you can make a difference with us to inspire local and international
communities to reduce their ecological footprint, to protect the
environment and sustain its natural resources for current and future
generations.

This
is our journey with you to create Green Wonderland on a fully
accredited organic farm that is completely off-grid and solar
powered, in the region of the Sierra Nevada mountains, Southern
Spain.

We
want to build a relationship with you founded on mutual trust and
gratitude. There are no independent means of purchasing the
space for Green Wonderland so, if you can donate please do, no matter
how small the contribution is, your donation will make Green
Wonderland a lived reality. 


Risks & Challenges A challenge for us to create this project would be the raising of the full amount to purchase this specific organic farm. However we have considered this possible scenario and we have developed a tipping point within the main target which would serve as an alternative solution. We have calculated a tipping point of 40% of the total value to be a viable option where we would still purchase a plot of land at a considerably reduced rate, and then would create Green Wonderland from the foundations up. If this were to be the case, where we have not raised the full amount, we would still create Green Wonderland but it would be from approximately April 2016 onwards. We will keep you updated on all the progress once the campaign has ended on our blog and through our social media networks. 



We are Sofia and Ivan and it is because of the combined years of expertise in the fields of Psychology, Hypnotherapy, Graphic Design, Art, Meditation, Sound Massage and Reiki, that we sustain the vision and skills to passionately build and develop this project. Values of respect, love and care for all living beings and the Planet as well as a collaborative approach, have been inspiring us to participate in community based work in the areas of Animal Rights protection, Permaculture and Gift Economy. We have a personal reason for starting this project, a passionate vision for what it could become and a social mission. We are dedicated, enthusiastic, skilled, resilient, versatile and well motivated earthlings. Years of dedicated work has allowed us to have a greater depth of understanding of the different dimensions of being human. We have a deep connection with plants, trees, all animals, music and art which in our experience have a way of changing perceptions without the filter of intellectualisation.

Our Core Values:

Integrity, Truth and Transparency
Respect, Love and Care for all living beings and the planet
Appreciation for Learning and Sharing of Knowledge
Collaborative approach to Living
Adaptability, Creativity and Free-thinking
Our wish is to live as sustainably as possible by producing the things we need from the land and through gift economy we will be reducing the need to purchase products or recycle. We want to use both solar and hydropower for our electricity, and water from natural resources. All products will be natural and biodegradable and the meals provided will be prepared wherever possible with our own produce, which is grown without the use of artificial chemicals or fertilizers. All organic wastes are disposed of in a compost heap, where it slowly breaks down into very rich, fertile compost. Additionally, we will strive to motivate local and international communities to reduce their ecological footprint.

    Other Ways You Can Co Create With Us 
Perhaps
you really want to contribute and you don’t have the funds to offer
a contribution, but you can still be a fundamental key to create
Green Wonderland. Please get the word out and make some noise about
the Green Wonderland campaign, spread the word across facebook,

people as possible to make Green Wonderland a success story!

Because

possible through the implementation of an ecological
consciousness. The goal of Green Wonderland Eco Retreat Centre is to
support such a beautiful metamorphosis into a lived reality.

story:
Virtual Vinyasa is a new yoga website and app concept that has been developing over the 18 months. Virtual Vinyasa has been compared to Spotify but for Yoga. Users of Virtual Vinyasa will be able to easily and intuitively create playlists of audio and videos forming yoga classes based on individual mind and body needs, mixing and matching different studios, instructors, styles of yoga, meditations, and music.  



Check out the website and app mock-up pages!


As yoga instructors, we are here to support and expand the yoga community as a whole, promoting connection and consciousness through practice and sharing. By contributing to Virtual Vinyasa you are joining a movement to empower individuals to take their yoga practice into their own hands with an at home practice, while still supporting brick and mortar studios. 

Now-a-days there is no denying the fact that a regular yoga and meditation practice works miracles on the mind and body. So why hasn't every single person engaged in a practice?

One of the main reasons is that our society has put a lot of emphasis on a community studio practice. The energy of a group is wonderful but its not for everyone. Some people need to get comfortable in their private practice before taking it into a group setting.  If you are suffering from insecurity, depression, anxiety, if you have an unusual work schedule or travel a lot, if you are pinching your pennies, or if you just want to get familiar and comfortable with yoga and sanskrit on your own, going to a studio may be out of the question. 

By supporting Virtual Vinyasa you are giving us the ability to create a platform that will allow users to easily discover different types of yoga, meditation, kirtan, and instructors. There is an opportunity here to create this virtual network while promoting studio spaces and instructors from all over the country.




  Instructors will have the opportunity to post their local studio class schedule on the website and app. This will give users the ability to be able to practice in person with instructors that they already feel comfortable with, when they choose to take their practice to the studio space. 


                                                                     Coming Soon!

The San Diego Round Robin features 6 instructors from 3 studio locations showing you how while mixing and matching instructors and styles you are able to create a fluid class. 

The Grotto Yoga Flow features 3 instructors from 1 studio. This gives studios an example of how we can promote their space and instructors by featuring them on the website and app. 


On top of the physical yoga practice another passion is sharing the stories of people living consciously, making changes in their communities.  Along this life journey we learn many lessons. Lessons of struggle, of transformation, of wisdom, of growth. Sharing the stories behind these lessons can be inspiring and empowering which is why the Virtual Vinyasa Podcast features instructors, students, and business' that are passionate about the conscious movement and what it took them to get to where they are on their journey. You can download the Virtual Vinyasa podcast on iTunes or by clicking the link above. 


Let me introduce myself, my beliefs, and passions. My name is Jaimie and I am the visionary for Virtual Vinyasa. I have been working in the wellness industry for the last 8 years focusing on massage therapy, yoga, nutrition, herbs, and energetic artwork. The idea for Virtual Vinyasa came to me after seeing outstanding life transformation with one of my private clients. Working with clients privately helped me to see that more people need to learn how to move for their own body. Virtual Vinyasa is a platform that will allow for that freedom. 

The Jaimie that began working on this project two years ago is long gone. That Jaimie was always coming from a place of love but with strong cautious undertones of worry, doubt, and fear fueled by normal societal pressures.

The last two years of planning have brought unimaginable spiritual awakening. The fear, the worry, the doubt, are now gone. Those layers have been peeled off, some easier than others. What is left is complete trust and surrender.  What is moving me forward  with Virtual Vinyasa is the understanding that my role on this planet is to do my part in awakening consciousness. Virtual Vinyasa is a way to make this happen.

My personal goal is to begin a new life of living in the present as much as possible and connecting with as many people as I can.  I have laid down the foundation for the concept of Virtual Vinyasa and now is a time to make the connections to bring this concept into reality. 

The goal of raising $888 was divinely inspired. When I think of the number 8, infinity comes to mind. I like to believe this journey will have infinite possibilities for success and the 888 is a beautiful reminder. By funding for this amount and exceeding it, I am allowing this campaign to stay open for funding past the 60 day run, allowing Virtual Vinyasa to continuously raise funding. 

I have done the projections for Virtual Vinyasa and could tell you that with contracting out people to build the website and app, run the marketing campaign, and for filming, editing and traveling costs we are looking at a business that would require $300,000 or more for start-up costs. But I do not want to contract people. 

The Pilgrimage I am embarking on is an opportunity to not only gain local community support around the country, it is also an opportunity for my team to find me. I am putting the intention out there that there are consciously living people who would like to get involved with a start-up like Virtual Vinyasa. People who are tired of working for Corporate America and see the value of joing me in this conscious business.


  


The Pilgrimage in conjunction with this campaign launch is the first wave of seeking awareness and gaining community support for Virtual Vinyasa. It is an opportunity to connect with whoever I am guided to connect with. I have many tools under my tool belt. Yoga, meditation, massage, thai yoga, energetic mandala artwork, mindful vegan cooking, podcasting-storytelling. 

I am taking my tool belt on the road during this campaign. Whichever way I am guided to connect is the way I will. Where ever the road leads me is the right road. There is no real destination, there is no time limit, there is only a mission. A mission to lead by example, to stir the pot, to open eyes, to empower others, to share my vision, to connect with anyone who wants to, to seek out like minded individuals to join me on this journey.

Virtual Vinyasa, I really do find it silly that this website and app concept is not out there already. The only reason I can imagine is that it needs a team of people working from a pure heart space to make it work. I feel that I am destined to create a team that will impact great change while maintaining a level of love that is difficult to find in the business world. So here I am, open, transparent, ready to work! If you feel my passion and are interested in joining the Virtual Vinyasa team, please contact me!

Follow me on my pilgrimage by connecting to my blog:)


Most of the Perks being offered for supporting this campaign are creative projects that I have worked on in the past or projects that I am currently working on. Take a look!

By contributing $5 you will receive a Facebook shout out and an energetic love hug! Thank you for showing your support:)

By contributing $10 you will receive a hand written postcard sent on the road during the Virtual Vinyasa Pilgrimage sharing some highlights of the trip!

In my days as a ceramic artist I made about a thousand handmade ceramic chakra pendants! Over the years I have sold and given them away as tools for mediation and/or healing.  

Each pendant has been high fired removing impurities from the clay, meditated on, and infused with gong vibration. These pendants are worn as reminder to bring a certain energy and balance into the body. 

By selecting this perk you will receive 1 of 7 chakras at random. Which one will call to you?!

   Mini Chakra Pendants $15                                Large Chakra Pendants $25


     


By contributing $35 you will receive a deck of Pilgrimage Affirmation Cards. On the Virtual Vinyasa Pilgrimage I will be connecting with new friends to draw mandalas based on the energy I feel around them. The people I meet will help me come up with a message of positivity they want to share with the world. These mandalas will turn into a deck of affirmation cards from my pilgrimage. When you choose a card, you are connecting into the energy of your brothers and sisters and receiving a special message to guide you in your day.

  


By contributing $40 you will receive my pilgrimage diary! As I am taking this journey of connection and growth seeking out my team and raising awareness for Virtual Vinyasa, I will be hand writing a daily diary while also blogging online sharing short stories, photos, realizations, experiences, and drawings. At the end of the journey I will be compiling these mediums into a book. See what its like to get inside my head:)


By contributing $45 you will receive a Virtual Vinyasa mens or womans t-shirt or tank with logo design! The mandala for Virtual Vinyasa highlights all of the chakra energies in one mandala representing the connection of all things.

By contributing $50 you will receive a gratitude mandala mens or womens tank top! This mandala was designed with a pure joy and gratefulness for receiving help along my journey.

Gratitude Tank Top

   



Help spread the word! Share the Virtual Vinyasa movement on your social media pages!

In my days as a ceramic artist I made about a thousand handmade ceramic chakra pendants! Over the years I have sold and given them away as tools for mediation and/or healing.  

Each pendant has been high fired removing impurities from the clay, meditated on, and infused with gong vibration. These pendants are worn as reminder to bring a certain energy and balance into the body. 
By selecting this perk you will receive 1 of 7 chakras at random. Which one will call to you?!
   Mini Chakra Pendants $15                                Large Chakra Pendants $25



     




By contributing $35 you will receive a deck of Pilgrimage Affirmation Cards. On the Virtual Vinyasa Pilgrimage I will be connecting with new friends to draw mandalas based on the energy I feel around them. The people I meet will help me come up with a message of positivity they want to share with the world. These mandalas will turn into a deck of affirmation cards from my pilgrimage. When you choose a card, you are connecting into the energy of your brothers and sisters and receiving a special message to guide you in your day.
  






By contributing $40 you will receive my pilgrimage diary! As I am taking this journey of connection and growth seeking out my team and raising awareness for Virtual Vinyasa, I will be hand writing a daily diary while also blogging online sharing short stories, photos, realizations, experiences, and drawings. At the end of the journey I will be compiling these mediums into a book. See what its like to get inside my head:)







By contributing $45 you will receive a Virtual Vinyasa mens or womans t-shirt or tank with logo design! The mandala for Virtual Vinyasa highlights all of the chakra energies in one mandala representing the connection of all things.

By contributing $50 you will receive a gratitude mandala mens or womens tank top! This mandala was designed with a pure joy and gratefulness for receiving help along my journey.
Gratitude Tank Top

   





Help spread the word! Share the Virtual Vinyasa movement on your social media pages!

story:
For almost 20 years I have dedicated my life to helping underground bands and artists fulfill their dreams and goals. While doing this I have let my health and well being fall apart. I have numerous health issues that this surgery will hopefully help.

I am not asking for money for the surgery, but money to help keep the allaboutrecords center for the arts(a non profit art center) open, while I am recovering. I may be stuck in bed and on a liquid diet for 2-4 weeks which means I will not be able to print any shirts or make buttons, which is how we currently fund the space.

This surgery is something I need to do, but if I can't raise enough money through donations or merch orders, then I will be forced to cancel it. I can't continue to put off this surgery much longer. I have developed bone spurs, digestive problems, ankle and knee issues. I live in constant pain and discomfort.

story:
The food industry has hit a tipping point.

Weight management has switched from being a specific diet regime to an everyday top-of-mind concern that people consciously build into their everyday eating choices.

Research shows that up to 80% of food on grocery shelves have added sugar. Food that is almost impossible to stop eating.  Is it any wonder that globally over half of consumers now see themselves as overweight while a clear majourity are interested in lowering their sugar intakes? 

It is the source of calories that is crucial in weight wellness. There is mounting scientific evidence that sugar promotes fat storage and hunger while protein, dietary fibre and fats support hunger suppression and reduce calorie consumption throughout the day.

A breakthrough in healthy snacking.

3 Sinners have created a recipe that hits the trifecta of curbing sugar cravings, reducing food intake and providing sustained energy. Cookies that give permission to enjoy, fill you up not out and lead to a healthier body shape.

Indulgent, gluten-free, have no added sugar and made with natural ingredients.  

Each individually wrapped cookie is packed with 33 grams of 3 Sinners 'cure your cravings' recipe mix. Ingredients like nut and milk proteins, free-range eggs, almonds, low sugar fruit, un-sweetened dark chocolate, natural dietary fibre and grass-fed New Zealand butter.

Support us and feel the difference one cookie a day makes.  

The three sinners team.


A one-time Opportunity to become an Original Sinner...

On our own our ability to change how the world snacks is small. However together we have the power to really change things. 

So we are inviting fans to create the Sinners 500 Club. A special fan group representing our first backers who will have access to lifelong privileges and rewards. This feature Perk Includes:
  • Two 14-pack cookie Cheat Boxes straight from our first production
  • 3 Sinners designer t-shirt
  • 20% discount on all future purchases from 3 Sinners online shop
  • The opportunity to participate in how 3 Sinners grows: new flavour development, new products, new innovations...
With your help we can help consumers to get exactly the type of snacks they want, when and how they want them. 
Let's be proud of the difference we can make together. 


A Word From Cookie... 
Why I Was Made for Loving You.

"I am rich in ingredients that help you feel full and satisfied. I’ll go all the way to make myself taste good. Because life’s too short to deny yourself moments of pleasure. The genius is in my DNA. My ingredients send out signals that curb your hunger. You can just sit back and eat free of guilt. Keep away from that hussy, sugar, and you’ll see a healthier body shape evolve in the mirror." Cookie.


The Naked Truth.

Strip all the sugar out of an average daily diet and you’ll find you have nearly 30 teaspoons of that nasty addictive powder. It’s all hidden in foods you thought were your BFFs, ones like ‘healthy’ fat free yoghurt, energy bars and drinks. And that’s just sugar.

Modern diets are so full of bad additives, we could bitch about them all day long. We could, but we’re going to be better than that.

Fat New World.

Obesity is arguably this century’s primary social health concern. We just keep getting fatter. We see this sort of market data popping up every other day: two out of three are overweight; some 63% are actively trying to lose weight; 71% are concerned about the amount of sugar they are eating. And on and on. 

In fact it is so much of a concern that in the recently published Food and Health Survey 2015 undertaken in the USA when given a choice between losing $1,000 or gaining 20 pounds (4.5kg), most people would rather lose their money.

We’re Going to Change Things.

We’ve made it our purpose in life to make it easier for you to look hot and feel good. We know if you eat less sugar and eat more nutritious foods that make you feel fuller, you’re on your way to a healthier body shape. 

3 Sinners cookies has natural ingredients, and no added sugar or gluten so you can have your cookie and eat it too!


We're creating quite the buzz... see who's talking about us.


"3 Sinners cookies are set to become the most relevant snack of our time. Can't say more". Brad Genet.




Frequently Asked Questions.

When will you ship?
We plan to produce the packaging straight after the close of the Indiegogo campaign end of August and start baking and shipping the cookies when packaging arrives in October. 

Where will you manufacture?
First cookies will be baked in a high-end UK bakery under a contract manufacturing partnership. As sales momentum builds we will build third-party manufacturing relationships in key end markets like USA, Australasia, Brazil and China.

What are your cookies made from?
We use an array of innovative natural ingredients as can be seen on our website under The Stuff Inside Me.  While each cookie flavour is slightly different in make-up the key hunger curbing ingredients and sugar replacers stay the same. 

Where do you purchase ingredients from?
Each ingredient is selected from preferred suppliers around the world. For example free-range, grass-fed butter comes from New Zealand, almonds from the key growing areas in Australia and the USA, chicory root from Europe. Other ingredients like cage-free eggs are sourced locally in the country of manufacture. 

Do you ship to international destinations?
We have free shipping in the UK and USA. For other destinations shipping will be automatically added to your bill.

What happens if you don't hit your funding target?
We plan to take a phased approach to launching and will scale the launch accordingly. 

What happens if you go over your target?
We are an extremely ambitious company and will simply accelerate our commercial expansion. 

Who do I contact for investment opportunities?
Please email hello@3sinners.com

I want to carry your line of cookies in our cafe or stores. Who should I contact?Please email hello@3sinners.com

I want to become a distributor. Who should I contact?
Please email hello@3sinners.com

What is your reseller money maker program?
3 Sinners seller program allows you to create built-in recurring revenue by signing on offices, businesses, cafeterias, families, etc, to our subscription cookie box service. The program provides a range of social selling tools and includes an initial 10 sell-in display packs (14 cookies each) to kick-off sales.

An e-commerce fulfillment model will be adopted with all orders automatically shipped to buyers so no ongoing stock required or cash handling.

Please email hello@3sinners.com

Who did your branding and video?
The video along with all packaging design and brand development was completed in-house by our creative team.  Websitecopy was written by creative director Alf Lee (www.cargocollective.com/alflee) while the video voiceover was done byJennifer Elkin (www.jenniferelkin.com).

Who are "3 Sinners"?
2 guys and a chick (the boss!) living across multiple time zones. Extensive experience in international business, creating new brands, marketing, living in generation #hashtag and having fun. 

Do you have Gift Subscriptions?
Yes! You can treat someone to a Gift Box (see the Cheat Box perk with 14 cookies) or contribute to a three-month or six-month 3 Sinners subscription. 

Other Ways You Can Help.

We need your help to spread the word that it’s easy to fall in love with all-natural, better tasting, sugar-free, gluten-free and guilt-free cookies. 

Please share this campaign and invite friends to join our 500 Club or go for one of our other Perks. You can share on Facebook, Twitter and e-mail using the Indiegogo tools at the top left of this page. Be proud of the social change in ‘reshaping the world’ you can make.

story:
En español: www.cosmox.mx

Review
As we know the principal problem of social communication is the first contact with the person, because to communicate a person you need at least his mail, name, twitter, phone number, etc.
Cosmox is a social red which solve this problem, it allows the free interaction between users of your neighborhood, it incorporates to the map of your city, make your planet an universe.

¿How does it work?

First of all, you need to choose a planet, it can be pre-designed or also you can make it and designed from zero. 


Situate your home on your neighborhood map, then collocate your planet.

Each planet represents an user on the location of his residence.

On your planet you can upload every kind of information, for example, blogs with your thoughts and share the things you like.


If you have a business you can make an online-shop for it, for example, restaurants or products of wherever kind and sell it at that moment online 

You can put any announcement as particular product you sell

Share your music and files, you can also check who has visited your planet.

Cosmox has an endless of applications, your imagination is the limit. You can put in contact with every user and send it a message, and if he wants, share with you what he did on his day.  You can explore every planet and find similarities with yours or also you could contact someone of your location for a professional service, Cosmox is the exit door, we dare you, maybe you can find an new universe outside. 

You can share your music, and also listening to it with the reproductive or explore music of other planets and add it on your music carpet or just listening to it. 

You can share some book which liked you and upload it, and that way everybody will be able to read it. Think about it… how someone recommends us a book if we can’t access to it. This application brake these complications. 

You like it?

This is just the beginning

Cosmox is a crew of 4 people who works for an internet more inclusive and a society more communicated. 

Winner of Campus Party México 2015 as best project of innovation and social impact, we count with support of the University of Guadalajara for its diffusion.

Cosmox will be the first social network on the world, to make this happen we need you, every dollar, every person, every thought makes the difference for a different universe.

What we need and What you get 

The Project

Collection of investment                                        August          5  to 05 September

Project Development                                              September  5  to 30 December

Online                                                                           January      1,    2016

This will only be possible with your help

* We want to create a marathon of work and end this project in two months, to make this happen, we will eat breakfast, lunch and dinner at work, making a working day from Monday to Sunday with more than twelve hours per day. 

* Help us to create a communication without frontiers, let’s make an universe together.

* Donating from one dollar you help us a lot, remember every dollar, every person, every thought make the difference for a different universe.

We are conscious of what important is the confidence and loyalty on the human relations, for that reason is that every cent will be show at the platform and we’re going to publish the advances week by week, also the costs related to the project. 

We need the money to buy the equip like mass storage servers, also the rent of IP fixed and other services like the diffusion of the company inside universities of our neighborhoods, food, also the maintenance and supplies of our installations, the equipment for work, and the publishing around the location.

Each location of a planet is checked fiscally, this means, that we make a home visit on motorcycle or send a postal with a code of certification. This represent a huge cost to us an even more for the fact that we’re beginning with this project.
However, is the most important part of Cosmox, because your space inside the network would be checked and real, you could scream what you think, express all the ideas you’ve been holding all this time, so everyone will hear you and know about your existence in this huge universe.
Our donation only let us make donations from one dollar, but that dollar makes the difference and it is a grain of sand, what we want from you is your passion an your faith in this project, the vision is that we all together can change the world and make a society without frontiers of communication because we’re pretty convinced that communication is the beginning of the universe.
 
Help us to diffuse our message, let’s make this arrived to every corner of the world, invite your friend and family, people known and unknown, to each person, or someone you love, we really want to meet your universe, help us to diffuse it. 

The impact

We’ve been working on this project for months and is moment to come to light. Your help is so special and necessary to make this dream come true, together we’ll change the perspective of social networks and the way to relating with different people.

We offer attention to our donors, clients, collaborators, suggestions, opinions, histories, and anything you want to tell us on this address:

Volcán Pele # 335A-1
Colonia:  Huentitan El Bajo 

Guadalajara, Jalisco. Mexico

C.P, 44250

email: cosmox.mx@gmail.com

to call from U.S.A:

Tel: 011 (52) 33 15-92-33-42

Attention Schedule: 8:00 am. a 10:00 pm.


Risk and Challenges 

We already know that our challenges are a lot and they’d be huge and little ones, but with your help, we can overcome every challenge, we’re going to be working hand to hand with every person who wish to help this cause, we’ll be informing you step by step, our advances, achievements and falls, documenting every move we make, we hope to count with your support on this journey, having always on mind that nothing is impossible, And together with your help we overcome…


In case that you can’t help us with a dollar, it doesn’t matter, your conviction can make the difference to us, if you can help us on diffuse our message, this simply gesture makes a huge difference to us, if you have any idea you want to share with us, just left us a suggestion, we’re opened to any opinion, lets communicate and switch our ideas. 
www.cosmox.mx

story:
Meet Charm

Why do the existing baby monitors often act like a combination of a walkie-talkie and an IP camera?

We have lots of imaging technologies applied in everyday life. In airport and border control, we apply the thermal imaging to check body temperature from a distance. 

On our phones and digital cameras, we have face detection as a trigger to take picture or to detect blinking. Why can't we have a baby monitor that embraces this kind of technologies, and help with the parent when it comes to nurturing baby?

So CharmCam Studio is formed. We felt that there had to be a better way to help parents monitoring and taking care of their babies. Today there are so many amazing technologies in sensing and connectivity, our goal is to make use of these technologies and make a better monitor and gears for babies and parents. In our first step, we reinvented the baby monitor and build a baby monitor that does monitor (finally!).

Continuous Body Temperature Monitor


CharmCam equips with the same thermography technology as you see in airport and border. The embedded long wavelength infra-red (LWIR) detector measures your baby's body temperature, and you can configure notification to alert you when your baby has elevated body temperature, or notify you when your baby's body temperature returns to normal.

With this function, you don't need to risk waking up your baby hourly when it has elevated body temperature. You can see the current and body temperature record on your phone. Just few clicks away!

Blocked Face Detection

Face detection is not new. You have this on your phone, on your digital camera - but why don't we apply it on baby monitor? Using thermal and visible light imaging, CharmCam can determine whether your baby's face is covered, and alert you to your phone with live video.

Lullabies and Twinkle LEDs

We know that soothing a baby to sleep can use a few tricks. CharmCam offers you with its tricks -- lullabies of your choices and twinkle LEDs. You can select the music file or playlist using our app, and CharmCam can play it along to your baby. You can set timer to turn off the lullabies, or to set a timer to turn it on as a wake-up notice to your baby. A good mixture of twinkle LEDs and lullabies can be your new tricks to soothe your baby to sleep! 


Front and Rear Camera

Why can you hardly find a baby monitor that can see what's happening at the front and at the back? Your mobile phone has front and rear camera, why don't we have this on the baby monitor, so that we can have a better look at baby's room and around the crib?
CharmCam equips with both front and rear camera. Each is configured with super wide field of view lens. You can click on your app to see the front and rear view.


One App, Full Control

CharmCam can be fully controlled by its app. You can access all the sensing measurement, including the video footage, baby's body temperature, the room temperature, humidity, background noise level, oxygen level and toxic level in the air. All the records of these measurements can be accessed in the app, and shared with your family. 
CharmCam's app supports both iOS and Android.




Gallery


Video Streaming from CharmCam to phone


Demonstration of the thermal sensing capability of CharmCam. Each CharmCam is well-calibrated by black body (a temperature controlled device) to yield thermographic measurement.

The Image Quality

Both front and rear camera on CharmCam are of 1080P resolution at a frame rate higher than 15 frames per second. The live view from CharmCam through our app may show a about 1.5 second delay in its best performance. We are working to improve this delay but this may be held off till after our initial production run has been completed. 

The Air

Each CharmCam carries air quality detector, which can measure the levels of oxygen, carbon monoxide and carbon dioxide.

The Thermal Sensing

The thermal sensing technology on CharmCam is the same as you see in the airport. It can detect long wavelength infra-red (LWIR) light and convert it to temperature measurement.

The Camera Mount

We understand that reinventing the baby monitor does not mean to reinvent the camera mount. So CharmCam baby monitor supports a standard  1/4" tripod mounting. In each set of CharmCam, we include two carefully selected camera mounts for you. One is the L-shape mounting (white), and the other one is the clamp-type mounting (black). 

EXCLUSIVE OFFER: The clamp-type mounting is FREE-OF-CHARGE only for our backers from Indiegogo. Don't miss this!

Perks

To kick off our campaign we are offering a number of perks to our backers!

Very Very Early Bird = $ 149
Be the among the first to get it: (1) CharmCam.
This includes (1) Flexible Clamp Mount and  (1) Table Stand for CharmCam.
SAVE 67% or $298 OFF the retail price of $447 for a limited time. 


Very Early Bird = $ 199
Be the among the first to get it: (1) CharmCam.

This includes (1) Flexible Clamp Mount and  (1) Table Stand for CharmCam.
SAVE 55% or $248 OFF the retail price of $447 for a limited time. 


Twice Is Good = US$358
Be the among the first to get it: (2) CharmCam.
This includes (2) Flexible Clamp Mount and  (2) Table Stand for CharmCam.
SAVE 55% or $447 OFF the retail price of $804 for a limited time. 


4x CharmCam = US$750
Be the among the first to get it: (4) CharmCam.
This includes (4) Flexible Clamp Mount and  (4) Table Stand for CharmCam.
SAVE 58% or $1,072 OFF the retail price of $1,519 for a limited time. 




An Add-on with IR Light and Air Sensor for H2S
When 200% of the funding goal is reached, all backers of CharmCam baby monitor can enjoy an add-on for their CharmCam. It is an IR light module with air sensor for Hydrogen Sulfide (rotten egg odor). Each CharmCam will come with a set of this add-on once this goal is reached.


An Add-on with IR Light and Air Sensor for H2S + 

Cloud Storage + FREE use for 12 MONTHS

Once 500% is reached, all backers of CharmCam baby monitor can enjoy cloud based video storage, and enjoy FREE use of this cloud service for 12 months!
 


An Add-on with IR Light and Air Sensor for H2S + 

Cloud Storage + FREE use for 18 MONTHS

Once 800% is reached, all backers of CharmCam baby monitor can enjoy cloud based video storage, and enjoy FREE use of this cloud service for 18 months!


An Add-on with IR Light and Air Sensor for H2S + 

Cloud Storage + FREE use for 24 MONTHS + Extended Warranty to TWO YEARS

Once 1000% is reached, all backers of CharmCam baby monitor can enjoy cloud based video storage, and enjoy FREE use of this cloud service for 24 months - and - an extended warranty to TWO years! 

Production Schedule


Referral Program:
8 referrals = 50% off on a CharmCam


Just log into your Indiegogo account, and click on the "Link" icon on the left of the video to generate a unique link for sharing. Share that link to your friends. After 8 successful supports on any of our perks from 8 different individuals, you will receive 50% discount on a perk for a CharmCam. Act now!  


 

Black Friday Very Special Offer! Only on 27 Nov 2015

Buy 4 Get 8! On 27 November from 00:01AM to 11:59PM PST, we offer an amazing discount when buying 4 sets of CharmCam. All buyers for 4 sets of CharmCam will have 4 additional sets for FREE! Only on 27 Nov! Spread the words!

We Need Your Help!

Our team have designed, redesigned and re-imagined CharmCam many times during the past 12 months, pouring countless hours into thinking about the user experience, the technical aspects of the project and how to deliver the world's most advanced baby monitor to you at an affordable price point. But that's not enough.
We need your monitor to complete the tooling, finalize the apps design, and purchase thousands of thermal and visible-light sensors so that we can lower the manufacturing cost and make CharmCam available for everyone.
You can help bring CharmCam baby monitors to the world by being the very first to own them!

Risks & Challenges

We know that there will always be unknowns when creating a new product, but we're up to the challenge.

We've spent the past 12 months, not only designing a better baby monitor, but studying and improving our design for manufacturing process. We have established a network of advisors and hired people who have done this type of work before. We're being conservative with our ship date of November 2016, but we will also not rush to send you an inferior product.

We're here for the long run. Our backers and community mean everything to our team. Making sure your expectations are met and exceeded is our top-most priority. As such, we will be forthright and very transparent throughout the entire manufacturing and testing process.


FAQ

What voltage does CharmCam work on?
CharmCam works on 5 volt. The power connector is the standard Micro-B USB. We are considering 110~260V version but this may be held off till after our initial production run has been completed.
Can other people take control of my baby cameras?
We have considered security. The WiFi connection will use the standard AES-128 security set-up that you are currently using. CharmCam will be as secure as your home WiFi network.
I am interested in becoming a distributor, what do I do?
Our first priority is to deliver the product to our Indiegogo backers, after the project is complete we may consider fielding these requests. You can email http://mailto:nick@charmcam.com with your details and we will follow up from there.
Is there a warranty?
We provide 12 months limited warranty to our CharmCam. For the exact details, we are still working it out in order to ensure that we comply with the legal requirements across a number of different countries, we decided its best that we seek legal advice to ensure that we are compliant. As soon as we have this information we will update you all.
Windows phone?
Originally we intended to develop just for iPhone and Android devices as this makes up the bulk of the consumer market. For windows phone, we are looking into the viability of this and will update the community as soon as we are certain that we can deliver a solid product on this platform.
How to connect CharmCam to a mobile device?
First you need to configure CharmCam via a phone using a direct WiFi connection. Then you can set up the home wireless network (e.g. SSID) that CharmCam shall connect to. Finally you just need to install our app on your mobile device, and select "Search" to find  CharmCam that is connected in the same network.
How many CharmCam baby monitors can be controlled by its app on a phone?
Concurrently you can configure settings of one CharmCam baby monitor at a time. But you can register hundreds of CharmCam on the app. 
How do I connect CharmCam to my home automation system?
It is on our road map to connect CharmCam with other home automation system. We will release a communication protocol to talk to our CharmCam, and it is likely that a "middle-ware" is needed to 'glue' different home automation system together. We will post our progress on this in the Update.
Does it work with 802.11g as well as 802.11n?
Yes. All of 802.11a/b/g/n from the same internal WiFi chip.
Are CharmCam baby monitor suitable for outdoor use?
No. CharmCam has been developed for indoor purposes. We may make an outdoor version down the track.

Further questions?
If the information above doesn't help, you can ask us directly: 
http://mailto:nick@charmcam.com
