Meet Charm
Why do the existing baby monitors often act like a combination of a walkie-talkie and an IP camera?
We have lots of imaging technologies applied in everyday life. In airport and border control, we apply the thermal imaging to check body temperature from a distance. 
On our phones and digital cameras, we have face detection as a trigger to take picture or to detect blinking. Why can't we have a baby monitor that embraces this kind of technologies, and help with the parent when it comes to nurturing baby?
So CharmCam Studio is formed. We felt that there had to be a better way to help parents monitoring and taking care of their babies. Today there are so many amazing technologies in sensing and connectivity, our goal is to make use of these technologies and make a better monitor and gears for babies and parents. In our first step, we reinvented the baby monitor and build a baby monitor that does monitor (finally!).

story:
• 66% OF EMPLOYEES WHO ARE IN SIGNIFICANT EMOTIONAL DISTRESS NEVER ASK FOR HELP!
  • PSYCHOLOGICAL DISTRESS COSTS COMPANIES $193 BILLION PER YEAR.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We exist to solve problems: 

  • Before they get out of hand
  • Before they ruin relationships
  • And save companies money in the process 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Awaken Behavioral Wellness (ABW) is comprised of a team of psychologists based out of San Jose, California. We use our training in human behavior to help maintain and improve emotional wellbeing, and prevent burn-out.

We bring evidence-based emotional wellness programs to companies, teams, and individuals stress-prone positions, to make preventing burn-out easy, accessible, and affordable. 

Bringing emotional wellness to work allows everyone the opportunity to maintain and improve their emotional wellness, and keep unspoken existing problems from getting worse. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


  • We want to be found by the companies and team leaders that are ready to prevent burnout and maintain emotional health.  
  • We are thinking differently about mental wellness at work, and would like to increase awareness and support for what we are doing. 
  • There is still a lot of shame, embarrassment, and stigma surrounding emotional problems, and we want to help eliminate that. 

What is a hiip bag? 

A hiip bag is a 12"x6" bag that you can wear around your hips, messenger style, or as a clutch. Each bag features nickel hardware and zippers, and has an adjustable 26"x53" strap. Through our partnership, hiip has made their Peakcock hiip bag exclusively available through your contribution to our campaign.     

When will I receive my hiip bag?

Your hiip bag will be shipped directly from hiip within two weeks of our campaign ending.  

What is a hiip Kit, and what does it contain?

For every hiip bag redeemed, a hiip Kit is personally delivered to a person in need on  the streets of San Francisco. A hiip Kit (see below) is a small pouch that contains socks, shampoo, toothpaste, lip balm, and sunscreen. 


How can I contact ABW?

ABW can be contacted by using the Indiegogo contact features, or via the Contact Us tab on our website.

How can I support this movement?

We invite you to continue your support by contributing to this campaign (any amount helps), and sharing the campaign with everyone you know!

You can also join our mailing list by signing up for the ABW Digest here.

story:
Who Is Blatant?

Before we get to the breakdown of the campaign, here is a brief background of who exactly we are:

  • Blatant! Lacrosse (A division of "Blatant!") was formed in 2011 by co-owners, Michael Brennan and Joe Potenza, while attending Dowling College and Hofstra University, respectively. 
  • Founded as an e-commerce business based in Huntington, NY, Blatant! Lacrosse currently operates in five different sectors inside the lacrosse market: Wholesale distribution of Blatant! Mesh, Blatant! Events (tournaments, leagues, camps and clinics), Team Sales (custom uniforms, spirit-wear and equipment), Online Sales, and Event Sales.
  • Along with our website, you might have noticed our presence vending at over 50 tournaments in the Northeast each year.
  • For more information about our company and to see our product offerings, make sure to check out our website, www.blatantlacrosse.com and follow us on Instagram @BlatantLacrosse. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking a minimum of $25,000 of funding to facilitate the expansion of our business.
  • This funding will primarily help us diversify our product line, increase inventory storage and shipping capabilities, as well as expedite the release of our new, highly-anticipated performance mesh, entitled, "Empire Mesh".
  • In return for your loyalty and financial commitment, we will be awarding patrons with numerous rewards based on certain funding benchmarks. These rewards include, but are not limited to: free samples of our unreleased, "Empire Mesh", full individual and team apparel packages, and corporate sponsorships at our events.
  • For a full list of the rewards that come along with helping fund our expansion, please refer to the "Perks" section of the campaign.

The Impact

Here are some of the many things that your contribution will better allow us to do:

  • Speed-up the release of our new line of performance mesh (Empire Mesh).
  • Increase our warehouse square footage to allow for easier inventory storage.
  • Improve our shipping logistics for more efficient packing and thus quicker delivery of online orders.
  • Giving potential corporate sponsors the ability to be featured on our Blatant! Events website and on t-shirts and signage at our tournaments, camps, and leagues (exposure to over 15,000 people each year, not including website hits and daily social media viewership).
  • Again, for a full list of all the additional rewards that come along with contributing to our expansion, please refer to the "Perks" section of the campaign.

Challenges We Face

  • Being based in a market (Long Island, NY) that is over-saturated with similar businesses pertaining to the world of lacrosse, there is always the risk that a bigger, more well-known company will undercut our pricing to try and price us out of the market. 
  • With the additional funding we are seeking, we will be able to go toe-to-toe with larger competitors who might challenge our ability to grow. By having a vast pool of financial resources to access, we will be able to increase our production capabilities, and thus make our product line more accessible to more people.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out by using the Indiegogo share tools! 
  • And as always, make sure to let your friends and family know about the #BLATANTEMPIRE on Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and Facebook.

Again, for a full list of all the additional rewards that come along with contributing to our expansion, please refer to the "Perks" section of the campaign.


Challenges We Face


Being based in a market (Long Island, NY) that is over-saturated with similar businesses pertaining to the world of lacrosse, there is always the risk that a bigger, more well-known company will undercut our pricing to try and price us out of the market. 
With the additional funding we are seeking, we will be able to go toe-to-toe with larger competitors who might challenge our ability to grow. By having a vast pool of financial resources to access, we will be able to increase our production capabilities, and thus make our product line more accessible to more people.

    Other Ways You Can Help 
Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out by using the Indiegogo share tools! 
And as always, make sure to let your friends and family know about the #BLATANTEMPIRE on Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and Facebook.

story:
We are a small group of nerdy people who want to combine our love of fandom with our love of natural living. We want to create body sprays from high quality essential oils that will be safe for all skin, smell great, and include the benefits of the oils themselves. Our goal is to not only connect you with your favorite characters but introduce you to the power of essential oils that can help ease anxiety, depression, and just about anything else that ails you. Things we as fans all tend to share.
The money we are raising will go toward start up costs including oils, bottles, and packaging. We already have blends planned for Team Free Will, 9th-12th Doctors, and are working on blends for Sherlock, John, and Moriarty. In order to perfect these blends we need to get our hands on the oils and test how they work together.

If you donate $5 you can pick between Sam or Castiel, $10 you will recieve Destiel (one bottle of Dean and one of Castiel), and if you donate $15 you will receive the entirety of Team Free Will (one bottle each of Sam, Dean, And Cas.) All before our etsy store goes live!

If we do not reach our goal we will start up much smaller then we are intending. We are currently hoping to launch the blends mentioned above with about 50 bottles total.

Our hope is to eventually be able to supply fans of all kinds with a safe and beneficial body spray connected to the fictional characters that bring them so much joy. Thank you each and everyone for donating. If you cannot donate, please spread the word. We are doing this to help share OUR passion with all of you.

story:
No victory, no healing

(image credit: The Pitch Kansas City weekly alternative newspaper)

I was one of a handful of physicians in Kansas willing to provide abortion care. In 2012 my license to practice medicine in the State of Kansas was revoked because of my decision to keep medically-irrelevant-but-personally-identifying details out of the medical records of abortion patients. While the 2014 outcome of the District Court appeal was a resounding victory legally, the Kansas State Board of Healing Arts refused to reinstate my license, and the extended appeal process may take years.

Recently, my job at a Kansas university was terminated without explanation. The history below shows how our situation is part of a concerted campaign of retaliation against my work on behalf of reproductive freedom, the goal of which is to drive me and my family into bankruptcy and out of Kansas.

Please help me remain a voice for reproductive rights in Kansas

The overwhelming response to our 2013 Indiegogo campaign allowed us to save our tiny farm, repay critical debts and fix serious problems such as restoring running water to our 100-year-old farmhouse. We know many, many people are hurting financially, so we are even more humbled and inspired by the outpouring of support we received.

Now we need your help again, to regain my medical license, help our son begin his freshman year in college, and to continue our efforts to be a voice for the people of Kansas. One supporter wrote something that continues to haunt me:

“Please keep fighting for a country I can believe in.”

State of Insanity: The reality nobody wants to acknowledge

Kansas is now firmly in control of Tea Party Republicans intent on arming everyone, ridding the state of public schools and poor people, trampling the civil rights of its citizens and mandating that doctors practice bad medicine. For years the Kansas medical board has been completely silent about the unethical and adverse health consequences of the ongoing slew of dangerous and senseless legislation added to the Kansas statutes, and it continues to field an unending stream of unfounded complaints from a convicted domestic terrorist.

On March 25, 2015 before the Kansas legislature, Rep. Mike Kiegerl compared me to Josef Mengele, complaining that Dr. George "Tiller is dead but Neuhaus is still alive".

In December of 2006 - almost a decade ago - some of my patients' medical records were seized without due process by men working for now-disbarred former Kansas AG Phill Kline. Kline, an attorney who raised campaign funds at churches - in clear violation of the U.S. Constitution - spent his entire term attempting to destroy every abortion clinic in Kansas, and even made appearances on The O’Reilly Factor to share details from patients' medical records. The witch-hunt was continued by disgraced former Kansas AG Paul Morrison, allegedly under pressure from an employee with whom he admitted having an adulterous relationship. At trial, the jury rejected the State’s misdemeanor charges against Dr. Tiller after an unprecedentedly short deliberation of only 45 minutes.

Strange bedfellows: The Kansas medical board and a convicted domestic terrorist

Following Dr. Tiller's acquittal, mirror accusations against both Dr. Tiller and me were immediately announced by the Kansas medical board. These "charges" were filed on behalf of Cheryl Sullenger, a convicted clinic bomber. Sullenger is now the “Senior Policy Advisor” for Operation Rescue, an organization that specializes in racketeering-like actions against health providers. In spite of her criminal past and associates, including members of the Army of God, justifiable homicide signatories and the author of the Nuremberg files, a website that glorifies the murder of doctors, her innumerable baseless complaints continue to be treated seriously by the Kansas medical board. Unlike most professional licensing boards, the Kansas medical board fields complaints from any member of the public anywhere in the world; no professional relationship or even previous interaction with the practitioner is necessary to file a complaint.

The Kansas medical board is appointed by the Governor. Not all member are medical practitioners and some have questionable credentials for this role, even as so-called "public members". One public member, seen here posing with Gov. Sam Brownback, recently threatened to commit suicide on Facebook. Her bizarre rambling soliloquy was her only contribution to my revocation hearing, and clearly demonstrates her complete lack of knowledge as to what is required in a medical record. The other public member is Richard Macias, an attorney who makes a living from adoptions, and who represented Operation Rescue while it was headed by Randall Terry, the organization's founder whom they had to publicly disavow after he spoke favorably about the murder of Dr. Tiller. Board members have been deliberately kept ignorant that the complainant is an executive for Operation Rescue.

And while the medical board has been criticized for basing licensing decisions on inappropriate political inquiries, current members seem unaware or unconcerned that one of their fellow board members is a longtime anti-abortion activist, despite the fact that his highly controversial appointment made the national news. A board attorney even objected to our request for Macias to recuse himself (although he did so following a closed-door session) in spite of the obvious conflict of interest. Macias was the primary speaker at my original revocation hearing, basing his argument for revocation on his erroneous statement of the prevailing standard of care for referrals. Unbelievable, huh?

The Kansas medical board rarely revokes a physician's license, generally only following a criminal conviction and never previously for inadequate record-keeping. As we have argued, in some cases even serious multiple offenders have not been revoked. In contrast, I've treated tens of thousands of patients with an exemplary safety record and without a single legitimate complaint, or any demonstration of patient injury, or lawsuit in over 25 years of medical practice. Yet, to date, the State of Kansas has expended over $100,000 prosecuting my case and is still trying to make me pay the cost of it.

This why we need your help to enable me to continue to oppose the dire state of women’s health care in Kansas, and to help expose the right-wing’s attempt to export this insanity to other states.

story:
Short Summary

Please donate $2 today to help with disaster relief from the 7.8 magnitude earthquake in Nepal that killed more than 7,000 and injured more than double that. When you donate $2 you will receive an MP3 version of the instrumental I created entitled "Never Forget," which was inspired by this tragedy. All money raised will be donated through the American Red Cross (http://www.redcross.org/what-we-do/internationa...). Please help Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. 

What We Need & What You Get

Even though I know this is only a drop in the bucket, I would like to raise at least $500. Any amount helps, and I believe we can definitely help one contribution at a time. 

For only $2 you can make a difference. Donate $2 today and you will receive a link to download "Never Forget" which is an instrumental I produced inspired by this tragedy. All money raised will be donated to through the American Red Cross. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share the video in this campaign and encourage others to donate either to this campaign or any other.

Thank you! #prayfornepal

story:
The Arrowhead Bike Farm is a Unique Concept & Place -

 We are creating a what will essentially be a mountain biking cultural hub right near the entrance to the New River Gorge trail system. The commercial part of the project is the campground, Bike shop and Biergarten. These ventures will pay for our 37 acres and our little farmhouse (soon to be bike shop). We are like a lot of passion driven businesses - We are loaded with passion but we have limited capital to pull-off everything we wish for. A Skills Area is high on our Wish List!
 

Cultivating Mountain Biking - 

Our motto is to Cultivate Mountain Biking - In order to do this, we need to get more and more people riding and learning basic mountain biking skills. A comprehensive skills area is key to do this. Nothing like this exists in West Virginia. Ours will be free and open to the public. It will be free for use by independent bike instructors and other bike shops that wish to use it for clinics. We believe that Mountain Biking is still in its infancy at the New River Gorge and with a skills park in place, it will continue to grow.

 

We need your Help-

If you are passionate about mountain biking and cycling in general, we are asking you to forgo that one extra post-ride beer and put those dollars right here! The money we raise will go 100% into building this skills area. We are setting aside the acreage, paying the liability insurance and managing this project. We need the capital to do this the right way. We are putting our backs to work on this as well. We need your funds to do the rest!

 

How the Funds will be used -

- We will use an IMBA (International Mountain Bike Association) certified trail builder to layout and design the skills area.

- Rental fees for  a small excavating machine to do terrain based features

- Lumber costs for wooden ramps and other features

- Miscellaneous drainage supplies

story:
My Name is Brenda Mierzejewski and I am the owner and founder of MIZZI COSMETICS and LIPLUXE Lip balm. I am also a wife and a stay at home mother of two children. I worked in the pharmaceutical and chemical industry for over 11 years in Supply Chain Management before children. 

After having our kids, we started to switch our normal routines over to all-natural routines; including the food we eat, the products we use in our home and on our bodies. This lifestyle change played an important role in where we are today with MIZZI COSMETICS.

When my children suffered from chapped lips last year, we tried everything advertised, or recommended to us by friends and family. Nothing worked, or worked for long. I wanted something natural, healing, and long lasting – something that truly worked. I decided to make something myself, using all natural ingredients such as pure honey, a vegan base, and therapeutic essential oils.  After almost 20 attempts to get my product perfect, I made a huge batch. I had so much lip balm I gave it away to family and friends. I received such a positive response that I made more and gave away almost 300 lip balms over the summer. Our product was not only an aid in healing chapped dry lips, but it provided a fabulous unexpected gloss with an extremely long wear.

I knew we had a special product, and decided to launch a small business and sell it to local retailers. LIPLUXE LLC was born October 2014. That December, a family friend offered to introduce it to a few boutiques on the West Coast. His sister is a publicist with contacts at the gifting suites for the 2015 Oscars. She loved our product and shared it with them and they loved it too. She got us into two gifting suites: The Roger Neal Style Gifting suite and GBK's gifting suite.

This opportunity created tremendous buzz, and local media attention, for our story and product. Sales grew 4500% in just 4 weeks, and retailers are signing on to carry our product each week. We feel blessed to be in the position to take our business to the next level.

The Impact

We are passionately committed to creating a line of all natural and organic products, safe enough to use on our own children. Your support allows us to continue to build upon that mission – expand our product line, and continue to research and source the very best ingredients.

We also believe in the importance of giving back to our community. We donate a portion of our sales to a small local non-profit organization called "Little Hearts" and also to The American Heart Association. Both organizations play a big role in support, research and educating people affected with Heart disease. As you watch our video, you will see how heart disease has affected our son and how these organizations helped our family. 

We have lofty goals and aspirations for our business and at the same time are keenly aware of our competitors and the overall marketplace. Your support will further provide us the financial ability to expand upon our market research capabilities and allow us to hone our target market and marketing channels here in the United States and abroad.

What We Need 

We want to raise $25,000. We are running this business out of our dining room, and given the rapid growth of our business our town zoning laws require us to move into a manufacturing district. We also have aspirations to invest in making our products all organic, and to expand our product line.

If we are unable to reach our goal of $25,000, the money raised will be prioritized to renting manufacturing space, and purchasing the necessary equipment to move MIZZI COSMETICS out of our home so that we can continue to grow!

Other Ways You Can Help

We are grateful and humbled by the time you’ve taken to learn about our story. If you are compelled to donate to our campaign, THANK YOU. If you are unable to give a monetary contribution, we remind you that the simple act of spreading the word about our story and products is also extremely valuable support. We invite you to use the Indiegogo share tools and MAKE SOME NOISE. LIPLUXE #ItsDaBalm!

On Behalf of MIZZI COSMETICS and our family, we want to thank each and everyone of you for taking the time to view our campaign and learn more about our business and our goals for our future. Any donation is greatly appreciated and would mean the world to us and the future of MIZZI COSMETICS.

story:
Erklärung auf englisch und deutsch vorhanden !

Description of the Inventor

My name is Sven Kleuckling from Germany, I am 40 years old, a father who is undertaking
lots of sportive activities with his children. And now also the inventor of the multi-function ball
Muku "round, colorful and healthy"! Because healthy nutrition and physical activities belong
together, we developed the Muku. The Muku is new and unique pot. Muku is supposed to
encourage and stipulate through a great variety and fun to enjoy a healthy diet at school,
office, etc. Muku is a patented product. We won the silver medal on the International Trade Fair     

" Ideas- Inventions - New Products - Nurremberg - Germany ". The greatest Trade Fair of the world.


What is it in this project about?


This project is about enabling children, adolescents and adults a health nutrition to go.
Healthy eating is nowadays in on our stressful world difficult, but important! In particular kid’s
schoolbag are fully packed with numerous books and folders, so that a decent breakfast
finds no space in it anymore. “Round, colorful, healthy!" Under this motto and with the overall
MUKU approach, healthy eating is going to make fun again. Unlike other products on the
market is our Muku absolutely tight, easy to use and at the same time multiple purposes
usable. Whether as a mixing bowl for cereal and milk, salads and dressings and other
yummy stuff. It can also be used as a shaker for delicious drinks and a regular bottle. The
ball is designed in a way that the lower half can be used as a bowl. It can be easily attached
to satchels, backpacks, sports bags, etc., resulting in that no unnecessary space is used
inside. A balanced, healthy diet fosters physical performance, general well-being and the
ability to concentrate. Through fear of toxic material, we decided to use for the MUKU only
all-new material, which is food-save, dishwasher- and micro-wave proof and BPA free. This
has been tested against the German Food law and will be also FDA certified. MUKU’s fully
recyclable plastic is ecologically sustainable and also odorless. All following the motto
“Round, colorful, healthy!".


What are the aims and who is the target audience?


The aim is project is to offer a sensible way a diverse and healthy way of to go eating and
even to enjoy it. Once manufactured MUKU is of sustainable use (refillable).
We target at age groups - from schoolchildren to sporty office workers, salad - and muesli
fans etc. Thus all people who stress healthy food on the go or who want to give their school
children something good to eat to take with them. Muku shall enable healthy food always and
everywhere


Why should anyone support this project?


You support us in a healthy project for our children. But also adults will be excited about the
Muku. Apart from a lack of exercise, very often an unhealthy diet is the root cause for an
increasing number of diseases such as obesity. With the multi-ball – the MUKU, we want to
encourage healthy eating on the go. We got plenty more ideas to make healthy heating a fun
experience. With your support, we will be able to start MUKU. In future we will hopefully see
a MUKU ball be attached to every school bag and every sports bag, etc. as a statement for
healthy nutrition on the go. Let the Muku roll ;-)

Mit Unterstützung der Crowd können wir Muku starten. Hoffentlich werden die Kugeln dann bald an Die Gliederung ist von der Crowdfundingseite startnext…

Beschreibung des Erfinders: ( oder bei Indiegogo als Team auftreten )

Mein Name ist Sven kleuckling aus Deutschland,  bin 40 Jahre, Papa und mit meinen Kindern sportlich aktiv. Und nun auch der Erfinder der Multifunktionskugel MuKu "rund, bunt, gesund" ! Weil gesunde Ernährung und sportliche Bewegung zusammengehören, haben wir nach reichlicher Überlegung MuKu entwickelt. Dieses neuartige einmalige Gefäß MuKu soll durch Abwechslung und Spaß die gesunde Ernährung unterwegs in Schule, Büro usw. fördern und anregen.

Worum geht es in diesem Projekt ?

In diesem Projekt geht es darum, den Kindern, Jugendlichen und Erwachsenen eine gesunde Ernährung für unterwegs zu ermöglichen. In der heutigen stressigen Welt ist eine gesunde Ernährung schwierig, aber wichtig! Insbesondere bei schulpflichtigen Kindern ist der Schulranzen aufgrund zahlreicher Bücher und Hefter so vollgepackt, dass ein ordentliches Frühstück keinen Platz mehr findet. „Rund, bunt, gesund!" Unter diesem Motto und mit dem Gesamtkonzept Muku soll gesunde Ernährung auch unterwegs Spaß machen. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Produkten auf dem Markt, ist unsere MuKu absolut dicht, kinderleicht zu bedienen und ist gleichzeitig für mehrere Zwecke verwendbar. Ob als Mixbehälter für Müsli und Milch, Salate und Soßen und anderen leckeren Sachen kann Sie auch als Shaker für leckere Drinks und als normale Trinkflasche benutzt werden. Die Kugel ist so konzipiert, dass die untere Hälfte als Schüssel verwendet werden kann. Zu befestigen ist die Kugel an Schulranzen, Rucksäcken, Sporttaschen etc., was dazu führt, dass sie keinen unnötigen Platz wegnimmt. Eine ausgewogene, gesunde Ernährung fördert sowohl die körperliche Leistungsfähigkeit, das allgemeine Wohlbefinden als auch die Konzentrationsfähigkeit. Aufgrund der Angst vor giftigen Kunststoffen haben wir uns bei MuKu entschieden, sie aus Polypropylen (PP) herzustellen, garantiert schadstofffrei und es sind keine Weichmacher und kein Bisphenol A (BPA)enthalten. Geprüft nach dem deutschen Lebensmittelgesetz. MuKu wird aus keinerlei schädlichen Stoffen bestehen. Das voll recyclebare Plastik ist ökologisch nachhaltig. Unsere MuKu ist zudem geruchs- und geschmacksneutral, spülmaschinenfest und microwellentauglich. Getreu nach dem Motto rund bunt GESUND.

Was sind die Ziele und wer ist die Zielgruppe?

Das Ziel ist es, eine sinnvolle Möglichkeit anzubieten, sich unterwegs abwechslungsreich und gesund zu ernähren und sogar noch Spaß dabei zu haben. Sie ist einmal produziert nachhaltig verwendbar. ( wiederbefüllbar)

Unsere Zielgruppe sind alle Altersgruppen - von Schulkind über Sportbegeisterte, Büroangestellte, Salat - und Müslifans usw. Alle Menschen, die Wert auf was Gesundes für unterwegs legen oder ihren Kindern was Gutes für die Schule mitgeben wollen. Mit MuKu soll gesundes Essen immer und überall möglich sein.

Warum sollte jemand dieses Projekt unterstützen ?

Ihr unterstützt uns in einem gesunden Projekt für unsere Kinder. Aber auch uns Erwachsene wird die MuKu begeistern. Neben zu wenig Bewegung ist oft auch ungesunde Ernährung Ursache für die steigende Anzahl von Erkrankungen wie beispielsweise Adipositas. Mit der Multikugel wollen wir die gesunde Ernährung für unterwegs fördern. Und mit unseren weiteren Ideen ist der Spaß an gesunde Ernährung garantiert.

jedem Schulranzen, an jeder Sporttasche etc. zu sehen sein und somit ein Zeichen für gesunde Ernährung setzen.

Let the MuKu roll ;-)
story_txt:
Erklärung auf englisch und deutsch vorhanden !
Description of the Inventor 
 My name is Sven Kleuckling from Germany, I am 40 years old, a father who is undertaking lots of sportive activities with his children. And now also the inventor of the multi-function ballMuku "round, colorful and healthy"! Because healthy nutrition and physical activities belongtogether, we developed the Muku. The Muku is new and unique pot. Muku is supposed toencourage and stipulate through a great variety and fun to enjoy a healthy diet at school,office, etc. Muku is a patented product. We won the silver medal on the International Trade Fair     " Ideas- Inventions - New Products - Nurremberg - Germany ". The greatest Trade Fair of the world. 
What is it in this project about?
This project is about enabling children, adolescents and adults a health nutrition to go. Healthy eating is nowadays in on our stressful world difficult, but important! In particular kid’sschoolbag are fully packed with numerous books and folders, so that a decent breakfastfinds no space in it anymore. “Round, colorful, healthy!" Under this motto and with the overallMUKU approach, healthy eating is going to make fun again. Unlike other products on themarket is our Muku absolutely tight, easy to use and at the same time multiple purposesusable. Whether as a mixing bowl for cereal and milk, salads and dressings and otheryummy stuff. It can also be used as a shaker for delicious drinks and a regular bottle. Theball is designed in a way that the lower half can be used as a bowl. It can be easily attachedto satchels, backpacks, sports bags, etc., resulting in that no unnecessary space is usedinside. A balanced, healthy diet fosters physical performance, general well-being and theability to concentrate. Through fear of toxic material, we decided to use for the MUKU onlyall-new material, which is food-save, dishwasher- and micro-wave proof and BPA free. Thishas been tested against the German Food law and will be also FDA certified. MUKU’s fullyrecyclable plastic is ecologically sustainable and also odorless. All following the motto“Round, colorful, healthy!". 
What are the aims and who is the target audience?
The aim is project is to offer a sensible way a diverse and healthy way of to go eating and even to enjoy it. Once manufactured MUKU is of sustainable use (refillable).We target at age groups - from schoolchildren to sporty office workers, salad - and muesli fans etc. Thus all people who stress healthy food on the go or who want to give their schoolchildren something good to eat to take with them. Muku shall enable healthy food always andeverywhere 
Why should anyone support this project?
You support us in a healthy project for our children. But also adults will be excited about the Muku. Apart from a lack of exercise, very often an unhealthy diet is the root cause for anincreasing number of diseases such as obesity. With the multi-ball – the MUKU, we want toencourage healthy eating on the go. We got plenty more ideas to make healthy heating a funexperience. With your support, we will be able to start MUKU. In future we will hopefully seea MUKU ball be attached to every school bag and every sports bag, etc. as a statement forhealthy nutrition on the go. Let the Muku roll ;-) Mit Unterstützung der Crowd können wir Muku starten. story:
SUCCESS METRICS

WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT TEPLO

THE PRESS:

INTRODUCING THE WORLD'S FIRST SMART BOTTLE FOR TEA LOVERS

Teplo is a revolutionary smart bottle that allows tea drinkers to brew the perfect cup of tea by tracking and controlling brewing temperature and time, via a mobile app and extracts maximum health benefits from your tea. 

Instead of letting your tea get cold, a rechargeable battery hidden in the base of the bottle keeps the beverage at the preferred temperature for as long as 4 hours. Plus users can personalize their tea blends based on health and taste preferences, and order premium teas from all over the world on Teplo’s app.

THE PROBLEM:

Tea is the most popular drink in the world yet many tea drinkers don’t realize that getting the perfect cup of tea is actually quite complex and difficult; tea is extremely sensitive to temperature and brewing time. Compared to the way most typically brew tea: by simply throwing a tea bag in hot water and start drinking, we are ignoring taste, flavor, color and even the correct drinking temperature of the tea. 

The Teplo team spent the past year carefully engineering both the bottle and the technology that powers it and are excited to unveil our product and bring it to tea lovers around the world. Introducing the world’s smartest bottle for tea drinkers - simple and elegant!

THE SOLUTION:

Teplo combines technology with its unique design to allow for the most perfect tea drinking experience, unlike anything else.

The glass bottle allows tea enthusiasts to appreciate the color of the tea, as well as to maintain the perfect temperature for a long period of time.

HOW IT WORKS

Select the type of tea to brew.

The app will notify you when to put the tea leaves at the right brewing temperature.

App will notify when to remove the tea leaves after the required brewing time is complete.

After the drinking temperature is reached the bottle will maintain that temperature for 4 hours.

TEA PERSONALIZATION:

Answer a few simple questions and get your own personalized tea to suit your taste and health preferences right at your door step using our app using our tea subscription package.

THE SPECS:

Teplo’s innovative design consists of a glass bottle with a thermo sensor, heater, Bluetooth communication module and two batteries. An internal battery is used to communicate with smart devices, and has an all-day battery life. An external battery maintains the drinking temperature for as long as four hours.

THE APP:

Teplo will provide a mobile application for iOS and Android, available from the App store and Google Play.

R&D:

We develop our technology in our in house R&D lab. We also leverage our capability by partnering with manufacturers across the world.

THE TEAM:

Kazunori Kawanobe (CEO, co-founder)

Abhinav Sureka (COO, co-founder)

Mayuresh Soni (CTO, co-founder)

Marissa Goldstein, CMO

Bill Phelps, Ideastorm Inc., Design Partner

Tetsuo Hitomi(tet.hitomi@gmail.com), Logo Design Partner

Mai Usami(sammy.mu@gmail.com), Logo Design Assistant

LemonLight Media, Video Production

Adam Goldstein, Timroon, Manufacturing Partner

OUR STORY:

We are three friends who came to the US to get our MBA’s at Babson College. Coming from Japan and India, tea is really important to our culture. With a growing tea market in the US of $2.4B, we thought that there must be a better way to use technology to create a better tea drinking experience. So, after discussing together, we decided to create Teplo, a simple yet elegant solution that combines modern technology with traditional tea drinking.

We’ve spent the past year designing and building both our hardware product as well as the technology that powers it. We’ve gone through countless prototypes and have tested it out on our classmates, who come from all over the world.

Now we are ready to launch Teplo and get it into the hands of tea enthusiasts all over the world and we need your help. With the money we raise from this campaign, we will be able to purchase tooling and thus kickstart the manufacturing process. We have the prototypes, have identified our suppliers and just need the capital to manufacture.

PHOTO GALLERY:

TIMELINE:

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

Bringing any product to market can present challenges and unfortunately delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We give you our promise to do our best to make sure that the production process is done efficiently and effectively. Through the help of Timroon, we’ve already identified our manufacturing partners and our production timeline has been established. We are excited to bring Teplo to life and thank you for your support!

We’ve spent the past year designing and building both our hardware product as well as the technology that powers it. We’ve gone through countless prototypes and have tested it out on our classmates, who come from all over the world.
Now we are ready to launch Teplo and get it into the hands of tea enthusiasts all over the world and we need your help. With the money we raise from this campaign, we will be able to purchase tooling and thus kickstart the manufacturing process. We have the prototypes, have identified our suppliers and just need the capital to manufacture.
PHOTO GALLERY:


TIMELINE:


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:
Bringing any product to market can present challenges and unfortunately delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We give you our promise to do our best to make sure that the production process is done efficiently and effectively. Through the help of Timroon, we’ve already identified our manufacturing partners and our production timeline has been established. We are excited to bring Teplo to life and thank you for your support!

story:
Traduction française disponible en suivant ce lien : http://bimpair.com/bimpair-nouvelle-technologie-gestion-air-velo/

BIMP’AIR is the first fully autonomous inflating device, a refillable compressed air capsule to inflate tires, set forks and shock absorbers or install tubeless with one system just by pressing a button! 

You can say goodbye to the exhausting process of pumping up your bicycle and to expensive and environmentally-damaging CO² capsules, Bimp’Air is the solution of the future.

Initially invented for cyclists, this patented technology offers an alternative to take care of your bike quickly and easily. 

The air bike maintenance is simplified to ride only with pleasure!


Bimp'Air is composed of a capsule, a miniature air compressor and an energy convertor.

With the Bimp'air Caps, a reserve of 11 liters of compressed air at 50 bar/725psi of pressure, you can easily inflate tires, adjust shock absorbers and also install tubeless in a few seconds. Thanks to this all-in-one system, all the bike's air needs are covered. 

Once used, the capsule is refillable as many times as you want thanks to a specific miniature air compressor, at the core of Bimp’Air’s technology. 

Two options to recharge: the ORIGIN System, where the energy of the bike produces the air that it needs or the E-WAY System, as an electrical charger to refill the capsule. 





The Capsule is the key component of the BIMP’AIR solution. It is a portable, fully independent reserve of compressed air which can be refilled and reused as often as you like.

This multi-purpose tool is both practical and attractive, with its contemporary lines and sporty look. Lightweight and neatly-proportioned, its filling indicator enables users to view the level of remaining compressed air and its built-in manometer offers a view of the inflation level. Hermetic, it can be stored away for later use. 



Able to contain high pressure, it is the first system on the market that can cover all the air a bike needs offering great inflation performances. 



There is nothing easier, just press a button and in only a few seconds, inflate whatever you need on your bike.


Once you will use it, there is no turning back as you are going to enjoy it so much!


To refill your BIMP'AIR CAPS, you can choose between two different options : 


The first worldwide system that allows your bike to produce the Air it needs!

The originality of Bimp’Air: Use the energy generated by the bicycle’s motion to produce air. An eco-friendly and ingenious solution!

First fits the energy convertor on the front wheel, very easily with no additional tool. Then put the mini air compressor into place. It starts as soon as the bicycle begins to move, filling up the capsule without any effort in 6 minutes at 15km/h. 

After that, your capsule is ready to use. 

Whether you’re out on the trail, in town or up in the hills, this efficient solution enables you to be totally self-sufficient!

=> This solution is compatible with max 36 diameter hubs, 9/10 axle. 



Bimp'Air has also developed an alternative charging device, the E-WAY System for a more universal use. 

With this electrical powered option you can refill the capsule before taking your bike. 

Compact and efficient, this system allows to refill your capsule in only 6 minutes and shuts off automatically when it is ready. 

You can charge it in your car with the 12V cigarette lighter plug or at home on the main power socket with a special adapter.


Check out how easy it is!




Bimp'Air is the perfect product for all your needs! 

For bike maintenance any cyclist needs several tools : an hand pump, a foot pump, a shock absorber pump, CO2 cartdriges and a compressor for tubeless. 


Bimp'Air is an "all-in-one" system designed to bring simplicity and performances to cyclists. 

Convenient for any type of bike practice, you will enjoy this innovation.


AND MORE...

As a reserve of air, the Bimp'Air Caps can also be used to adjust the pressure of motorcycles, scooters, car wheels,  wheelchairs,  any kind of balls,...







Starting with the idea 4 years ago, we have been through all the different steps and are now almost ready to go on the market ! We are finalizing the industrialization process and producing the 1°serie of products. 


Bimp'Air is the first high pressure refillable miniaturized system which can deliver 50bar/725psi  performances to manage the air in a nomadic and more than ever comfortable way. 

Today, we offer an innovative solution as an accessory for bikes but this is only the first step!

Imagine... integrating our technology into a bike to make the bike of the future, creating the air it needs and automatically regulating the pressure... That could be on any bike tomorrow.

Apart from the bike market, we found numerous other applications where the high pressure mini compressor and its separate and refillable reserve of air can serve. We already found applications for motorcycles, scooters, cars, wheelchairs, for gardening, DIY, or in the mechanical industry... and there is a lot more to imagine. 

We enjoy dreaming ... but we are convinced that a lot of projects will follow to extend our technology and that Bimp'Air will definitely become a new way to manage the Air!


If you love cycling but don’t want to think about inflation constraints anymore,

If you see Bimp’Air as an eco-friendly product and a breakthrough technology,

If you are looking for performances and simplicity to enjoy your passion,

Help us contributing to our Project!

After more than 3 years developing Bimp’Air innovation, we now need You to go out and make it real.

Help us achieving our goals, to strengthen our brand and launch Bimp’Air in the international bike market.

We created it for you with hard work and great enthusiasm and hope to continue innovating to bring high pressure technology to the public!

Be part of our story!

Get a contribution : Bimp'Air goodies, Outfits or Products or simply share this page to your friends! 


We thank you very much for your attention to our Project and hope you will join our community. 
Do not hesitate to contact us for any question. 

Our company is based in Béziers, South of France and we are a six-person team actively working together to make all of this possible! Our complementarity brings the conditions for innovation and performance in a spirit of sharing and contribution.

Convenient for any type of bike practice, you will
enjoy this innovation.

AND MORE...
As a reserve of air, the Bimp'Air Caps can also be used to adjust the pressure of motorcycles, scooters, car wheels,  wheelchairs,  any kind of balls,...













Starting with the idea 4 years ago,
we have been through all the different steps and are now almost ready to go on
the market ! We are finalizing the industrialization process and producing the
1°serie of products. 






Bimp'Air is the first high pressure refillable
miniaturized system which can deliver 50bar/725psi  performances to manage
the air in a nomadic and more than ever comfortable way. 
Today, we offer an innovative solution as an accessory
for bikes but this is only the first step!
Imagine... integrating our technology into a bike to
make the bike of the future, creating the air it needs and automatically
regulating the pressure... That could be on any bike tomorrow.





Apart from the bike market, we found numerous other
applications where the high pressure mini compressor and its separate and
refillable reserve of air can serve. We already found applications for motorcycles, scooters, cars, wheelchairs, for
gardening, DIY, or in the mechanical industry... and there is a lot more to imagine. 
We enjoy dreaming ... but we are convinced that a lot
of projects will follow to extend our technology and that Bimp'Air will
definitely become a new way to manage the Air!






If you love cycling but don’t want to think about
inflation constraints anymore, 
If you see Bimp’Air as an eco-friendly product and a breakthrough
technology, 
If you are looking for performances and simplicity to
enjoy your passion, 
Help us contributing to our Project!
After more than 3 years developing Bimp’Air
innovation, we now need You to go out and make it real. 
Help us achieving our goals, to strengthen our brand
and launch Bimp’Air in the international bike market. 
We created it for you with hard work and great enthusiasm
and hope to continue innovating to bring high pressure technology to the public!
Be part of our story!
Get a contribution : Bimp'Air goodies, Outfits or Products or simply share this page to your friends! 


We thank you very much for your attention to our Project and hope you will join our community. Do not hesitate to contact us for any question. 


Our company is based in Béziers, South of France and we are a six-person
team actively working together to make all of this possible! Our
complementarity brings the conditions for innovation and performance in a
spirit of sharing and contribution.

story:
_________________________________________________________________________

Missed out on pre-ordering your Reveal? Don't worry! Click here to sign up for our mailing list and find out how you can get yours.

_________________________________________________________________________



Reveal is a wearable device that will measure and track anxiety in real time to:

Help you better understand behaviour
Provide insight into care
Notify you of an oncoming meltdown
Use as a tool for self regulation  

This shockproof, waterproof and very durable wearable is being designed to be small enough for kids and comfortable enough for individuals with sensory issues. 

DESIGN  -  TEAM  -  PRESS  -  FAQs  -  HOW IT WORKS  - ORDER 

 People with Anxiety
Parents
Caregivers
Clinicians & OTs
Teachers and EAs 


Links to recent articles: Forbes - Digital Trends - The Mighty - CKNW



We're putting a lot of work into how Reveal will look and feel, constantly making progress and improving. We have spoken to hundreds of parents, caregivers, and care experts to help us understand how to design a band that will work best. 
 

We have been working directly with families since the beginning and know how important this is to you. We know it’s hard to wait, but we promise to work as hard as we can to make this happen and we hope it will be worth the wait!

We understand the importance of providing quantified care that is reliable, accurate, and effective. We want to provide care that is reflective of every individual’s uniqueness.

That being said, Reveal will be a complicated machine. The device requires hardware, software, and data analytics. All of this will interact with you through a simple and clear interface, and a comfortable, durable form factor. And that’s not going to be easy.

We still have a lot to do, from choosing the final material, designing the clasp, to making sure the readings are accurate.

We are working tirelessly to bring all of these pieces together. We are finalizing our app and form factor prototypes by engaging directly with families so we can better understand how to make Reveal right for you.

Our development team is hard at work and focused on optimizing our machine-learning algorithm and building out the app, and we are working on a licensing agreement with the top developer of physiological measurement hardware.

So far, we have been operating on a shoestring budget and still have made significant progress. The next step is to go from a working prototype to testing it and making sure it does exactly what it needs. After that, we need to go through manufacturing and then finally the distribution, which means Reveal in your hands.

We have support from experienced mentors who are helping us guide the development of Reveal. We are involved in the Coast Capital Savings Innovation Hub and the Next36 Accelerator to help us ensure that the transition from concept to finish product happens smoothly.

We are working to confirm our entire supply chain by the end of 2016. Our goal is to ship Reveal Version 1.0 to you by May of 2017.





Our body’s nervous system automatically responds to physical, emotional, and cognitive stressors. For example, knowing you have a big test coming up, or hearing a loud noise can evoke nervous system reactions.

The autonomic nervous system responds to these stressors by activating the sympathetic nervous system, which results in a number of physiological and behavioural changes.

Reveal will measure and track a combination of the three leading physiological indicators of changes in anxiety as a result of these stressors.

These indicators are:

So, how exactly does this work?

When alerted, your sympathetic nervous system can activate certain sweat glands, resulting in “emotional sweat”. Electrodermal activity is a measure of change in skin conductance as a result of this “emotional sweat”. We will measure EDA through small electrical changes in the skin using two dry electrodes - a painless way of measuring EDA.

Your sympathetic nervous system also affects your circulatory system. When alerted by external stress, your heart rate will increase, and the diameter of your blood vessels will decrease. We can measure heart rate by shining a light on the skin and measuring the change in the light reflected as the blood pumps in and out of peripheral arteries. We can indirectly measure changes in blood vessel diameter by observing changes in skin temperature, which are tracked with a sensitive thermistor.

All of these sensors will be powered by a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery.

Reveal will identify the physiological patterns that relate to anxiety to give you more insight into what is happening internally.

Kushki et. al. (2013). Investigating the Autonomic Nervous System Response to Anxiety in Children with Autism Spectrum Disorders. PLoS ONE 8(4)

Fletcher et. al. (2010). iCalm: Wearable Sensor and Network Architecture for Wirelessly Communicating and Logging Autonomic Activity. IEEE Transactions on Information Technology in Biomedicine, Vol. 14(2)

Poh et. al. (2010). A Wearable Sensor for Unobtrusive, Long-Term Assessment of Electrodermal Activity. IEEE Transaction on Biomedical Engineering, Vol. 57(5)

Liu et. al. (2008). Physiology-based affect recognition for computer-assisted intervention of children with Autism Spectrum Disorder. International Journal of Human-Computer Studies, 66.



Reveal will go beyond physiological tracking - we are working with families to help us identify how to best track other types of behaviours, activities, and other useful information to provide a complete and individualized profile to better understand your child.

Is Reveal made just for autism?

Reveal is not limited to ASDs. We're starting with the autism community to focus our initial design and data collection efforts. Once we get the wearable working well for this community we would love to use it for the variety of other purposes for which it could help provide insights. Other possible applications can include measuring stress for PTSD, generalized anxiety disorders, or for people with dementia.

Can Reveal work without the Reveal + subscription?

Yes, we will have a free version of the app available so that you can use Reveal at no monthly cost. The unlimited version will be available for only 9.99$/mo.

Who can use Reveal?

Right now, we’re designing Reveal for children with an ASD, their parents, caregivers and behavioural consultants because they are the ones already tracking and gathering the data we need to make Reveal most effective. That being said, Reveal will ultimately be used for self-regulation for autistic children, teenagers, and adults alike.  In the long term, we want this to be available to all those who need it, but we need to start in the right place.


How will Reveal help me identify what triggers anxiety for me/my child?

Identifying triggers of anxiety is a complicated process. We are starting this process in our current study by measuring physiological data and matching the recorded patterns to observed behaviours.

When Reveal becomes available, you will be able to go onto the app and tell it what’s happening in real time. As you are recording, you can go into the app and let it know where you are/what you’re doing, and provide details of the situation. Is your child laughing? Playing? Screaming?  What happened before? What is happening as a result? This way when you look back at the data, you will have access to all this information.

But, as you use Reveal, it will get to know you and get smarter. So the next time it notices anxiety levels rise distinctly above the baseline you will get a notification with a simple prompt such as, “hey, I just noticed a spike, what’s up?” This will allow you to notice and contextualize each rise in anxiety the moment it happens.

Are you doing trials for Reveal? Can I/my child participate?

Yes, we are conducting trials. The eligibility requirements for the current study are as follows:

  • Must be located in the lower mainland of British Columbia, Canada.

  • Must have an ASD diagnosis

  • Must not taking medication for anxiety regulation. Send a message to igg@awakelabs.com if you meet the above criteria. If you are interested in being considered for future studies, sign up for our mailing list through www.awakelabs.com

Why, “autistic person” rather than “person with autism” or “person with an ASD”?

We understand that this is a recurring topic of debate and in fact, we started this campaign using person first language. Since the launch we’ve received a number of emails from autistic individuals asking us about our choice in language and in light of these, we have changed it. We are constantly learning new things and are actively working to be the best possible allies to the community so if you have a concern please speak up!


For those who are a bit more curious, here are some fantastic blogs that have delved a little bit further into this discussion:

https://crackedmirrorinshalott.wordpress.com/2013/04/12/autistic-allistic-neurodiverse-and-neurotypical-say-what/

http://www.autistichoya.com/2011/08/significance-of-semantics-person-first.html

Is the device communicating only with the app or does it give any physical response directly?

Currently it will be communicating only with the app.  As we continue to develop Reveal as a tool for self-regulation, we will have a feature that gives the wearer an indication of heightened anxiety. This functionality will not be included in the first version of Reveal.

Is this device being marketed in different channels other than autism?

Currently, no. We want to focus first on building this for the autistic community. Once it is working well,  we plan on scaling to other markets, such as dementia, PTSD and general anxiety.

Is there currently any testing being done in schools?

Not specifically. A few trials have taken place with a child’s EA at school as it was the location indicated by certain participants to be the most familiar and comfortable to conduct the trials. So far, none of the testing has been specific to Reveal’s use in a school setting.

Are there any plans to expand capability to include GPS?

Yes we will investigate the feasibility integrating GPS capabilities as it is a request we have gotten many times.

How does the device distinguish between excited and anxious as the two are physiologically very similar?

Through the app you will be able to tag data with contextual information (example: is your child laughing or crying? Running and happy stimming, or quiet and withdrawn?) in order to help distinguish between the two. As Reveal gets more sophisticated and learns each individual user's patterns over time, it could differentiate between the two states.

Do you see this device being useful as a self-regulation tool?

Yes definitely! Our ultimate goal is for this to be a tool for self regulation and to promote independence.

Will you be able to use autism funding to purchase the device?

This is something we are working on. We are looking to make Reveal as accessible as possible to those who need it. If you have any suggestions, contacts or if your country/state has any specific requirements please let us know!


When an event occurs, do you have to be trained how to read it or how to use the app?

We are designing it to be as simple and as comprehensible as possible. We will also provide access to tutorials and out-of-box instructions to teach you how to use some of the basic functions.


What technology is currently being used in the field?


Some behavioural consultants use things like Fitbits and Mios to help track anxiety. These products were not designed to be used for these purposes and tend to break easily. They also don’t provide an accurate quantified measure of anxiety using multiple physiological indicators - they simply use heart rate. They are a good start, but there is still a long way to go, which is why we are developing Reveal.


What technology is currently being used in the field?


Some behavioural consultants use things like Fitbits and Mios to help track anxiety. These products were not designed to be used for these purposes and tend to break easily. They also don’t provide an accurate quantified measure of anxiety using multiple physiological indicators - they simply use heart rate. They are a good start, but there is still a long way to go, which is why we are developing Reveal.

story:
WHY SmartProbe!


GAIN TOTAL PEACE OF MIND

 WITH SMART PROBES TEMPERATURE

MONITORING SYSTEM

  • Smart Probes monitoring system gives you comprehensive temperature history and alert log reports in seconds, minutes or hours from anywhere in the world.
  • Use your smart phone, Tablet, or PC to monitor your business temperatures.
  • Smart Probes wireless temperature monitoring continuously sends temperature records 24 hours a day, 7 days a week at your designated intervals direct to your PC or our server.
  • Data is collected without visiting a single fridge.
  • Real time alerts are sent via PC, text message or email alerts day & night.
  • Smart Probes Wireless Temperature Monitoring System graphs your cold rooms, refrigerators, hot cupboards, vaccine fridges and other cold storage appliances where they are continuously monitored via your PC to our server.
  • For larger sites such as hotels, supermarkets, clubs and hospitals with food service or medical facilities across a numbers of floors, data is brought back from a wireless network in each area across the LAN network.


Home Foodie Fanatics Special Perk  $380.00

Have a smart System for home for the first time. Watch your Meat, Wine Cellar, Fridge, Freezers etc.,  or just let it tell you when your family roast is ready .
You Get::
Smart Probe Master Probe
Smart Probe Temperature Probe
One 600mm Remote plug in sensor ( monitor your cooking and Cooling)
Smart Probe Temperature Food Spike Sensor
Smart Probe Program
On Line Monitoring for 1 year
On Line Support for 1 year
Monitor all this on your phone or tablet or PC 24/7
Get Emails when you set your temps





Our Company

Wireless Monitoring of Your Equipment 24 hours a day

Director Adam Everingham has been a chef in the food industry since 1979 and has worked in and owned some of Sydney's best Restaurants as well as working in fresh food distribution.
Throughout these vast years of experience Adam saw a need for a better and more efficient way of monitoring temperatures, which started  him on a personal mission to set up a fool proof system to alleviate the constant disturbance of having to stop and write down temperatures while you are busy in the workplace.

He linked up with a highly recognised Electronic Engineer, who has extensive knowledge in the medical industry.

After thousands of man hours we have a system that can accommodate small surgeries & restaurants, to large clubs, hotels & hospitals, as well as monitor all devices in  large supermarket chains with separate manager logins .  One person can monitor as many outlets as needed from one PC or Phone.

OUR NEW PHONE APP....MONITOR TEMPERATURES ON YOUR SMART PHONE


SAVE TIME AND MONEY ON STAFF COSTS

Having a staff member every 2 or 4 hours manually testing and logging the temperature of a fridge or freezer is time consuming and is open to human error.  Smart Probe alleviates this by automatically recording temperatures.

Smart Probes temperatures are automatically logged, and once they are logged they are unable to be tampered with.

Your Auditor can have remote access to your temperature log which also saves time and money.

By being alerted via email or text of temperature spikes it allows you time to relocate stock before spoilage occurs which often saves thousands of dollars

Having recorded temperatures which can't be tampered with shows the necessary due diligence if someone gets a food borne illness.




SAVING MONEY WITH SMART PROBE DIAGNOSTICS

Temperature alerts are highlighted on your PC as they occur.

Where temperatures reach a critical point, an alert will be relayed by text message to your phone or email to nominated preset team members.

Reacting promptly means food or medical vaccines can be saved by moving it elsewhere or by using it immediately. What is the value of the food you are storing?

You can collect and graph data that helps you save money and monitor possible costly breakdowns. Monitor doors left open from temperature spikes also highlights wasted energy, as well as out of hours temperature spikes relayed to your Smartphone or Email.



PROTECTING YOUR NAME AND REPUTATION

Smart Probes Wireless Temperature Monitoring gives you fully encrypted temperature history and alert log reports in a graph form or line form.

Monitor multiple probes from your PC or Smart Phone from one site or multiple sites around the world. Once generated the temperatures cannot be altered, which represents real evidence of due diligence.

Could you fully rely on your manual records if action was taken against you? Live access to your sites temperatures offers peace of mind knowing that your policies on temperature compliance are being met.

No more surprises or last minute worries when it's time for the monthly or annual audit. Your auditor can also receive updates to his Smartphone if necessary which saves time & money.

SMART PROBE TEMPERATURE LOGS PAGE

See live readings at:  www.smartprobe.com.au

SMART PROBE IS FULLY CUSTOMIZED TO SUIT YOUR BUSINESS

You have full control over how often the temperature is to be logged, be it every 5 minutes or every 4 hours or anytime in between. These options are all available in your setup menu.

Temperature alarm levels are setup to meet your business requirements.

In the event that a temperature alarm occurs, Smart Probes server automatically notifies up to 3 email addresses and 3 mobile phones for immediate action to be taken.

Flexible set up enables email and text message alerts to be sent to the shift manager as well as upper managers or one central office.

Master and administrator users have access to the secure database using their own login and password , allowing quick and simple auditing of temperatures in your business.

Smart Probes temperature monitoring is suitable for businesses with one operator through to multiple stores.

Login access can be given to General Managers to monitor probes in each store under their own user login.

Larger corporations with national or international businesses with multiple probes in multiple locations can login and monitor all of their sites from anywhere in the world.

Remote auditing and reporting is quick and simple, with access to live temperature records will help you monitor your operations at any time.

Smart Probes monitors temperatures of all your sites centrally ensuring they are working to a company wide temperature management policy, streamlining audit and control procedures. Smart probe will contact you if a temperature does not read, which could be a warning of power down in your facility.

Smart probes multiple departments or sites are linked to a central server for instant access from anywhere in the world via logins and passwords. Our probes automatically record temperatures without human intervention, monitoring 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. Now that is peace of mind!

COMPLETED AND TESTED PCB


SMART PROBE ACCESSORIES

  • 1 or 2  metre sensor stainless wire - to monitor cooking or cooling processes
  • 1 metre sensor - Coolroom/freezer Room
  • Plug in Antenna - for out of the way places
  • Temperature Spike - for probing food products

 



SMART PROBE TEAM WITH JASON FROM SYDNEY FISH MARKETS



Other Ways You Can Help

If SmartProbe is not for you - maybe you have family and friends or business associates who can make a good use of it? Please share on your Facebook, tweet on Twitter, and plus on Google+ - every share is heartily appreciated! You can share through links at the top this page

Products
  • Smart Probe Home Page
  • Smart Probe Food Spike with monitoring capabilities

Optional extras

  • 2 x metre plug in probe sensor ( liquid up to 175 degrees )
  • 1 x metre  plug in probe sensor ( Coolroom or Freezer room )
  •  433MH Antenna
  • Android Tablet

Contact

  • AUSTRALIA                                                                                    Newington NSW                                                                                                             2127 Sydney  Australia
