 Data is collected without visiting a single fridge. 

Real
 time alerts are sent via PC, text message or email alerts day & night. 

 Smart Probes Wireless Temperature Monitoring System graphs your cold 
rooms, refrigerators, hot cupboards, vaccine fridges and other cold 
storage appliances where they are continuously monitored via your PC to 
our server.
For larger sites such as hotels, supermarkets, clubs and 
hospitals with food service or medical facilities across a numbers of 
floors, data is brought back from a wireless network in each area across
 the LAN network.

Home Foodie Fanatics Special Perk  $380.00
Have a smart System for home for the first time. Watch your Meat, Wine Cellar, Fridge, Freezers etc.,  or just let it tell you when your family roast is ready .You Get::Smart Probe Master ProbeSmart Probe Temperature ProbeOne 600mm Remote plug in sensor ( monitor your cooking and Cooling)Smart Probe Temperature Food Spike SensorSmart Probe ProgramOn Line Monitoring for 1 yearOn Line Support for 1 yearMonitor all this on your phone or tablet or PC 24/7Get Emails when you set your temps








 


  


Our Company
Wireless Monitoring of Your Equipment 24 hours a day

Director Adam Everingham has been a chef in the food industry since 1979 and has worked in and owned some of Sydney's best Restaurants as well as working in fresh food distribution.Throughout these vast years of experience Adam saw a need for a better and more efficient way of monitoring temperatures, which started  him on a personal mission to set up a fool proof system to alleviate the constant disturbance of having to stop and write down temperatures while you are busy in the workplace. He linked up with a highly recognised Electronic Engineer, who has extensive knowledge in the medical industry.After thousands of man hours we have a system that can accommodate small surgeries & restaurants, to large clubs, hotels & hospitals, as well as monitor all devices in  large supermarket chains with separate manager logins .  One person can monitor as many outlets as needed from one PC or Phone.OUR NEW PHONE APP....MONITOR TEMPERATURES ON YOUR SMART PHONE
SAVE TIME AND MONEY ON STAFF COSTS

 Having a 
staff member every 2 or 4 hours manually testing and logging the 
temperature of a fridge or freezer is time consuming and is open to human error.  Smart Probe alleviates this by automatically recording temperatures.
Smart Probes temperatures are automatically logged, and once they are logged they are unable to be tampered with.
Your Auditor can have remote access to your temperature log which also saves time and money.
By being alerted via email or text of temperature spikes it allows you time to relocate stock before spoilage occurs which often saves thousands of dollars
Having recorded temperatures which can't be tampered with shows the necessary due diligence if someone 
gets a food borne illness.



SAVING MONEY WITH SMART PROBE DIAGNOSTICS

Temperature alerts are highlighted on your PC as they occur. 
Where temperatures reach a critical point, an alert will be relayed by text message to your phone or email to
 nominated preset team members. 
Reacting promptly means food or medical vaccines can be saved by 
moving it elsewhere or by using it immediately. What is the value of the
 food you are storing?

You can collect and graph data that helps you save money and monitor 
possible costly breakdowns. Monitor doors left open from temperature 
spikes also highlights wasted energy, as well as out of hours 
temperature spikes relayed to your Smartphone or Email.









PROTECTING YOUR NAME AND REPUTATION

Smart Probes Wireless Temperature Monitoring gives you fully 
encrypted temperature history and alert log reports in a graph form or 
line form. 
Monitor multiple probes from your PC or 
Smart Phone from one site or multiple sites around the world. Once generated 
the temperatures cannot be altered, which represents real evidence of due diligence.

Could you fully rely on your manual records if action was taken against 
you? Live access to your sites temperatures offers peace of 
mind knowing that your policies on temperature compliance are being met.

 No more surprises or last minute worries when it's time for the monthly
 or annual audit. Your auditor can also receive updates to his Smartphone if
 necessary which saves time & money.
SMART PROBE TEMPERATURE LOGS PAGE


See live readings at:  www.smartprobe.com.auSMART PROBE IS FULLY CUSTOMIZED TO SUIT YOUR BUSINESS
You have full control over how often the temperature is to be logged, be it every 5 minutes or every 4 hours or anytime in between. These options are all available in your setup menu.
Temperature alarm levels are setup to meet your business requirements.
In the event that a temperature alarm occurs, Smart Probes server 
automatically notifies up to 3 email addresses and 3 mobile phones for 
immediate action to be taken. 
Flexible set up enables email and text message alerts to be sent 
to the shift manager as well as upper managers or one central office. 
Master and administrator users have access to the secure database 
using their own login and password , allowing quick and simple auditing 
of temperatures in your business.
Smart Probes temperature monitoring is suitable for businesses with 
one operator through to multiple stores.
Login access can be given to General Managers to monitor probes in each store under their own user login. 
 Larger corporations with national or international businesses with multiple probes in multiple locations can login and monitor all of their sites from anywhere in the world.
Remote auditing and reporting is quick and simple, with access to 
live temperature records will help you monitor your operations at any 
time.
Smart Probes monitors 
temperatures of all your sites centrally ensuring they are working to a
 company wide temperature management policy, streamlining audit and 
control procedures. Smart probe will contact you if a temperature does not read, 
which could be a warning of power down in your facility.
Smart probes multiple departments or sites are linked to a central 
server for instant access from anywhere in the world via logins and 
passwords. Our probes automatically record temperatures without human 
intervention, monitoring 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. Now that is peace of mind!

COMPLETED AND TESTED PCB 



SMART PROBE ACCESSORIES

1 or 2  metre sensor stainless wire - to monitor cooking or cooling processes
1 metre sensor - Coolroom/freezer Room 

Plug in Antenna - for out of the way places
Temperature Spike - for probing food products

 
 

SMART PROBE TEAM WITH JASON FROM SYDNEY FISH MARKETS






Other Ways You Can Help
If SmartProbe is not for
you - maybe you have family and friends or business associates who can make a good use of it? Please
share on your Facebook, tweet on Twitter, and plus on Google+ - every share is
heartily appreciated! You can share through links at the top this page 





 
 

 






Products


Smart Probe Home Page

Smart Probe Food Spike with monitoring capabilities



Optional extras


2 x metre plug in probe sensor ( liquid up to 175 degrees ) 

1 x metre  plug in probe sensor ( Coolroom or Freezer room )

 433MH Antenna

Android Tablet



Contact


AUSTRALIA                                                                                    Newington NSW                                                                                                             2127 Sydney  Australia

story:
Short Summary


             Hi! Im Angelo Batts co-founder of BROOMYS. Washington, DC native.Before BROOMYS, I worked at some of the world's most admired brands such as STARBUCKS COFFEE CO, Apple Inc (Apple Store), WELLS FARGO and J.CREW. With over 5 years of retail experience, I've learned how to exhibit world class customer service.I've been cleaning since early childhood and studied floor cleaning under my Dad who operated his own carpet cleaning and floor care business.
           I once wanted to be a shoe designer- meeting the iconic Ralph Lauren on two occasions in New York City at the tender age of 19. Ralph helped me to realize that I needed business partners which I did not have at the time of fulfilling my dreams as a shoe designer. After working in Georgetown Washington, DC at Abercrombie & Fitch and the Apple Store-I met DeAndre Howard at RUGBY RALPH LAUREN (CO-founder of BROOMYS.) He gave me the idea of starting a cleaning business and so we did. I never thought that I would be following in my dads foot steps. 

             April of 2010,  I lost my dad to lung cancer along with my inspiration to design shoes. I needed something that I could be passionate about again-BROOMYS. I wanted to change the home cleaning business like never before, offering the best cleaning and organizing services period! After peeling through the pages of fashion magazines at Barnes & Noble, inspiration started to bloom again. I thought about having beautiful cleaning ads with models. I googled the photographers mentioned in the magazines and I discovered that they aren't just any photographers, they're fashion photographers. I knew that a photo-shoot that was similar to designer magazine ads would cost several thousand dollars. So I came to Indiegogo.



Photograph By: Angelo Batts
              As a former employee at the Apple store, I know that people love beautiful products and great services. Some companies design gorgeous technology, software, homes, clothing and cars-we design clean, in homes. So its important that we not only offer great cleaning & organizing services, but we also offer beautiful, eye catching advertising to individuals interested in our services.
      We're not the average cleaning company. So we need your help in bringing something extraordinary to the way that people choose and use cleaning/organizing services-in style.

  • You truly get to be apart of something epic here! Yes! You can say that you helped participate in the launch of a new household name-literally! But more importantly, you will help with getting BROOMYS into more homes to clean/organize and change lives. A lot of people don't realize the importance of a clean home, that's where you come in.






         A Professional Fashion magazine quality photo-shoot with  local Fashion Photographer Monica True includes model makeup/hair and styling. This will give us the look that you see from your favorite designer brands. Its all about packaging people!
                            
  • BROOMYS is offering the best custom-home cleaning/organizing to contributors at a discounted rate for ($1) ($5) ($10) ($20)  ($25) ($50) ($100) ($250) ($500) contributions) Offer applies for DMV(Washington, DC Maryland Virginia) residents.
  • If you're not a local resident, we will send you a Thank You! card along with FaceTime or Skype chats with BROOMYS founders.
  • Also, all that contribute will be featured on our credits page by name.
  • Again the funds will go towards the photo-shoot models/makeup/hair

  • As you can imagine, our services are much needed all over the DMV area. Each contributor will get a cleaning or organizing service of their choice.
  • There are thousands of cleaning companies, that offer cleaning services. With your help, we can stand out from the bunch with a defined image. No one wants another cleaning lady, they want BROOMYS!

  • We've been on a tough road with BROOMYS in the past two years-some Yeses and a lot of No's . Its not easy starting or operating a business, its like having a new baby. A business needs special undivided attention and nurturing. It gets expensive too. So we plan to use a clean brand image as power to generate more business which in turn will help us to appeal to the best customers. Meanwhile, we strive for excellence by getting trained and certified in the cleaning industry. Also continuing to improve the overall customer experience. The risk is getting individuals to accept our image as a cleaning company. Our goal is to be unexpected and unpredictable. No other cleaning company is doing what we're doing. 

  • If you're not related to uncle Scrooge or Richie Rich and don't have the moneybags to help us out, spread the word! facebook, twitter, instagram, skype, Facetime your family friends cats and dogs! We would greatly appreciate it!
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

That's all to it!

story:
The Committee of Brynaman Lido are determined to get our pool reopened and back in action for the whole community.  Our vision is to convert the pool to a natural swimming pool which will be kinder to the environment and your skin, and more cost-efficient to maintain.  Please see the above example of a similar pool in Germany.

Our miner forefathers paid for and constructed the pool with their own money; let's pay tribute to them by contributing to the costs of refurbishing the pool.  This is our community pool for YOU and YOUR children - please help support it in any way that you can.

Thank you very much / Diolch yn fawr.

story:
San Jacinto Amilpas is a small village in Mexico. in the state of Oaxaca. The village is poor, but has lots of spirit.  It has a boys and girls' soccer team (6 to 9 year olds)  which plays in the local league and, as their dedicated coach Armando says, last month won against a team which had "complete soccer gear, even shoes." There are 15 boys and girls who turn up for practice every Monday and the game on Saturday.    Armando says that this isn't  just about football, but about the kids learning "that if you work hard, together, with perseverance, dedication and sacrifice, you can get where you want."

Armando is a waiter who works 12 hours a day, 6 days a week as well as making and selling pizzas from his kitchen on his day off. In his spare time he coaches SJA, San Jacinto Amilpas kids' soccer team. He pays for any expenses they have. They're wearing borrowed shirts and running shoes. Sometimes a kid will turn up with no shoes at all.

I'm a Canadian tourist who came by the village to take some photographs and got hooked on their enthusiasm and spirit and how with so little, they try so hard.

Team shirts would give the children a sense of pride and identity. Soccer shoes would help too.

Shirts cost about $89CAD each, shorts another $20CAD and football boots (soccer shoes) another $50. I have a deal with a printer to put their team name on for $5 a shirt. So I'm asking for $2460 CAD (less than $2000USD) to make a team and a village of supporters very happy and proud.

story:
Who We Are and Why We're Here


eMedica is a young IT company of dedicated engineers and business professionals who came together to create a personal health record (PHR) platform that is designed to empower patients everywhere to be in control of their own medical and health records.

Our focus is squarely fixed on providing the average person with the means of creating, organizing, and securely transporting their own personal health record (or the personal health record of someone in their care). A personal health record (PHR) is the complete collection of health and medical records maintained by the patient themself - as opposed to the various medical records held on the patient’s behalf at doctors’ offices or other care facilities.

Your personal health record is “Your health in Your hands”.

eMedica was formed to develop PHR technology that is easy to use and NOT stored on the “Cloud”. We also offer related services such as assisting with medical records collection, document scanning, and helping clients to assemble their own PHR.

With interest growing from the general population to manage their own health and well-being, personal ownership of health records is becoming the norm both in North America and around the world. This is in keeping with other advancements in technology, especially in health IT so that, in the near future, we believe everyone will own and maintain some form of personal health record. This is useful for all, and especially for those individuals with chronic conditions, complicated medical histories, travellers and holidaymakers, and those who work in high-risk areas of employment. A PHR can be incredibly valuable in the event of a medical emergency.

The goal of this campaign is to combine eMedica's existing personal health record technology with the power and convenience of modern smartphones and tablets so that we can create the most helpful, and easy-to-use personal health record mobile app out there.


What We Need & What You Get


We would like to raise $75,000 to build the personal health record mobile app that puts your medical record and other health information at your fingertips and in your control.

With a PHR mobile app you can build and maintain your own PHR - or the PHR of someone in your care (children, grandparents, spouse, etc.) Quickly capture prescription information by taking a picture of the bottle’s label, or scan medical documents using your phone or tablet and have those documents automatically attach to your PHR. And, any information collected using the mobile app will automatically synchronize with your eMedica Card (see later for details).

The mobile app will be available as a free download and will support both iOS (iPhone and iPad) and Android devices. To make full use of the app, an eMedica account is required and this will be provided with each campaign contribution.

While we have our own ideas about how the app should look and work, we’d love to hear your ideas about how we can make it better. eMedica’s existing PHR Card application (for PC and laptop computers) was significantly improved by the feedback we received from our beta testers. Many suggestions we received were incorporated into the PC App, and we promise to do it again as we develop our PHR mobile app. Please help us advance personal health record technology by contributing to our campaign and, for every donation of $50 or more, we’ll immediately send you an eMedica Card with pre-loaded PHR app for PC's and laptops (Windows, Mac, and Linux). Use it to create your own PHR today and, once the new mobile app is released, you’ll receive a copy of that as well (projected release timeframe is early to mid 2016).

Even if we don’t reach our $75,000 campaign goal, you’ll still receive an eMedica PHR Card and the eMedica mobile app may still be developed at a later time.


The Current eMedica Card and Personal Health Record App for PC's and Laptops


See below to view the eMedica Card you'll receive right away for donating to our campaign! Just plug it in to any PC or laptop using its flip out USB connector.


The software runs directly off of the eMedica Card, and your personal health information is stored securely in encrypted form on the card. You can take all your important health and medical information with you wherever you go - especially when travelling out of province or country. The credit card sized eMedica Card easily fits into any wallet or purse.


A select sample of features:


Your Emergency Summary Report always available


Secure login & encrypted data


Your data is not stored on the cloud


Manage care team and other contacts


We collect & scan your medical records*


Track prescriptions & medications


Keep a record of immunizations


Maintain your medical history


Print patient summary reports

And much more!
Click here to see all features in a new window

*Medical records collection is an optional add-on service

eMedica PHR Cards are colourfully branded and designed to stand out to First Responders and Hospital Staff. In case of emergency, or if otherwise incapacitated, each card has a succinct Emergency Medical Summary Report file that is not encrypted and thus easily available to anyone who finds your Card.



Personal Health Record Mobile App


The goal of this campaign is to build a powerful and easy-to-use PHR mobile app. It will combine the best features of our existing eMedica Card app (for PC's and laptops) with the added power and convenience of smartphone technology.

With eMedica's mobile app your important health and medical information is always on your phone. From scanning in new documents and prescriptions to finding the medical information you need, the mobile app has been designed to make managing your personal health record simple.

The PHR mobile app will include:

  • Support for Android and iOS devices (smartphones and tablets)
  • Built-in prescription label scanner saving you time entering prescription information by simply scanning the bottle's label instead using the camera on your mobile device.

  • Built-in document scanner allowing you to scan and automatically attach medical documents to your personal health record.

  • View and edit your personal health record from anywhere


  • A constantly updated Emergency Medical Summary Report


Manage all areas of your personal health record including:

  • Patient Summary
  • Emergency Medical Summary
  • Important Contacts
  • Current Care Team
  • Current Medical Conditions
  • Allergies & Sensitivities
  • Prescriptions & Medications
  • Medical Insurance
  • Medical History
  • Immunizations
  • Travel History
  • Advance Directives



  • An optional, automatic backup service is available so that, if you ever lose your smartphone or tablet, recovering your data is a snap.


  • Need a hand collecting your medical records? eMedica is here to help. We offer an optional medical records collection service.


Other features we're considering for the app:

  • Scan in contacts from business cards

Let us know what you want to see in the app and we'll do our best to make it happen! The existing PHR Card app for PC's and laptops was significantly improved by input from doctors and patients alike.


The Plan


The eMedica team has worked hard to produce a secure & portable PHR solution for patients everywhere. Now we're looking to build on our earlier successes to bring you a PHR mobile app for Android and iOS mobile devices. Below is a timeline of what we've accomplished and the projected schedule going forward.


Jan - Apr 2015 - Production release of eMedica’s PHR Card app for PCs and laptops (Complete)

May - Aug 2015 - Design Phase 1 of the PHR mobile app for Android and iOS devices (Complete)

Aug - Nov 2015 - Design Phase 2 of the PHR mobile app incorporating campaign donor input

Nov 2015 - Apr 2016 - Implement and test the proposed design

Late Jan 2016 - Milestone: Alpha release of the PHR mobile app

Early Mar 2016 - Milestone: Beta release of the PHR mobile app

Late Apr 2016 - Milestone: Production release of the PHR mobile app


The Impact


eMedica is poised to advance personal health record technology for patients everywhere and our aim is to make it as easy, convenient and powerful as possible. But we need your help to get there! Everyone legally owns their own health and medical record information, but how do you get it? Where do you put it once you have a copy of it? How do you keep it all organized? How do you store it securely? And how can you take it with you when on the move?

We’ve already addressed these questions with the existing eMedica Card application. Now we’re looking to expand on our past successes and utilize the power and convenience of mobile devices. Please help us make this happen by contributing to our campaign, and get started today on your own eMedica PHR Card app for PCs and laptops. Later, you’ll receive a copy of the new mobile app as soon as it becomes available (expected release: early to mid 2016).


Risks & Challenges


The new PHR mobile app brings together existing technologies and integrates them for PHR management in a unique and useful way. However, by utilizing proven existing technologies (such as optical character recognition, document scanning, image processing, etc.), and combining them with eMedica’s existing PHR Card app, the technical risks posed in undertaking this project have been minimized. Three issues that affect almost every new development project are time, money and scope (the range of selected features). We intend to strictly limit the scope of this project to the features promised in this campaign plus those features selected from the feedback we receive from you. Thereafter, the challenge becomes staying within budget and delivering on time and eMedica’s development and management teams already achieved this in developing our PHR Card app. We have the experience, the track record and, with your help, we intend to do it again!


Other Ways You Can Help


If you’re not able to contribute, that’s OK, but we’re still interested in hearing what you have to say! Please e-mail us any time at info@emedicatech.com with your suggestions and/or feedback.


Our Community Commitment to Youth


Currently, eMedica is developing a program for donating eMedica Cards to local sporting associations and teams. The goal is to provide young athletes with a means of tracking and recording details of any injuries, treatment or related therapies. As a result of sports injuries, medical conditions frequently occur later in life and having the history readily at hand, complete with medications prescribed, X-rays, MRI scan data, etc., can play an important role in assisting with an accurate diagnosis later. At any time, team members can access their full medical history on their eMedica PHR Card and this can be invaluable information if one is injured in another province, state or country. Let us know if you have a team we can help.


Thank You!


Our team at eMedica sincerely thanks you for your contribution and/or suggestions, both of which are very important to us. Without you, we will not be able to complete our project in a timely manner and get it tested and market ready. Using leading edge technology, we intend to put all eMedica clients in control of a very important aspect of their life - their personal health record. And to do so knowing that the privacy and protection of their personal health data is our #1 priority.

We are truly committed to putting “Your health in Your hands”.

We would like to raise $75,000 to build the personal health record mobile app that puts your medical record and other 
health information at your fingertips and in your control.
With a PHR mobile app you can build and maintain your own PHR - or the PHR of someone in your care (children, grandparents, spouse, etc.) Quickly capture prescription information by taking a picture of the bottle’s label, or scan medical documents using your phone or tablet 
and have those documents automatically attach to your PHR.  And, any information collected using the mobile app will automatically synchronize 
with your eMedica Card (see later for details).
The mobile app will be available as a free download and will support both iOS (iPhone and iPad) and Android devices. To make full use of the app, 
an eMedica account is required and this will be provided with each campaign contribution.
While we have our own ideas about how the app should look and work, we’d love to hear your ideas about how we can make it better. eMedica’s 
existing PHR Card application (for PC and laptop computers) was significantly improved by the feedback we received from our beta testers. 
Many suggestions we received were incorporated into the PC App, and we promise to do it again as we develop our PHR mobile app.  Please help us 
advance personal health record technology by contributing to our campaign and, for every donation of $50 or more, we’ll immediately send you an eMedica 
Card with pre-loaded PHR app for PC's and laptops (Windows, Mac, and Linux). Use it to create your own PHR today and, once the new mobile app is 
released, you’ll receive a copy of that as well (projected release timeframe is early to mid 2016).
Even if we don’t reach our $75,000 campaign goal, you’ll still receive an eMedica PHR Card and the eMedica mobile app may still be developed at a later time.


The Current eMedica Card and Personal Health Record App for PC's and Laptops

See below to view the eMedica Card you'll receive right away for donating to our
campaign! Just plug it in to any PC or laptop using its flip out USB connector.


The software runs directly off of the eMedica Card, and your personal health information is stored securely in encrypted form on the card.  You can take
 all your important health and medical information with you wherever you go - especially when travelling out of province or country.  The credit card sized
 eMedica Card easily fits into any wallet or purse.


A select sample of features:







Your Emergency Summary Report always available









Secure login & encrypted data







Your data is not stored on the cloud









Manage care team and other contacts







We collect & scan your medical records*









Track prescriptions & medications







Keep a record of immunizations









Maintain your medical history







Print patient summary reports







				And much more!
Click here to see all features in a new window
*Medical records collection is an optional add-on service






eMedica PHR Cards are colourfully branded and designed to stand out to First Responders and Hospital Staff. In case of emergency, 
or if otherwise incapacitated, each card has a succinct Emergency Medical Summary Report file that is not encrypted and thus easily available to anyone who finds your Card.






Personal Health Record Mobile App

The goal of this campaign is to build a powerful and easy-to-use PHR mobile app. It will combine the best features of our existing eMedica Card app 
(for PC's and laptops)  with the added power and convenience of smartphone technology.
With eMedica's mobile app your important health and medical information is always on your phone.  From scanning in new documents and prescriptions 
to finding the medical information you need, the mobile app has been designed to make managing your personal health record simple.
The PHR mobile app will include:

Support for Android and iOS devices (smartphones and tablets)



Built-in prescription label scanner saving you time entering prescription information by simply scanning the bottle's label instead using the camera on your mobile device.















Built-in document scanner allowing you to scan and automatically attach medical documents to your personal health record.














View and edit your personal health record from anywhere








A constantly updated Emergency Medical Summary Report







Manage all areas of your personal health record including:






Patient Summary
Emergency Medical Summary
Important Contacts
Current Care Team
Current Medical Conditions
Allergies & Sensitivities




Prescriptions & Medications
Medical Insurance
Medical History
Immunizations
Travel History
Advance Directives
















An optional, automatic backup service is available so that, if you ever lose your smartphone or tablet, recovering your data is a snap.









Need a hand collecting your medical records? eMedica is here to help. We offer an optional medical records collection service.







Other features we're considering for the app:

Scan in contacts from business cards













Let us know what you want to see in the app and we'll do our best to make it happen! The existing PHR Card app for PC's and laptops was 
significantly improved by input from doctors and patients alike.


The Plan

The eMedica team has worked hard to produce a secure & portable PHR solution for patients everywhere. Now we're looking to build on our earlier
successes to bring you a PHR mobile app for Android and iOS mobile devices. Below is a timeline of what we've accomplished and the projected schedule going forward.






Jan - Apr 2015 - Production release of eMedica’s PHR Card app for PCs and laptops (Complete)
May - Aug 2015 - Design Phase 1 of the PHR mobile app for Android and iOS devices (Complete)
Aug - Nov 2015 - Design Phase 2 of the PHR mobile app incorporating campaign donor input
Nov 2015 - Apr 2016 - Implement and test the proposed design
Late Jan 2016 - Milestone: Alpha release of the PHR mobile app
Early Mar 2016 - Milestone: Beta release of the PHR mobile app
Late Apr 2016 - Milestone: Production release of the PHR mobile app


The Impact

eMedica is poised to advance personal health record technology for patients everywhere and our aim is to make it as easy, 
convenient and powerful as possible. But we need your help to get there! Everyone legally owns their own health and medical 
record information, but how do you get it?  Where do you put it once you have a copy of it? How do you keep it all organized? 
How do you store it securely? And how can you take it with you when on the move?
We’ve already addressed these questions with the existing eMedica Card application.  Now we’re looking to expand on our past 
successes and utilize the power and convenience of mobile devices.  Please help us make this happen by contributing to our campaign, 
and get started today on your own eMedica PHR Card app for PCs and laptops.  Later, you’ll receive a copy of the new mobile app as 
soon as it becomes available (expected release: early to mid 2016).


Risks & Challenges

The new PHR mobile app brings together existing technologies and integrates them for PHR management in a unique and useful way.  
However, by utilizing proven existing technologies (such as optical character recognition, document scanning, image processing, etc.), 
and combining them with eMedica’s existing PHR Card app, the technical risks posed in undertaking this project have been minimized.  
Three issues that affect almost every new development project are time, money and scope (the range of selected features).  We intend to 
strictly limit the scope of this project to the features promised in this campaign plus those features selected from the feedback we 
receive from you.  Thereafter, the challenge becomes staying within budget and delivering on time and eMedica’s development and 
management teams already achieved this in developing our PHR Card app.  We have the experience, the track record and, with your help, 
we intend to do it again!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you’re not able to contribute, that’s OK, but we’re still interested in hearing what you have to say! Please e-mail us any time 
at info@emedicatech.com with your suggestions and/or feedback.


Our Community Commitment to Youth

Currently, eMedica is developing a program for donating eMedica Cards to local sporting associations and teams. The goal is to provide 
young athletes with a means of tracking and recording details of any injuries, treatment or related therapies.  As a result of sports injuries, 
medical conditions frequently occur later in life and having the history readily at hand, complete with medications prescribed, X-rays, MRI scan 
data, etc., can play an important role in assisting with an accurate diagnosis later.  At any time, team members can access their full medical 
history on their eMedica PHR Card and this can be invaluable information if one is injured in another province, state or country. Let us know if you have a team we can help.


Thank You!

Our team at eMedica sincerely thanks you for your contribution and/or suggestions, both of which are very important to us. Without you, we 
will not be able to complete our project in a timely manner and get it tested and market ready. Using leading edge technology, we intend to put
 all eMedica clients in control of a very important aspect of their life - their personal health record. And to do so knowing that the privacy and
 protection of their personal health data is our #1 priority.
We are truly committed to putting “Your health in Your hands”.

story:
Premises Park is an indoor BMX Skate park in Tucson, Arizona established to fill Southern Arizona's need for BMX and Skateboard riders that is safe, fun, and drug free. Established in 2011 in a small it grew quickly, and one year later moved into a 10,000 square foot facility to better serve every riders' need.

As originally featured on Arizona Public Media, and WorldOne TV in 2010. We have come along way. Please watch the video here...
Arizona Public Media, PBS Story on Premises Park Opening.

First ramps built, Premises Park, 2011

Current 10,000 Square feet of Premises Park

Premises Park was created by a group of local riders in Tucson, AZ  who volunteered countless hours of work building to help it grow over the last 4 years. The city of Tucson, population 1.6 million plus, has not provided a city park facility for all BMX, skateboarders, and freestyle scooters. 

Kids enjoying some of the good times at Premises Park

Premises, volunteer built and supported, has fulfilled that need and has provided to riders a safe environment for all ages. This park is an alternative to riding areas like streets and public places where there is possible damage to property, exposure to drugs, or injury/loss of life. Our goal at Premises Park is to provide a non-bias experience to every rider. Whether they ride BMX, skate, blade, scooter, or whatever, we are all one here, and we all strive to bring the best out in ourselves, and others. 

Local youth dance group using Premises for a Hip Hop Showcase

Constant everyday use over the last 4 years has taken a toll on our wooden ramps. Struggling to make utility and rent payments we have fallen behind. We are looking to raise at least $2000 to help with some much needed re-sheeting of the park, and updating to better fit the needs of our growing bike, skateboard, and scooter population. 

With this remodel we can establish stronger beginner lesson programs with addition paid staff, and provide a greater, safer riding environment for many more years.

story:
Membership at Catalyst: A Sex Positive Place is NEVER required, but membership gets you awesome perks and helps to make great improvements! 

Some of the perks of membership:

Free admission to Naughty Karaoke 2x a month!

$5 off all other Catalyst hosted events!

Free quarterly members and volunteer only party!

Catalyst has been in existence for three years at our NE Garfield location. We've outgrown that space and have found a larger, more functional one on SE Foster, which allows us to expand our sex positive footprint and activities. 

The new space has been a professional dungeon for at least 15 years and was a lingerie modeling salon prior to that. We're delighted to bring this space to Portland's sex positive community at large and are working to give it a facelift that will make it an increasingly warm and welcoming place to gather for workshops, social events, business meetings, discussion/support groups, parties, and whatever else we can cook up.

The space is already amazing thanks to the hard work of many volunteers. We would like to install central AC, new windows, and beautiful flooring, as well as address a bunch of smaller projects that will make everyone's time at Catalyst even more enjoyable. Your donations and memberships will help make this happen!

story:
Short Summary

"Instead of a going to umpteen different boutiques (and doctor's offices) to meet your health and fitness needs, imagine going to ONE place where all your health needs are integrated. Imagine a place with any type exercise you can think of, plus a place with doctors, diet and lifestyle coaches, kids and family programs, and more.  Even better, imagine a place where you're assigned a trusted advisor who helps a myriad of fitness and wellness professionals work together as a team to come up with customized solutions for you." 

YOU CAN HELP US LAUNCH THAT FACILITY!

Perhaps you are:

  1. Feeling frustrated about losing weight and keeping it off. Perhaps you've tried all sorts of fitness and dietary programs and not had the success you were looking for.
  2. Injured or in pain and antsy to "get back in the game" but need help knowing how you can heal and prevent injuries.
  3. Tired of going to umpteen different medical and alternative specialists and wished they could collaborate on your behalf and come up with better solutions.
  4. Having trouble figuring out what to do, how to fit it in, and stay motivated.  Maybe you feel like you need a wise guide to sort through the mass of options, give you answers that adapt to your schedule, and keep you on track.

Wouldn't it be great if you could have a captain for "Team YOU"?  Imagine having someone who makes sure you never lose sight of the big picture.  Imagine someone who helps coordinate all the players who have a stake in your and your family's health--a team captain who helps your doctor talk with your personal trainer about your fitness regimen, gets your massage therapist and acupuncturist on the same page so their treatment plans are complementary, and ensures your kids' fitness program director understands and supports the bigger dietary goals set by your nutritionist.  Imagine a place where services like this are bundled and less expensive than you think.

    ...WE'RE BUILDING A BUSINESS BUILT TO DO JUST THAT. 

    OUR VISION

    It's time for:

    1. TRUE-ly integrated and custom-made health programs, where niche businesses blend into a holistic, proactive, results-oriented model for wellness
    2. A health business that honors the individual and empowers a family's commitment to living a healthy lifestyle
    3. Creating a movement that makes better health more accessible for everyone

    It's time for a business that puts it all together:

    Click here to enlarge

    Our Tipping Point is NOW!

    We've worked on this vision for ten solid years and we'll stop at nothing to see this next step, our dream facility, become reality!  We've outgrown our current location and are raising money to open a new facility--a unique, 10,000+ square foot, one-stop-shop that permanently and emphatically demonstrates a sustainable model for healthy living. 

    We'll be able to quickly increase our exercise offerings roughly 4X.  What kind of workout do you want?

    • 1-1 Personal Training
    • Small group workouts like apparatus Pilates, barbells, boxing/martial arts
    • Dance, yoga, mat Pilates, HIIT, barre, cycle, rowing
    • Kids fitness classes
    Forget driving all over town!  We've got you covered.

    When it comes to our Food, Wellness, and Education services, we'll be able to increase our offerings roughly 10X to include these awesome new additions we've been looking for/working on for years.  Are you looking for a place to:

    • Hang out with friends and unwind? 
    • Enjoy a cooking class? 
    • Take a quick shower after your workout? 
    • Drop your kids off for a date night? 
    • Take advantage of childcare and get a massage? 
    • Get a workout at the same time your children exercise? 
    • See a doctor after a documentary and discussion? 
    • Easily find a place to park? 
    No problem.  It's all here!

    To whet your appetite, here is the current architect drawing and some details about the new space.

    OUR MISSION

    1. CREATE FUN & MEANINGFUL CONNECTIONS: Infuse our work with laughter, the exhilaration of accomplishing a goal, the discovery of new experiences, and be a place that provides opportunities to meet people's intrinsic need for connection.
    2. TRANSFORM OUR CLIENTS' LIVES: Offer a holistic and sustainable model for enhancing the quality of people's lives through an integrated approach to fitness, food, wellness, and education. 
    3. MAINTAIN INTEGRITY: No gimmicks. Teach the true principles of change--realistic, consistent, determined actions--that have a compounding effect when practiced over time.

    Our Competitive Advantage

    While other businesses have been perfecting niche services, we have been perfecting our understanding of the big picture, and building a real-world model for the integration of various health and fitness professionals into a team--Team YOU. 


    Health is about doing a lot of little things right, and to make change happen, you have to set yourself up for success.  Change is most likely when the environment is right: when you have a wise guide (a TRUE Advisor), a diverse team of specialists ready to collaborate to help you, and when you're surrounded by others working hard to become more than they are now. 

    This is a "Way of Life" model and we call the concept a Health Portfolio.  It's a simplified model for health where Advisors keep an eye on the big picture, where the spending of time and money is targeted, where specialists do their work, where meaningful relationships are forged, synergy is created, and the business offerings flex to your needs over time.

    By focusing on the big picture we:

    • Create customized solutions for individuals and families
    • Integrate care from a doctor into a bigger exercise, diet, and lifestyle program
    • Save our customers' time and money (no more driving all over town)
    • Help people overcome or prevent poor health
    • Make regular exercise something people look forward to
    • Provide space where learning happens and where friendships are formed
    • Teach adults and children to cook
    • Encourage healthy habits from childhood
    • Use company profits to implement a Give Back Program designed to give access our health, dietary, and fitness services to those who otherwise could not afford it

    HOW WE GOT HERE

    Twelve years ago we set out to improve the quality of our lives by living a healthier lifestyle.  Christian had seen half a dozen different doctors while trying to make sense of his degenerative shoulder and weak immune system.  For two years we had little success.  However, we just couldn't swallow the idea that he would never get better.  So we kept searching. 

    It's amazing what a little tenacity can turn up.  Despite what all the professionals said, he was able to heal his body without drugs or surgery.  Along the way we met many others who had similar journeys.  What was the common thread?  They all realized there was no magic bullet, or single strategy they were missing.  It was a combination of a few key factors that made the difference, and it was those factors tweaked and repeated over time that compounded into great success.  In short, the "secret" we all learned was education, discipline, and seeking out well-rounded, on-going support.

    However, one other key ingredient was also common--"why power."  Why Power (a bigger purpose to motivate disciplined action) is what fueled those we met, and us, to put in the hard work to follow through on the lifestyle changes we needed to make.  Seeing how change was truly possible, we became passionate about sharing what we learned and helping people find their unique motivation.  In fact, we became so inspired we spent the last 10 years working together to develop a new, big picture, integrated health/business model.  

    What We Need & What You Get

    The money we are raising will allow us to renovate the space, get the word out about this game-changer model for health, and recruit the very best doctors, trainers, nutritionist, childcare professionals, and management team to meet our growing demand--some of our offerings are already wait-listed!    

    Thanks to our early TRUE believers who backed us the last few months, we're off to a great start raising money.  But we have a short window of time to secure the rest of the funds we need to see this project through to its full potential.  The second round of construction bids came back higher than the original so we need to raise $150K.  Here's a breakdown of what we still need:

                                                           

    From cool TRUE Gear, to your name on the Founders Wall in our new facility, to LIFETIME and UNLIMITED access to our services, we are offering some sweet perks to our supporters.  Even if you're not local you can benefit from virtual access to our team who can help you stay healthy for the long haul.  Please check out our perks and think about how we can help you.   

    The Impact

    Partner with us to make a difference.  Over the course of the last decade we have worked with over 2,000 people in our community.  In our new facility we could easily match that number in one year!  In ten years we could personally impact 20,000+ people in just this one facility.  That's enough to start a grassroots movement...in the nation's capital no less.  

    We believe creating a better model for health is the best way to criticize the broken or enslaving systems that are harming the health of our nation.  By redefining health we will transform our neighborhood, open more facilities, play our part in reversing the insidious health trends in this country, and enhance the quality of our life that will impact generations to come.  

    Who wouldn't want to be a part of that!  Please join us in showing the world there's a better way to approach health.  The more we raise, the sooner we will be able to help more people live up to their full potential!  Maybe one of those people is you.

    Our Challenges

    As ever-enthusiastic optimists, we always hope for the best, but we've stayed in business for 10+ years by also realistically assessing and addressing our risks.

    While our competitors are concerned about market saturation, we see that as our greatest opportunity.  The boutique boom has created both a mass of options, and an industry-wide dilution of customer loyalty.  Customers' needs change over time, and thus their loyalty to niche businesses wanes as their needs change.  By integrating so many niche businesses under one roof, having services that fit all stages of life, integrating them, and handsomely rewarding loyalty, we maintain a strategic advantage others cannot compete with. 

    We also know in business, like life, sometimes we'll be forced to bounce back from the unexpected...like when a car crashed into our studio.  

    Through the ups and downs of the entrepreneur roller coaster, we developed a dogged determination and an uncommon resiliency, having overcome a flood, a fire, a car crash and 5 months of mysterious electrical problems.  We know there will always be risks, but the vision is too compelling to ever think about giving up...for our own sake, that of our children, and the many lives we will touch. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Join us!  Even if you cannot contribute financially, please follow us on social media (share! retweet! repost!), and consider working with us virtually.  Help make some noise to get the word out to anyone and everyone who might help us launch this movement. 

    Eventually, we hope to address your health needs with a TRUE Health & Wholeness facility in your neighborhood.  How cool would it be to know your support helped make that possible? 

    The Indiegogo share tools are right here on this page.  Please use them and THANK YOU for your support!

However, one other key ingredient was also common--"why power."  Why Power (a bigger purpose to motivate disciplined action) is what fueled those we met, and us, to put in the hard work to follow through on the lifestyle changes we needed to make.  Seeing how change was truly possible, we became passionate about sharing what we learned and helping people find their unique motivation.  In fact, we became so inspired we spent the last 10 years working together to develop a new, big picture, integrated health/business model.     What We Need & What You Get The money we are raising will allow us to renovate
 the space, get the word out about this game-changer model for health, and recruit the very best doctors, trainers, nutritionist, 
childcare professionals, and management team to meet our growing demand--some of our offerings are already wait-listed!     Thanks to our early TRUE believers who backed us the last few months, we're off to a great start raising money.  But we have a short window of time to secure the rest of the funds we need to see this project through to its full potential.  The second round of construction bids came back higher than the original so we need to raise $150K.  Here's a breakdown of what we still need: 

                                                        From cool TRUE Gear, to your name on the Founders Wall in our new facility, to LIFETIME and UNLIMITED access to our services, we are offering some sweet perks to our supporters.  Even if you're not local you can benefit from virtual access to our team who can help you stay healthy for the long haul.  Please check out our perks and think about how we can help you.     The Impact
Partner with us to make a difference.  Over the course of the last decade we have worked with over 2,000 people in our community.  In our new facility we could easily match that number in one year!  In ten years we could personally impact 20,000+ people in just this one facility.  That's enough to start a grassroots movement...in the nation's capital no less.  
We believe creating a better model for health is the best way to criticize the broken or enslaving systems that are harming the health of our nation.  By redefining health we will transform our neighborhood, open more facilities, play our part in reversing the insidious health trends in this country, and enhance the quality of our life that will impact generations to come.   

Who wouldn't want to be a part of that!  Please join us in showing the world there's a better way to approach health.  The more we raise, the sooner we will be able to help more people 
live up to their full potential!  Maybe one of those people is you.

  Our Challenges As ever-enthusiastic optimists, we always hope for the best, but we've stayed in business for 10+ years by also realistically assessing and addressing our risks.
While our competitors are concerned about market saturation, we see 
that as our greatest opportunity.  The boutique boom has created both a mass of options, and an industry-wide dilution of customer loyalty.  
Customers' needs change over time, and thus their loyalty to niche businesses wanes as their needs change.  By integrating so many niche businesses under one roof, having services that fit all stages of life, integrating them, and 
handsomely rewarding loyalty, we maintain a strategic advantage others cannot compete with.  

We also know in business, like life, sometimes we'll be forced to bounce back from the unexpected...like when a car crashed into our studio.   

Through the ups and downs of the entrepreneur roller coaster, we developed a dogged determination and an uncommon resiliency, having overcome a flood, a fire, a car crash and 5 months of mysterious electrical problems.  We know there will always be risks, but the vision is too compelling to ever think about giving up...for our own sake, that of our children, and the many lives we will touch.  
  Other Ways You Can Help Join us!  Even if you cannot contribute financially, please follow us on social media (share! retweet! repost!), and consider working with us virtually.  Help make some noise to get the word out to anyone and everyone who might help us launch this movement.  
Eventually, we hope to address your health needs with a TRUE Health & Wholeness facility in your neighborhood.  How cool would it be to know your support helped make that possible?  
The Indiegogo share tools are right here on this page.  Please use them and THANK YOU for your support!

story:
Hello my name is Joan Mwanaka and I've recently started an exciting business for the interest of patient safety. 

Due to the plethora of rising life threatening side effects of our medicine, I am on a mission to make our drugs safer. With my academic background and work experience in drug safety, medical writing as well as business, I feel ready to take this challenge head on!

After travelling to a few countries in Africa, it became apparent that the drug safety healthcare systems, particularly in Pharmacovigilance (drug safety) were not as robust as my home country, United Kingdom. 

I took the burden upon myself to look into establishing and supporting drug safety in Africa as I did in the United Kingdom.

WHAT DOES DRUG SAFETY MEAN?

In a nutshell, it is the constant monitoring of our medicine to ensure it is beneficial and not harmful. Once drug safety measures are implemented (reporting of side effects), drugs can be further developed if needs be, new safety information can transpire, or if very dangerous, the drug can be withdrawn from the market.

Due to Pharmacovigilance, the following drugs were removed from the market: 

  1. Thalidomide drugs caused neonatal birth defects
  2. Alatrofloxacin caused liver toxicity and death 
  3. Prenyalmine caused cardiac arrhythmia and death

Drug safety measures within pharmaceutical companies and regulatory authority bodies, ensured the drugs were monitored closely when they returned on the market.  

Every drug causes a side effect. Cancer drugs plus many others are highly toxic which begs the question: what are the unknown or under reported side effects they cause today? The lack of education on drug safety reporting can mean that the drugs we once thought were safe, as demonstrated in the list above, can in fact be life threatening. Drug companies need to have reported information so they know how to closely monitor their drugs on the market in the interest of safety. 

Almond Pharma aims to do two things to better the health care system in Africa and globally and further improve the safety profile of our drugs:

  1. Train Doctors about the benefits of drug safety and how to report a side effect
  2. Collect as much safety information as possible on commonly used drugs and report it to the relevant bodies.

The Impact/Our Objective

Almond Pharma aims to build and support health care systems in Africa and educate on drug safety globally. Upon collecting data via doctors, our trained staff (or other means), will inform companies of how safe the drug is and notify them if there is any need for the drug to be closely monitored. If they don't adverse data about their drug, how can they protect their consumers?

This project will not happen over night! It may take a couple of years to expose and establish the real risks of a drug before any action can be taken. However, let's face it, if we never knew that thalidomide, a drug prescribed to pregnant women to help combat morning sickness was later found to cause neonatal congenital deformities (babies born without limbs), the drug would still be on the market causing the same problem today. Due to the strong force of Pharmacovigilance, thalidomide was removed from the market and then revisited, is now used for the treatment of certain cancers. 

Guess what, there are many more drugs on the market that need to be closely monitored, however, if Pharmacovigilance is not pursued and implemented, the necessary safety measures will suffer as a consequence.

With my background in BSc Medicinal Chemistry and my MSc in Pharmacovigilance (that I am  currentlycompleting), I believe I can overcome the life threatening hurdles in the medicinal field.

What stage is Almond Pharma at as we speak?

We currently have contacts in Nigeria, Malawi and South Africa. We have pending meetings with the directors of heath bodies in each of the listed country, and we endeavour to start the project of, data collection and collating this year.

What We Need & What You Get

As Almond Pharma is a small business, we need funding to get it on its feet in order to build a strong foundation with the view of being financially self-sufficient in the future.

  • £50,000 is the minimal start up fee required.

  • In order to collect adverse drugs, a database is required. So far we have enquired with a few companies and what appears to be the most industry efficient costs £30k (12 months of the 3 year contract).

  • Travelling to and from Africa on an education and training campaign £10k (for 12 months)

  • Basic business costs in running, e.g., electricity, rent and office stationary cost £10k (for 12 months)

  • Total £50k

*What happens if we raise money over and above the goal?  We will invest the money in the industry database systems and in house training. 

How can I say thank you, on behalf of Almond Pharma?

This is a research based business. The funds will go towards collating as much information so that drugs companies can improve their products by payingattention to serious irreversible life threatening and potentially fatal side effects. This data will also increase consumer safety and in turn get safety information from countries in Africa, then expedited to regulatory bodies. 

In return for your kindness, we have EXCITING mouth watering jaw dropping PERKS! Our perks range from, a cool personalised graffiti lab coat, to a personal Skype call from me!


£1      Kind hearted
Every little helps....

Thanks so much for your beautiful marble! Your kindness has not gone unnoticed in my eyes, and I'll forever be grateful!


£5      High Five

 Thanks for your support! Your fiver will go towards collecting safety data about medicine on the market. Your perk is a 'Thank you' email acknowledging our appreciation for donating.


£20  Almond Pharma Perk Tee  Thanks for  supporting us.

£20 will go towards COLLATING the collected adverse data, about the drugs on the market. Our perk to you is a 'T Shirt' plus a 'Thank You' email acknowledging our appreciation for donating.


£55  Almond Pharma Stay

Thanks for your noticed action of support and kindness. 

£55 will train drug safety associate's in Africa to efficiently collect and collate drug safety adverse data, then report them compliantly. Our perk to you is an Almond Pharma stationary set (Pens, pencil Case, note pad) plus a 'T-Shirt' and a 'Thank You' email acknowledging our appreciation for donating.


£100 Almond Pharma Tee Graffiti Lab Coat

You are ever so generous! Thanks immensely! 

£100 will go towards training  doctors & nurses in Africa.

We promise to send you a Almond Pharma stationary set (Pens, pencil Case, note pad), a 'T Shirt' plus an ingenious personalised Graffiti lab coat.  We will take the time to write messages on your lab coat (as long as they are positive and legal), or alternatively you can opt for a plain white lab coat. You also get, a 'Thank You' email acknowledging our appreciation for donating.


£1,000 WOW! You're amazing! A Personal Skype Call...

£1000 will support the organisation with our travel costs between UK and Africa. 

I will personally Skype call you, so you can ask any questions about the project, or just simply have me say, 'Thank You'. You will also get an ingenious personalised Graffiti lab coat.  We will take the time to write messages on your lab coat (as long as they are positive and legal), or alternatively you can opt for a plain white one. We will send a  T Shirt plus a 'Thank You' email acknowledging our appreciation for donating!


£5,000 WOW am I dreaming? This is REAL! Dinner for 2...

£5,000 will go towards our running fees e.g., rent, bills, business overheads.

I'll arrange a dinner, personally Skype call you so you can ask any questions about the project, or just simply have me say, 'Thank You'. 

Plus you get all the other perks...


£10,000 Gold hearted friends! Holiday Break for Two.

£10,000 will go towards our software fees for three years.

I'll arrange a continental weekend break for two.

I'll personally Skype call you so you can ask any questions about the project, or just simply have me say, 'Thank You'. 

Plus you get all the other perks...



Please do make visit our website and please make this project viral by sharing it via the Indiegogo tools! 
Our website is www.almondpharma.com

story:
Hi guys!

 

    My name's Brittany, and I'm here on a mission!!
As the 30th of July crept upon me, I realized I was content in my career as a photographer. But, when rapidly approaching 30, being content and feeling as though you're living to your full potential are two completely different things. I knew I have  more to offer. That's when I made a decision to actively pursue change.
In the past few years, I've developed a  true passion for fitness, and an obsession with nutrition, lol. I feel that a person's health is literally the most valuable thing they can posess. If I can motivate those around me to attain happiness and health while doing what I enjoy most, then I am exactly where I should be. In seeking happiness for others, you find it for yourself. So I've decided to take my love of fitness, my absolute detail to customer care, and experience in business management and make Celestial Body Fitness official! And I want you along for the ride!!
Which brings me to why we are here. I’m asking that you contribute what you can to give Celestial Body Fitness the push it needs to become the great success that I know it will be!! We’re reaching for a goal of 2,500, and believe me, there is plan for every last one of those dollars. That includes the cost of specialty certifications that I need to earn CEC (continuing education credits) that keep my personal trainer certification valid, equipment, licenses and permits, and office supplies and equipment.

 

 

In return for your contributions, I have something for you!! Not only are there awesome prizes for ALL donations, but there are opportunities to get your hands on extra goodies! That’s right… there’s a raffle and a referral contest. The raffle will take place 5 days after the campaign deadline. All contributors are eligible, and a video of the name drawing process will be posted to this page as soon as it’s complete. The referral contest will reward contributors that get their network to donate a certain amount. If your network raises  $100+, $250+, $375+, or $500+ will be rewarded super exclusive perks! Please note: In order for your referrals to count, you must be logged into your very own Indiegogo.com account and use Indiegogo's share tools for their analytics to track your referral. I will be sharing my leaderboard with you all through

out the campaign.

The support you’ve shown this far is overwhelmingly awesome!! I am extremely grateful for your time, support,  and belief in Celestial Body Fitness. Now let’s blow this campaign out of the water and make it happen, captain!

story:
"Jill Di-Tommaso was diagnosed with ovarian cancer in 2008.  
Jill and her friend, Laura Smith, have become committed to raising awareness about this devastating disease.  Over a cup of coffee, they founded the girlygirl P.A.R.T.S. 5k Run/Walk for Ovarian Cancer.
The money raised goes directly to a fund directed by Dr. Ursula Matulonis to research a pre-screening tool for ovarian cancer. Dr. Matulonis is the Director of Gynecologic Oncology at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute."

http://www.girlygirlparts.org/


Jill is my host mom, from the amazing year I spent in the USA as an exchange student. She is still battling with this awful disease, but that doesn't take away from her the strength to organize every year a 5k run to raise funds for this cause.

I had the chance of being present at the 2012 run and it was very touching and emotional. Unfortunately, this year I cannot travel across the country to help with the organization of this wonderful event. This is why I decided to start this Indiegogo campaign, to help raise money even from far! 

Every penny raised will be sent to Girly Girl PARTS and then to the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute.

Do it for yourself, for your wife, your mom, your sister and your daughter!

DONATE NOW!

Thank you,

Ylenia B.
