story:
Drug Store News | McKnights | Medical Design & Outsourcing | Healthcare Packaging


 

Watch video in full HD on your desktop: https://youtu.be/og8e7MXw7To

The SugarCube Mobile App was designed to simplify the way diabetes test results are presented, collecting them into one easy to read and share location. But, we wanted to offer much more than a place for test results. As we listened to the challenges diabetics faced around the world, we identified additional areas that will help manage their condition. Including all of the following AND more:

The SugarCube cloud storage backend uses industry standard SSL technology to
encrypt and secure YOUR data. Secure access to The SugarCube data on mobile phones via unique user identification, password and fingerprint options. Encryption of all the data which is stored on mobile devices as well as HIPAA compliant cloud server.





The SugarCube - Future of Diabetes Management 

We understand how difficult the added responsibilities of diabetes management can be. That's why we developed, The SugarCube, a complete diabetes lifestyle management system which will help people living with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes change the way they manage their condition to improve quality of life. 

What is The SugarCube Management System: The SugarCube is a Bluetooth® technology enabled glucose testing kit that supports insulin delivery and communicates with The SugarCube mobile app. The two work simultaneously to provide simpler diabetic lifestyle management.

The SugarCube: An all-in-one glucose testing kit that supports insulin delivery for Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetics.

The SugarCube App: A state-of-the-art mobile application and website that receives a users personal health data from The SugarCube kit. The SugarCube application enables users to make healthier lifestyle decisions based on their personal historical health data and reports directly to your doctor's office.




The SugarCube test kit is compatible with nine Flexpen© style insulin delivery devices, and we have our research team looking to add more to that list. Please contact us know if you don't see your insulin delivery pen on the list and we'll work hard to get it there! Email: info@TheSugarCubeApp.com


We have a prototype device and mobile app that is designed to measure and track your glucose levels, physical activities, food & restaurant choices, and more. However, before The SugarCube can become a medical device it will have to go through the FDA (Food and Drug Administration) premarket notification process. This is where your help and support comes in!

Disclaimer: The SugarCube has not been cleared or approved by FDA. The information provided on this page is The SugarCube’s vision of the final design that will be subject to FDA approval prior to it's availability. As a contributor to this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, you are supporting The SugarCube’s next steps to bring a revolutionary all-in-one glucometer with insulin delivery to market.




Since 2009, Johnnie Refvik, CEO and Founder of Refvik Technologies joined roughly 285 million people battling some form of diabetes. Over the next few years, that number drastically increased by more than 100 million people globally. Unfortunately, there’s still no ‘cure’ for diabetes yet so the only option for people living with diabetes is management. This is why we came up with The SugarCube lifestyle management system. 

Next Steps With Your Support

Our goal is to put The SugarCube diabetes lifestyle management system into the hands of every diabetic we can so that they can live happier, healthier and longer lives. We see our system making a world of difference to the diabetic community. Through a successful Indiegogo campaign, we will finalize the electronic components of the all-inclusive testing device. This will include custom glucometer, test strips and lancets. 

Additionally, we will complete tooling, manufacturing and inventory. We will also finalize The SugarCube Mobile app on both iOS and Android platforms. Together our test kit and mobile app will change how diabetics manage their daily BG levels via a easy to use system.


Thank you! Every contribution is special, you and the ones you love are special to us! With this contribution we will continue to work on finding a better way to take care of your diabetes. We want to make a change, so let’s do it together. With this contribution you will receive our updates on what The SugarCube is up to.

Social Shout Out: We'll only use the name you give us, privacy matters!

Spread awareness! Who said stickers aren’t cool anymore, we sure didn’t. 

You want it, you got it! Get our mobile application free for 3 months. Our mobile app will make your everyday living easier. Our app is not just for diabetics it’s for healthier living.



Get your hands on our SWAG package to support the team in making a difference for the people you love and diabetics around the world.


Be first in line! Get (1) The SugarCube Test Kit with 30 day supply of test strips.


It’s important to know how to eat healthy when you’re a diabetic. Sometimes it’s hard to understand what’s good and what’s bad, so we’re here to help.

The SugarCube Meal plan includes:
    • 3 private consults with a SugarCube Dietician
    • 1 - 30-minute consult to discuss your current habits and goals
    • Meal plan will be emailed to you after your initial consult
    • 1 – 15 follow up to adjust the plan as needed
    •1 email or chat follow up to ensure you’re on track for your goals


Be first in line! Get (1) The SugarCube Test Kit with 90 day supply of test strips.



Your 365 day management system! Receive (1) The SugarCube test kit plus test strips and mobile app for 1 year.


We love that you want to share! Get (2) devices, both with a 1-year mobile app subscription. The perfect gift for someone special in your life.

Get creative! Be on our design team to help with our next selective limited edition The SugarCube device. We will make 1000 custom design devices and you can help make a decision on how it looks. You'll also be the first to receive one of the custom design products.



Tools and Manufacturing 

Sourcing the highest quality materials and negotiation with manufacturing firms can be a lengthy process. We have quotes and bids from multiple expert medical device design and manufacturing firms. Although sometimes there are delays due to design changes or reliance on a contract vendor, we do not expect this timeline to be high risk by selecting vendors with proven track records.

FDA Clinical Trials

Although the regulatory approval process can be unpredictable, the approval path for blood glucose monitors is well defined. A short study requiring the comparison of blood testing between lab equipment and the Sugar Cube pen is submitted and the approval process takes 90 days. We have already begun drafting our protocol for the FDA clinical trial.  We have contracted with a consulting expert with over 20 years of experience with regulatory submissions, that includes submissions for blood glucose monitoring products, to lead this process. 


I don’t have Diabetes but a family member does. Where can I get a SugarCube for them?

It starts with a little help from our supporters! Diabetes affects us all in one way or another. Everyone has a family member or friend that has one type of diabetes. We are currently looking for support to get these lifestyle management tools into the hands of diabetics in your life so we can help them live happier and healthier. 

Pre-orders start: TBD 

How will the mobile app help me?

The SugarCube application enables users to make healthier lifestyle decisions based on their personal historical health data, community support, activity challenges and reports your progress directly to your doctor’s office.

Will the mobile app work with my current test kit?

Yes and no. The SugarCube App will only exchange information with Bluetooth® capable monitors, like our SugarCube test kit. However, you can still take advantage of the intuitive design and features of our mobile app by manually entering your blood glucose levels through the SugarCube dashboard.

Is my Information Secure?

Yes, we are 100% HIPPA compliant which means all your personal data is stored on highly secured servers.
story_txt:
Drug Store News | McKnights | Medical Design & Outsourcing | Healthcare Packaging


 
Watch video in full HD on your desktop: https://youtu.be/og8e7MXw7To

The SugarCube Mobile App was designed to simplify the way diabetes test results are presented, collecting them into one easy to read and share location. But, we wanted to offer much more than a place for test results. As we listened to the challenges diabetics faced around the world, we identified additional areas that will help manage their condition. Including all of the following AND more:



The SugarCube cloud storage backend uses industry standard SSL technology toencrypt and secure YOUR data. Secure access to The SugarCube data on mobile phones via unique user identification, password and fingerprint options. Encryption of all the data which is stored on mobile devices as well as HIPAA compliant cloud server.










The SugarCube - Future of Diabetes Management 
We understand how difficult the added responsibilities of diabetes management can be. That's why we developed, The SugarCube, a complete diabetes lifestyle management system which will help people living with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes change the way they manage their condition to improve quality of life. 
What is The SugarCube Management System: The SugarCube is a Bluetooth® technology enabled glucose testing kit that supports insulin delivery and communicates with The SugarCube mobile app. The two work simultaneously to provide simpler diabetic lifestyle management.
The SugarCube: An all-in-one glucose testing kit that supports insulin delivery for Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetics.
The SugarCube App: A state-of-the-art mobile application and website that receives a users personal health data from The SugarCube kit. The SugarCube application enables users to make healthier lifestyle decisions based on their personal historical health data and reports directly to your doctor's office.





The SugarCube test kit is compatible with nine Flexpen© style insulin delivery devices, and we have our research team looking to add more to that list. Please contact us know if you don't see your insulin delivery pen on the list and we'll work hard to get it there! Email: info@TheSugarCubeApp.com


We have a prototype device and mobile app that is designed to measure and track your glucose levels, physical activities, food & restaurant choices, and more. However, before The SugarCube can become a medical device it will have to go through the FDA (Food and Drug Administration) premarket notification process. This is where your help and support comes in!
Disclaimer: The SugarCube has not been cleared or approved by FDA. The information provided on this page is The SugarCube’s vision of the final design that will be subject to FDA approval prior to it's availability. As a contributor to this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, you are supporting The SugarCube’s next steps to bring a revolutionary all-in-one glucometer with insulin delivery to market.















Since 2009, Johnnie Refvik, CEO and Founder of Refvik Technologies joined roughly 285 million people battling some form of diabetes. Over the next few years, that number drastically increased by more than 100 million people globally. Unfortunately, there’s still no ‘cure’ for diabetes yet so the only option for people living with diabetes is management. This is why we came up with The SugarCube lifestyle management system. 



Next Steps With Your Support
Our goal is to put The SugarCube diabetes lifestyle management system into the hands of every diabetic we can so that they can live happier, healthier and longer lives. We see our system making a world of difference to the diabetic community. Through a successful Indiegogo campaign, we will finalize the electronic components of the all-inclusive testing device. This will include custom glucometer, test strips and lancets. 
Additionally, we will complete tooling, manufacturing and inventory. We will also finalize The SugarCube Mobile app on both iOS and Android platforms. Together our test kit and mobile app will change how diabetics manage their daily BG levels via a easy to use system.





Thank you! Every contribution is special, you and the ones you love are special to us! With this contribution we will continue to work on finding a better way to take care of your diabetes. We want to make a change, so let’s do it together. story:
Who I am and who we are

Hello my name is Patricia Trotman. I am the founder of Strictly Biblical International Ministry.

Recently I went on a mission trip to Africa, to visit two ministries that "Strictly Biblical Bible Teaching Ministries" support.

 The mission was from August 28 - September 8, 2015. The reason for the mission trip was to assess the need and to personally meet with the brethren there.

The needs are great  in Zambia and South African

  • In Lusaka, Zambia in a village named Mungulu the people are drinking dirty water and dying from it.
  • In Meyerton South Africa the Lakeside Orphanage, the children need a table so they can sit down and eat their meals. They also need beds and clothing.
  • In Zambia there is a school "Firm Foundation Christian Academy" where the children are learning from out dated and torn books and they only have a meager structure for learning and are in need of other basic things.

                                                They truly need our help.


Priorities

One of our priorities is clean water. Globally, contaminated water is a serious problem that can cause severe pain, disability and even death. Common global water-related diseases caused by parasites include Guinea worm, schistosomiasis, amebiasis, cryptosporidiosis (Crypto), and giardiasis. People become infected with these diseases when they swallow or have contact with water that has been contaminated by certain parasites. For example, individuals drinking water contaminated with fecal matter containing the ameba Entamoeba histolytica can get amebic dysentery (amebiasis). An individual can get Guinea worm disease when they drink water that contains the parasite Dracunculus medinensis. If an infected person with an open Guinea worm wound enters a pond or well used for drinking water, they can spread the parasite into the water and continue the cycle of contamination and infection. Schistosomiasis can be spread when people swim in or have contact with freshwater lakes that are contaminated with Schistosoma parasites.
Water is an essential resource for life. Water is used by everyone, every day. Not only do all people need drinking water to survive, but water plays an important role in almost every aspect of our lives. – from recreation to manufacturing computers to performing medical procedures. When water becomes contaminated by parasites, however, it can cause a variety of illnesses.

                  


                   What We Need & What You Get

To break it down in more detail for you:

  • We need 5,000.00 to dig and put in a well in Mungulu.
  • We need 1,000.00 for the table/chairs and beds for the Orphanage in South Africa 
  • We need 2,000.00 to help supply the school so the children can get a better education in Zambia.
  • More than 95% of the funds go to Africa. Even if we don't reach our goal it will go to Africa to help where it is needed most.
  • For every donation of $30.00 or more you get an "I Support Strictly Biblical International Ministry" T-Shirt
  • For  a donation of 40.00 or more you will receive a T- Shirt and a picture of the well and the school and or the orphanage of what your $$ did.

                   

                                The Impact

When you give, you will be saving lives and giving people a better life. Help educate and help people to help them selves. Also show our christian love to help the needy and feed the poor and give a hand up and not a hand out.

Here are other things that you will be helping with:

  • You are helping to provide better accommodations for a better education.
  • All projects are put into action as soon as funds are received.
  • You are making life better for orphans, so they can be assets to their communities and know that others care.

                                            

                                              What we have done

               Since we have been supporting these two ministries, we have:

  • Sent clothes, bibles,toys, medicine, crayons, coloring books, toothbrushes and more in South Africa
  • Helped re build apart of the orphanage that caught fire in South Africa
  • Fed children at an orphanage in Lusaka, Zambia
  • Helped to purchase the desk and chairs that you see in the picture above in Lusaka
  • Fed the children in the orphanage also help with the feeding program at CRM in South Africa

                            Risks & Challenges

Some people are leery about giving donations to causes in Africa because they are not sure it will get there or that it will be used for what the organization says it will be used for.

I promise that 95- 99% of your dollars donated will go towards these causes. I have been there and will be going back. Also the Pastor's of the churches there are honest God fearing reliable men with wonderful and humble mates that keep me updated and informed.

                  Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. Tell friends and family.
  • Use Face Book, Twitter and any other social media.
  • Maybe you know of businesses that would like to help a worthy cause.
  • And first and foremost PRAY!
  • S.I.M. Face Book Page
      Also if you would like  to do monthly giving email for more information at:                                                      strictlyintnlminis@sbcglobal.net 
                             and make your heading "I want to give"

                                                   And that's all there is to it. 

                                                              God Bless You!

story:
Resumen

Centro Ganesha - El Centro Deportivo
Centro Ganesha - The Sports Center

En 2007 abrimos el primer centro de Yoga de Sant Vicenç Dels Horts, fue una corta pero magnífica experiencia, la suerte no estuvo de nuestro lado...

Desde entonces tenemos centroganesha.com, un blog dedicado a el bienestar, la vida sana y el entrenamiento físico, después de varios años de ganar experiencia en gestión deportiva, hemos decidido emprender y hacer realidad un centro deportivo novedoso con el objetivo de poner al alcance de todos, deportes y disciplinas que hasta ahora sólo estaban al alcance de muy pocos:

In 2007 we was opened the first Yoga Center at Sant Vicenç Dels Horts, it was a short but magnificent experience, luck was not on our side.

Since then we have centroganesha.com, a blog about wellness, healthy living, and physical training, after several years of experience about sport management, we are decided undertake and it become tangible a new sports center in order to make available to everybody, sports and disciplines that were previously only available for few privileged people.

  • Yoga.
  • Street workout
  • Natural CrossFit.
  • Personal Training.
  • Interval training sessions.
  • Entrenamiento Funcional.
  • Functional training.
  • Free running indoor. (We need your help)
  • Telas aéreas.
  • Aerial fabric.
  • Trapecio fijo.
  • Fixed trapeze.
  • Tai-Chi.
  • Pilates.
  • Aeroyoga.
  • Aerial yoga.
  • Yoga Mamás y Bebés.
  • Yoga for Moms and babes.
  • Yoga infantil.
  • Yoga for children.
  • Dinámica de la risa.
  • Laughter dynamics. 

 

Todo esto suena muy bien, ¡a que si!... Concebir este centro deportivo único, nos permitirá ser el canal a través del cual conseguirás tus objetivos de manera sana, segura y duradera.

Necesitamos tu ayuda para construir esta idea, juntos podemos revolucionar el mundo del entrenamiento.

All this sounds really good, are you with us? ... Build this incredible idea, will enable us to be the channel through which our customers will achieve their goals, always safely and sustainable manner.

We need your help to build our idea, together we can revolutionize the sport training world.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtien

 

¿Que necesitamos?

What do we need?

A excepción de unos pocos, la mayoría de los emprendedores no tenemos ayuda de los bancos, y hacer de esto algo tangible es costoso, te explicamos:

A través de esta campaña esperamos conseguir 7.000 €

Except for a few, most entrepreneurs do not have bank support, and make it real is very expensive, we explain it below:

Que serán destinados para  partes de las reformas y poder habilitar el centro. 

Son algunas de las partes más costosas de este proyecto.

Estamos muy cerca de conseguir 600 pre-abonados y esto nos tiene muy entusiasmados, por eso estamos trabajando muy duro para conseguir tenerlo todo listo :)

Sabemos que nuestro proyecto tendrá un impacto social muy positivo, pues las disciplinas que impartimos podrán llenar de esperanza y reconducir la vida de muchos adolescentes, de colmar de energía vital a las personas mayores, de dar felicidad y satisfacción la vida de todos, y de crear un ambiente sano y fraternal en los más pequeños.

We know that project will have a positive social impact, because the disciplines we teach will be filled with hope and will redirect the lives of many teenagers, also can fill of vital energy to the elderly, to give happiness and life satisfaction of all, and create an healthy environment and friendly for a children.

Nuestro riesgo y nuestra motivación

Our risks and motivations

Los creadores y emprendedores de este proyecto somos padres de un guapísimo adolescente de 16 años, y de una niña preciosa de 6 años, sabemos que este desafío entraña su riesgo más delicado en la vida de nuestros hijos, pero también sabemos que es el camino para crear un futuro para ellos.

Por eso, no pararemos hasta conseguir materializar nuestro sueño, tenemos la experiencia, la formación, la energía y las ganas, sólo nos falta tu ayuda :)

The creators and entrepreneurs of this project, are parents of two beautiful children, with 16 and 6 years old, we know that this challenge involves risk for our family, but also know that it is the way to create a better future for them.

So we don't stop until realize our dream, we have the experience, the knowledge, the energy and desire, we just need your help :)

¿Que puedes hacer si no puedes aportar dinero?

What can you do if you can't contribute money?

Somos conscientes que no todos podréis aportar todo lo que os gustaría, recordar que hasta la cantidad más pequeña sumará, y que tu nombre siempre estará publicado en nuestra web.

También puedes ayudarnos a difundir este proyecto utilizando las herramientas que te da Indiegogo.

We realize that not everyone will can contribute everything they like, so remember that until the small quantities are very important for us, also remember that your name will be at the angels wall of our website.

Also you can help us spread this campaign using the tools give you Indiegogo.

Mil y mil gracias por tu tiempo y por tu ayuda ;)

Thousand thanks for your time and your help ;)
story_txt:
Resumen
Centro Ganesha - El Centro Deportivo

Centro Ganesha - The Sports Center

En 2007 abrimos el primer centro de Yoga de Sant Vicenç Dels Horts, fue una corta pero magnífica experiencia, la suerte no estuvo de nuestro lado...
Desde entonces tenemos centroganesha.com, un blog dedicado a el bienestar, la vida sana y el entrenamiento físico, después de varios años de ganar experiencia en gestión deportiva, hemos decidido emprender y hacer realidad un centro deportivo novedoso con el objetivo de poner al alcance de todos, deportes y disciplinas que hasta ahora sólo estaban al alcance de muy pocos:
In 2007 we was opened the first Yoga Center at Sant Vicenç Dels Horts, it was a short but magnificent experience, luck was not on our side.
Since then we have centroganesha.com, a blog about wellness, healthy living, and physical training, after several years of experience about sport management, we are decided undertake and it become tangible a new sports center in order to make available to everybody, sports and disciplines that were previously only available for few privileged people.

Yoga.
Street workout
Natural CrossFit.
Personal Training.
Interval training sessions.
Entrenamiento Funcional.
Functional training.
Free running indoor. (We need your help)
Telas aéreas.
Aerial fabric.
Trapecio fijo.
Fixed trapeze.
Tai-Chi.
Pilates.
Aeroyoga.
Aerial yoga.
Yoga Mamás y Bebés.
Yoga for Moms and babes.
Yoga infantil.
Yoga for children.
Dinámica de la risa.

Laughter dynamics. 



 
Todo esto suena muy bien, ¡a que si!... Concebir este centro deportivo único, nos permitirá ser el canal a través del cual conseguirás tus objetivos de manera sana, segura y duradera.
Necesitamos tu ayuda para construir esta idea, juntos podemos revolucionar el mundo del entrenamiento.
All this sounds really good, are you with us? ... Build this incredible idea, will enable us to be the channel through which our customers will achieve their goals, always safely and sustainable manner.
We need your help to build our idea, together we can revolutionize the sport training world.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtien ¿Que necesitamos?

What do we need?

A excepción de unos pocos, la mayoría de los emprendedores no tenemos ayuda de los bancos, y hacer de esto algo tangible es costoso, te explicamos:
A través de esta campaña esperamos conseguir 7.000 €
Except for a few, most entrepreneurs do not have bank support, and make it real is very expensive, we explain it below:
Que serán destinados para  partes de las reformas y poder habilitar el centro. 
Son algunas de las partes más costosas de este proyecto.
These are some of more expensive parts of this project.

¿Cómo nos puedes ayudar?, y lo que te ofrecemos :)

story:
HEAL ABUSED ANIMALS

Animal shelters and rescues are flooded with abused animals every year.  Many of these animals require treatment for wounds.  Quickderm is a patented formulation with high efficacy and developed after years of research.  Donate now and we will send Quickderm in your name to an animal shelter or rescue of your choice.  The shelter can utilize the product to heal the animals and send product home with the new owners of the pet.  Also, you can donate and receive Quickderm for your own animals.

This is Gabby.  She was set on fire by a group of teenagers in Dallas, Texas and thrown into a dumpster.  Quickderm healed her as you will see in the below pictures!

 


HEALING HUMANS TOO

This campaign not only helps animals, but humans too.  We are raising funds to bring this technology to market for the healing of human ulcers.  Our business plan is outlined further down the page, but first we want to share the need for abused animals!

ANIMAL ABUSE IS A HUGE ISSUE

According to the National Humane Society website: unlike violent crimes against people, information on reported cases of animal abuse have not been compiled by state and federal agencies, making it difficult to calculate the prevalence or trends in these crimes.  In 2014, the FBI announced that it will add cruelty to animals as a category in the agency’s Uniform Crime Report, a nationwide crime-reporting system. While only about a third of U.S. communities currently participate in the system, the data generated will help create a clearer picture of animal abuse and guide strategies for intervention and enforcement. Data collection will begin in January 2016 and will cover four categories: simple/gross neglect, intentional abuse and torture, organized abuse (such as dogfighting and cockfighting) and animal sexual abuse. 

Up to now, statistics on animal abuse have been collected by private organizations.  According to Pet-Abuse.Com and the AARDAS project, a high percentage of abuse is from neglect.  The below table details their compiled statistics on abuse types and as you can see, the majority of abuse would produce wounds requiring treatment with Quickderm!


Abuse affects many types of animals from pets at home to horses and farm animals.  Below is a chart showing the incidence of abuse by animal type and Quickderm can help all of them!


As with many medicines, the original source of that medicine originates from plants.  The Quickderm formulation originates from an old recipe in which red oak bark was burned into ashes and used on wounds.  The oak bark treatment was studied and synthesized into the five key chemical components that effect wound healing.  Quickderm heals at the molecular level and we want to take this formulation to the human market as will be described below.

A PICTURE IS WORTH A THOUSAND WORDS

Here are some before and after pictures on the effectiveness of Quickderm.  WARNING, THE PICTURES IN THIS CAMPAIGN ARE GRAPHIC IN NATURE!!!



CAT'S NECK

             


DOG PAW

 


FETLOCK INJURY

 


GABBY THE CAT

   


HORSE EYE

 


HORSE HEAD


    



DEGLOVING DOG PAW

  


DON’T TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT, READ WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING…

I just received my VetCare QuickDerm! It’s absolutely the best wound ointment I have ever found for my 2 senior dogs, both 9lb. Chihuahuas. Within days of my husband’s unexpected death a few years ago, I noticed a small bleeding spot on my Duke’s front leg. As I watched his behavior, he would stare at the front door waiting for his ‘Dad’ to walk in. The longer he watched the door, the more he licked that spot. My then vet recommended QuickDerm and gave me a small tube of it. In a day, the healing started! The wound was dry within days and the skin recovered within a couple of weeks.

Since then, Duke has, from time to time, licked spots on himself but they’ve never been as bad as the first one due to the wonderful QUICK results of QuickDerm!!!

Thank you!
Jan Forrester



I ordered your product for my sugar glider who had a dominance wound, as it was recommended to me versus vetericyn for which I normally use…vetericyn usually takes about two weeks to heal our wounds…your product took one week! It’s amazing and I wanted you to know. Below I have attached what it looked like and now it’s completely gone. Thank you for this product

A very satisfied customer
Stephanie Paquette



Thank you Mikel! I really appreciate your awesome customer service and you shipping that out so quickly! So does my coned dog Samantha. Getting that ointment means faster healing and less time in the cone of shame. She’s miserable with that silly thing on. Ha ha! Have a great night!
–Jamie



“Just wanted to say thanks for the QuickDerm wound ointment! It really did the trick on her TPLO (ACL knee surgery) incision. It was weepy, swollen and red for the 1st couple of weeks. I started using the ointment after her compression bandage was removed and by 6 weeks post surgery you couldn’t even see the incision. I think it made all the difference in how her wound healed. I also used the last of it on her elbow calluses as these had gotten irritated due to all of her “down time”.

Thanks again. We really appreciate your thoughtfulness.”
–Ruth & Randy Overton



“QuickDerm is in every vehicle, medicine cabinet, and I give it to all my clients to try. Super product!
Walter Varcoe, Farrier
New York



“I am ever grateful to have come across this product at an IVECCS a year ago. I’ve used it on MANY wounds and it has been amazing! My clients have been nothing short of super happy with this product. I seem to constantly get pictures because they are in shock of how great the wound looks in such a short period of time. From severe open wounds with bone exposure (I deal with lots of feral cats!), to degloving injuries, ulcerated masses on rats, necrotic skin lesions in reptiles….this is my GO TO ointmen! Love it!”

–Natara Loose, DVM, DACVECC
“The Neighborhood Vet”



I handle the adoptable strays that make their way into our practice. We recently took in a small hound mix which had leather-like skin and was missing fur from about 80% of her body. After several baths, she became so itchy that even with the application of various topical creams, she scratched herself open last Tuesday (9 days ago). The open wound was bleeding and measured about 6” by 1.” Recently, our PennVet sales rep introduced me to your ointment. The wound healed within two days of my applying the QuickDerm, and her fur is already growing back. She has some of the most severe skin issues we have ever experienced. The owner of the practice, Karin-Susan Breitlauch DVM, has been a veterinarian for 25 years and is extremely impressed with the effectiveness of your product. We are a 24-7 emergency clinic and expect to be trying your ointment and spray on a number of wound care issues in the near future. It is not often that we are able to leave such positive feedback about a new product and are certainly happy to do so.
Sincerely,
Linda Breitlauch, Comptroller,
Creature Comforts Veterinary Practice,
Saylorsburg, PA



In the competitive world of advanced wound care in the horse, QuickDerm has outperformed comparable products that cost two or three times as much.

Gregory Fox, DVM
Lexington, KY



I have had the opportunity to use QuickDerm on several cases including minor wounds and several skin diseases. I have been very happy with the results and the performance of this product. I look forward to using it on many more cases.

Tracy A. Turner, DVM, MS, Dipl.ACVS
Anoka Equine Veterinary Services
Elk River, MN



I am writing to let you know how pleased we are with your product QuickDerm. We have used it in our veterinary practice for wound management and have seen incredible results. Also we have used it for topical treatment of two patients with inoperable skin tumors. One patient is “Pearl Rose” Hutchins, a 16 year old Bichon Frise with a sebaceous epithelioma with perivascular dermatitis. Application of QuickDerm temporarily shrunk the tumor.
Another patient a 9 year old Siberian Husky “Star” Beard had an elbow mass diagnosed as low grade spindle cell tumor most consistent with hemangiopericytoma. Application of QuikDerm caused about a 50% shrinkage in the tumor. Unfortunately this pet was euthanized because of a nasal tumor.
I have also have personal experience with the use of your product in the management of exuberant granulation tissue (“proud flesh”) in one of our horses. It worked very well.

Dr. Denise R. Sacks
Oak Ridge Animal Hospital
Greensboro, NC 27409



Hello!
I attended the SWVS in October in San Antonio, TX and received a sample of this product. I have used it on one of my personal pets and was extremely impressed. It cut the healing time in half for anything else I have used. Although obviously not labeled for such use, I put a small amount on an open wound that I had, to see if it stung upon application, and was very impressed that it did not (very minute sting for the first second, but went away quickly). I have relayed all of this, including the small amount of product needed, to our Dermatologist who just started with us about 2.5 months ago. She is very interested in trying it. She sees small animal (dogs and cats) and horses.

Megan Rutledge
Veterinary Specialist of North Texas
Internal Medicine Department



“I have had numerous opportunities to use the QuickDerm tube that you sent home with me on horses, and as you knew I would be, I am amazed! I have used it on 2 deep cuts, and was able to witness the inuries and apply immediately. By the next day the wounds were closed and by day 2, I honestly would not have believed there had been injuries in the animals if it had not been for the blood still streaked on one horse’s face from the initial insult!”

Dr. Sue Whiteman, DVM (Indiana)



“We are a non-profit equine rescue and we house and care for 60-80 horses at any one time. The horses live outside in herds in large pastures with tree, ponds and varying terrain. Horses being horses, we regularly have a variety of wounds to deal with.

I purchased a 4 oz. tube of VetCare EquiDerm Advanced Wound Ointment at the NAVC in January this year. We have been using it on the horses here at the Horse Protection Association of Florida over the past four months. We have used it on lacerations, sunburn and rain rot. I am very impressed with this product; we have seen excellent results on every wound we have used it on. One 2 yr. old TB colt had a small but deep laceration that looked like he may have run into a nail protruding from the fence. The wound was washed once and the EquiDerm AWO applied once daily. The wound healed quickly with no proud flesh or scarring which is impressive because this colt was emaciated and its immune system compromised.

EquiDerm AWO has worked beautifully on the sunburned pink noses from the scorching Florida sun and the rain rot that came on quickly after seven straight days and 20 inches of rain in late May. We truly appreciate having a wound ointment that works so effectively and makes our jobs caring for the horses a little bit easier.

Sincerely,
Morgan Silver, Executive Director
Horse Protection Association of Florida”



“I have used QuickDerm on several cases and been very impressed with its ability to accelerate healing – particularly in c hronic wounds. I recently used it on an axillary pocket wound in a clinic blood donor cat that had been present for weeks and failed other treatments. In just a few days the wound was 50% smaller and had a nice rim of new granulation tissue. At 2 weeks, the entire wound was filled with granulation tissue and it was only 25% of its original size. The wound was then surgically closed and healed beautifully. QuickDerm did wonders for this cat’s wound, when nothing else was working – now I reach for QuickDerm first!”

Rebecca M. Stanclift, DVM
Diplomate of the American College of Veterinary Surgeons
Latham, NY



Dear VetCare,
I’m writing to let you know that I am extraordinarily pleased with your product, which I use on my hawks and falcons’ feet.

One health problem common to larger birds of prey is a condition called “bumblefoot.” Bumblefoot is essentially caused by pressure on a raptor’s delicate feet, often in combination with an injury (such as a squirrel bite incurred while hunting) or prolonged periods of inactivity (such as with injured, captive-kept and rehab birds). Bumblefoot is similar in nature to pressure ulcers and can be an absolute nightmare to resolve once it occurs, so prevention and proactively addressing any foot injuries is really the best “cure.” This is where your product really excels.

When one of my birds incurs a squirrel bite to the foot or toes, I first clean the wound site by gently scrubbing with warm soapy water and a toothbrush to remove any dirt or debris, then I irrigate the wound site with 70% isopropyl alcohol to disinfect it. Next, I wrap a narrow perch with a piece of pastic cut from a contractor’s garbage bag and tape it into place on the perch. I then slather the top of the plastic-wrapped perch with your product and place the bird on it. Every time the bird moves on the perch, it self-medicates its feet. Over the course of the night, the bird may medicate itself dozens of times as it changes position while sleeping–it’s that easy!

Since using this method and your product, I have not had a single bird develop bumblefoot and all squirrel bites – even the particularly nasty ones – have healed completely.

Sincerely,
Mike Bodary
Federally Licensed Master Falconer



“QuickDerm is a wonderful product and I was amazed with the results. Max (our dog) also has diabeties, which makes the healing process especially difficult. But after applying QuickDerm for one week directly to his wound; well, the results speak for themselves! I love my dog and could not bare to see him suffer and I am so thankful there is a product on the market that yields such miraculous results.”

Warm regards,
Jeff McGahee



“I had tried two other products prior to using QuickDerm and they were not giving me any results. I began using QuickDerm and noticed a change within three days after the first application. There were six applications and not much of the product was needed to cover the wound. The result of QuickDerm speaks for itself. I will continue to use the product and recommend it to others.”

Wayland McClelland, Idaho

Donate now to help abused animals!!


HERE IS HOW WE ARE GOING TO HELP HUMANS.........

This campaign is operated by Metrix Medical, Inc..  Quickderm is a product of Vetcare, Inc. and has licensed the technology to Metrix for use on human ulcers.  The primary principals of Vetcare are also principals in Metrix. Human ulcers develop from various disease states such as diabetes, venous stasis disease, paralysis and inactivity.  The healing of wounds in humans and animals are very similar.  Below is a chart of the phases of healing.



The healing time for wounds is effected by how the wound is treated.  In humans with disease states such as diabetes, the healing process stalls as a result of ineffective molecular activity.  The Quickderm formulation balances the wound bed molecular activity to allow the wound to go thru all the phases of healing.  This formulation was recently used by a podiatrist on foot ulcer patient and stated “this is the best improvement he’s had in 1 year”!  As you can see from the below pictures, the wound improved in about 3 weeks!!

         


The net funds raised in this campaign will be used to commercialize the product into the Illinois Medicaid population.  Statistics show that lower income populations have a higher incidence of disease states that cause ulcers.

Advanced wound care technologies treat chronic wounds and these wounds often lead to infection and other complications, including amputations, causing a significant burden to the healthcare system as demonstrated thru the below statistics:

  • Diabetic ulcers: 800,000 estimated annual cases in the U.S. at a total national annual cost of $5 billion est.
  • Pressure ulcers: annual treatment costs total approximately $1.3 billion in the U.S.
  • Venous stasis ulcers: treatment costs total between $2.5 - $3.5 billion in the U.S. annually
  • 6% of hospitalizations that listed diabetes also listed lower extremity ulcer conditions
  • Chronic ulcers listed in 2.7% of hospitalizations listing diabetes
  • More than half of U.S. amputations occur in diabetics
  • Foot ulcers precede approximately 85% of lower extremity amputations in people with diabetes
  • Up to 20% experience additional amputation within 12 months (up to 51% in 5 years)
  • Five year mortality following amputation 39%-68% in various studies
  • Diabetic Foot Ulcers are estimated to affect approximately 25% of all diabetics in their lifetime


Once the State of Illinois is rolled-out, we will begin rolling out in other states.  The total project cost is $450,000 in three phases.  We are currently raising $150,000 for phase 1 and will extend our campaign fundraising when phase 2 and 3 are beginning.  Below is a description of each phase.

Phase 1

  • 35 Patient IRB clinical study
  • Health economic study by well known health economist in the State of Illinois evidencing the significant savings this product would provide to the State via improved healing of ulcers and reduction in amputations due to ulcers
  • Presentation of study to Illinois Medicaid executives via lobbying group partners
  • Solidify preferred provider status
  • Negotiate preliminary pricing
  • Approval of Phase 2

Phase 2

  • Selection of up to 600 Illinois Medicaid patients with diabetic foot ulcers.  Half of the patients will be treated with this product and half (control group) will be treated under the usual and customary treatment protocol.
  • Utilize Eocene health technology on the patients treated with this product to monitor and ensure proper usage of the product.
  • Compile results on theses patients as further evidence of  the product efficacy displayed in the 35 patient study
  • Utilize the highly efficacious results to negotiate final discretionary formulary pricing and preferred product provider status for ulcers

Phase 3

  • Installation of office for administrative and clinical staffing
  • Determination and selection of appropriate distribution channel
  • Installation of sales team to create pull-thru for product thru distribution channel
  • Installation of clinical team to interact with patients on product usage


Metrix Medical Inc is a collaboration of 4 individuals with more than 50 combined years experience in the chronic woundcare industry.  We have been executives in the science, legal, finance, regulatory and sales fields for a few different companies for much of this time.  Help us achieve the goal of transforming this technology into human ulcer healing!


Important Note: all donations are compiled by Indiegogo until the completion of the campaign.  All shipments will be made once Metrix Medical has received the proceeds from Indiegogo.  Thanks for your patience and understanding!!!!

formulation originates from an old recipe in which red oak bark was burned into
ashes and used on wounds.  The oak bark
treatment was studied and synthesized into the five key chemical components
that effect wound healing.  Quickderm
heals at the molecular level and we want to take this formulation to the human
market as will be described below.
A PICTURE IS WORTH A THOUSAND WORDS
Here are some before and after pictures on the effectiveness
of Quickderm.  WARNING, THE PICTURES IN
THIS CAMPAIGN ARE GRAPHIC IN NATURE!!!
CAT'S NECK             DOG PAW  FETLOCK INJURY  GABBY THE CAT    HORSE EYE   HORSE HEAD     DEGLOVING DOG PAW   
DON’T TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT, READ WHAT OTHERS ARE
SAYING…
I just received my VetCare QuickDerm! It’s
absolutely the best wound ointment I have ever found for my 2 senior dogs, both
9lb. Chihuahuas. Within days of my husband’s unexpected death a few years ago,
I noticed a small bleeding spot on my Duke’s front leg. As I watched his behavior,
he would stare at the front door waiting for his ‘Dad’ to walk in. The longer
he watched the door, the more he licked that spot. My then vet recommended
QuickDerm and gave me a small tube of it. In a day, the healing started! The
wound was dry within days and the skin recovered within a couple of weeks.
Since then, Duke has, from time to time, licked spots on himself
but they’ve never been as bad as the first one due to the wonderful QUICK
results of QuickDerm!!!
Thank you!
Jan Forrester
I ordered your product for my sugar glider who
had a dominance wound, as it was recommended to me versus vetericyn for which I
normally use…vetericyn usually takes about two weeks to heal our wounds…your
product took one week! It’s amazing and I wanted you to know. Below I have
attached what it looked like and now it’s completely gone. Thank you for this
product 
A very satisfied customer
Stephanie Paquette
Thank you Mikel! I really appreciate your
awesome customer service and you shipping that out so quickly! So does my coned
dog Samantha. Getting that ointment means faster healing and less time in the
cone of shame. She’s miserable with that silly thing on. Ha ha! Have a great
night!
–Jamie



“Just wanted to say thanks for the QuickDerm
wound ointment! It really did the trick on her TPLO (ACL knee surgery)
incision. It was weepy, swollen and red for the 1st couple of weeks. I started
using the ointment after her compression bandage was removed and by 6 weeks
post surgery you couldn’t even see the incision. I think it made all the
difference in how her wound healed. I also used the last of it on her elbow
calluses as these had gotten irritated due to all of her “down time”.
Thanks again. We really appreciate your thoughtfulness.”
–Ruth & Randy Overton
“QuickDerm is in every vehicle, medicine
cabinet, and I give it to all my clients to try. Super product!
Walter Varcoe, Farrier
New York
“I am ever grateful to have come across this
product at an IVECCS a year ago. I’ve used it on MANY wounds and it has been
amazing! My clients have been nothing short of super happy with this product. I
seem to constantly get pictures because they are in shock of how great the
wound looks in such a short period of time. From severe open wounds with bone
exposure (I deal with lots of feral cats!), to degloving injuries, ulcerated
masses on rats, necrotic skin lesions in reptiles….this is my GO TO ointmen!
Love it!”
–Natara Loose, DVM, DACVECC
“The Neighborhood Vet”
I handle the adoptable strays that make their way into our
practice. We recently took in a small hound mix which had leather-like skin and
was missing fur from about 80% of her body. After several baths, she became so
itchy that even with the application of various topical creams, she scratched
herself open last Tuesday (9 days ago). The open wound was bleeding and
measured about 6” by 1.” Recently, our PennVet sales rep introduced me to your
ointment. The wound healed within two days of my applying the QuickDerm, and
her fur is already growing back. She has some of the most severe skin issues we
have ever experienced. The owner of the practice, Karin-Susan Breitlauch DVM,
has been a veterinarian for 25 years and is extremely impressed with the
effectiveness of your product. We are a 24-7 emergency clinic and expect to be
trying your ointment and spray on a number of wound care issues in the near
future. It is not often that we are able to leave such positive feedback about
a new product and are certainly happy to do so.
Sincerely,
Linda Breitlauch, Comptroller,
Creature Comforts Veterinary Practice,
Saylorsburg, PA
In the competitive world of advanced wound care in the horse,
QuickDerm has outperformed comparable products that cost two or three times as
much.
Gregory Fox, DVM
Lexington, KY
I have had the opportunity to use QuickDerm on several cases
including minor wounds and several skin diseases. I have been very happy with
the results and the performance of this product. I look forward to using it on
many more cases.
Tracy A. Turner, DVM, MS, Dipl.ACVS
Anoka Equine Veterinary Services
Elk River, MN
I am writing to let you know how pleased we are with your product
QuickDerm. We have used it in our veterinary practice for wound management and
have seen incredible results. Also we have used it for topical treatment of two
patients with inoperable skin tumors. One patient is “Pearl Rose” Hutchins, a
16 year old Bichon Frise with a sebaceous epithelioma with perivascular
dermatitis. Application of QuickDerm temporarily shrunk the tumor.
Another patient a 9 year old Siberian Husky “Star” Beard had an elbow mass
diagnosed as low grade spindle cell tumor most consistent with
hemangiopericytoma. Application of QuikDerm caused about a 50% shrinkage in the
tumor. Unfortunately this pet was euthanized because of a nasal tumor.
I have also have personal experience with the use of your product in the
management of exuberant granulation tissue (“proud flesh”) in one of our
horses. It worked very well.
Dr. Denise R. Sacks
Oak Ridge Animal Hospital
Greensboro, NC 27409
Hello!
I attended the SWVS in October in San Antonio, TX and received a sample of this
product. I have used it on one of my personal pets and was extremely impressed.
It cut the healing time in half for anything else I have used. Although
obviously not labeled for such use, I put a small amount on an open wound that
I had, to see if it stung upon application, and was very impressed that it did
not (very minute sting for the first second, but went away quickly). I have
relayed all of this, including the small amount of product needed, to our
Dermatologist who just started with us about 2.5 months ago. She is very
interested in trying it. She sees small animal (dogs and cats) and horses.
Megan Rutledge
Veterinary Specialist of North Texas
Internal Medicine Department
“I have had numerous opportunities to use the QuickDerm tube that
you sent home with me on horses, and as you knew I would be, I am amazed! I
have used it on 2 deep cuts, and was able to witness the inuries and apply
immediately. By the next day the wounds were closed and by day 2, I honestly
would not have believed there had been injuries in the animals if it had not
been for the blood still streaked on one horse’s face from the initial insult!”
Dr. Sue Whiteman, DVM (Indiana)
“We are a non-profit equine rescue and we house and care for 60-80
horses at any one time. The horses live outside in herds in large pastures with
tree, ponds and varying terrain. Horses being horses, we regularly have a variety
of wounds to deal with.
I purchased a 4 oz. tube of VetCare EquiDerm Advanced Wound
Ointment at the NAVC in January this year. We have been using it on the horses
here at the Horse Protection Association of Florida over the past four months.
We have used it on lacerations, sunburn and rain rot. I am very impressed with
this product; we have seen excellent results on every wound we have used it on.
One 2 yr. old TB colt had a small but deep laceration that looked like he may
have run into a nail protruding from the fence. The wound was washed once and
the EquiDerm AWO applied once daily. The wound healed quickly with no proud
flesh or scarring which is impressive because this colt was emaciated and its
immune system compromised.
EquiDerm AWO has worked beautifully on the sunburned pink noses
from the scorching Florida sun and the rain rot that came on quickly after
seven straight days and 20 inches of rain in late May. We truly appreciate
having a wound ointment that works so effectively and makes our jobs caring for
the horses a little bit easier.
Sincerely,
Morgan Silver, Executive Director
Horse Protection Association of Florida”
“I have used QuickDerm on several cases and been very impressed
with its ability to accelerate healing – particularly in c hronic wounds. I
recently used it on an axillary pocket wound in a clinic blood donor cat that
had been present for weeks and failed other treatments. In just a few days the
wound was 50% smaller and had a nice rim of new granulation tissue. At 2 weeks,
the entire wound was filled with granulation tissue and it was only 25% of its
original size. The wound was then surgically closed and healed beautifully.
QuickDerm did wonders for this cat’s wound, when nothing else was working – now
I reach for QuickDerm first!”
Rebecca M. Stanclift, DVM
Diplomate of the American College of Veterinary Surgeons
Latham, NY
Dear VetCare,
I’m writing to let you know that I am extraordinarily pleased with your
product, which I use on my hawks and falcons’ feet.
One health problem common to larger birds of prey is a condition
called “bumblefoot.” Bumblefoot is essentially caused by pressure on a raptor’s
delicate feet, often in combination with an injury (such as a squirrel bite
incurred while hunting) or prolonged periods of inactivity (such as with
injured, captive-kept and rehab birds). Bumblefoot is similar in nature to
pressure ulcers and can be an absolute nightmare to resolve once it occurs, so
prevention and proactively addressing any foot injuries is really the best
“cure.” This is where your product really excels.
When one of my birds incurs a squirrel bite to the foot or toes, I
first clean the wound site by gently scrubbing with warm soapy water and a
toothbrush to remove any dirt or debris, then I irrigate the wound site with
70% isopropyl alcohol to disinfect it. Next, I wrap a narrow perch with a piece
of pastic cut from a contractor’s garbage bag and tape it into place on the
perch. I then slather the top of the plastic-wrapped perch with your product
and place the bird on it. Every time the bird moves on the perch, it
self-medicates its feet. Over the course of the night, the bird may medicate
itself dozens of times as it changes position while sleeping–it’s that easy!
Since using this method and your product, I have not had a single
bird develop bumblefoot and all squirrel bites – even the particularly nasty
ones – have healed completely.
Sincerely,
Mike Bodary
Federally Licensed Master Falconer
“QuickDerm is a wonderful product and I was amazed with the
results. Max (our dog) also has diabeties, which makes the healing process
especially difficult. But after applying QuickDerm for one week directly to his
wound; well, the results speak for themselves! I love my dog and could not bare
to see him suffer and I am so thankful there is a product on the market that
yields such miraculous results.”
Warm regards,
Jeff McGahee
“I had tried two other products prior to using QuickDerm and they
were not giving me any results. I began using QuickDerm and noticed a change
within three days after the first application. There were six applications and
not much of the product was needed to cover the wound. The result of QuickDerm
speaks for itself. I will continue to use the product and recommend it to
others.”

Wayland McClelland, Idaho
Donate now to help abused animals!!
HERE IS HOW WE ARE GOING TO HELP HUMANS.........
This campaign is operated by Metrix Medical,
Inc..  Quickderm is a product of Vetcare,
Inc. and has licensed the technology to Metrix for use on human ulcers.  The primary principals of Vetcare are also
principals in Metrix. Human ulcers
develop from various disease states such as diabetes, venous stasis disease,
paralysis and inactivity.  The healing of
wounds in humans and animals are very similar. 
Below is a chart of the phases of healing. 
The healing time for wounds is effected by how the wound is
treated.  In humans with disease states
such as diabetes, the healing process stalls as a result of ineffective
molecular activity.  The Quickderm
formulation balances the wound bed molecular activity to allow the wound to go
thru all the phases of healing.  This formulation
was recently used by a podiatrist on foot ulcer patient and stated “this is the
best improvement he’s had in 1 year”!  As
you can see from the below pictures, the wound improved in about 3 weeks!!
          
The net funds raised in this campaign will be used to
commercialize the product into the Illinois Medicaid population.  Statistics show that lower income populations
have a higher incidence of disease states that cause ulcers.
Advanced wound care technologies treat chronic wounds
and these wounds often lead to infection and other complications, including
amputations, causing a significant burden to the healthcare system as demonstrated thru the below statistics:


Diabetic
ulcers: 800,000 estimated annual cases in the U.S. at a total national annual
cost of $5 billion est.

Pressure
ulcers: annual treatment costs total approximately $1.3 billion in the U.S. 

Venous
stasis ulcers: treatment costs total between $2.5 - $3.5 billion in the U.S.
annually

6% of
hospitalizations that listed diabetes also listed lower extremity ulcer
conditions

Chronic
ulcers listed in 2.7% of hospitalizations listing diabetes

More than
half of U.S. amputations occur in diabetics

Foot
ulcers precede approximately 85% of lower extremity amputations in people with
diabetes

Up to 20%
experience additional amputation within 12 months (up to 51% in 5 years)

Five year
mortality following amputation 39%-68% in various studies

Diabetic Foot
Ulcers are estimated to affect approximately 25% of all diabetics in their
lifetime
Once the State of Illinois is rolled-out, we will begin rolling
out in other states.  The total project
cost is $450,000 in three phases.  We are
currently raising $150,000 for phase 1 and will extend our campaign fundraising
when phase 2 and 3 are beginning.  Below
is a description of each phase.

Phase
1


35 Patient IRB clinical study

Health economic study by well known health
economist in the State of Illinois evidencing the significant savings this
product would provide to the State via improved healing of ulcers
and reduction in amputations due to ulcers

Presentation of study to Illinois Medicaid
executives via lobbying group partners

Solidify preferred provider status

Negotiate preliminary pricing

Approval of Phase 2


Phase 2

Selection of up to 600 Illinois Medicaid
patients with diabetic foot ulcers.  Half
of the patients will be treated with this product and half (control group) will
be treated under the usual and customary treatment protocol.

Utilize Eocene health technology on the patients
treated with this product to monitor and ensure proper usage of the product.

Compile results on theses patients as further
evidence of  the product efficacy
displayed in the 35 patient study
Utilize the highly efficacious results to negotiate final
discretionary formulary pricing and preferred product provider status for ulcers

Phase
3


Installation of office for administrative and
clinical staffing

Determination and selection of appropriate
distribution channel

Installation of sales team to create pull-thru
for product thru distribution channel

Installation of clinical team to interact with
patients on product usage

Metrix Medical Inc is a collaboration of 4
individuals with more than 50 combined years experience in the chronic
woundcare industry.  We have been executives in the science, legal,
finance, regulatory and sales fields for a few different companies
for much of this time.  Help us
achieve the goal of transforming this technology into human ulcer healing!
Important Note: all donations are compiled by Indiegogo until the completion of the campaign.  All shipments will be made once Metrix Medical has received the proceeds from Indiegogo.  Thanks for your patience and understanding!!!!

story:
My name is Antonio, I´m 42 years old, I´m Italian and I live in Peru since 2011. I´m Personal Trainer, Karate black belt and proven ability in Martial Arts. All my life I played sports and I love cycling.

Arriving to Peru, I found that I could bike around and that was the only way to know it more deeply, but most important is that the city of Lima, where I live, physically and mentally struck me negatively. I felt weak and tired, but out of town with my bike, every state of physical and mental discomfort disappeared and my body felt boundless energy and enthusiasm. All this helped me to understand how an artificial context as the city is, can be hardly compatible with the expressions of body and mind, and yet, how a natural and seemingly inhospitable context can recharge the person and their welfare to be discovered itself with new potentialities. That´s why, I want to do this cyclotrip- study, to monitor and document my body condition, mental and psycho-emotional states of my body in localized in remote areas of the Peruvian Andes.

This study will benefit all people interested in the research and knowledge of welfare; as Wellness Coach, I have been working with my clients on how to develop their bodies through the practice of movement, everything related to coordination, balance and perception of the body, according to what the person asks me.

My traveling companion is a Giant Mountaineer with Shimano XT / Deore, wheels 27.5” and amortized fork Rockshock Gold 30 100 mm. Frame aluminum 6000 series, equipped with rear grill Topeck Super Tourist DX. For transportation of luggage, I use two subsequent backpacks Ortlieb where I have clothing to combat the cold, rain and wind, a small kitchen, first aid kit, tools and parts for the bike.

In the backpack that I have put on the grill bike, I carry a tent, a mattress, a sleeping bag and a "Water Bag" from 10 liters water reserve. On the helm, I have an Ortlieb briefcase where I keep my documents, phone and maps, plus cereal bars and fruit. On top of the lid of the briefcase, I have a roadmap.

The trip consists of approximately 2500 kms, which I believe go in 50 days, with an average of 50 kms per day, depending on the difficulty of the route. For food and lodging, I calculate US $ 20 per day, for a total of US $ 1000 approximately.

I hope you can help me with this personal challenge!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Me llamo Antonio tengo 42 años, soy italiano y vivo en Perú desde el 2011. Soy Personal Trainer, cinturón negro en Karate y  tengo conocimientos demostrados en Artes Marciales. Toda mi vida he hecho deporte y me apasiona el ciclismo.

Llegando al Perú descubrí que podía recorrerlo en bicicleta y que era el único modo para conocerlo más profundamente, pero lo más importante es que la ciudad de Lima, donde vivo, me impactaba físicamente y mentalmente de manera negativa. Me sentía débil y fatigado, pero al salir de la ciudad con mi bicicleta, todo estado de malestar físico y mental desaparecía y sentía en mi organismo una energía y entusiasmo desbordante. Todo eso me sirvió para entender cómo un contexto artificial como lo es la ciudad, es poco compatible con las expresiones del cuerpo y de la mente, y a la vez, cómo un contexto natural y aparentemente inhóspito pueda recargar a la persona y su bienestar hasta descubrirse a sí misma con nuevas potencialidades. Por eso,  deseo realizar este ciclo viaje- estudio para monitorear y documentar mi estado corporal, mental y psico-emotivo localizado en las zonas remotas de los Andes del Perú.

Este estudio beneficiará a todas las personas interesadas en el conocimiento y búsqueda de su bienestar; como Wellness Coach, vengo trabajando con mis clientes sobre cómo desarrollar su cuerpo a través de la práctica del movimiento, todo lo referido a coordinación, equilibrio y percepción del cuerpo, en función a lo que me pide la persona.

Mi compañera de viaje es una Giant Montañera, con cambio Shimano XT/Deore, ruedas de 27.5" y horquilla amortizada Rockshock Gold 30 de 100 mm., Marco en aluminio serie 6000, equipada con parrilla posterior Topeck Super Tourist DX. Para el transporte del equipaje, me sirvo de dos mochilas Ortlieb posteriores donde llevo ropa para combatir el frío, lluvia y viento,  una pequeña cocina, botiquín primeros auxilio, herramientas y repuestos para la bicicleta.

En la mochila que tengo puesta sobre la parrilla de la bicicleta, llevo una carpa, una colchoneta, una bolsa de dormir y una “Water Bag” de 10 litros para reserva de agua. Sobre el timón, tengo un maletín Ortlieb donde guardo mis documentos, celular y mapas, además de barras de cereal y fruta. Encima de la tapa del maletín, llevo un mapa de ruta.

El viaje consta de 2500 kms. aproximadamente, que calculo recorrer en 50 días, con un promedio de 50 kms. por día, dependiendo de la dificultad de la ruta. Para la alimentación y hospedaje calculo US$ 20 diarios, que da un total aproximado de US$ 1000.

Espero que me puedan ayudar con este reto personal!

Espero que me puedan

story:
Special thanks to Rona for speaking out about her own experience with mental illness!  Understanding mental illness helps us reach out in critical moments. Understanding ends stigma!
Your $10 donation will help Bridgeway provide Mental Health First Aid classes.
Bridgeway Rehabilitation Services, based in Elizabeth, NJ, has been providing psychiatric rehabilitation programs for almost 50 years in the central and northern NJ region. www.bridgewayrehab.org. Recently, Bridgeway branched out to open a Crisis Intervention Services facility in Jersey City, NJ, and to provide Mental Health First Aid trainings in various corporate, municipal, and educational settings, including a collaboration with the NJ State Law Enforcement Crisis Intervention Team.
We are seeking funding to underwrite the costs of trainings in situations where there is no funding available for manuals, rental of space, transportation costs, etc.
Trainings are completed in one 8 hour session, with coffee and lunch breaks built in. Upon completion each participant is given a Mental Health First Aid certificate.
The manuals we use are published by Mental Health First Aid USA, which is

managed, operated, and disseminated by the: National Council for Behavioral Health, Maryland Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, and the Missouri Department of Mental Health.

story:
What Is JustThignThis?

JustSignThis.com (ex. Signmytits) is the service, where you can order the most personal and unique message on the bodies of our wonderful models. Sounds strange? Let us explain.

It is an interesting way to say "happy birthday" or impress your friends, original way to promote your company or make the best invitation for your party!

Why Did We Come to Indiegogo? 

We have already had some media attention in Poland after the launch of our first service. Lots of good reviews. But sometimes feedback was very aggressive and scandalous. We had a lot of discussions in the local media about social responsibility of startups. And we understood that tolerance was impossible without taboo breaking.

That's why we decided to start Indiegogo campaign. We want to break taboos and share our ideas with big hope for change. These are the main ideas we stand for:

  • Tolerance
  • Beauty of Body
  • Freedom of expression
  • Naturalness

We believe that with your help we can share these ideas and make our little service be a symbol of any kind of tolerance, freedom of thought and expression. Support more open and tolerant world and see what we have prepared for you...

How Are We Planning to Reach Our Goals?

You ask how we are planning to share our ideas and fight the taboos? We have found really interesting and stylish way to do it!

We came here to launch the most personal and unique campaign ever! Sounds too pretentious? Perhaps, but usually you have exactly the same perks as other backers, right? No. Not this time!

What Do We Have for You? 

We prepared absolutely personal and unique products exclusively for Indiegogo campaign. Everyone will be able to personalize every perk for himself. Write your own message, select a girl or a guy print, size for T-Shirts or model of phone. So every perk remains absolutely personal and unique. Have you seen anything like this before?

Here are products that have been prepared exclusively for Indiegogo:

  • Personal T-shirts with unique prints
  • Exclusive Phone Cases
  • Eco-bags with prints
  • Postcards with professional photos 

Every product will have your own print with message you will write by yourself! 

Excited? But we have something more for you ... You also can order a professional photo with your message of 50% discount (save $10). You will be able to choose a girl or a guy for a photo. We will start delivering images during the campaign, so you will be able to get them ASAP. We are planning to send them once per two weeks. 

How Can You Personalize Your Perks? 

We have prepared a special Indiegogo form, where you can choose all options. You need to support our campaign and select your perk first. Then use this form with e-mail used here as a backer.

The first delivery of personalized products is planed for November / December 2015.

Support JustSignThis campaign and get the most personalized perks ever!

Our T-Shirts: 

You don’t need to make signs on your body to tell everyone how you feel. Our T-Shirt will tell everything for you! Just think up your message and support us on Indiegogo. And from our part, we will send you the best T-shirt with your message on our great models. 

Our T-Shirts from only the finest quality materials. This ensures both incredible softness and durability.

We have two types of T-shirts prepared for you: 

  • JustSignThis T-shirt (with standard #JustSignThis print. Just choose a girl or a guy print type and your size)
  • Personal T-shirt (write your own message, choose a girl or a guy print type and size)

Our phone cases:

Every time you will show up with your phone everyone's eyes will be on it . Our cases are the best way to stand out from crowd!

Support us and get exclusive Phone Case with a girl or a guy print and brand new message you will think up. Choose a model of phone, also create your own message (check FAQs).

Our Eco Bags: 

Impress your friends with a new Eco Bag. I suppose they will be a little bit shocked. And probably they will ask you where to get one like that.

You can write your own message and choose a girl or a guy print.

Our Postcards: 

Do you want to have the original Postcard to surprise sweethearts or friends? Come up with an idea for a message or wish, select a type of print and get a special card for your beloved ones.

What Are We Planning to Do When We Reach our Goals? 

1) We want to make new services to break more taboos

You may think "Oh, these guys are so fancy!"...BUT, surprise-surprise, our new service will be mostly devoted to the idea of breaking "ideal body" stereotype. We are going to promote "non-standard beauty" concept. For instance, service "SignTheDadBod" with "Dad Bod" man. Same kind of offer will also appear for girls. We want to give opportunities for models with non-standard forms to gain the experience and fight against stereotypes of 90x60x90.

"At first glance, our products might be seen as a break of taboos, but we believe this is exactly what some parts of the world require to engage in an open debate about equality." - Andriy Tkachiv – CEO / Founder 

2) Add new exclusive products as perks

  • When we meet 5 000 $ we will add iPad & Tablet Cases
  • When we meet 10 000 $ we will add Hoody with personal message
  • When we meet 15 000 $ we will add special "Inception edition" of our T-Shirts...  You are looking forward for those, believe me ;)
  • More other products to come

3) Finance tolerance campaign in Poland and Russia

The tolerance campaign aims to raise awareness and cause open debate among Polish and Russians, about their homosexual countrymen. 

"We have a lot of homosexual friends here in Poland and also in Russia. And want to use our campaign, to help them fight the taboo of their homosexuality." - Maksym Volokhan – CMO / Founder 

4) Found our own clothing line

If our Indiegogo campaign succeed we will found new clothing line shipping worldwide. We will make products with best prints proposed by our customers and give everyone an opportunity to be a clothes designer. 

Other Ways You Can Help Us:

1) Share our campaign on social networks and use the hashtag:

We will appreciate that!
2) Subscribe for our Newsletter

All news about new products and promotions. Best photos from shoots and backstage. You are going to enjoy that, be sure ;) 

3) Share your opinion about us on our contact form.

Project History

The idea of JustSignThis came to Andriy Tkachiv, when he was thinking about a birthday present for his friend. He found a young woman, who wanted to write his birthday greetings on her body. Unfortunately, due to organisational problems, the gift didn't arrive on time and was not of the highest quality. 

That was the moment, when Tkachiv and his friend Maksym Volokhan made the decision to found JustSignThis (first name was SignMyTits). They also create great system which gives an opportunity for beginner models to get first experience. This ensures high quality products and fast delivery. 

Contacts

For general questions: contact@justsignthis.com
For press: media@justsignthis.com

Our website: JustSignThis.com

FAQs

How do I personalize my perk?  

Think up your message, choose a girl or a guy print, your size for T-Shirts or model of phone. So every perk will be absolutely individual and unique. Leave your perk ideas in a special form under link below:

  • justsignthis.com/indiegogo

* Please use the same e-mail which you used here as a contributor, so we can send you the right product.

What message can I write? 

Any message you like. It could be your nickname, favorite phrase or life motto. May be name of your dog or mom's favorite TV series. You have 40 characters for your creativity.

What size of T-Shirts can I order? 

Male: X, M, L, XL

Female: XS, S, M, L, XL

Cases for which phone models do you provide?

You can order cases for iPhone 5 / 5S, 6/6 Plus, 6s / 6S Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6 / S6 Edge, HTC M9, Sony Xperia Z4, Motorola Moto X and some other models, check full list in our form. 

What is Thank you photo? 

Professional photo of model's body on whom we will write few names of backers. You can choose photo of a girl or a guy. 

What is Photo with your message? 

Professional photo with your message of 50% discount (save $10). You will be able to choose a girl or a guy photo. We will start delivery of photos during the campaign and we are planning to send out them once per two weeks. 
What is Professional products set? 
We make sets, so you can save more. You need to use one message and one print type for all products in set. 

What is Products Set for a Couple? 

Set for two, so you can save more. 2x T-Shirts and Phone Cases. You could have either the same message, print type, size and phone models or the different one's.

Delivery

Poland Shipping 

We are doing secure Poland shipping, which is just extra $5.

EU Shipping

We are doing secure EU shipping, which is just extra $10.

UK Shipping 

We are doing secure UK shipping, which is just extra $15.

US Shipping 

We are doing secure US shipping, which is just extra $20.

Rest of the World Shipping

We are doing secure Worldwide shipping, which is just extra $25.

Naturalness

story:
This video explains how LifeSaverApp can save your life! 

 

LifeSaverApp is ready today to send you a link for a digital subscription.  If you sign up now, you will get your subscription at half price. 

“I have been an emergency room doctor for thirty years, I love this medical record.  It is exactly the kind of information I need to initiate comprehensive medical care and it is available instantly.  I wish everyone had this medical record – it would make my job so much easier – and more effective.  It takes the guesswork out of emergency care.” Roy Givens, M.D.

As designer of LifeSaverApp, I have years of healthcare software design experience through my practice management software, ClinicPro.   I am offering LifeSaverApp on Indiegogo as a way to get the word out quickly.  Anyone with a chronic medical condition needs a way to organize his/her medical record and LifeSaverApp provides that solution.  LifeSaverApp includes medications, diagnosed conditions, allergies, insurance coverage, emergency contacts, surgeries, hospitalizations and much more!  After ten years of development and refinement and widespread availability of the internet, LifeSaverApp can make good on its purpose - to save your life!
 

Please watch our videos and  tell your friends and family about LifeSaverApp!
