story:
What will SwaTanTra do for me?

SwaTanTra will let you find freedom from recurring muscle pain while helping to break the dependency on pain relievers or expensive and high-risk surgeries. Living in a pain-free world will open up doors to new adventures, better sleep, and an all-around healthier version of yourself. By placing the power of SwaTanTra in your fingertips, muscle pain will no longer define or complicate your life.

Make the dream happen: Bring SwaTanTra to your fingertips.

SwaTanTra's pain relieving power has the potential to increase the quality of life for both chronic and acute pain sufferers around the world. We need your help to bring this revolution to life by helping fund SwaTanTra prototype development. By combining ancient massage practices, trigger point therapy, and cutting edge Android and iOS technology, chronic muscle pain can become an issue of the past. We need your support to fund almost 400 hours of developer time @$25/hr to create this app for both iOS and Android.

 

How does Swatantra work?

SwaTanTra utilizes a two-step diagnostic sequencing, followed by a guided pain remedy process. To diagnose the source of your pain, SwaTanTra s mapping screen will help you map and mark your pain spots in 3D. Next, SwaTanTra 's symptom screen will guide you through a series of diagnostic questions using an exhaustive database to narrow down the muscles or muscle group that are causing your pain and discomfort.

SwaTanTra 's remedy screen is the most powerful part of this tool. The remedy screen will show you each of your dysfunctional muscles and will guide with detailed instructions to locate the trigger point on those muscles. You'll then be taught by SwaTanTra to massage the pain-causing trigger points using detailed instructions, videos and graphics (and, if you can't or need some assistance, SwaTanTra will locate and recommend local, qualified therapists that can help you on your path to freedom from pain). After the pain-causing trigger point has been massaged and released, SwaTanTra will guide you through the final step: stretching your newly released muscle with Yoga-like stretches to open the connective tissues within your body, allowing the life force to flow back into your targeted muscles by improving circulation.

Why was SwaTanTra created?

SwaTanTra was created by Cyriac the founder and CEO of the School of Thai Massage LLC. Cyriac is a Thai Yoga  Massage practitioner and accredited instructor who loves the work of healing and helping provide people the tools to fight pain.

Cyriac's students practice in many countries across the globe, spreading his dream of helping people to live a better, pain-free life. Cyriac is deeply troubled by the fact that most of the chronic pain conditions that people suffer from are "managed" by prescription pain killers or high-risk surgeries. Rather than keep the application of Trigger Point Therapy limited to the world of massage therapists, Cyriac wants to democratize healing and empower people around the world with this do-it-yourself treatment. With 2.5 billion people having smartphones by 2019, globally, Swatantra has the power to touch almost any individual or community and help people to have better circulation, better range of motion, and a better quality of life.

What is SwaTanTra Pro?

SwaTanTra Pro offers all of the diagnostic and tutorial based features of SwaTanTra, but is specifically designed and enhanced to be used by massage therapists, bodyworkers, healing professionals and yoga practitioners. SwaTanTra Pro will allow healing professionals like you to analyze your client's' pain patterns, instantly generating customized trigger point target maps-- saving you hours of palpation, eliminating guesswork and increasing the effectiveness of your therapy. SwaTanTra Pro acts as your efficient assistant by storing your client's data and visit details so you can quickly access them see what areas you would like focus on your next session. SwaTanTra also creates home based massage and stretching exercises that you can share with your client so you can help your clients hold on to the progress you achieved in your sessions. Finally SwaTanTra Pro provides you with a free listing of your healing services so you can get referrals from the users of SwaTanTra's basic version who need more hands-on help. 

Over the next 6 months, Cyriac plans to start training SwaTanTra Practitioners on providing palpation, massage and stretching services and tool each of them with SwaTanTra Pro. Thus creating a powerful decentralized network of bodyworkers who can locally and quickly help people in pain.

SwaTanTra in action:



SwaTanTra: Proposed Timeline

Please Join Us In Empowering People To Heal Themselves

Choose any of our Indiegogo perks to preorder your copy or support the simplification and distribution of this proven and scientific way for people like you to find freedom from pain. For partnership or equity participation opportunities please contact us at cyriac@tyms.in.

story:
What is the Brio Band and why make such a device?

Being diagnosed with diabetes is a life changing event. According to the CDC in 2014, 29.1 million people in the United States have diabetes, around 9.3% of the population. Another 86 million people are in pre diabetes and each year there are 1.7 million new diagnoses of diabetes.

This means 1.7 million people, now have to make changes to how they eat and exercise, along with having to track their blood sugar. This is really important, in that low blood sugar, or hypoglycemia, can lead to a myriad of side effects, the worst being death. Essentially, when a diabetic becomes hypoglycemic, they may experience chills, clamminess, shakiness, seizures, and even become unresponsive. When unresponsive, a diabetic is helpless; if someone isn’t around to help them or administer medication/first aid, the likelihood of survival can become slim to none.

This is how the idea came to be, as one of the founder’s friends has had this happen multiple times.

They are still around today, but many diabetics do not get nearly as lucky. While deaths due to diabetes is a difficult stat to track, as it is usually attributed to organ failure or some other cause, the knowledge of the possibility is definitely known to the diabetic and the people close to them.

Parents wonder if their child is keeping track of their blood sugar as they should be, or if they are taking their medicine in a timely manner.

Others may have a diabetic parent living on their own and wish they could have a way to be kept in the loop on their glucose levels and vital stats.

Diabetics themselves may be worried that, the next time their blood sugar dips too low, they may not have someone nearby to alert their loved ones or emergency personnel of their crisis. So this is where the Brio Band comes in.

The Brio Band is designed to be a smart glucometer watch with a built in alarm for low blood sugar episodes. When paired with the companion app on your smart phone, the band is able to send an alert out to friends and family of a potential low blood sugar episode, while also producing a local noise alarm. These episodes are detected by either the built in glucometer or using a predictive sensor platform that tests for symptoms of low blood sugar.

It also includes features on the app and watch that can help manage a user’s weight, exercise, and food intake. It also includes a prescription reminder, health calculators, and other features. An additional optional casing around the watch includes a built in lancet system and strip storage creating an all-in-one kit that conveniently sits on your wrist.

If this device could help to save one life, then it would be considered an outright success. But where we believe it will have the greatest impact is in providing peace of mind to diabetics and the people closest to them.

Since we want to create a device for the people, we want feedback from you! Let us know via comments or email about features, improvements, or changes that you would like to see or if you have any questions/input at all. We really want to know what we can do to improve our device!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

Additional Features:

An additional case that goes around the watch that includes a built-in lancet and strip storage to allow for easy blood sugar testing without carrying a full kit.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What we need:

We are still in the design/prototype stage of our device and need to finish both the hardware and application design. Our goal of $200,000 is going to be used to cover the finishing of the hardware design & companion application, going through testing and FDA approval, and tooling/manufacturing costs. Here is a basic timeline of our post-IndieGoGo plans.

Nov. 2016 – Start final design process

Late Dec. 2016 – Finish final design

Jan. 2017 – Start testing/FDA approval process

March 2017 – Start production/tool ordering process

May 2017 – Start shipping first units

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About HC&T Solutions/The Team

Health Care and Technology Solutions LLC is a startup company that focuses on medical/health products and research. The company was founded in 2015 and operates in Grand Rapids Michigan. HC&T was founded on the idea of making a healthier community through products, research, and outreach. We believe that our company can have a much larger impact on people's lives than just the products we make. We want to improve the communities we live in by helping established local and national non-profits and also by creating new outreach programs/classes.

Learn more about us and the team here:

http://www.hct-solutions.com/about

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Brio Band/HC&T FAQ

 

How does the low blood sugar alarm work?

There are two ways that the alarm system process can be triggered.

1.) Using the built in glucometer, once the watch reads that your blood sugar is below a certain threshold (around 70-80 mg/dl) …

OR

2.) Using the built in sensors to detect the physical symptoms of low blood sugar…

The system will send data to the companion app on your smart phone will forward a message to anyone you want. The watch will also have options to beep/vibrate locally, to alert a nearby person and include the ability cancel the forwarding process within 30 seconds of the device registering a potential episode.

 

How does the sensor detect that there is low blood sugar?

Looking at what the typical physical symptoms are during a hypoglycemic episode, we wanted to measure any signs using sensors on a device. What sets our product apart is how we use that information once it’s collected. By using a form of machine learning, the device is able to recognize patterns of physical symptoms that occur during an episode of low blood sugar. It uses these patterns to classify if the incoming inputs are a low blood sugar episode or not. This algorithm of determining patterns is unique per person and can be tweaked to help increase the accuracy of the watch.

 

How long does the battery last?

Our minimal goal is to have it last at least 1 full day per full charge, while multiple days is the what we are aiming for. We know that for this product to reach its peak potential, it must be worn as much as possible. The less time it needs charging, the better. This is not an issue we take lightly and are designing a lot of the watch around reducing energy consumption and extending the battery life.

 

When will the product ship?

We are aiming to launch in late May of 2017. You can check the timeline included above to see what our planned progress time table is!

 

Will we ship/sell the Brio Band outside of the US?

Due to regulations differing in each country regarding medical devices, we are limiting the release of the Brio Band initially to the US. We will NOT ship outside of the US. We would like to bring this device to other countries as soon as possible, but we have no time set as of yet. So stay tuned for more information as we know more!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other ways you can help!

If you are unable to donate, there are other ways you can help! Share our campaign on Facebook/Twitter, like our Facebook page and spread the word about what we’re doing!

Also again, any feedback is a huge help to us. Let us know what you think, any questions you have, or any input on changes in the comment section!
story_txt:
What is the Brio Band and why make such a device?Being diagnosed with diabetes is a life changing event. According to the CDC in 2014, 29.1 million people in the United States have diabetes, around 9.3% of the population. Another 86 million people are in pre diabetes and each year there are 1.7 million new diagnoses of diabetes.This means 1.7 million people, now have to make changes to how they eat and exercise, along with having to track their blood sugar. This is really important, in that low blood sugar, or hypoglycemia, can lead to a myriad of side effects, the worst being death. Essentially, when a diabetic becomes hypoglycemic, they may experience chills, clamminess, shakiness, seizures, and even become unresponsive. When unresponsive, a diabetic is helpless; if someone isn’t around to help them or administer medication/first aid, the likelihood of survival can become slim to none.This is how the idea came to be, as one of the founder’s friends has had this happen multiple times.They are still around today, but many diabetics do not get nearly as lucky. While deaths due to diabetes is a difficult stat to track, as it is usually attributed to organ failure or some other cause, the knowledge of the possibility is definitely known to the diabetic and the people close to them.Parents wonder if their child is keeping track of their blood sugar as they should be, or if they are taking their medicine in a timely manner.Others may have a diabetic parent living on their own and wish they could have a way to be kept in the loop on their glucose levels and vital stats.Diabetics themselves may be worried that, the next time their blood sugar dips too low, they may not have someone nearby to alert their loved ones or emergency personnel of their crisis. So this is where the Brio Band comes in.The Brio Band is designed to be a smart glucometer watch with a built in alarm for low blood sugar episodes. When paired with the companion app on your smart phone, the band is able to send an alert out to friends and family of a potential low blood sugar episode, while also producing a local noise alarm. These episodes are detected by either the built in glucometer or using a predictive sensor platform that tests for symptoms of low blood sugar.It also includes features on the app and watch that can help manage a user’s weight, exercise, and food intake. It also includes a prescription reminder, health calculators, and other features. An additional optional casing around the watch includes a built in lancet system and strip storage creating an all-in-one kit that conveniently sits on your wrist.If this device could help to save one life, then it would be considered an outright success. But where we believe it will have the greatest impact is in providing peace of mind to diabetics and the people closest to them.Since we want to create a device for the people, we want feedback from you! Let us know via comments or email about features, improvements, or changes that you would like to see or if you have any questions/input at all. We really want to know what we can do to improve our device!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Features:Additional Features:An additional case that goes around the watch that includes a built-in lancet and strip storage to allow for easy blood sugar testing without carrying a full kit.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What we need:We are still in the design/prototype stage of our device and need to finish both the hardware and application design. Our goal of $200,000 is going to be used to cover the finishing of the hardware design & companion application, going through testing and FDA approval, and tooling/manufacturing costs. Here is a basic timeline of our post-IndieGoGo plans.Nov. 2016 – Start final design processLate Dec. 2016 – Finish final designJan. 2017 – Start testing/FDA approval processMarch 2017 – Start production/tool ordering processMay 2017 – Start shipping first units------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------About HC&T Solutions/The TeamHealth Care and Technology Solutions LLC is a startup company that focuses on medical/health products and research. The company was founded in 2015 and operates in Grand Rapids Michigan. HC&T was founded on the idea of making a healthier community through products, research, and outreach. We believe that our company can have a much larger impact on people's lives than just the products we make. We want to improve the communities we live in by helping established local and national non-profits and also by creating new outreach programs/classes.Learn more about us and the team here:http://www.hct-solutions.com/about------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Brio Band/HC&T FAQ How does the low blood sugar alarm work?There are two ways that the alarm system process can be triggered.1.) Using the built in glucometer, once the watch reads that your blood sugar is below a certain threshold (around 70-80 mg/dl) …OR2.) Using the built in sensors to detect the physical symptoms of low blood sugar…The system will send data to the companion app on your smart phone will forward a message to anyone you want. The watch will also have options to beep/vibrate locally, to alert a nearby person and include the ability cancel the forwarding process within 30 seconds of the device registering a potential episode. How does the sensor detect that there is low blood sugar?Looking at what the typical physical symptoms are during a hypoglycemic episode, we wanted to measure any signs using sensors on a device. What sets our product apart is how we use that information once it’s collected. By using a form of machine learning, the device is able to recognize patterns of physical symptoms that occur during an episode of low blood sugar. It uses these patterns to classify if the incoming inputs are a low blood sugar episode or not. This algorithm of determining patterns is unique per person and can be tweaked to help increase the accuracy of the watch. How long does the battery last?Our minimal goal is to have it last at least 1 full day per full charge, while multiple days is the what we are aiming for. We know that for this product to reach its peak potential, it must be worn as much as possible. The less time it needs charging, the better. This is not an issue we take lightly and are designing a lot of the watch around reducing energy consumption and extending the battery life. When will the product ship?We are aiming to launch in late May of 2017. You can check the timeline included above to see what our planned progress time table is! Will we ship/sell the Brio Band outside of the US?Due to regulations differing in each country regarding medical devices, we are limiting the release of the Brio Band initially to the US. We will NOT ship outside of the US. We would like to bring this device to other countries as soon as possible, but we have no time set as of yet. So stay tuned for more information as we know more!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Other ways you can help!If you are unable to donate, there are other ways you can help! Share our campaign on Facebook/Twitter, like our Facebook page and spread the word about what we’re doing!Also again, any feedback is a huge help to us. story:
Yogurt Reimagined : World’s Super Snack

"Yoconut Dairy Free is delicious, entirely plant-based, and naturally rehydrates."

WE believe there is POWER PROMISED in eating good food.  Good food fuels more than just your body, it fuels your every cell so that you can do things you love and create your best life.

This mission is what guided us to create a line of super snacks that reimagines what “perfect” yogurt can be, if it could made with all plant-based ingredients and absolutely delicious.

After 3+ years, with more than 300 recipes tries, we did it! 

Inside every Yoconut cup is thick and creamy coconut yogurt and our sheer joy and dedication for quality.

Our farmers grow our nutritiously rich coconuts in thriving soils and we apply the utmost quality standards and care to make every cup great.

 

Original 

This is the recipe that started it all - made with all parts of the coconuts - coconut water and coconut milk. It is perfect for breakfast, snack, or anytime you want a super snack. 

 

Madagascar Vanilla Bean

Heavenly Madagascar Vanilla Bean mixes in with our Original Yoconut coconut yogurt, creating the superb taste of Vanilla Bean coconut yogurt. A must try for vanilla lovers!

 

 

Lemon Cream 

Sweet citrus California lemon folds into our Original Yoconut coconut yogurt creating the most robust flavor. You will think you are eating lemon curd or lemon cheesecake. 

 

What makes Yoconut Special? 

Everything... seriously. From our ingredients, choosing what to put and what to left out, to our amazing taste and texture, we want you to enjoy the wonderful journey that good food can take you.

 

 

 

 

 

Our Partners

https://thrivemarket.com/

https://www.gr8nola.com/

 

http://www.porchcoffees.com/

Our Story

YoconutDF Founder Bonnie Lau loves to eat! She is a foodie of all things delicious and dairy free, and is a runner, a dancer, a yogurt maker.  Bonnie realized the world needed a better yogurt when she was training for her first marathon – she wondered: what if the perfect yogurt can be made with plant-based ingredients?  

She teamed up with two food-loving scientists and together they invested more than 3 years reimagining the most delicious, velvety combination, to bring the magic of eating to a whole new level. In fact, Yoconut is uber delicious and healthy.  It has been nominated for the 2016 Veggie Award for “Best Vegan Yogurt.” 

There is power promised in eating food that is good for you. It fuels your every cell, giving you the extra boost so you can create your best life.  Plus, the buzz of happiness is priceless. Enjoy the wonderful journey that good food can take you. Let Yoconut unleash your inner power to achieve life’s potential.

 

Why Indiegogo

We're ready to scale YoconutDF and bring YoconutDF to a store near you. The money raised from this campaign will go directly into the business and help us to expand our operations. To make that leap, we're using the power of Indiegogo to help us pay for better packaging, higher-grade production equipment, and larger ingredient orders. 

Testimonial

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways to Help

We’d be eternally grateful if you can share our campaign via your social networks (e.g., Facebook, and Twitter), email, text, or any other way you can think of! And share your favorite way to enjoy #YoconutDF and you could be feature on our Instagram @YoconutDF.

 

 

Risk and challenges 

We have worked hard to mitigate risk but this is our first Indiegogo so naturally there's an element of unknown involved. That said, we worked hard on this for 3+ years and also have been selling at Fort Mason farmers market since June, 2016, so we are confident that our Indiegogo debut will not disappoint.

Supply risk - The price and availability of coconuts could present challenges. 

Production risk - There is a chance we would have to move from our current production site or our production outgrow it. At that time, we will look for another facility to continue making delicious, healthy, and allergy-friendly Yoconut.

story:
Dear Friends, Hello
My name is Jonas Vaitkus. Currently I'm going through a very difficult time in my life. Absurdly, I have been accused of possession and distribution of large quantities of cannibis. This accusation is false and my freedom is at real risk. I face 10-15 years in prison! This possibilty has shadowed me for the last 2 years. This trial requires a lot of strength, time and funding all of which I am now lacking. I am drained.
This is my story....
I have an old farm in Savidonys village, Lithuania. I spent much of my time there and it was always a welcoming place for friends and aquaintances. I grew vegetables, fruits and a few cannabis plants for personnal use. It is important to note that the plants I grew were not  a cultivated species. They were wild and contained minor amounts of THC. In other words I grew Hemp. Growing along side my tomatoes they served as protection against various vegetable diseaces, worms and even moles. I used the seeds for food, teas and the leaves were great for my sauna whisks. I never hid this from family, neighbours or friends.

Hemp  used to be widespread in Lithuanian villages used for the purposes mentioned above. It was never illegal to grow or store Hemp. One can even buy Hemp seeds today in Lithuanian shops and street fairs.
After the 30th of July 2012, things changed.
To earn extra cash I rented out my farm house and land to the organisers of a Psytrance Festival called Ragana (The Witch Ritual) that promoted traditional Lithuanian culture. Permission was granted by the local Government for the event to go ahead.  Many positive, like minded people heard the call and came from all over.
Despite the good energy neighbours called the police in order to reduce the music volume. Police came and got the impression that drugs were being used. Consequently, without my presence, the farm was searched and some festival participants arrested. The Hemp plants I grew were discovered and confiscated. The plants were weighed by police with the soil, roots, leaves and stems. This action resulted in the development of far more serious and absurd accusations against me.  I was accused of producing and distributing drugs for the purpose of financial gain. A long troublesome trail began. I was held responsible for the entire Festival.
I went ahead with the trail and hired a lawyer, convinced it would be over soon and I would only have to pay a fine for loud music as I was not the organiser of the event I only rented out my land.
 I lost my good reputation  and public service job as a photographer for Lithuanian Genocide and Resistance Research Center. For the past 2 years I have been unemployed earning money here and there through odd jobs. The debt to my lawyer of 2 years continues to grow. I no longer have the finances to pay. The organisers of the festival and false friends have abandoned me.
I am in a hopeless situation I cannot resolve alone. I would greatly appreciate any help I can get in this battle against the absurdity of the law. Believing in your kindness, I ask for your understanding and any financial support you can give.

story:
The unique combination of ingredients found in MITOflex promote joint health, energy, strength, endurance, focus, and performance all in one easy to take supplement.  MITOflex has vitamins, glucosamine, chondroitin, anti-inflammatories, electrolytes, herbal extracts and our unique PQQ additive. Our experience and trials with MITOflex shows it works.  Published studies at the National Institute of Health support the findings *. 

>>> Read about Catalytic Cycling Click Here <<<  

The peace of mind of profound nourishment





– a whole picture approach to high performance –

I am passionate about getting this product out there because I know what it’s done for me personally and I want to share its benefits with others.  I was in my fifties, out of shape, and diagnosed with Stage 4 osteoarthritis. So there was no way I could work out to get myself back in great shape. I was trapped.  There had to be a way out.

I decided to take a whole picture approach, feeding my body with a range of nutrients including vitamins, electrolytes (minerals and special salts), glucosamine, and certain herbal extracts. But the most important thing I came across in my research was cell function. I discovered I needed to rekindle a cell function process called Mitochondrial Biogenesis.

When I did, everything changed for me. I went to my doctor for a physical and got an A+. For the first time in 5 years my blood work came back completely normal, I’d been borderline Type II diabetic but now showed a dead center normal result. Astonishingly, I hardly even realize I have stage 4 osteoarthritis, which had been so bad it made me limp. All my doctor could say was: “keep doing whatever you’re doing! *”   

I’m more energetic, stronger both physically and mentally, and at the same time, I feel relaxed. And my joints are pain-free!

After manufacturing a small batch of MITOflex and seeing other people start to experience the same wonderful benefits, I realized I have to find a way to share this formulation.



I believe so deeply in the benefits of MITOflex that I have invested in a large first batch for initial sale and wider trials. 

I’m an engineer and scientist, not a salesman.  Your support can help get MITOflex out there. Selling this first batch through this campaign will enable me to afford proper marketing to bring MitoFlex to a larger audience!

MITOflex Energy Foundations is manufactured professionally in an FDA regulated and inspected facility to make sure it is safe for the general public.

The 15+ ingredients in MITOflex cost much more individually and are impractical to take on a daily basis. MITOflex puts it all together in one easy to take powder at an affordable cost.

The MITOflex experience will give you the great boost your body deserves.  Help make it possible for others to hear about and experience these powerful benefits in the future as well.

Thank you for taking the time to go through this campaign.  Please consider supporting with an order for MITOflex Energy Foundations today!



It's about the whole picture, not a single ingredient.


Lower cost & more convenient

There is solid science behind the powerful combination of ingredients in MITOflex. Each ingredient supports a part of the end goal - strength, joint health, energy, positive attitude, and a sense of well being. Together they help give you the foundation you need to perform at your best.

With the right cell function support at a cellular level everything starts working better. From the first few days of use you will notice a difference. After about 3 weeks, cells start producing more energy, and you should expect to feel stronger both mentally and physically.



Basically, the mitochondria use the food and nutrients we eat to produce energy. The mitochondria’s main role in the cell is to take glucose and use the energy stored to make ATP in a process called cellular respiration. This ATP is then released from the mitochondria, and broken down by the other parts of the cell to power themselves. Muscles use ATP when they contract, the more ATP the better.

If you don’t eat the right stuff, the energy isn’t there. That’s where MITOflex makes the difference, providing the cellular level strength you need to be your youthful best.

There are no peaks and valleys, like with energy shots. Just a steady long-term feeling of alertness, energy and health. This is complemented with deep and refreshing sleep. The effect is amazing -- I would almost call it miraculous. And I’m an engineer!

I’ve spent nearly two years getting to this point. Doctors have been consulted to make sure they approve of the use of this combination of ingredients (they were highly encouraging that it was "all good stuff!"). The staff scientist at the FDA-regulated facility where MITOflex is manufactured approved the formula. Everything we use is considered by the FDA to be over-the-counter food or vitamins.  


I have purchased a production run of MITOflex and I'm making it available FIRST through this Indiegogo campaign at a special introductory price.  


It's about the whole picture, not a single ingredient.

Be among the first to experience the beautiful benefits this proven product, and help bring it to market just by ordering for yourself. 


We expect to start shipping on November 1st.

As with all supplements you should show the supplement fact panel to your doctor and read the supplement facts sheet completely.  If you have known allergies the allergens are listed on the label.

* - These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.  This applies to all statements made herein.

    Trial Participant Age 26

  • "My peace of mind increased."
  • "I'm 26 years old and my knees feel a lot better when I run!"
  • "My joints just feel a more lubricated."
  • "I've have an energy level increase, I just want to go do things."
  • "My nails are growing a lot faster."
  • "My sleep quality has really improved, I now sleep solid all night and wake up more refreshed!"
  • "Overall energy has increased and it's hard to describe it's like a calm energy."
  • "My resting alertness in increased, it's like I'm at peace but ready to go."
  • "I have more confidence in my physical ability which allows me to relax more."
  • "My mind is wandering less."
  • "I'm a MITOflex user for life."

    Trial Participant Age 45

  • "I have more energy, I mean when I play sports I'm getting there more often, remarkable."
  • "I'm sleeping better"
  • "I have had severe pain in my hip, after using MITOflex 3 weeks - it seems better"
  • "Given the choice - I will continue using MITOflex!"

    Trial Participant Age 55

  • "I just feel good."
  • "I'm sleeping better"
  • "I regularly feel like working out, doing things - just have energy."
  • "My nails are growing a lot faster."
  • "I was borderline Type II diabetic. After MPBI my bloodwork came back normal."
  • "Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness (DOMS) has virtually disappeared. I'm in the gym whenever I want now. Not sidelined by muscle pain."
  • "I'm back to building muscle mass, losing weight, I just FEEL much younger."
  • "The pain in my joints would break my concentration and that kept me from developing all the strength I knew I had. MITOflex fixed that, the weights are increasing and I just feel strong."
  • "I'm not as fatigued after a long day's work anymore."
  • "I have more energy on the courts. I'm getting there more often, moving better!"
  • "I'd swear I'm less gray and there are some fine hairs coming in where I was bald."

    Trial Participant Age 54

  • I used to be anxious and nervous, would wake up several times a night, I had pain in my joints and they would swell when I exercised. I was fatigued at the end of the day after work. After using MPBI for more than 8 weeks, things have completely changed. The little things don't bother me anymore. I'm a lot more calm. Stress at work has disappeared, I can focus now really well. I'm a lot more productive at work and at the gym. On the courts - I can get there again. I'm working out whenever I want now - I don't get sore two days later, recovery is like when I was in my early 20's, I'm actually in my 50's. This stuff is like using high octane fuel instead of low grade. I just feel and do better.

electrolytes (minerals and special salts), glucosamine, and certain herbal
extracts. But the most important thing I came across in my research was cell function. I discovered I needed to
rekindle a cell function process called Mitochondrial Biogenesis.
When I did, everything changed for me. I went to my doctor for a physical
and got an A+. For the first time in 5 years my blood work came back completely
normal, I’d been borderline Type II diabetic but now showed a dead center normal result.
Astonishingly, I hardly even realize I have stage 4 osteoarthritis, which had
been so bad it made me limp. All my doctor could say was: “keep doing whatever
you’re doing! *”   
I’m more energetic, stronger both physically and mentally, and at the same time, I
feel relaxed. And my joints are pain-free!
After manufacturing a small batch of MITOflex and seeing other people start to experience
the same wonderful benefits, I realized I have to find a way to share this
formulation.








I believe so deeply in
the benefits of MITOflex that I have invested in a large first batch for initial sale
and wider trials. 
I’m an engineer and
scientist, not a salesman.  Your support
can help get MITOflex out there. Selling this first batch through this campaign
will enable me to afford proper marketing to bring MitoFlex to a larger audience!
MITOflex Energy
Foundations is manufactured professionally in an FDA regulated and inspected
facility to make sure it is safe for the general public. 
The 15+ ingredients in
MITOflex cost much more individually and are impractical to take on a daily
basis. MITOflex puts it all together in one easy to take powder at an
affordable cost. 
The MITOflex
experience will give you the great boost your body deserves.  Help make it possible for others to hear
about and experience these powerful benefits in the future as well.
Thank you
for taking the time to go through this campaign.  Please consider
supporting with an order for MITOflex Energy Foundations today!






It's about the whole picture, not a single ingredient.



Lower cost & more convenient
There is solid science behind the powerful combination of
ingredients in MITOflex. Each ingredient supports a part of the end goal -
strength, joint health, energy, positive attitude, and a sense of well being.
Together they help give you the foundation you need to perform at your best. 
With the right cell function support at a cellular level
everything starts working better. From the first few days of use you will
notice a difference. After about 3 weeks, cells start producing more energy, and you should expect to feel stronger both mentally and physically.





Basically, the mitochondria use the food and nutrients we eat
to produce energy. The mitochondria’s main role in the cell is to take
glucose and use the energy stored to make ATP in a process called cellular
respiration. This ATP is then released from the mitochondria, and broken down
by the other parts of the cell to power themselves. Muscles use ATP when they
contract, the more ATP the better.
If you don’t eat the right stuff, the energy isn’t there. That’s
where MITOflex makes the difference, providing the cellular level strength you
need to be your youthful best. 
There are no peaks and valleys, like with energy shots. Just a
steady long-term feeling of alertness, energy and health. This is complemented
with deep and refreshing sleep. The effect is amazing -- I would almost call it
miraculous. And I’m an engineer! 
I’ve spent nearly two years getting to this point. Doctors have
been consulted to make sure they approve of the use of this combination of
ingredients (they were highly encouraging that it was "all good
stuff!"). The staff scientist at the FDA-regulated facility where MITOflex
is manufactured approved the formula. Everything we use is considered by the FDA to
be over-the-counter food or vitamins.  


I have purchased a
production run of MITOflex and I'm making it available FIRST through this
Indiegogo campaign at a special introductory price.  




It's about the whole picture, not a single ingredient.




Be among the first to experience the beautiful benefits this
proven product, and help bring it to market just by ordering for yourself. 


  



We expect to start shipping on November 1st.
As with all
supplements you should show the supplement fact panel to your doctor and read the supplement facts sheet completely.  If you have known allergies the allergens are listed on the label.

* -
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
 This applies to all statements made herein.


Trial Participant Age 26

"My peace of mind increased."
"I'm 26 years old and my knees feel a lot better when I run!"
"My joints just feel a more lubricated."
"I've have an energy level increase, I just want to go do things."
"My nails are growing a lot faster."
"My sleep quality has really improved, I now sleep solid all night and wake up more refreshed!"
"Overall energy has increased and it's hard to describe it's like a calm energy."
"My resting alertness in increased, it's like I'm at peace but ready to go."
"I have more confidence in my physical ability which allows me to relax more."
"My mind is wandering less."
"I'm a MITOflex user for life."


Trial Participant Age 45

"I have more energy, I mean when I play sports I'm getting there more often, remarkable."
"I'm sleeping better"
"I have had severe pain in my hip, after using MITOflex 3 weeks - it seems better"

"Given the choice - I will continue using MITOflex!"


Trial Participant Age 55

"I just feel good."
"I'm sleeping better"
"I regularly feel like working out, doing things - just have energy."
"My nails are growing a lot faster."
"I was borderline Type II diabetic.  After MPBI my bloodwork came back normal."
"Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness (DOMS) has virtually disappeared.  I'm in the gym whenever I want now.  Not sidelined by muscle pain."
"I'm back to building muscle mass, losing weight, I just FEEL much younger."
"The pain in my joints would break my concentration and that kept me from developing all the strength I knew I had.  MITOflex fixed that, the weights are increasing and I just feel strong."
"I'm not as fatigued after a long day's work anymore."
"I have more energy on the courts.  I'm getting there more often, moving better!"
"I'd swear I'm less gray and there are some fine hairs coming in where I was bald."


Trial Participant Age 54

I used to be anxious and nervous, would wake up several times a night,
                    I had pain in my joints and they would swell when I exercised.  I was fatigued at the end of the day after work.  
                    After using MPBI for more than 8 weeks, things have completely changed.  
                    The little things don't bother me anymore.   I'm a lot more calm. Stress at work has disappeared, 
                    I can focus now really well.   I'm a lot more productive at work and at the gym.  On the courts - 
                    I can get there again.  I'm working out whenever I want now - I don't get sore two days later, recovery 
                    is like when I was in my early 20's, I'm actually in my 50's.  This stuff is like using high octane fuel 
                    instead of low grade.  I just feel and do better.

story:
The Problem With Bleeding

Death from traumatic injury is the #1 killer of young people worldwide, and leads to more years of productive life lost than any other illness including cancer and heart disease. Uncontrolled bleeding is the cause of death in more than half of the patients that die. However, survivors can still have severe complications. Reversing uncontrolled bleeding as fast as possible is critical to trauma care, the longer you wait the more likely someone is to die. Transfusing a patient who does not need it can lead to complications and possibly death. Since it is not always obvious which patients need transfusions and which ones do not, the SCAN-R5 can determine this.

 

SCAN-R5: The Solution

Stasys has developed the SCAN-R5 technology to determine a patient’s transfusion needs in less than 5 minutes. The SCAN-R5 enables doctors to find which patients need transfusions so that life saving care is given quickly. Equally important, unnecessary transfusions can be prevented, which avoids complications and protects blood supplies that are a precious and limited resource. The SCAN-R5 enables rapid and smart clinical decisions that can save lives in the US and worldwide. We NEED YOUR HELP to get the device into the hands of doctors and hospitals.

 

The Risks of Blood Transfusions

Blood clots can both save and kill a person. When arteries are cut, blood clots are needed to seal off the wound. However, when they form unnecessarily, in the case of deep vein thrombosis (DVT) for example, they can dislodge and cause a stroke. People taking anti-clotting medications (aspirin, warfarin/coumadin, xarelto, Plavix, etc…) frequently take a variety of drugs, and in a variety of doses, but everyone’s blood has different sensitivities to these drugs requiring personalization. The Stasys SCAN-R5 can identify an individual’s sensitivity to medication to delicately balance bleeding risk with healthy clot formation.

 

Strained Blood Bank Resources

An additional complication is that blood products are in high demand but short supply. They can be severely depleted during mass casualty events like natural disasters or major traffic accidents. For example, in the Pacific Northwest of the United States, 900 donors a day are needed to supply trauma, surgery and cancer patients. A single car accident victim with coagulopathy might require as much as 50 liters of blood, or 100 donors worth of blood to stabilize. The developing world has even greater shortages of blood products, receiving only about 1/7th the number of donors for the same need. The SCAN-R5 can help manage these life saving precious resources by directing blood to those who need it and simultaneously lowering risk of unnecessary transfusion.

 

 

Anti-Clotting Medication Detection

When taking anti-clotting medications, a physician and patient should know how well it is working - too low of a dose leads to clot growth (risk of thrombosis) while a high dose causes bleeding risk to skyrocket (coagulopathy). Every person’s blood clots differently and medication affects everyone very differently. The best treatment should be a personalized treatment. The SCAN-R5 directly measures clotting for an individual patient in the doctor’s office, thereby enabling the right dosage right away.

 

The SCAN-R5 technology has been proven to work in two independently operated trials at the main trauma hospitals in Seattle & Houston. The users included ER doctors, nurses, research coordinators, and lab technicians. Through each trial we have learned a great deal about the workflow in the hospitals, the urgency of decision making in the pre-hospital and ER settings, and the best way to positively benefit patient outcomes. The system uses mechanical activation of blood cells, meaning no reagent mixing, pipetting or blood handling has to be done by the user, a far departure from existing devices which require a number of pipetting, timing, and handling steps that can introduce user error. The sensors measure micro-clot force, which is the mechanism by which blood adheres to blood vessel walls and forms stable clots. Strong clots are needed to stop the bleeding in trauma. Weak clots are unstable and cannot stop bleeding effectively. The Stasys SCAN-R5 measures the force of a clot and thereby identifies whether a person has strong or weak clots. We are confident in the technology, usability, and benefits the device can provide to patients.

 

The three of us at Stasys are dedicated to getting this technology into the field and into practice to benefit society. We are not a giant conglomerate medical device company that has millions of dollars to pay for teams of engineers and scientists. Instead, we’ve been able to get as far as we have through startup scrappiness and modest research grants through the National Science Foundation, and Washington state based life science research agencies. Crowdfunding at this stage of the project helps us cross the gap between traditional research funding and regulatory approval. To do this, we need to make multiple copies of the device and mass-manufacture tens of thousands of sensor cards. This costs A LOT. However, if we can clear this stage, the threshold of manufacturing will be low enough that we’ll be able to put devices in progressively smaller hospitals and sites in the US and worldwide that otherwise would not be able to utilize the system. This is where we believe the SCAN-R5 will have the greatest impact and save the most lives. We are working extremely hard to make this a reality to help trauma patients. Your help is greatly appreciated!

 

 

The Stasys Team

Dr. Ari Karchin - Chief Operating Officer at Stasys Medical. He has over 15 years experience as a design engineer and scientific researcher in the fields of tissue engineering, biomechanics, and hematology. Ari holds a PhD in Bioengineering from the University of Washington and MS and BS degrees in Biomedical Engineering and Mechanical Engineering, respectively, from the University of California, Davis. In addition, Ari holds a certificate in Medical Devices & Commercialization from the University of Washington.

Dr. Lucas Ting - Principal Engineer at Stasys Medical who co-invented the SCAN-R5 technology and has worked on the project since its inception. Lucas is a multidisciplinary engineer and scientist with focuses on blood physiology, bioreactors, microfluidics, MEMs, and medical devices. He holds a MS and PhD in mechanical engineering from the University of Washington and a BS in mechanical engineering from the University of Illinois Urbana Champaign.

Annie Smith - Research Scientist and Lab Manager at Stasys Medical. She manages the Stasys laboratory testing sites, conducts experiments and assists in the development and hand-fabrication of testing cards. She holds a BS in Biochemistry from the University of Missouri.

 

Stasys was founded in late 2012 to help medical doctors, like co-founder Dr. Nathan White, make better decisions about patient care and ultimately save lives. Currently, Stasys is comprised of the above team of three people, but we could not have made it this far without the support and guidance from the leading experts on our advisory boards.

Dr. Nate Sniadecki - acting CTO for Stasys Medical. He is a professor of Mechanical Engineering at UW, and world-renowned expert in the field of microfluidics and micropost technology for cellular traction force measurement

Dr. Nathan White - acting CMO for Stasys Medical. He is a professor of Emergency Medicine at UW, and is both an academic expert in the field of coagulopathy while clinically treating patients with coagulopathy on a daily basis.

Clinical Advisory Board:

John Holcomb, MD - Former Trauma Surgeon at Army’s Institute of Surgical Research and Chief of Acute Care Surgery at UT Health

Karim Brohi, MD - Professor of Trauma Sciences at the London School of Medicine

Pär Johansson, MD, DSc, MBA - Director of Transfusion Medicine Rigshospitalet, Denmark

Marc Maegele, MD, PhD - Professor of Traumatology Cologne-Merheim Medical Center

Business Advisory Board:

Lonnie Edelheit, PhD - Senior VP R&D GE (ret)

Chris Porter, PhD - Serial Med Device Entrepreneur

Trevor Moody - President TM Strategic Advisors

 

 

 

Thank You

Please share this campaign with anyone who may support your passion for projects that will have a global impact, and help us get the word out about the SCAN-R5! With your support, we can gain valuable information about the effect of anti-clotting medications on an individual, and help doctors smartly monitor blood product supplies ensuring supplies for those in critical need. Together, we can put the R5 in the hands of doctors, quickly measure clotting power, and radically improve treatment of trauma and surgery and cancer patients. Thank you for your support of this life saving technology.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

Any medical device project faces risks in acceptance and usage. We understand these risks, and have been working since the early phases of the project to engage with users and stakeholders in the hospital. We have received tremendous excitement and support from doctors and other medical professionals regarding the benefits that this device can provide. So far, the range of testing data we’ve collected is substantial and very encouraging, and will be the foundation toward acceptance of the technology into critical emergency care.

A significant obstacle we, and other medical devices, face is the regulatory pathway. Through expert consultation, we are confident that our case is sound for the minimal 510(k) route with a clear predicate.

 

F.A.Q

Q: I have heard about other companies that promise a lot of measurements from a small volume of blood that ultimately turned out to be not reliable and accurate, is that the case here?
A: We have published peer-reviewed methods and data that describe our technology and results. Our human trauma trials have shown significant detection for transfusion requirements and were run by third parties. Now we need your help getting the system into more doctors’ hands.

Q: How much blood does your test use?
A: A single complete test uses about 0.5 mL of blood. In comparison, a blood donation is typically about 500 mL, or half a liter of blood. This small blood volume is more than suitable for emergency care and even makes the system suitable for use in pediatrics in the future.

Q: Is your system easy to use?
A: We’ve designed the device with operator ease of use in mind, in order to convey the most important information about clotting response to the doctors. We’ve used feedback from multiple human factor trials to create an interface that is fast to understand and act upon.

Q: What is the next trial and your timeline for getting the machine into hospitals?
A: We have partners at multiple trauma centers in the US and globally that have expressed interest in participating in the next phase of trauma trials. These will allow us to obtain FDA clearance necessary for market introduction. This trial is not cheap, so we need your help. Based on our experience with previously completed trials, we expect this to take 6-12 months to complete.

Q: Have any additional questions?
A: Let us know!

story:
Who We Are/What We're Doing

  • We're Sam and Eli, biomedical engineering students at Duke.
  • We're building a new way to transfer disabled patients from bed to wheelchair so they can spend more time out of bed and interact with their loved ones and communities.
  • In homes, hospitals, and nursing facilities, patient mobility is a medical necessity, yet existing transfer methods are slow, difficult, and dangerous.
  • About 10 million people in the US face this problem. As Baby Boomers retire, this number will more than double by 2040.
  • Our new device is quick, safe, comfortable, and easy-to-use. It's a win-win-win for patients, caregivers, and caregiving facilities.

How You Can Help

  • Please back our campaign with a donation!
  • Your contribution will help us raise $10,000 total: $5,000 to be eligible for the Duke Startup Challenge summer program, and $5,000 to expand our existing prototype.
  • Expanding the prototype will make it portable, so we can bring it to nursing homes and get feedback from caregivers. Getting their input is crucial to our development process. The money will go to equipment, materials, and basic startup expenses.
  • We need $5,000 minimum to advance in the startup challenge. The more we raise above that, the more progress we'll make this spring and summer!

The Impact

  • Do you know someone who needs help getting out of bed? This device is for them. If we can make their transfer process easy, they will get out of bed more often. That means more socializing in the living room, more meals at the dinner table, and more time outside on a nice day.
  • Current transfer methods put strain on the caregiver's back and cause long-term back injury. In fact, nursing assistants suffer more musculoskeletal injuries than any other occupation. Our method requires no lifting and does not put the caregiver at risk.
  • Overall, our device increases caregiver productivity. That means more time and effort to devote to other important nursing tasks.

Risks & Challenges

  • There is risk in any product development process. Our in-house team can build a complete prototype, but in order to be certified for patient use it will need a professional makeover by an engineering firm to ensure durability, manufacturability, and safety. There can always be unexpected bumps and hurdles in this process.
  • We need to establish more contacts in assisted living facilities so we can connect with more caregivers and administrators. We can learn more about how they experience the problem and see which product features they like best.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this link!
  • Like our Facebook page to see project updates: https://www.facebook.com/zephmobility
  • Check out these sources for more background information about patient transfer:
    • http://www.thiscaringhome.org/spec_concerns/tra...
    • https://newoldage.blogs.nytimes.com/2014/02/26/...
    • https://www.caregiver.org/selected-long-term-ca...

Who We Are/What We're Doing
We're Sam and Eli, biomedical engineering students at Duke.
We're building a new way to transfer disabled patients from bed to wheelchair so they can spend more time out of bed and interact with their loved ones and communities.
In homes, hospitals, and nursing facilities, patient mobility is a medical necessity, yet existing transfer methods are slow, difficult, and dangerous.
About 10 million people in the US face this problem. As Baby Boomers retire, this number will more than double by 2040.
Our new device is quick, safe, comfortable, and easy-to-use. It's a win-win-win for patients, caregivers, and caregiving facilities.
How You Can Help
Please back our campaign with a donation!
Your contribution will help us raise $10,000 total: $5,000 to be eligible for the Duke Startup Challenge summer program, and $5,000 to expand our existing prototype.
Expanding the prototype will make it portable, so we can bring it to nursing homes and get feedback from caregivers. Getting their input is crucial to our development process. The money will go to equipment, materials, and basic startup expenses.
We need $5,000 minimum to advance in the startup challenge. The more we raise above that, the more progress we'll make this spring and summer!
The Impact
Do you know someone who needs help getting out of bed? This device is for them. If we can make their transfer process easy, they will get out of bed more often. That means more socializing in the living room, more meals at the dinner table, and more time outside on a nice day.
Current transfer methods put strain on the caregiver's back and cause long-term back injury. In fact, nursing assistants suffer more musculoskeletal injuries than any other occupation. Our method requires no lifting and does not put the caregiver at risk.
Overall, our device increases caregiver productivity. That means more time and effort to devote to other important nursing tasks.

There is risk in any product development process. Our in-house team can build a complete prototype, but in order to be certified for patient use it will need a professional makeover by an engineering firm to ensure durability, manufacturability, and safety. There can always be unexpected bumps and hurdles in this process.

Like our Facebook page to see project updates: https://www.facebook.com/zephmobility

Check out these sources for more background information about patient transfer:
http://www.thiscaringhome.org/spec_concerns/tra...
https://newoldage.blogs.nytimes.com/2014/02/26/...
https://www.caregiver.org/selected-long-term-ca...

story:
Update:

Great news!!! We've been able to cut out the middle man on part of the production.  So we've lowered the prices on the pillow.  Check out the new prices on the perks and as always, thanks for you support.

The back story:

My partner, Norm, and I developed this product, the Solace Edema Pillow, out of necessity.  Norm is a trained auto  mechanic and I have worked in healthcare finance for about 2 decades.  Our expertise here is from personal experience.

Norm developed health issues that caused chronic edema - swelling in his lower extremities.  He needed something to keep his feet elevated while resting.  Every night he was kicking the pillows off the bed and would wake up with the same swollen legs, ankles  and feet that he went to bed with.

Through trial and error, we came up with the Solace Edema Pillow.  This pillow stays on the bed, even if you toss and turn throughout the night.  If you have edema, you wake up with little or no swelling.  Because it worked so well for Norm, we decided that we should share our creation with the world.

Here's the great thing about this pillow - it has many other uses!  We realized that it can be used just for lounging or to reduce the effects of many common ailments such as post-surgery swelling, upper respiratory ailments, snoring and more!

Where we are now:

Norm and I have already got everything lined up! Specialty foam manufacturer; fabric supplier; sewing company; we even have a warehouse lined up. There's also a van that we can purchase to pick up our supplies.  As all of our suppliers are local to us, in New Jersey, this will help keep costs down. Best of all, we have multiple doctors asking us for marketing materials and when the Solace Edema Pillow is going to be on the market!

With your help we will get this company off the ground and make this patent pending product available to you and the world.  The funding will go towards acquiring the warehouse, the van, minimum orders from our suppliers, everything we need to set up the warehouse for production, and of course, initial inventory.

We've received some feedback from initial users.  Some have said that they would prefer a pillow that is a little lower than the 10" pillow that they tried. So, we're going ahead and offering heights of both 8" and 10" right away.  We're offering the pillow to you, our early birds, at a 25% discount on your purchase.

Should we not reach our goal, we still plan to move forward with this endeavor.  We will have to make adjustments on our plan, such as sharing warehouse space or renting equipment, instead of purchasing, to reduce initial set up costs. Above all, we will make sure that we provide you with your pre-ordered Solace Edema Pillow and thank you gifts.

Impact on the world:

Norm and I can't emphasize how much the Solace Edema Pillow can help millions of people.  Many conditions cause edema either temporarily, such as pregnancy, or chronically, such as heart disease.  The Solace Edema Pillow can help alleviate multiple common ailment and conditions - none of which are limited to age, sex or race,  Anyone can benefit from the Solace Edema Pillow!

Risks and challenges we may face:

We certainly expect hiccups along the way, but we've spent 2 years working on this already and have resolved as many obstacles that we could think of along the way.  We do have lots of support - Norm's longtime friend and "research assistant", in addition to other friends who have started their own successful businesses.  These business friends have given us plenty of advice and guidance, and will continue to do so.

We've been developing great working relationships these passed two years - people in marketing, accounting, IT and more.  We've drawn upon their expertise and talents and gladly accepted their referrals to others who have assisted us.  We plan to continue this practice and pay it forward, if and when we can.

Other ways to help:

The Solace Edema Pillow is a product that millions of people will find very helpful for any number of ailments and conditions.  If you, yourself, do not need it, you probably know someone who does.  This product was born out of necessity, so let's get it to those who need it.  Please help us get the word out and remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Your donation, pre-order or referral is greatly appreciated.  We thank you in advance for your support and assistance, and millions of people around the world will greatly appreciate it when they can readily purchase the Solace Edema Pillow.

story:
HELP US - expand our clinic

HELP MORE - so we can offer FREE advice to those on local waiting lists

HELP YOU - whilst helping you with your own physical goals

 

Who are Support & Sustain?

We came together 4 years ago, as our frustration grew at a health service that is increasingly stretched. We started a private physiotherapy clinic that was different. One that works to complement and help the state funded health service. We keep our prices amongst the lowest whilst helping the NHS income generate. We spend our profits on providing treatment for people with complex conditions that often fall through the cracks in healthcare.

Now we want to tackle the latest issue in our local South East London area...

Our goal;

  • In our area, there is an 18 week waits for NHS physiotherapy and we know that people are left in pain, scared, unsure of what the future will bring and unable to work or support their families whilst they await this treatment.
  • We want to roll out free advice clinics to this population so that within a few days of having a problem we can provide them with advice and reassurance. Making sure they make the right decisions to keep themselves as healthy as possible whilst they await their NHS treatment.

We Can Only Do This By Growing The Clinic

We Need Your Help!

Our clinic is nearly always full and as such the only way to provide these FREE CLINICS is to expand.

 

What Could Go Wrong?!

The people we treat are our biggest advocates but we also need an online presence and help with spreading the word via social media.

Please help us by using the Indiegogo share tools today :)

story:
A Vital New Resource

Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans is a vital new resource for yoga teachers, yoga service organizations, veterans and their families, veterans' organizations, VA administrators, and anyone interested in bringing yoga and mindfulness to veterans in a safe, effective, sustainable, and socially equitable way.

Our campaign aims to bring this resource to teachers passionate about sharing yoga and mindfulness with veterans or their families, and not knowing where to start or seeking more support and information.Your donation will make this possible. Not long ago, the very idea of “yoga for veterans” sounded odd to many. Today, yoga’s popularity among veterans and military personnel is growing fast. When adapted to meet the needs, concerns, and values of service members and their families, yoga offers vital tools for building health, strength, and resilience—physically, psychologically, and emotionally.

A Collaborative Project

As part of the Yoga Service Best Practices Series, created by the Yoga Service Council in collaboration with the Omega Institute, this  work is the product of an innovative 18-month project involving leaders in various fields: yoga, mindfulness, veterans’ affairs, military operations and culture, traditional and integrative medicine, clinical psychology, trauma therapy, social work, social research, nonprofit management, and more. Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans synthesizes this wealth of knowledge to gather over 100 Best Practice guidelines for teaching yoga to veterans in ways that are safe, effective, sustainable, socially equitable, and responsive to the particularities of the military experience.

Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans is designed is to help not only yoga teachers wanting to work with veterans, but also individuals in the medical field working with veterans and veteran family members, as well as VA administrators,  and veterans’ organizations.

Your Contribution will Help Fund Publication and Distribution of this Valuable Resource.

If we reach our goal of $9,000.00 we will be able to send 1,000 copies of Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans absolutely FREE to veterans, veterans’ organizations, VA administrators, yoga teachers, and other qualified individuals and organizations.

Please Give Now!

Give today! Share the link! Tell your friends and associates!

Thank you for your support!

To learn more about the Yoga Service Council, visit www.yogaservicecouncil.org. Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans is second book in the Yoga Service Best Practices series, which was created by the Yoga Service Council in collaboration with the Omega Institute. We extend special thanks to lululemon/Here to Be for major support of the YSC and our Best Practices Series, including but not limited to Best Practices for Yoga with Veterans.

Do you know someone who should request a copy? Our online portal system will go live via the Yoga Service Council website and other social media platforms once the book is published during the week of 14 November.
