story:
Introducing the Vertebar® Posture Device.

This rigid yet lightweight postural guide teaches your body how to find 
optimal posture and bend forward without tension on the lower back.
Wearing the Vertebar® during exercise or heavy lifts
prevents over-rounding of the spine, allowing the hips to help out more. 
Prevent uneven wear & tear throughout your entire body with the Vertebar®.

For just 10 minutes a day, 3 days a week, you can significantly change your posture to reduce aches, pains, and lost mobility.  The Hip Hinge and the Squat are the basic exercises that can strengthen your posture and lifting mechanics. 


Before and After 3 Workouts Wearing Vertebar®:
Hip Hinge [Forward Bend]


Injuries happen. Back Pain happens.

We accept aches, pains, and lost mobility as facts of aging.
It doesn't have to be this way.



    

 



 

 

Start your journey towards a pain-free life.
With your contribution, you can experience tension relief and we can provide enhanced features for Vertebar®, including add-on sensors and an app, to provide strength and mobility solutions at your convenience. 




Testimonials

Fitness Mega-Influencer Elliot Hulse:
"It’s a pretty good tool for those who want to do the corrective deadlift, or any exercise requiring neutral spine."

Elliot Hulse performs exercises such as Bent Over Rows, Deadlifts, and Planks while using a dowel or Vertebar® to maintain optimal spinal alignment. 

Warehouse Worker Tommy:
"I love using the Vertebar®. Using it in the warehouse and during my workouts keeps my lower back tension-free. After moving heavy boxes all day, my back aches and I notice I can't lift as heavy as I'd like in the gym. Thanks to learning more optimal lifting mechanics using the Vertebar® I have been able to maximize my lifting performance at work and the gym."

Tommy uses the Vertebar® when lifting heavy boxes in the warehouse and while performing typical gym exercises such as deadlifts, planks, and pull-ups. 


Creator Sheena:
"I have suffered from neck, upper and lower back pain for over 10 years. Teaching a variety of fitness classes and being an athlete my whole life, injuries and pain were just part of being active. My clients suffered as well. It was clear a solution was needed to allow us to keep doing the things we love, without pain or limitations. Wearing Vertebar® during workouts and household chores keeps me living pain-free!"
Sheena performs kettlebell exercises, calisthenics, and barre fitness exercises while maintaining neutral, tension-free spinal alignment. 
Sheena demonstrates the versatility of the Vertebar® by using it to help perform transfers, household chores such as cooking, and fitness exercises. It's important to take care of yourself when you take care of others. 

 
 

How It Works

 

Neutral Spine is not a straight or flat spine.
The spine has curves that are ideal for weight bearing and allow for optimal nerve communication, as well as blood flow. Pressing the outward curves of the spine against the rigid Vertebar® teaches your muscles how to maintain optimal alignment, especially during movement.  

The Hip Hinge is when we bend over from our hips instead of rounding over with our spines. Maintaining a Neutral Spine while bending over distributes the workload to our hips, which are better equipped for lifting mechanics.

 

Perks

Our perks feature the Vertebar® Posture Device while including stretching series to reduce aches & pains while increasing mobility. Videos of Vertebar® instructions, exercises, stretches, and self-massage techniques will be provided through our recurring membership site, Verte.Life.



Save when you buy the 5-pack or 10-pack!
Perfect for Fitness studios and Physical Therapy Clinics!
 

The Vertebar® Posture Device allows the body to learn how to prefer moving with a more neutral spinal alignment, like aligning the tires of our cars. When the spine is in neutral, our joints can be in more optimal, neutral resting positions. This allows the bones to move with more joint space, preventing uneven wear and tear.

Stretching Series are one of the perks to help rebalance our muscles and soft tissues throughout the entire body. Back tension and pain can be exacerbated by tightened muscles in the surrounding areas. Increasing muscle length in these areas can help reduce any tension acting on our low back, hips, and knees. Our stretching series provides multiple stretches in an easy flow sequence, to maximize tension release in the low back and hips. The series are included with your Vertebar® purchase. 

Our Goal 

We are raising $6500 to purchase our first round of mass produced Vertebar® devices, provide more design options for easier portability and adjustability, and begin working on the add-on sensors and app to provide an enhanced feedback experience.

The more we raise, the more options we can provide. Our product is made from high-grade Aluminum. Making Vertebar® accessible to as many people as possible is our priority. We offer a handful of color options for you to choose from. As we move forward with design options, we will offer material options as well. 

Should we not reach our goal, you will still receive your Vertebar® as we continue to push forward with our plans.

Share with your friends and anyone you know that needs relief!
 

Timeline


Device Specifications

Color Options:

Exact shade subject to change.
If a color becomes unavailable we will reach out to confirm color choice option. 

Length Options:


Strap Specs:


Easy to wash, fast-drying, Black neoprene.
Head Strap is 1 inch wide and accommodates head circumferences up to 26 inches.
Low Ribs and Hips straps are 1.5 inches wide.
Low Ribs circumference is measured around the the lower ribcage. 
Hips circumference is measured across hip bones (ASIS) and sacrum.  
We recommend ordering larger sizes if planning on sharing 1 Vertebar® with others.
The straps can be wrapped around to fit smaller circumferences.
Smaller/Shorter straps are not able to accommodate larger circumferences than listed below. 

As delivery date nears, we will reach out to offer separate strap orders
if interested in having multiple strap sizes on hand. 


The Team


The Creator

Working in Fitness and Physical Therapy, Sheena personally heard hundreds of stories of people who have lost their quality of life because of movement limitations and pain.
She sees it is possible to live without pain that limits us from doing the things we love to do.

No stranger to physical pain, Sheena has been an athlete her entire life. Involved in martial arts, softball, golf, tennis, swimming, and skateboarding, injuries were a part of being physically active. As she got older, she did not want to stop enjoying these activities. She found a way through exercise to continue the fun well into adulthood, and plans on continuing well into her senior years. 

Vertebar® is the tool to help you overcome any limitations and live the life you want.
The goal of using Vertebar® is to keep us moving pain free and without limitations until our dying day. 


The Partners

 

FAQs

Is this just a stick/bar/dowel?
Yes it is a stick for your back! However, it's unique design makes it more functional and provides feedback unattainable with a regular or weighted stick. A stick/bar/dowel is commonly used in Physical Therapy and Fitness to teach optimal spinal alignment and bending mechanics. 

The Vertebar® is specially designed to stay in place, allowing the user to maintain neutral alignment while working out and providing feedback without having to hold on to the bar. 

Can I just strap a stick/bar/dowel to my back?
Sure! We started that way. However, we found that the dowel tends to move off to the side of the spine during movement.
Our design specifically addresses this by comfortably staying in place, allowing space for the vertebrae, and providing touch/tactile sensation to the postural muscles along the spine.

Is Vertebar® it heavy?
The Vertebar® is very lightweight. It weighs under 1kg and is very rigid. It can resist bending in any direction when wearing it and lifting over 150lb. 

Is it uncomfortable?
The Vertebar® can be uncomfortable when you first start using, just like trying to sit up straight can be uncomfortable. However, after performing 10-15 repetitions of the basic exercises of Hip Hinge/Forward Bend and Squats, the discomfort goes away. 

Who can wear this?
Almost anyone! As long as you can wear each of the 3 straps (forehead, low ribs, hips), you can benefit from wearing the Vertebar® posture device.

To make sure this version of Vertebar® is appropriate for you, stand up against a wall. If you can press the 3 points of contact against the wall, this version will work for you.

If you are unable to get your head back to touch the wall, our future adjustable version will be able to better accommodate you. We recommend holding off on ordering this version if your head is over a distance of 3 inches from the wall. Our stretch series and rolling out videos will still help you experience relief.

Do I wear this while seated at my desk?
You can! When you have the Vertebar®, you are free to use it how you want. We recommend performing the exercises and using only during lifts or heavy lifting maneuvers.

This device is a guide, not a brace.

Wearing it at your desk for short periods (under 1 hour) at a time can help remind your body to keep your head back and spine in neutral. As long as you are actively pressing your head back and consciously sitting with neutral spinal posture, the Vertebar® will provide the benefit it is designed for.

What can I do when I wear it?
The primary purpose of the Vertebar® posture device is to perform hip hinging (bending forward from the hips), squats, and a multitude of strengthening exercises. 

Wear it to warm-up for the day or before a workout. Wear it during specific exercises or for your entire workout. Wear it while moving heavy boxes or transferring individuals/patients. 

Our Verte.Life membership site will provide exercise instruction and workouts to try while wearing the Vertebar® posture device.

Almost any exercise can be performed while wearing the device. Planks, pushups, rows, and lower body exercises such as squats and lunges are recommended. Check out our phto

We recommend exercises traditionally performed in the sagittal and frontal planes.
We DO NOT recommend exercises that require rotation or twisting of the ribs from the hips nor any exercise requiring flexing or over extending of the spine. Crunches are not recommended. Sit ups and hip flexing exercises can be performed while wearing the device.

Do I have to strap it to my head?
YES. The current version of the Vertebar® posture device does require use of the head strap.
While it does not look attractive and may feel uncomfortable at first, we tend to move our heads unnecessarily during exercise which can cause strain on neck and shoulder muscles.

When our neck/cervical spine is out of neutral, it can make it difficult for the rest of the spine to find and maintain a neutral position.  

“Text neck” is a growing problem that leads to headaches and focus issues. Our heads can weigh over 60 pounds the farther away from neutral it rests. This causes significant strain on our neck muscles and surrounding tissues. When our ears line up over our shoulders, our heads only weight about 15 pounds.

Future designs will include removing the head contact to allow for different types of lifts and maneuvers.

 

Have more questions?
Feel free to reach out to us at info@Vertebar.com

 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you’re unable to contribute at this time, please share our campaign to anyone you know who could use help with posture and relieving aches and pains! Together, we can save spines.

story:
“About 95% of the population experiences acne at least once.”

This common disease varies from mild to severe, and sometimes leaves scars in large areas. It typically appears between ages 11 to 50.

<The Journal of Reproductive Medicine> P 742-752, September 2008

 

I had the same worries, as I have been dealing with problematic skin for the past 20 years.
The ‘True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence’ started with the following questions.

  • Is there a way to soothe acne, and moisturize at the same time?
  • Is there a way to manage the whole face with mild ingredients, instead of just one or two spots with acne?
  • Is there a way to brighten complexion with a whitening function while calming the skin?

 

To answer the above questions, we created a total of 8 samples just to make one single product, conducted testing at least weekly, and developed the optimal recipe for sensitive skin.
And here are the pictures of our conducted test result, proving its effects ‘True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence’.

 

 

Product Development Story

 

Is there a way to soothe acne and moisturize at the same time?

We developed the optimal recipe containing soothing ingredients such as centella, tea tree, bee venom, chameleon plant, madecassoside, BSASM, etc. as well as ingredients that are effective for moisturizing, such as panthenol, sodium hyaluronate (hyaluronic acid), and betaine. You no longer have to experience dry skin in exchange for soothing sensitive skin.

 

Is there a way to manage the whole face with mild ingredients, instead of just one or two spots with acne?

This is not a product that dries and irritates the skin, so it can be used on your whole face every day. We made the formulation sticky, allowing you to put more in affected areas.

Dermatological test result: Non-irritating

34 subjects were observed for their reaction to the True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence after 30 minutes, 24 hours, and 48 hours, and the results show that it does not cause any irritation.

Is there a way to brighten complexion with a whitening function while calming the skin?

We included niacinamide - a functional cosmetic ingredient that helps whiten the skin. This helps brighten your complexion while managing sensitive skin.
Completed report regarding the ‘whitening functionality’ items to the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety in Korea.

 

 

Soothing + Moisturizing + Whitening

The True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence was created with our heart.

This contains 73% centella water instead of purified water, so it is an essence that helps relieve and soothe sensitive skin. It contains centella, bee venom, tea tree, chameleon plant, madecassoside, and BSASM to help manage sensitive skin. The panthenol and hyaluronic acid moisturize the skin, and the niacinamide ingredients help whiten skin.

 

 

Studies:

 - Centella Asistica
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC38...
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC31...
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC48...

 - Panthenol
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12113650
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14641355
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27425824

 

 

FAQ

 

My skin is not sensitive, can I use it?

Since it has mild ingredients from nature (98%) with skin brightening function and moisturizing, feel free to use it. 

 

What does this product smell like?

No synthetic fragrance has been added, so it is the natural scent of tea tree which is the one of key ingredients of 'True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence'.

 

Do I have to apply this product only on problematic areas?

We recommend you to apply on whole face 2 times a day and for better results, please apply a thicker amount on problematic areas.

 

Specification?

Brand : True Heart
Model : True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence
Volume : 1 fl oz / 30 ml
Made in Korea
Ingredients : Centella Asiatica Leaf Water(73%), Panthenol, Butylene Glycol,  Niacinamide, Betaine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glycereth-26, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Bee Venom, Madecassoside,  Centella Asiatica Extract , Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, 
Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract,  Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sodium Phytate, Dipropylene Glycol, Arginine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Allantoin, Carbomer, Diethylhexyl Sodium Sulfosuccinate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin

 

Shipping method?

We send your item by "Economy Shipping" without tracking number. (Free shipping for Indiegogo special.)

It takes on average,

1) to U.S.A., Canada and Australia : 9 ~ 14 business days.
2) to EU such as U.K., Spain, France, Germany : 9 ~ 14 business days.
3) to Southeast Asia such as Thailand, Singapore : 5 ~ 7 business days.
4) to China, Japan and Hongkong : 5 ~ 7 business days.
5) to Middle East such as Saudi Arabia, Idia : 9 ~ 14 business days.
6) to South America, Africa : 10~15 business days.
7) to Brazil, Malta, Russia, Israel, Italy(Strict Customs) : 10 ~ 15 business days.
8) to other countries : About 21 business dyas.

Or

"Standard shipping" with Tracking no.(extra $3.0)
- Average shipping period : the same as "Economy shipping"

You no longer have to experience dry skin in exchange for soothing sensitive skin. Is there a way to manage the whole face with mild ingredients, instead of just one or two spots with acne?This is not a product that dries and irritates the skin, so it can be used on your whole face every day. We made the formulation sticky, allowing you to put more in affected areas.Dermatological test result: Non-irritating34 subjects were observed for their reaction to the True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence after 30 minutes, 24 hours, and 48 hours, and the results show that it does not cause any irritation.Is there a way to brighten complexion with a whitening function while calming the skin?We included niacinamide - a functional cosmetic ingredient that helps whiten the skin. This helps brighten your complexion while managing sensitive skin.Completed report regarding the ‘whitening functionality’ items to the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety in Korea.  Soothing + Moisturizing + WhiteningThe True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence was created with our heart.This contains 73% centella water instead of purified water, so it is an essence that helps relieve and soothe sensitive skin. It contains centella, bee venom, tea tree, chameleon plant, madecassoside, and BSASM to help manage sensitive skin. The panthenol and hyaluronic acid moisturize the skin, and the niacinamide ingredients help whiten skin.  Studies: - Centella Asisticahttps://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC38...https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC31...https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC48... - Panthenolhttps://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12113650https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14641355https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27425824  FAQ My skin is not sensitive, can I use it?Since it has mild ingredients from nature (98%) with skin brightening function and moisturizing, feel free to use it.  What does this product smell like?No synthetic fragrance has been added, so it is the natural scent of tea tree which is the one of key ingredients of 'True Heart Centella Cica Spot Essence'. Do I have to apply this product only on problematic areas?We recommend you to apply on whole face 2 times a day and for better results, please apply a thicker amount on problematic areas. Specification?Brand : True HeartModel : True Heart Centella Cica Spot EssenceVolume : 1 fl oz / 30 mlMade in KoreaIngredients : Centella Asiatica Leaf Water(73%), Panthenol, Butylene Glycol,  Niacinamide, Betaine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glycereth-26, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Bee Venom, Madecassoside,  Centella Asiatica Extract , Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract,  Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sodium Phytate, Dipropylene Glycol, Arginine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Allantoin, Carbomer, Diethylhexyl Sodium Sulfosuccinate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin Shipping method?We send your item by "Economy Shipping" without tracking number. (Free shipping for Indiegogo special.)It takes on average,1) to U.S.A., Canada and Australia : 9 ~ 14 business days.2) to EU such as U.K., Spain, France, Germany : 9 ~ 14 business days.3) to Southeast Asia such as Thailand, Singapore : 5 ~ 7 business days.4) to China, Japan and Hongkong : 5 ~ 7 business days.5) to Middle East such as Saudi Arabia, Idia : 9 ~ 14 business days.6) to South America, Africa : 10~15 business days.7) to Brazil, Malta, Russia, Israel, Italy(Strict Customs) : 10 ~ 15 business days.8) to other countries : About 21 business dyas.Or"Standard shipping" with Tracking no.(extra $3.0)- Average shipping period : the same as "Economy shipping"

story:
MONITOR YOUR LOVED ONE’S HEALTH

The first-of-its-kind connected smart diaper for babies and brief for adults incontinent.

Safe, economical and easy to use, Smardii instantly detects wetness and soiling. It reads body temperature, location and positioning (prevention of SIDS and falls), and runs real-time urine analysis helping detect illnesses such as UTI.

Smardii’s innovative technology offers efficient monitoring and reassurance for parents and for caregivers whether in daycares, hospitals, or at home.

 

        

Smardii comprises three parts:​

  1. The Sensor-built-in Diapers which are fully disposable for a quick and easy change. For users and caregivers, it looks and feels like a regular diaper. It’s just smarter… much smarter!
  2. The external reusable and rechargeable disc called Smardii Puck which is the brain of our product. It easily clips onto the diaper, is very comfortable, and is connected to your phone via Bluetooth. It will provide timely alerts directly to your phone.
  3. The Smardii Gateway, which is optional, will allow you to stay connected 24/7 with your loved one even while you are away.

NO MORE SNIFFING… NO MORE GUESSING...

2am… baby is crying… needs a change? Has fever? Are you sure? Who knows? Smardii does!

"Is my baby sleeping well through the night...?!" "Is she on her stomach..?!" "Is she on her back...?!"

"I left my baby with the 'sitter... is she ok..?!"

"I wonder if the nurses have checked on my mom at the nursing home..?!"

 

The Smardii App will alert you when there is a specific event, whether it is a wet or soiled diaper, an abnormal body temperature, a fall or spill, or even... first symptoms of potential illness!

                

  • A Diaper needs change: After unclipping the reusable Smardii Puck, simply take off the puck and trash the dirty diaper the old fashioned way. Then, use a fresh Smart Diaper and clip the Smardii Puck back on. It's that simple!
  • Baby or grandma' has temperature or has certain symptoms you should not ignore: at least you'll get an alert in real-time so that you can take care of your loved ones, and share this information with pediatrician or medical staff. Smardii will also be connected to medical appointment online scheduling apps so that you can easily make an appointment for your loved ones and be on top of their health.
  • Baby was "shaken" or Grandma' is trying to stand when she should not be: here again you'll get an alert immediately so that you can address the situation and possibly prevent serious injury or harm.

Data is transmitted via Bluetooth Low Energy to any smartphone, tablet, or computer.

The app enables 24/7 monitoring and automated time logs, which can be shared with healthcare professionals and family members.

Smardii’s location and body positioning capabilities are important safety breakthroughs in caring  for children or for dementia patients prone to wander or fall.

Helping with Potting Training: While in "potty training mode" Smardii will help you better monitor when your child usually goes, so that you can potty train your child and get him out of diapers quicker!

Location Services: Using the Smardii Puck and the Smardii Gateway, you'll be notified immediately when your child (or elderly parent) is out of range.

Preventive Health: Smardii is not only a convenience product. It is a truly smart system with the purpose of addressing certain medical conditions before they become more serious. 

SIDS Prevention: Smardii will help you monitoring that your baby is sleeping on his back, hence reducing risks of SIDS.

Alexa Enabled: Simply ask Alexa if it's time for a change, or when the diaper was last changed! You can reorder diapers simply by saying it or even make appointments with doctors or share medical information.

 
 
 

Smardii follows all guidelines published by the WHO, so that our product is safe for you and your loved ones!Smardii utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0., and it only turns on when needed.

BLE and health effects:

A large number of studies have been performed over the last two decades:

  • To date, no adverse health effects have been established as being caused by radio-frequency electromagnetic fields use.
  • Tissue heating is the principal mechanism of interaction between radio-frequency energy and the human body. At the frequencies used by BLE, most of the energy is absorbed by the skin and other superficial tissues, resulting in no temperature rise in the organs of the body.
  • A number of studies have investigated the effects of radio-frequency fields on brain electrical activity, urine system, cognitive function, sleep, heart rate and blood pressure in volunteers. To date, research does not suggest any consistent evidence of adverse health effects from exposure to radio-frequency fields at levels below those that cause tissue heating. Further, research has not been able to provide support for a causal relationship between exposure to electromagnetic fields and self-reported symptoms, or “electromagnetic hypersensitivity”.

Recommendation: 

  • The World Health Organization (WHO) develops public information materials and promotes dialogue among scientists, governments, industry and the public to raise the level of understanding about potential adverse health risks of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields.
  • Two international bodies ( ICNIRP and IEEE ) have developed exposure guidelines for workers and for the general public. These guidelines are based on a detailed assessment of the available scientific evidence.

WHO recommends to connected device users to respect the guidelines. In this way, BLE emissive power is far less than the maximum admitted.

  • The most important is not the maximum emissive power on a short time but the long-term exposure, so the WHO recommends to limit exposure to electromagnetic fields (e.g. turn-off Bluetooth when not in use).

  • Urine Detection
  • Stool Detection
  • Temperature Reading
  • Sleep Analysis
  • Body Positioning
  • Fall Detection & Prevention
  • Location
  • Real-Time Urine Analysis
  • Sharing of Medical History with Medical Staff and Family Members
  • Alexa Enabled (and other smart home systems)
  • Diaper Refill Subscription Plan

Smardii being truly smart, can analyze what diaper size you need and if you are running low. You will automatically receive the right amount of diapers... at the right size... at the right time! It's worry free!

Whenever you are low on baby diapers, Smardii will ship a new box of fresh diapers directly to your home. Upon request, we can also ship the diapers directly to your child's daycare (*only participating daycares). You can cancel at any time.

 

*RETAIL (not available through Indiegogo): up to 240 diapers per month depending on sizes. Additional diapers can be purchased at a prorated amount. Through the Smardii App, we'll know what size you'll need.

**INDIEGOGO BUNDLE: we will be shipping up to 720 diapers to you over a 3-month period; up to 1,440 diapers over a 6-month period; and up to 2,880 diapers over a 12-month period. Through the Smardii App, we'll know what size you'll need. The number of diapers provided will depend on the sizes you'll be using.

NOTE: we will be offering diaper subscription plans for ADULTS as well, but it is not yet available on Indiegogo. Stay tuned!

PREVENTIVE CARE

With Smardii, you get the reassurance and piece of mind that your loved ones are well cared for, safe and secure.

SMARDII. BETTER CARE.

FACEBOOK 

 

ENTREPRENEUR

"It's the Uber of Pooper"....

"It's Innovative and does Solve a Need"...

 

 

IMPERIAL COLLEGE OF LONDON    

  

 

SMARDII SHIPPING

Smardii will ship worldwide.
Shipping is free within continental U.S. Outside of the U.S., the shipping fee is $19 worldwide and excludes GST, VAT, equivalent taxes and customs duties. GST and VAT, if any, will be collected from backers at the time of delivery.

We plan to ship the product to all backers in September 2019. Smardii will ship to the Super Early Bird backers first and then begin shipping to the Early Bird backers. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

For questions about your order, please contact info@smardii.com. 

By backing today, you'll get to own Smardii at an exclusive price that won’t be offered again commercially.


Change of Address? We’ve got you covered.
We've partnered with BackerKit to make sure that Smardii backers have the absolute smoothest experience possible. BackerKit service begins when our Indiegogo campaign is over.

If you need to change your address or anything else about your order, Smardii and BackerKit will be there to help you easily update any of your shipping and delivery details!

story:
The Urban Renew Well (URW) Center is the first of its kind. A longevity & performance recovery facility that offers unlimited member services including infrared sauna treatments, oxygen & sound therapy, immersion tubs, ionic foot detoxes and meditation, along-side a cohesive team of holistic practitioners, physicians and therapists, united under one roof.

 

The center was birthed from owner and founder, Amanda Moreley‘s vision to transform the look, feel and accessibility of preventative wellness. A former collegiate track & field star and Olympic bobsled athlete, it wasn’t until Moreley had completely transitioned out of the elite athletic sector, that she realized how powerful affordable, integrative support would be to the everyday active individual, seeking solutions for achieving optimal health.

 

“I recognize that there is great power of teamwork, consistency and a high standard of excellence. This is what created the synergy I experienced on teams, as a world-class athlete.  I believe that simplicity and accessibility empower individuals to spend their time focused on rejuvenation, recovery and healing, instead of being disappointed, exhausted and stressed-out.  Being a comprehensive one-stop spot is a key component to what makes the Urban Renew Well Center unique,” says Moreley.

 

URW is a beautiful culmination of a holistic wellness spa and a therapeutic recovery lounge.  With multiple modalities, practitioners and services we know that being optimal is a combination of doing a few simple things very well, with the consistency, support and understanding that is readily available to you from integrative practitioners that care.

 

The funds generated from this crowd-funding campaign will go toward the cost of the equipment and our initial marketing cost as we prepare to open our doors in January 2020.  Your contribution will be the drop in the well that we need to create a far-reaching ripple, enabling many people to come, unplug and restore harmony physically, mentally, spiritually and emotionally for many years to come.

 

At a time when we seldom have moments to disconnect from our cell phones and other technologies, the Urban Renew Well Center is creating a new low-tech concept and redefining what it means to take time to CARE for yourself, RESTORE mental and physical ease and UNPLUG from the stresses of life.

 

Whether you are a premier profession, a fit family member, a destination traveler, an experience seeker or simply on a mission to live a more holistic and healthier life, “The Well” is your spot for all things RESTORATIVE. 

 

Help us spread the word:

  1. Share #URWFillTheWell on social media! Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the campaign page, on the left.
  2. Talk about the project with your friends!
  3. LIKE and FOLLOW us on Facebook @urbanrenewwell to hear about the exciting things coming up for the URW community. 

 

 

Q:  What will you do with the money?
A:  We will put it towards all the costs of attracting, cultivating and servicing our clients and community. The investment in our wellness center equipment, will be essential to providing a unique and incredible experience for our clients.   This will include our oxygen bar, infrared sauna, ionic foot detox baths and immersion tubs.  We will also be compensating our video, media and marketing team for the Pre-Opening publicity and advertising tasks.

 

Q:  Where will the Urban Renew Well Center be located and when will you open??
A:  The Urban Renew Well Center will be located in North Scottsdale, Arizona and we anticipate opening doors in January 2020!

 

Q:  What services will the Urban Renew Well Center offer for the monthly members?
A:  Unlimited use of the following:  Infrared Sauna, Ionic Foot Detox Baths, Immersion tubs, Oxygen therapy, Meditation room and member-only discounts on massage, Traditional Chinese Acupuncture, Naturopathic Medicine and Holistic Chiropractic sessions.

 

    Q:  When will I get my perks?
    A:  Each perk has an estimated delivery month/year listed in the description. You will be notified of any delays. For the membership perks, we indicated January 2020 due to the fact that you'll be receiving the services at the time of opening, however, the other items (candle, t-shirt, etc) will be shipped to you September of 2019.

    Q:  Will any perks go out before the campaign is completed?
    A:  Unfortunately, no.

    Q:  How will I get my digital download perk?
    A:  By email.

    Q:  What if I want one of the perks and it is sold out?
    A:  Some perks are only available in limited quantities because of their special/time sensitive nature.  So get these perks while they're HOT and contribute now!!  If possible, we will increase the number of a few limited offerings and we will also be adding a few more awesome perks throughout the campaign.  Stay tuned!

     

    We're super excited to open our doors and begin servicing the community, and we have a lot of amazing things planned.  The Urban Renew Well team wants to say a HUGH thank you from our hearts to yours.  We greatly appreciate your love and support!

story:
About Us:

The Handlers Basketball is a training company dedicated to helping basketball players from every stage of the game improve their skills. From a kid making basketball dribbling drill videos in my basement, to a brand of over 70,000 followers on Instagram (@thehandlers), The Handlers shows people the power of Basketball. This new basketball training glove is just the beginning of multiple unique and effect basketball training products to help players improve their game.

 

Glove Four Features:

-The Palm deflector pushes the ball away from the palm, forcing the player to control the ball with their finger pads

-The finger seperators keep your fingers in a wide athletic grip allowing you to cover more surface area of the basketball giving the player more control 

-The adjustable weight is filled with iron steel and has the ability to come on or off the glove 

-The exposed finger glove allows you to get the actual feel of the basketball while training

 

Product Tested:

This product was originally made at a small scale and tested by some of the best in each segment of the basketball market. The feedback we received was overwhelmingly positive. These segments include:

-WNBA Players

-NBA G-League Players

-Harlem Globetrotters

-High-Level NBA Skills Trainers

-Division 1 Basketball Players

-Top 10 High School Recruits in their respected classes

(for evidence of this please view videos that are shared on my Instagram: @thehandlers)

 

Funding:

The Handlers needs help financing the first large purchase order to have the ability to share the glove with the masses. I am just a young 26 year-old former basketball player and do not currently have the budget to afford a large purchase order so am looking to IndiGOGO to help reach my goal of affording a large order. With a $50 backing you will receive a pair of gloves delivered in the mail. FREE SHIPPING FOR ALL UNITED STATES PURCHASES.
story_txt:
About Us:
The Handlers Basketball is a training company dedicated to helping basketball players from every stage of the game improve their skills. From a kid making basketball dribbling drill videos in my basement, to a brand of over 70,000 followers on Instagram (@thehandlers), The Handlers shows people the power of Basketball. This new basketball training glove is just the beginning of multiple unique and effect basketball training products to help players improve their game.
 
Glove Four Features:
-The Palm deflector pushes the ball away from the palm, forcing the player to control the ball with their finger pads
-The finger seperators keep your fingers in a wide athletic grip allowing you to cover more surface area of the basketball giving the player more control 
-The adjustable weight is filled with iron steel and has the ability to come on or off the glove 
-The exposed finger glove allows you to get the actual feel of the basketball while training
 
Product Tested:
This product was originally made at a small scale and tested by some of the best in each segment of the basketball market. The feedback we received was overwhelmingly positive. These segments include:
-WNBA Players
-NBA G-League Players
-Harlem Globetrotters
-High-Level NBA Skills Trainers
-Division 1 Basketball Players
-Top 10 High School Recruits in their respected classes
(for evidence of this please view videos that are shared on my Instagram: @thehandlers)
 
Funding:
The Handlers needs help financing the first large purchase order to have the ability to share the glove with the masses. I am just a young 26 year-old former basketball player and do not currently have the budget to afford a large purchase order so am looking to IndiGOGO to help reach my goal of affording a large order. With a $50 backing you will receive a pair of gloves delivered in the mail. FREE SHIPPING FOR ALL UNITED STATES PURCHASES.

story:
Visit our Website:

https://www.fitstop.io

 

Title 

 

FitStop – Fitness Anytime, Anywhere, Right from Your Phone 

 

 

Tagline 

 

People are looking for alternative fitness solutions. Ours is called FitStop. 

 

 

Pitch 

 

The New Normal in Health and Fitness 

 

After this year, there is no telling where the fitness industry is headed. Gyms, fitness centers, and other facilities remain closed, and even as they reopen, it is likely that people’s habits will have shifted for good. We have seen over the last several months that North Americans are willing to look past traditional gyms and fitness centers: purchasing fitness equipment, weights, and cardio machines in large numbers, they are exhibiting a willingness to try new modes of exercise and cutting-edge approaches to their own health. 

 

We see an opportunity to help people here, and we are eager to pursue it. 

 

 

Introducing: FitStop 

 

The app that we have designed, called FitStop, stands for a substantially different fitness environment – one that stands in stark contrast to the inconvenient gyms and fitness centers that have dominated the fitness sector for such a long time. On our app, personal trainers can launch their businesses from the comfort of their own homes, offering their services to wider audiences, who can also tap into them from the comfort of their own homes. 

 

Our goal is to afford people complete and comprehensive access to their fitness journeys once again, something that may have slipped through their fingers and passed them by this year. 

 

 

How It Works 

 

Getting started on FitStop is simple. As a personal trainer, you would create your profile and then set up your classes or connect with people for one-on-one training sessions. As a user, you would create your profile and then browse the classes that are available or find the personal trainer who is perfect for you. We have devoted ourselves to designing a platform that is easy to use, simplifying the process that people need to go through in order to start moving, get their bodies flowing, and claim all of their health goals. 

 

 

Better Careers for Trainers 

 

For a small fee, personal trainers can become their own bosses, launching their businesses online and cutting through all of the red tape that would otherwise seem so daunting to them as they worked to attract clients and set up online fitness classes. Everything goes through FitStop, from the video streams to the payments, which means that trainers can focus exclusively on offering top-quality personal training services. 

 

 

Better Health for You 

 

As a user on FitStop, you can access health, strength, and fitness from your phone, tablet, or even desktop computer. If you are looking for a personal trainer, for some motivation, or for a boost to your confidence, all you need to do is log in to the app, find your trainer or class, and take control of your health and wellness once and for all. Our interactive app is exactly what the moment calls for, filling a real need that North Americans in every city are experiencing. 

 

If you have searched for something new and different, this is it. 

 

FitStop is the key to your ultimate fitness success. 

 

A Fitter World for Us All 

 

In addition to supporting personal trainers and people who are looking for creative ways to exercise from their homes, both throughout the healthcare crisis and beyond, FitStop is doing important work toward building a better world for us all. We are making North America a healthier place to live, and at a time when potentially 30 million people are out of a gym space between Canada and the US, this is extremely important. 

 

We have created all of the preliminary layouts and development plans for FitStop. To engineer the app itself, though, we need your support. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get 

 

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising between $10,000 and $15,000. If we can hit $10,000, we will be able to cover most of our development costs, and if we can raise more than $15,000, we will divert the remainder to our advertising budget, promoting FitStop to people across the US and Canada. 

 

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering some limited-edition rewards, including discounts on group classes and merchandise branded with the FitStop logo. 

 

Contribute now and do your part to get FitStop up and running! 

 

 

Our Business Model 

 

To promote FitStop, we are going to form a community of fitness influencers and enthusiasts, leveraging existing audiences to encourage people to rethink their fitness strategies. We will then generate revenue through FitStop by charging small fees for the services that we are facilitating, empowering personal trainers by allowing them to keep the bulk of their charges – while making our model sustainable by making it economically feasible. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges 

 

Although there are other fitness apps on the market, FitStop is unique in that it is enabling personal trainers and their potential clients to connect directly, either one-on-one or in group classes. We are confident that once people understand the FitStop difference, they will download our app in large numbers. 

 

Until then, we are concentrating all of our energy on development, doing everything that we can to avoid logistical difficulties and sticking to our timeline, leading up to our planned {month and year} launch. If we do run into any delays, we will be sure to keep all of our contributors in the loop, remaining transparent about all the progress that we are making. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for FitStop by sharing a link to the campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother this launch will go. If you know anyone who feels as if they have fallen off their fitness path because of isolation or gym closures, let them know that there is another way. Let them know that FitStop has arrived. 

 

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

story:
SafeKey – Avoid Germs in Public

We are proud to introduce our answer to germs & viruses – SafeKey.

SafeKey is a simple tool that helps you to avoid germs in public places.

  • Pushing public buttons
  • Opening doors
  • Using ATMs
  • Shopping


​All of this is safer when using this little gadget that you can hang from your belt loop.

 

  

  

We wanted to ensure the safety of the people in our own company which resulted in this idea. While there were similar products on offer, we created ours from brass, which is known for its anti-microbial properties and added a few more functionalities to SafeKey.

As it proved really popular among our team and their families, we decided to bring it to the public. Now it’s your chance to either protect yourself, your family or employees from germs.
 

Funding

We are looking to raise £5000 to help us deliver the SafeKey to you at an affordable price. Every contributor can select a suitable perk from the sidebar, whether you want a single item or a whole pack for all the family members.

Our company deals with metal fabrication daily and we have been helping NHS projects, so we can see that this sector can use some more assistance. Thus, in case we cannot reach the goal, all the funds will go to the COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund for WHO or will be refunded.
 

Why SafeKey?

We have to keep in mind that the current situation needs special measures. That’s what drove us towards creating SafeKey.

Choosing brass as the material helps to reduce the time Coronavirus bacteria can live on the tool. While the germs tend to last a few days on materials like steel or plastic, brass kills them in a few hours.

Also, several studies have shown a significant decrease of bacteria living on devices made from brass compared to other materials.
https://mbio.asm.org/content/6/6/e01697-15
https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/infection-control-and-hospital-epidemiology/article/antimicrobial-efficacy-of-copper-alloy-furnishing-in-the-clinical-environment-a-crossover-study/0AEDAC712740D613D9EC0EB38E2B28BD

Copper percentages must reach 58% to get the effect. We are using CZ108 grade brass with 64% of copper.

It is important to note that SafeKey is not an alternative to disinfecting surfaces. Rather, it is an extra layer of protection, helping to avoid direct contact with contaminated surfaces.

We designed SafeKey in a way that will also keep it relevant after the current COVID-19 crisis. Using it on the keychain, it will still come in handy at public restrooms for example. Adding the functionalities of a bottle opener and a spanner also make sure you will find some good use to it afterwards.

 

  

The Team Behind

The creator of SafeKey is Martin Vares, the CEO of Fractory and a recent Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree in the manufacturing category (on the right).

Fractory is an award winning international manufacturing company that offers its services online. The team boasts over 15 seasoned engineers whose expertise was used on this project.

Using the company’s international presence and capabilities, we can assure great quality as well as local manufacturing. This way we can reduce the ecological footprint by keeping the manufacturing close to you.

Also, having our own manufacturing network helps us to drive down the project costs and ensure low prices.
 

Spreading the Word

Whether you are ordering a single piece, a whole package for colleagues or just like the idea, please share the campaign on different social media platforms by just clicking on the share tools in the campaign page.

story:
Hi,

My name is Sebastián, I am the co-founder of Egal Health.

Egal Health offers a modern approach to equality through an online platform designed to provide easy access to mental healthcare and wellness for people in the LGBTIQ+ spectrum.  We match LGBTIQ+ patients with licensed, trained, and accredited psychologists and provide counseling privately or anonymously via video or audio. Our mission is to provide everyone with easy, affordable, and secure access to professional counseling on-demand.

To learn more about our team you can visit our profile at The Org.

The Size of the Problem

According to data from the Australian Government, 41% of LGBTIQ+ people have a diagnosed mental health condition. However, many of us avoid mental healthcare due to fear of stigma, high price per session, or geographic distances. These all serve as barriers for individuals who would otherwise benefit from counseling.

The Solution

Recent studies have shown that 94% of people prefer digital psychotherapy over face-to-face therapy. In fact, 98% of people using this method reported making progress. At Egal Health, our mission is to provide everyone with on-demand professional counseling that is easy, affordable, and secure. We are committed to building a diverse community that helps people feel supported in their healthcare journey, ensures that quality, readily available, and accessible mental healthcare is guaranteed at all times.

We Need Your Support

We are currently a team of five looking to build our first tech venture. We are experts in the areas of LGBTIQ+ psychology and neuroscience, business development, software engineering, and brand development. However, building a technology company is extremely expensive. Your support could help us cover our product development and marketing costs to be able to go-to-market across Australia in early 2021. 

My Story

At the age of 17 I came out of the closet. Ten years later I was diagnosed with anxiety. The first time I heard about it, I felt scared, vulnerable, and ashamed. Many things were going on in my life, and it was a key moment for me to better understand the sources of my symptoms of worry, restlessness, and trouble with concentration. All of these being ongoing issues I have dealt with since I was kid.

Whilst living in New York City I met with various psychologists who were specialized in LGBTIQ+ related issues. However, I found that many of them had no experience with the issues I was facing. Instead, I often felt judged for what was happening in my life and as if I was the one teaching them about my problems. To make matters worse, I was also paying a substantive amount for these services.

That’s how I arrived at the NY LGBT Center, a historic community centre located in Downtown Manhattan, where they referred me to a trained and specialized psychologist on gender and sexuality issues. My psychologist, Jeff, helped me to better understand that being gay has not been easy for me. Throughout my life, I have been bullied and discriminated against, being authentic at work has been a challenge, relationships have not been easy, and that is only the beginning of the list.

After numerous sessions with Jeff that involved delving into my upbringing and experience as an LGBTIQ+ person, as well as reading endless resources about sexuality and mental healthcare, I realized that finding professional help for my own mental health problem was the right solution. However, I also realized that issues such as availability, coverage, and quality meant that this solution was not attainable for everyone.

If you would like to support Egal Health in any way, please get in touch at sebastian@egalhealth.com or victoria@egalhealth.com. 

Thank you,

Sebastián

story:
Sterilize anything you want, anytime, and anywhere you go!

 

The real reason to close the toilet lid is a phenomenon known as a "toilet plume", a.k.a. the germs and fecal matter that get shot upwards — up to 15 feet high! — with the force created by the sudden gush of water.

 

Not everyone close their lid after use! We all know that!

The Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer is an intelligent device that uses mercury-free UV-C LED technology to seamlessly and consistently sanitize your toilet seat inside and out to make sure it’s bacteria-free all the time!

 

The Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer UV-C LED light substantially covers both the inside part of the toilet and the toilet seat with which your skin will come into contact.

 

 Sterilization for the inside part of the toilet

 Sterilization for the toilet seat(If you don't close the lid)

The Human detection sensor safety feature, makes it even safer to use. It is 100% safe and there is no need to worry about the LED light harming your eyes. Even when it starts sterilizing, whenever people get close (within 3 meters), it will automatically stop, preventing any harm to you!

This world’s first toilet sterilizing device with unique features:

Truth be told, before we came up with Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer, there was no solution to disinfecting toilet seats and toilet seat cushions—anywhere in the world! 

The special advantage is that the Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer holds the mercury-free UV-C LED technology that we use to accomplish a fast and effective sterilization outcome: eliminating bacteria in 120 seconds. At 275mm, the UV-C light effectively destroys the DNA and RNA strands of bacteria, also killing germs and dust mites.

 

This is so advanced that even NASA is using this technology to sterilize their water in space! They started using UV-C LED deep UV disinfection technology to sterilize space gloves and allow astronauts to drink pure water. Now we’re making it available for you to easily keep your toilet away from bacteria. This technology holds FDA, CE, and SGS certifications, so it couldn’t be safer for you to use!

 

 UV-C LED Test

 
 

1.Hand-held mode: hold it in your hand and point it towards what you want to sanitize

 

2.Vertical mode: the sterilizer is mounted on the fixed bracket, and the toilet lid is open 

 

3.Horizontal mode: the sterilizer is mounted on the fixed bracket, and the toilet lid is closed

 

In any case, the Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer offers a new kind of sanitizing experience.

 

The Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer is not only portable and convenient, but the magnetic suction charger makes it an easily chargeable device.

 

Mahaton combines international trendy industrial design with the green UV-C LED sterilization technology that NASA uses. The company is formed by one of the earliest engineering teams in the world to develop UV-C LED technology-based consumer products. Based on this technology, we first developed the Mahaton Self-Cleaning Water Bottle with Wireless Charging, which raised over $50,000 on Kickstarter. And we’re now launching the Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer—again, offering you technological innovation to make your home and other living environments cleaner and safer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best  Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and  over $500M raised in total.

 

This project is promoted by Green Inbox

This technology holds FDA, CE, and SGS certifications, so it couldn’t be safer for you to use!  UV-C LED Test  1.Hand-held mode: hold it in your hand and point it towards what you want to sanitize 2.Vertical mode: the sterilizer is mounted on the fixed bracket, and the toilet lid is open  3.Horizontal mode: the sterilizer is mounted on the fixed bracket, and the toilet lid is closed In any case, the Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer offers a new kind of sanitizing experience. The Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer is not only portable and convenient, but the magnetic suction charger makes it an easily chargeable device. Mahaton combines international trendy industrial design with the green UV-C LED sterilization technology that NASA uses. The company is formed by one of the earliest engineering teams in the world to develop UV-C LED technology-based consumer products. Based on this technology, we first developed the Mahaton Self-Cleaning Water Bottle with Wireless Charging, which raised over $50,000 on Kickstarter. And we’re now launching the Mahaton Toilet Sterilizer—again, offering you technological innovation to make your home and other living environments cleaner and safer.      This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best  Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and  over $500M raised in total. This project is promoted by Green Inbox

story:
Why Fun Kits for Kids in the Hospital

Thanks for reading about our idea. We have made ten Fun Kits already, but want to do more.

  • We are the Rainbow Whirlwind Army. We are ages 8-11. We wanted to do a Community Service. 
  • Our group talked about how scary the hospital is. One of our members has been hospitalized nine times and has a brother who has been in more than 40 times. So we want to help fellow kids and make them feel a little less miserable while they get better.
  • To cheer up sick and injured kids, there are a lot of nice things that hospitals do. But knowing other kids care about you is important. So we've been making bright, happy pillowcases that older kids (like us and teenagers) would like. We want to add art supplies to them and we are calling them Fun Kits. Our motto is "Play Down for Lay Down"!

What We Need & What You Get

Here's detail:

  • We need about $10 per Fun Kit, for the cost of fabric and a couple of art supplies.
  • You can get your name on one of the tags we make for inside the pillowcase! Just make a donation of at least $25 and we can send you a picture of the tag.
  • We are also held a rummage sale, bake sale and giant board games to raise money. In the summer we plan to do a garage sale.
  • If we don't reach our goal of being able to make 50 more of these, we will use the money to make as many of them as we can. And then we'll try some more!

Kids will know you care

Everyone loves to get presents. We will do the work of getting it all together, but do need more money. Art supplies are super expensive. With all of our allowances we only got enough money for the first ten.

  • Because we know something about being in the hospital, we want to do this for other kids. No matter how sick a kid feels, we still want to play and pretend, even if we can only do it from a bed.
  • The pillowcases are made of new fabric, but we make each one ourselves.
  • We have communicated with our local Children's Hospital to make sure our donations will be accepted. They will and they're very excited it won't just be for little kids.

Risks & Challenges

We can't just collect old art supplies from schools or people.

  • We know that all art supplies must be new and unopened or else the Children's Hospital cannot distribute them.
  • Being germ free means our items must meet the standards set by Child Life at our hospital. We are doing those things.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't give us money, we could use your help.

  • If you can't give, could you share our page with others who might be able to? We appreciate it very much.
  • The share tools on here are easy to use!

You are awesome for reading this. We hope you can help us .

story:
Homemade Natural Organic Protein Bars

These are simple protein/nutrition bars that I have made. It is made from the basis of organic nuts and other organic and natural foods and has no preservatives, no processed foods, and no added sugars. It is packed with about 30 grams of protein and high in energy producing nutrients. It is also vegan approved, and most important very TASTY!

The Story

The idea came as I was just looking for something healthy to eat as a snack, and I mixed in a few items and decided to shape it into a bar. My college roommates (Chef Awesome & Ali "The Great") tasted them and said I should sell it and...KA-POW!

So far, I have been selling my product by hand and by person to person. I have seen nothing but positive feedback in that it tastes just right (not too sweet/unsweet but smooth), and that it is filling and healthy and that it GETS THE JOB DONE!


The Future

I would really like to put this item into local stores and get it to health/non-health conscious people (and those who just like good snacks). In order to do that I will have to produce this in larger bulk and in a commercial kitchen (in which I will also get Health Permits and USDA Organic Approvals, etc).




HOW WE WILL GET THERE TOGETHER


What You Can Do

Below is a list of what is needed to GO TO THE NEXT LEVEL. Also, to the side is a chart of perks that you will receive upon donations. Any single item is interchangeable for another within reason. Also, for donations $200 and above, donors will be able to subscribe to the newsletter. So, donations of any amount, thoughts, opinions, Facebook/Twitter shares, likes,  word-of-mouth advertising, volunteers and prayers are all welcomed.

I really believe that this is a unique one-of-a-kind product and the potential for this is inevitable and limitless.

What We Need

We can make these products from home, but in order to take it to the next level, and place our items in stores, we have to become a little bit more official/efficient:

  • Patents (Legalities & Protection)
  • Department Permits (More Legal stuff)
  • Space in Commercial Kitchen (Found a really convenient place to cook)
  • Bulk Food Supplies (Organic nuts can get pricey, but are cheaper in bulk)
  • Small Packaging/Printing Supplies (This is to look more official & be efficient)
  • Marketing & Advertising (To help spread the word & boost brand awareness)
  • Small Staff Team (To help with events/production/marketing)

The Dream Does Not Stop

Even after this campaign, there will be additional ways to get involved. I really want this to be a community effort and to build health consciousness into people's way of living. There are also ideas for future product lines and other healthy, tasty treats to come about in the future.

I believe that we all can accomplish our dreams and in turn inspire others to do the same thing if we never quit or give up. You have a dream in you that will touch others. So, with that said, I want to THANK YOU a lot for whatever thoughts or donations you give to this campaign and as the famous song says, "DON'T STOP BELIEVING"!


Thank You!

thelifebars@gmail.com


**TRY A SAMPLE for free when you follow/share us on Facebook!!**

*We Will Also Donate A Portion of What We receive to a Charity that is fighting hunger and promoting health throughout the world! *
